
-----title

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1076')">1072-1076年</a>　居新昌。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　居新昌，尝随父至县城，游石龟观，拜石龟。<br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　居新昌，闻云庵克文禅师之名，时克文住新昌洞山普利禅院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1081')">1080-1081年</a>　居新昌。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　居新昌，与宜禅师谊叟游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　居新昌，与邻家子蔡康国日课读儒经。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　居新昌，父母并月而没，出继喻家为嗣，喻家祭祖，以非本族男不得续嗣，出之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　为童僧，依新昌三峰山宝云寺靘禅师。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　专学作诗，废食忘眠，日记数千言，览群书殆尽，靘禅师器之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　闻靘禅师诵迦叶波偈，茫然莫识其旨。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='25b4e0c186084d13b57040f7e1f3c876_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　从克文禅师学出世法，文字大进。听景福顺禅师言僧景淳工诗事，心不然之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　随师克文禅师移居九峰。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='345f401453c3450c87899b984fb27cd4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("345f401453c3450c87899b984fb27cd4");'><span id='345f401453c3450c87899b984fb27cd4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520511'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520511'>炎炎三伏过中伏，秋光先到幽人家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520511'>闭门积雨藓封径，寒塘白藕晴开花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520511'>吾侪酷爱真乐妙，笑谈相对兴无涯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520511'>山童解烹蟹眼汤，先生自试鹰爪芽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520511'>清香玉乳沃诗脾，抨纸落笔惊龙蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520511'>源长浩与春涨激，力健清将秋气嘉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520511'>须臾沓幅乱书几，环观朗诵交惊誇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520511'>一声渔笛意不尽，夕阳归去还西斜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520511'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>次韵龚端咏颜真卿、柳公权帖诗。作品：《次韵龚德颜柳帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520457' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520457' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520457?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵龚德颜柳帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520457")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520457_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520457'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520457'>颜柳以字名，画画法可究。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520457'>后世何寂寥，此辈了无有。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520457'>皆云学未至，妙不应心手。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520457'>那知斯人徒，德高名往就。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520457'>字工德不修，名与身俱朽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520457'>吾子佳少年，俊气驹方骤。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520457'>新诗作行草，开轴龙蛇走。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520457'>坐客口为愕，我亦知肯首。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520457'>积墨如陂池，积笔高陇阜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520457'>学之不至颜，要亦终至柳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520457'>此诗闻东坡，请君书座右。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520457'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_520457_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='78cbee25c32b4f93863d19afb1629ab3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("78cbee25c32b4f93863d19afb1629ab3");'><span id='78cbee25c32b4f93863d19afb1629ab3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>，28岁</div><div id='78cbee25c32b4f93863d19afb1629ab3' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年8月15日</a>　在洞山诵契嵩禅师《嘉祐集》，中秋日，为之作序。作品：《嘉祐序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>嘉祐序</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符元年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213260")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213260'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213260'>禅师讳契嵩，字仲灵，藤州人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213260_comment'></div>少从洞山聪禅师游，出世湖山，乃嗣其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213260_comment'></div>其道微妙，而末法学者器近而不能晓悟，而公亦不肯少低其韵，以俯循其机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213260_comment'></div>因叹曰：「吾安能圆凿以就方柄哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213260_comment'></div>闻之圣贤所为，得志则行其道，否则言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213260_comment'></div>言之行，由是为万世法，使天下学者识度修明，远邪林而游正涂，则奚必目击而受之，谓己之出邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213260_comment'></div>即闭关著书，以考正祖宗所以来之之迹为十二卷，又列《定祖图》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213260_comment'></div>书成，携之京师，因内翰王公素献之仁宗皇帝，又为书先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213260_comment'></div>上读至「臣固为道不为名，为法不为身」，叹爱其诚，旌以明教大师，赐其书入藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213260_comment'></div>书既送中书，时魏国韩公琦览之，以示欧阳文忠公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213260_comment'></div>公方以文章自任，以师表天下，又以护宗，不喜吾道，见其文，谓魏公曰：「不意僧中有此郎邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213260_comment'></div>黎明当一识之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213260_comment'></div>公因往见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213260_comment'></div>文忠与语终日，遂大喜，由是公名振海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213260_comment'></div>遂买舟东下，居永安精舍而归老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213260_comment'></div>公虽于古今内外之书无所不读，至于安危治乱之略，当世闻人，少见其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213260_comment'></div>而痛以律自律其身，其学端诚为归宿之地，而慕梁惠约之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213260_comment'></div>以其学校其所为，未见少差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213260_comment'></div>其考正命分，于贤圣出处之际，尤为详正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213260_comment'></div>观学者循奇巧而不知本也，乃作《坛经赞》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213260_comment'></div>亡孝背义又循养其欲也，乃作《孝篇》十二章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213260_comment'></div>士大夫不顾名实，多是己非他，乃作《辅教编》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213260_comment'></div>学者苟合自轻，不贵尚以修德也，乃题《远公影堂》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213260_comment'></div>记其所慕也，乃作《茨堂序》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213260_comment'></div>因风俗山川之胜，欲以抛掷其才力以收景趣，乃作《武林志》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213260_comment'></div>至于长诗、赞而已，殆所谓太山之一毫芒耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213260_comment'></div>公终于湖山，而火化不坏者六物，天下闻其风者，为之首东长想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213260_comment'></div>呜呼，一匹夫云行鸟飞天地之间，视万乘之尊，其天地之远也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213260_comment'></div>顾巨公贵人，云泥之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213260_comment'></div>而一旦以其所为之书献，天子为之动容，天下靡然向其风，而卒能酬其志，岂非其所自信修诚之效欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213260_comment'></div>后之学者读其书，必有掩卷而三叹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213260_comment'></div>元符元年中秋日，高安某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1213260_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　初冬，将离新昌往他山，龚端自邑中驰书挽留，是夕胡彦通亦会，共坐清谈，达旦不寐，共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗，作诗怀其人。作品：《余将经行他山德庄自邑中驰书作诗见留是夕胡彦通亦会二君于谈达旦不寐明日霜重共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗有怀其人五首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《余将经行他山德庄自邑中驰书作诗见留是夕胡彦通亦会二君于谈达旦不寐明日霜重共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗有怀其人五首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《余将经行他山德庄自邑中驰书作诗见留是夕胡彦通亦会二君于谈达旦不寐明日霜重共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗有怀其人五首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《余将经行他山德庄自邑中驰书作诗见留是夕胡彦通亦会二君于谈达旦不寐明日霜重共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗有怀其人五首》（其四）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《余将经行他山德庄自邑中驰书作诗见留是夕胡彦通亦会二君于谈达旦不寐明日霜重共读蔡德符兄弟所寄诗有怀其人五首》（其五）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521673' class='_poem'><div class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521677'><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月</a>　正月，住新昌洞山，大雪，作诗戏招邹正臣。作品：《大雪戏招耶溪先生邹元佐》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大雪戏招耶溪先生邹元佐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520455")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520455'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520455'>昨夜颠风吹裂石，晓来雪片大如席。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520455'>耶溪先生醉不知，拥絮雷霆喧鼻息。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520455'>痴奴搥门呼不应，但闻含糊语呵叱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520455'>先生行世如行川，虚舟触人无怨言。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520455'>逢人觅钱即沽酒，得钱不谢犹傲然。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520455'>我欲看君堕帻醉，便觉两颊微涡旋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520455'>款段自能驮醉起，归路逆风吹冻耳。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520455'>入门儿女啼饥寒，瞪目瞠然作直视。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520455_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520455'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月</a>　因大雪，晚睡，梦与李德修语甚久，既觉，作诗。作品：《大雪晚睡梦李德修插琼花一枝与语甚久既觉作此诗时在洞山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大雪晚睡梦李德修插琼花一枝与语甚久既觉作此诗时在洞山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520477")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520477_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520477'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520477'>穷年踏黄尘，旅卧每自鄙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520477'>此山颇岑寂，饮食亦清美。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520477'>瘦藤当一折，且作终老计。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520477'>晓堂看春雪，秀色净窗几。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520477'>炉暖倚蒲团，颓然成坐睡。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520477'>君从何所来，会我清梦里。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520477'>琼花斜袅帽，眸子湛秋水。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520477'>伊予杂欢笑，应阿竟何事。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520477'>忽然长揖去，惊觉在千里。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520477'>人生孰非梦，安有昏旦异。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520477'>心知目所见，历历皆虚伪。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520477'>他日或相逢，何殊开睫寐。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520477'>此诗当见渠，一展笑相视。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520477'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_520477_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　希祖出示克文所蓄黄龙慧南手迹，题其后。作品：《题黄龙南和尚手抄后三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span>《题黄龙南和尚手抄后三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span>《题黄龙南和尚手抄后三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题黄龙南和尚手抄后<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213293")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213293'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213293'>予犹及见丛林老成人，皆云黄龙南禅师游方时，尝至归宗宝鬔头，方会茶师，却倚而坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213293_comment'></div>宝呵之：「南书记无骨耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213293_comment'></div>师惊顾，玉立如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213293_comment'></div>又至栖贤，諟禅师教令坐禅，久之得定，因诵《首楞严》咒终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213293_comment'></div>建中靖国元年春，修水祖超然出云庵所蓄此书为示，点画奇劲，如空中之雨，小大萧散，出于自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213293_comment'></div>予置卷叹曰：成德之人，其所作为，虽点笔弄墨之际，亦自卓绝，况其不可名者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213293_comment'></div>某题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　于故人处获福严良雅所集洞山守初禅师语录一编。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在洞山，读清禀禅师《澄心堂录》，得谷山行崇禅师语。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　偶见洞山藏角有道常禅师所编百丈怀海语录，为题其后。作品：《题百丈常禅师所编大智广录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题百丈常禅师所编大智广录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213276")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213276'>余常识老僧知琼于司命山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213276_comment'></div>琼，湓城人，黄龙无恙时客也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213276_comment'></div>为余言：「黄龙住山，作止甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213276_comment'></div>尝手校此录于积翠，谓门弟子曰：『佛语心宗，法门旨趣，至江西为大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213276_comment'></div>大智精妙颖悟之力，能到其所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213276_comment'></div>此中虽无地可以栖言语，然要不可以终去语言也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213276_comment'></div>故其广演之语，大剔禅者法执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213276_comment'></div>而今之五家宗趣，皆此录森列，如井之在海，其清凉甘滑，泄苦浊毒所不同，而本则无异质也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213276_comment'></div>予志其言久之，偶见洞山藏角破函中多故经，往掀搅之，乃获见常禅师居百丈日重编者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213276_comment'></div>熟读，验琼之言，信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213276_comment'></div>校世所传，多讹略，因藏之，以正诸传之失，又志琼之首告也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在洞山作诗贺希祖生辰。作品：《洞山祖超然生辰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洞山祖超然生辰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520451")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520451_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520451'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520451'>希郎真吾道门友，初见忘年今耐久。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520451'>天机深稳道骨清，诗句谁令愕人口。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520451'>可怜佳处未全知，但见兹篇气浑厚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520451'>我生痴鲁人所弃，洞视胸中了无有。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520451'>但忻所至有青山，依倚丛林遮百丑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520451'>君才一筹胜却我，胡为包腰反随后。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520451'>人生嗜好调自殊，海上旧闻人逐臭。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520451'>江南长忆好云泉，今日云泉长入手。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520451'>万顷苍然几桉间，作诗举以为君寿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520451'>理毫聊为试冰华，小字明窗看挥肘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520451_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520451'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520451_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　王野夫相访洞山，既去，作诗，兼简王直夫。作品：《桐川王野夫相访洞山既去作此兼简直夫》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520459' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520459' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520459?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桐川王野夫相访洞山既去作此兼简直夫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520459")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520459_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520459'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520459'>野夫加于人一等，玉骨春容含秀整。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520459'>已惊词源倒三峡，会看声名重九鼎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520459'>江南尽处山作堆，雨馀青碧数峰开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520459'>那知万壑千岩处，风帽蹇驴能独来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520459'>凤凰鸑鷟未入眼，今识鹓雏犹恨晚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520459'>兴阑掉头不肯留，出门去袂聊一挽。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520459'>君家富贵若骑虎，拥鼻未免非虚语。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520459'>何当解带食太仓，时时携被宿玉堂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520459'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520459_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　夏，客洞山禅悦堂之东斋，向南开轩，名其轩曰画浪，并作记。作品：《画浪轩记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213426' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213426' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213426?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画浪轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213426")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213426_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213426'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213426'>建中靖国改元夏，余客洞山禅悦堂之东斋，中无长物，唯置一床，覆以蘧蒢，架书数卷于枕间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213426_comment'></div>傃南开轩以纳众山之胜，眼倦抛书，坐卧惟山之接，山容无尽而乐亦无厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213426_comment'></div>三伏大热，坐榻皆温，林阴拂掠，不足以剪畏日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213426_comment'></div>有蜀道人得孙知微活水遗法，为余壁间作崩掀渺漫之图，以来凉气，解衣磐礴，奋笔而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213426_comment'></div>余惊定叹曰：「异哉，一堵之间，须臾之顷，而足江湖万顷之势，壮波怒涡，洼窿千状，而有不穷之变；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213426_comment'></div>阴风徐来，毛骨震掉，忽焉如舟洞庭而望霜晓也，能复有险畏神速于此者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213426_comment'></div>道人举杖，指以谓余曰：「龙骧万斛，逶迤而进，如欲济，如慎畏，有如明公卿任大责重，思所以济民而报国者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213426_comment'></div>舳舻衔尾，追逐上下，如行如留，有如仕路之纷纷，方进而未艾者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213426_comment'></div>鱼龙变化，更相出没，有如贱而忽显，贵而忽弃者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213426_comment'></div>一叶之艇，傲颠风而舞澎湃，超然自得，有如道德奇逸，杂市人而无辨者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213426_comment'></div>世波之神速险畏，其有以类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213426_comment'></div>故吾图之至于白鸥沙禽，汎汎随流，若无所与者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213426_comment'></div>又如我辈宅青山而侣白云，然犹思高飞远引，不能与之涉也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213426_comment'></div>余扪其汹涌起突之处，点画秾纤之间，语之曰：「果有生灭变易否乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213426_comment'></div>曰：「无有也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213426_comment'></div>「夫天地万物之盛，备古今寒暑之往来，是非荣辱相寻于无穷，而死生忧患追逐之而不赦，错综历乱，如蜜房，如乱丝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213426_comment'></div>如此画浪，初未始有生灭，有变易，而其颠倒妄自惊怪者，如子自画之，而又自畏之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213426_comment'></div>古之大圣人皆能游戏于此，故曰『是法住法位，世间相常住』，又曰『一切法常静，无有起相震』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213426_comment'></div>旦驹儿，子之乡老也，而亦曰『如画水成文，不生不灭』，何遽忘之也耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213426_comment'></div>于是道人顾余而笑曰：「愿从子游」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213426_comment'></div>因名其轩曰「画浪」，又为之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213426_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在洞山日，尝独行山谷间，见有岩如侧磬，中有石床，仅容坐卧，名之曰宜独岩，为作铭。作品：《宜独岩铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213502' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213502' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213502?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宜独岩铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213502")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213502_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213502'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213502'>余性喜笑傲，不了人之爱憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213502_comment'></div>比坐哗众，人所鄙弃，饭馀曳杖山行，路穷则反，会意植杖，莞然一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213502_comment'></div>响应山谷之西崦，幽奇可爱，有岩西向，洞如侧磬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213502_comment'></div>中有石砧，仅容坐卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213502_comment'></div>而附岩左右，偏生脩竹，余每至此，终日忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213502_comment'></div>既久，因名其岩曰宜独，乃为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213502_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213502'>幽岩如磬，侧立山腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213502_comment'></div>中有石砧，砥平而绿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213502_comment'></div>我来忘归，卧听风竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213502_comment'></div>夫物得宜，如眉映目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213502_comment'></div>幽居情闲，乃名宜独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213502_comment'></div>一顷之陂，清馀两鹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213502_comment'></div>得其所哉，此诗可录。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213502_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　雨后得法如所寄新诗，次其韵。作品：《雨后得无象新诗次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雨后得无象新诗次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_520833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520833'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520833'>雨馀步林幽，松风初到面。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520833'>寒蝉相应鸣，小立无人见。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' gray;'>▪</span>自长沙往分宁龙安山兜率寺，过新昌，遇彭几自京师归。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读饶节送彭几诗，想见其为人，闻时已出家为僧，作诗次其韵。作品：《饶德操营中客世与渊才友善有诗送之予偶读想见其为人时闻已薙发出家矣因次其韵》<span target='_blank'>饶德操营中客世与渊才友善有诗送之予偶读想见其为人时闻已薙发出家矣因次其韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520531")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520531'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520531'>吾闻彼上人，不惰不精进。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520531'>观其吐词气，人品极爽俊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520531'>迩来效丹霞，裂冠铲须鬓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520531'>高才固难容，世议久迫窘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520531'>想于龙象群，眉宇发奇韵。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520531'>渊才干国器，美若兵厨酝。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>，37岁</div><div id='c952237daa004fe4abf45523b6006dc8' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>　初春，赴临川，道经新昌县城，过石龟观，忆亡友胡汝霖事，以炭书其壁。作品：《题石龟观壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题石龟观壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213472")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213472'>余家筠溪之上，去城馀百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213472_comment'></div>儿时闻城中塔成，欲往观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213472_comment'></div>因先君行，坐余于力谢三肩上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213472_comment'></div>至石龟观，谢三者绐余曰：「当先拜石龟，乃能见塔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213472_comment'></div>不然，终不可见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213472_comment'></div>余曰：「傥尔，汝何不拜」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213472_comment'></div>曰：「我已尝拜之，汝既童子，又后至，法当拜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213472_comment'></div>于是再拜入城，幸见塔，而心喜谢三肯余先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213472_comment'></div>后三十年过焉，视石乌龟良无恙，摩挲以追绎前事，为大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213472_comment'></div>吾亡友胡汝霖民望，生抚之金溪，七八岁时，随兄入城，忽不知所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213472_comment'></div>使人寻，已在宝应寺前看泥力士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213472_comment'></div>余每以戏之，而忘余亦有此患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213472_comment'></div>乃以炭书其壁，曰：「须知泥力士，不减石乌龟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213472_comment'></div>忠子，民望里人也，书以示之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213472_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='7cfb8144a1064b6d96759c477d13868e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7cfb8144a1064b6d96759c477d13868e");'><span id='7cfb8144a1064b6d96759c477d13868e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='7cfb8144a1064b6d96759c477d13868e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　至新昌，作诗次己作《宿宣妙寺》韵。作品：《次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年3月</a>　三月，希祖来访，喜作诗次前韵。作品：《三月喜超然至次前韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三月喜超然至次前韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520616")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520616'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520616'>杨柳风萧萧，芙蕖晴熳熳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520616'>水阁试新凉，披衣快清旦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520616'>幽居非养高，一榻聊医懒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520616'>嘿观四大空，吾复有何患。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520616'>上人超诣姿，丛林得精拣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520616'>勿嫌白兆村，真是人天眼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520616'>穿云得得来，其他空非瞰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520616'>遂为信宿留，与子同朝饭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520616'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520616_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　与希祖对榻夜语，忆谢逸，跋其诗。作品：《跋谢无逸诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋谢无逸诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213396")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213396'>临川谢无逸，布衣而名重搢绅，于书无所不读，于文无所不能，而尤工于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213396_comment'></div>黄鲁直阅其与老仲元诗曰：「老凤垂头噤不语，枯木查牙噪春鸟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213396_comment'></div>大惊曰：「张、晁流也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213396_comment'></div>陈莹中阅其赠普安禅师诗曰：「老师登堂挝大鼓，是中那容啬夫喋」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213396_comment'></div>叹息曰：「计其魁杰，不减张、晁也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213396_comment'></div>二诗于无逸集中未为绝唱，而陈、黄已绝倒无馀，惜其未多见之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213396_comment'></div>然无逸又喜论列而气长，诗尚造语而工，置于文潜、补之集中，东坡不能辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213396_comment'></div>文章如良金美玉，自有定价，殆非虚语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213396_comment'></div>予方以罪谪海外，无逸适过庐山，见吾弟超然，熟视久之，意折曰：「吾此生复能见觉范乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213396_comment'></div>语不成声，乃背去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213396_comment'></div>后三年，予幸蒙恩北还，而无逸乃弃予而先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213396_comment'></div>因与超然对榻，夜语及之，不自觉泪殷枕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213396_comment'></div>呜呼，无逸东邻有宁生者，二十馀，以镂刻为菩萨像，每过无逸，恬退趋去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213396_comment'></div>俄游京师，以其役得将仕郎而还，华裾细马，闾里聚观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213396_comment'></div>无逸出门值之，为避路，门弟子为不怿累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213396_comment'></div>呜呼，无逸有出世之才，年未五十，一命不沾，殒倾大命，曾东邻宁木工之不若，嗟乎惜哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　知陈瓘与谢逸书，有“觉范真是比丘”之句，作诗以自励。作品：《了翁有书与谢无逸云觉范真是比丘》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>了翁有书与谢无逸云觉范真是比丘</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520855")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520855'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520855'>堕马哭淮王，牧羊仗汉节。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520855'>古人守忠义，视死如弃禊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520855'>吾是真比丘，死生见窟宅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520855'>一饭不愿馀，孤坐阅岁月。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520855'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520855_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　寒食，与彭子长于刘园见花，作诗。作品：《次韵彭子长刘园见花》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵彭子长刘园见花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520620")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520620'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520620'>我昔海山度寒食，虽有花看非故园。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520620'>今年寒食花又见，已在故园疑梦魂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520620'>虚弦丧气念前痛，瘴面敢辞增唾痕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520620'>此生流落坐旷达，晚悔坦率加辛勤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520620'>觉城老子天乞我，人品秀拔高摩云。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520620'>定应分身在绛阙，想见佩珰裙褶纁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520620'>君看翰墨吐秀句，绿杨春重含朝暾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520620'>袖中功名未暇探，且复行乐追幽欣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520620'>陋邦忽见洛阳面，为谁扶头清露翻。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520620'>残春风日太醇酽，发妆初罢争迎门。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520620'>丰肌忍调獭髓医，笑涡尚初红朝温。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520620'>谪仙点笔风雨疾，少陵眼寒烟雾昏。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520620'>公独寓之一戏耳，宁用解语方佐尊。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520620'>夜深秉烛花不睡，饮到落月窥金盆。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520620'>情钟耳热意一折，赋诗绕纸风雷奔。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520620'>诗成我读辄起舞，自忘首秃衣绁袢<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作柈，据《诗经·君子偕老》改）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520620'>泠然驭风欲仙去，引手便觉天可扪。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520620'>归来僵卧数屋角，万象困顿天不言。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520620'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_520620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　倚杖望九峰，又次韵彭子长诗二首。作品：《次韵彭子长签判二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span>《次韵彭子长签判二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵彭子长佥判二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520632")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520632'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520632'>我穷亲旧绝，君来殆天遣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520632'>度关一句妙，不拨机自转。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520632'>令人意颓然，盎如醉黎衍<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：黎人谓饮酒为衍也。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520632'>新诗丽吴姬，雾鬓风前卷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520632'>细看发豪放，川奔惊地喘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520632'>才高那可妒，默念耳自反。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520632'>不禁数馀年，三眠蚕欲茧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520632'>思君谁与同，月度微云浅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520632'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520632_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520633?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520633'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520633'>悉如羊公鹤，氋氃费推遣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520633'>心如旋磨驴，日夜团圞转。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520633'>夫子为讥诃，譬说颇蔓衍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520633'>愁心得少休，忽作象鼻卷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520633'>出门无所诣，地坐息疲喘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520633'>路穷辄一笑，兴尽复回反。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520633'>风光闻布谷，人家初煮茧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520633'>倚藤望九峰，层叠分浓浅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520633'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　文谦以香山靘禅师提诲之语为示，题其后。作品：《题香山靘禅师语》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题香山靘禅师语</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213280")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213280'>禅师父事云庵，于予为法兄，然予少实师事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213280_comment'></div>初闻其诵《迦叶波偈》曰：「诸法从缘生，诸法从缘灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213280_comment'></div>我师大沙门，常作如是说」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213280_comment'></div>乃曰：「子悟此，即是出家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213280_comment'></div>予时年十六，晓夕以思，茫然莫识其旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213280_comment'></div>顷在海外闲居，味维摩诘言：「善来，文殊师利，不来相而来，不见相而见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213280_comment'></div>文殊师利言：「如是居士若来，己更不来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213280_comment'></div>若去，己更不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213280_comment'></div>所以者何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213280_comment'></div>来无所从，去无所至，所可见者，更不可见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213280_comment'></div>乃追绎香山之语，遂深入缘起无生之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213280_comment'></div>将以见之，报其发药之恩，则化去已逾年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213280_comment'></div>其门人文谦以其提诲之语为示，并书予愿见不果。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213280_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fed7c7e41a2e44d29adf921d0f94f40d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fed7c7e41a2e44d29adf921d0f94f40d");'><span id='fed7c7e41a2e44d29adf921d0f94f40d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='fed7c7e41a2e44d29adf921d0f94f40d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>五月，筑室筠州新昌石门寺，与希祖同坐夏，阅谷山行崇禅师语，题其后。作品：《题谷山崇禅师语》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213282' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213282' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213282?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题谷山崇禅师语</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213282")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213282_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213282'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213282'>予读《澄心堂录》长庆棱公之孙、保福展公之嗣谷山禅师之语，奇崄宏妙，光明广大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213282_comment'></div>观其胆气逸群，不在岩头、云门之下，而录失其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213282_comment'></div>然语多称报恩传灯，但有潭州谷山句禅师而无机缘，其列熙、崇两人机语，校句所□示殆相万，然皆住报恩，岂句亦常居之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213282_comment'></div>予常与超然冲虎游谷山，访其遗事，无所考，因相对叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213282_comment'></div>追念东坡之语曰：「齐鲁有大臣，史失其名，而黄四娘乃得与杜诗不朽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213282_comment'></div>事莫不尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213282_comment'></div>作诗曰：「行尽湘西十里松，到门却立数诸峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213282_comment'></div>崇公事迹无寻处，庭下春泥见虎踪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213282_comment'></div>又十年，复与超然夏于石门，偶阅前诗，遂并录之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213282_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>释枣柏大士李通玄撰《华严十明论》<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读《华严十明论》，作诗。作品：《读十明论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>读十明论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522047")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522047'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522047'>了知无性灭无明，空慧须从戒定生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522047'>峰顶世间心已尽，莲开幻事观方成。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522047'>尚无欣慕厌除念，岂有神通变化情。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522047'>对现色身人不识，南风小雨共笼晴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522047_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522047'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗记注《华严十明论》事。作品：《注十明论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521587?labeling=true' target='_blank'>注十明论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521587")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521587_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521587'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521587'>了知无性灭无明，空慧须从戒定生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521587'>频呼小玉元无意，只要檀郎认得声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521587'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521587_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作六世祖师赞，以寄惟清禅师。作品：《六世祖师画像赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_1213519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>六世祖师画像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213519")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213519'>余窜海上三年而还，馆于筠之石门寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213519_comment'></div>悲丛林之荒寒，念祖师之标致，不自知涕流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213519_comment'></div>作六世祖师赞，录以寄昭默禅师，以见其志云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>新昌李元与弟施延福寺大钟，为作铭。作品：《延福寺钟铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213504' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213504' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213504?labeling=true' target='_blank'>延福寺钟铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　政和四年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213504")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213504_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213504'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213504'>梁武帝假宝公神力见地狱，相问何以救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213504_comment'></div>宝公曰：「众生定业，不可即灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213504_comment'></div>唯闻钟声，其苦暂息耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213504_comment'></div>武帝于是诏天下佛庙，击钟当舒徐其声，欲以停苦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213504_comment'></div>宜丰李元与弟施延福院大钟，愿资延母夫人周氏寿祺，且雪夙障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213504_comment'></div>余以谓李氏知所施矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213504_comment'></div>晋许逊白日仙去，天诏书曰：「赦汝不事先祖之罪，佳汝施药咒水之功」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213504_comment'></div>夫施药咒水，脱人于苦者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213504_comment'></div>唐崔祐甫本贵且寿，以任情杀戮，囚系不释，遂不寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213504_comment'></div>囚系杀戮，置人于苦者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213504_comment'></div>呜呼，寿固无象，脱人之苦则增，置人于苦则损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213504_comment'></div>夫钟之功利，博大昭著者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213504_comment'></div>以之为施，周氏之罪灭寿延，理有固然者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213504_comment'></div>因为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1213504'>众生大梦营黑业，玲珑击钟与开睫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213504_comment'></div>功德之大吾敢喋，愿移慈母离障结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213504_comment'></div>如声度垣即超越，孝哉伯仲俱勇决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213504_comment'></div>依仗佛力等痛切，如取寓物执券牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213504_comment'></div>愿寿慈母春在颊，如钟常撞无尽竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213504_comment'></div>政和甲午夏五月，谁为铭之甘露灭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213504_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>所居连希祖自见轩，日多啜茶其上，作诗。作品：《余所居连超然自见轩日多啜茶其上二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span>《余所居连超然自见轩日多啜茶其上二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521192' class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521192'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521192'>三生事办吾知要，一室香凝独掩门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521192'>睡足便惊清昼夜，火红消尽白灰存。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521192'>巷无俗驾蚁纷绕，邻有高人玉粹温。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521192'>隐比价膺犹可愧，会茶时复到幽轩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521192'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521192_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521193?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521193'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521193'>功名今古一鸡肋，美味那知是祸根。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521193'>扫迹世途龟曳尾，僻居烟雾豹埋文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521193'>如期见访穿窗月，不告而行出岫云。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521193'>火浴未为无伴助，塔吾遗骨尚烦君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521193'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗题希祖自见轩。作品：《超然自见轩》<span target='_blank'>超然自见轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521028")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521028'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521028'>丛林争致致不得，茧足径来寻俨师。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521028'>幽境自能情外见，高怀独出世间痴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521028'>清晨倚槛临黄卷，五月乱山闻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>子规。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521028'>夙习尚嗟消未尽，壁间时录和陶诗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521028'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_521028'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_521028_0'>⑴ 原作关，据四库本、《宋诗钞》改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_521028_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>暇日，因阅文稿，乃得《潭州东明石观音赞》旧本，录以寄智海禅师，并题其后。作品：《题观音赞寄岳麓禅师》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题观音赞寄岳麓禅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213301")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213301'>崇宁间至东明拜瞻石像，作此赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213301_comment'></div>时无际禅师方领住持事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213301_comment'></div>及无际迁居岳麓馀十年，生成宝坊于灰烬之中，而予以弘法婴难流落之馀幸，复相见，问：「前赞无恙乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213301_comment'></div>无际戏予曰：「羽化矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213301_comment'></div>暇日因阅文稿，乃得旧本，忻然录以寄之，曰：「当善护持，无使复为人持去，覆酱瓿耳」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>时方自警断绝作诗，而瑜禅师自灵石来访，留三日，复开禁，为之作鸣玉轩诗。作品：《瑜上人自灵石来求鸣玉轩诗会予断作语复决堤作一首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_218221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_218221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/218221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑜上人自灵石来求鸣玉轩诗会予断作语复决堤作一首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_218221")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_218221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_218221'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_218221'>求鸣玉轩诗，会予断作语。<div id='poem_sentence_0_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_218221'>道人去我久，书问且不数。<div id='poem_sentence_1_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_218221'>闻余窜南荒，惊悸日枯削。<div id='poem_sentence_2_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_218221'>安知跨大海，往返如入郭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_218221'>譬如人弄潮，覆却甚自若。<div id='poem_sentence_4_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_218221'>旁多聚观者，缩项胆为落。<div id='poem_sentence_5_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_218221'>僻居少过从，閒庭堕斗雀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_218221'>手倦失轻纨，扣门谁剥啄。<div id='poem_sentence_7_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_218221'>开关忽见之，但觉瘦矍铄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_218221'>立谈慰良苦，兀坐叙契阔。<div id='poem_sentence_9_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_218221'>谁持稻田衣，包此剪翎鹤。<div id='poem_sentence_10_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_218221'>远来殊可念，此意重山岳。<div id='poem_sentence_11_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_218221'>悃愊见无华，语论出棱角。<div id='poem_sentence_12_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_218221'>为余三日留，颇觉解寂寞。<div id='poem_sentence_13_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_218221'>忽然欲归去，破裓不容捉。<div id='poem_sentence_14_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_218221'>想见历千峰，细路如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_218221", 218221, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>遗索</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_218221'>相寻固自佳，乞诗亦不恶。<div id='poem_sentence_16_218221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_218221'>而余病多语，方以默为药。<div target='_blank'>题石龟观壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213472")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213472'>余家筠溪之上，去城馀百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213472_comment'></div>儿时闻城中塔成，欲往观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213472_comment'></div>因先君行，坐余于力谢三肩上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213472_comment'></div>至石龟观，谢三者绐余曰：「当先拜石龟，乃能见塔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213472_comment'></div>不然，终不可见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213472_comment'></div>余曰：「傥尔，汝何不拜」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213472_comment'></div>曰：「我已尝拜之，汝既童子，又后至，法当拜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213472_comment'></div>于是再拜入城，幸见塔，而心喜谢三肯余先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213472_comment'></div>后三十年过焉，视石乌龟良无恙，摩挲以追绎前事，为大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213472_comment'></div>吾亡友胡汝霖民望，生抚之金溪，七八岁时，随兄入城，忽不知所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213472_comment'></div>使人寻，已在宝应寺前看泥力士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213472_comment'></div>余每以戏之，而忘余亦有此患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213472_comment'></div>乃以炭书其壁，曰：「须知泥力士，不减石乌龟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213472_comment'></div>忠子，民望里人也，书以示之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　作诗赠鉴上人。作品：《赠鉴上人》<span id='poem_sentence_1_521063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521063'>苍苔不厌芒鞋弊，空翠偏宜坏衲荒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521063_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521063_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　作诗和清上人。作品：《和清上人》<span "poem_title_520997")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520997'><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　游新昌惠照院，见吕惠卿之父吕璹所题诗，跋其后。作品：《跋吕镇公诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋吕镇公诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213392")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213392'>右惠照院见太师镇国吕公留题一首，深清雄丽，有爱君报国之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213392_comment'></div>时公方尉新昌，实生太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213392_comment'></div>吉甫以道德为神考所敬，与舒王上下议论，遂参大政，文章翰墨，雷霆一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213392_comment'></div>福禄寿考，逮事三朝，天下学者宗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213392_comment'></div>昔李邵以高才博学为南郑幕门侯吏，而其子固为东汉名臣，岂所谓隐德报应不身尝之，而及其子孙者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213392_comment'></div>予于太师镇国公亦云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　还故里，馆于延福寺，寺前有小溪，风物类斜川，沿溪行，作诗。作品：《春日溪行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520913' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520913' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520913?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_4_520913_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　题诗延福寺壁。作品：《题延福寺壁》<span id='poem_sentence_2_1213559_comment'></div>荐登清华，出缙绅右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213559_comment'></div>用舍进退，有命有义。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　作诗次韵曾孝序见寄。作品：《次韵曾侯见寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520884' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520884?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵曾侯见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520884")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_520884_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520884'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520884'>客食石门寺，而今仅两年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520884'>衰迟嗟我老，邂逅识君贤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520884'>圣域人称亚，儒林秀誉先。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520884'>未揎攀桂手，已许买山钱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520884'>垄麦秋期近，庭槐昼影圆。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520884'>方思归去日，忽得寄来篇。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520884'>意合蒙推奖，情亲出爱怜。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520884'>格幽凌雪劲，词锦照人鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520884'>把玩欣无厌，行吟却怅然。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520884'>句追工部袂，气拍翰林肩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520884'>世已惊殊异，名宜改半千。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520884'>永怀风露重，绕遍旧池莲。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520884'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520884_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年5月3日</a>　五月三日，为云盖守智禅师设粥作文。作品：《云盖智和尚设粥》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云盖智和尚设粥疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年5月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213633")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213633'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213633'>今晨香粥，普告大众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213633_comment'></div>圆明体上，离见离情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213633_comment'></div>安立谛中，有恩有义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213633_comment'></div>智和尚三月七日，现全身于云盖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213633_comment'></div>甘露灭五月三日，提纲要于石门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213633_comment'></div>佛法现前，恩义俱报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213633_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年5月</a>　为叔彭几大祥看经，作文。作品：《又几大祥看经》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213634?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又几大祥看经疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213634")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213634_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213634'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213634'>侄苾刍某，伏遇亡叔协律大祥之晨，预诵金文，宣持秘号，所集殊因，并申资荐，往生净国者，谨具功德疏于后：右伏以恩爱别离，同谓之苦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213634_comment'></div>死生寿夭，已定于缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213634_comment'></div>欲洗濯其苦因，必依投于僧佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213634_comment'></div>某人伏念俱缘利国，致祸及身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213634_comment'></div>岂意一朝，遂成千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213634_comment'></div>脱瘴乡其偶尔，登堂室之阒然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213634_comment'></div>谛想音容，疑远游之未返；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213634_comment'></div>难居岁月，俄大祥之已临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213634_comment'></div>寡婶弱孤，持骨函而若绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213634_comment'></div>偏亲幼弟，拜奠酌而长号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213634_comment'></div>皇天唯予善人，此理殆成虚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213634_comment'></div>疾方增炽，哭不成声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213634_comment'></div>仰仗真乘，用资冥福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213634_comment'></div>伏念亡叔协律依如来无畏慈力，生菩萨有缘悲心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213634_comment'></div>摧落业障之山，倍增功德之海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213634_comment'></div>一念透脱，六根顿明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213634_comment'></div>已在人间，聪明更益其念；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213634_comment'></div>尚留恶道，慧明即触其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213634_comment'></div>决结龙华之后期，同副灵山之夙愿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213634_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年6月10日</a>　因《华严十明论》释毕，题其后。作品：《题华严十明论》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题华严十明论</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213266")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213266'>显谟阁待制朱公世英为余言：顷过金陵，谒王文公于钟山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213266_comment'></div>公以彦里闬晚生，有志学道，谓曰：「若读史，见勾践、伍员事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213266_comment'></div>勾践保栖会稽，置胆于坐，卧则仰胆，饭食亦尝胆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213266_comment'></div>伍员去楚，櫜载而去昭关，至蒲伏行，乞于吴市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213266_comment'></div>二子设心止欲雪耻复雠，而焦身苦思二十馀年而后遂其欲，盖有志者事竟成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213266_comment'></div>然移此心以学无上菩提，其何以御之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213266_comment'></div>世英嘱予记其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213266_comment'></div>世英殁一年，余还自海外，筑室筠溪石门寺，夏释此论，追念平时之语，曰：嗟乎，流转三界，未即弃去，其耻亦大矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213266_comment'></div>囚缚五阴，未能超出，其雠亦深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213266_comment'></div>以吴楚之雠耻较之，其相倍如日劫，而学者亦思掣肘径去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213266_comment'></div>然至诚恻怛，勇决力行，较勾践、伍员，特太山毫芒耳，岂不惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213266_comment'></div>《金刚般若经》须菩提闻世尊言：「以恒河沙等身命布施，不如受持四句偈，为他人说之福」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213266_comment'></div>于是泣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213266_comment'></div>其心岂不谓学者多以一身味著懈怠，故自为障碍乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213266_comment'></div>夫杂华具四天下微尘数偈，而其所诠者，如来普光明大智一法而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213266_comment'></div>亲近随顺，此智者戒定慧三法而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213266_comment'></div>以戒定慧观照方便，破灭无明，一切众生弹指实證，故金刚藏菩萨曰：「随顺无明起诸有，若不随顺，诸有离是谓成佛，显决入法要旨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213266_comment'></div>借令三世如来重复宣示，深奥不能加毫末于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213266_comment'></div>其于利害去取，晓如白黑，其义理昭著，粲如日星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213266_comment'></div>不知学者于戒定慧何疑，而不随顺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213266_comment'></div>于无明烦恼何恋，而不弃遗乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213266_comment'></div>孟轲曰：「今有无名之指，屈而不信，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1213266", 1213266, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>疾痛</span>害事也，如有能信之者，则不远秦楚之路，为指之不若人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213266_comment'></div>指不若人，则知恶之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213266_comment'></div>心不若人，则不知恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213266_comment'></div>此之谓不知类也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213266_comment'></div>今之知类者，吾特未见耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213266_comment'></div>岂密行暗證，隐实显玼，世不得而知欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213266_comment'></div>抑观力粗浮，习重境强，多遇缘而退欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213266_comment'></div>余切慕思大智者父子，于道能遗虚名，收实效，三十年间，决期现證，皆获宿智，通入法华三昧，乳中之酪，此其验矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213266_comment'></div>呜呼，安得如南岳、天台两人者，与之增进此道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213266_comment'></div>政和五年六月十日书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1213266_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年7月</a>　七月，卧痾石门寺，罗彦胜之妻邹氏携释迦如来像并十八罗汉像轴来求赞。作品：《绣释迦像并十八罗汉赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　作诗送净因归庐山。作品：《送觉先大师觉先参佛照圆通二老》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送觉先大师觉先参佛照圆通二老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_521140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521140'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521140'>浮玉道人雷电舌，法云老师冰雪颜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521140'>后来事听诸方外，先数君游二老间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
