ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年10月</a>　十月月中，回筠州石门寺，化信士布施，镂版印行六祖慧能所释《金刚经》作品：《题六祖慧释金刚经》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题六祖释金刚经</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213269")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213269'>《金刚般若》，灵智妙心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213269_comment'></div>诸佛与我及众生类三无差别，然诸佛已知而信者，我今知而信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213269_comment'></div>唯众生未知未信，则当教导之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213269_comment'></div>故世尊以后五百岁，持戒修福者，能生信心为实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213269_comment'></div>然以心信心，犹为三法，如人不睡而能有梦，则知是病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213269_comment'></div>故世尊又曰：「以是信解不生法相」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213269_comment'></div>如来世尊既以明告显说以为经，祖师从而注释之，恩德可谓大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213269_comment'></div>而传布未广，予窃患之，故化清信檀越，镂版印施，普告大众云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213269_comment'></div>政和五年十月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年11月12日</a>　十一月十二日夜，题华光仲仁所画墨梅示圆禅者。作品：《题华光梅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题华光梅</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213342")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213342'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213342'>华光绍圣初试手作梅，便如迦陵鸟，方雏声，已压众鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213342_comment'></div>东坡见之，如黄梅视无姓儿，便肯之无姓儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213342_comment'></div>今将以衣钵授岭南撩，予惜黄梅破头老人不及见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213342_comment'></div>圆禅者，当还，举似乃翁，问甘露灭法喻齐否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213342_comment'></div>政和五年十一月十二日夜，石门精舍题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　冬，游新昌石台寺，作诗。作品：《游石台寺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游石台寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521888")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521888'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521888'>岁晏身心无一事，江山信美又吾乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521888'>去年今日黄河北，夜趁明驼上太行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521888'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为石台寺肱禅师跋其所蓄草圣。作品：《跋石台肱禅师所蓄草圣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋石台肱禅师所蓄草圣</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213371")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213371'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213371'>少游此诗，荆公自书于纨扇，盖其胜妙之极，收拾春色于语言中而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213371_comment'></div>及东坡和之，如语中出春色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213371_comment'></div>山谷草圣，不数张长史、素道人，遂书两诗于华光梅花树下，可谓四绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213371_comment'></div>予不晓草字，开卷但见其雷砰电射，揭地祇而西七曜耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213371_comment'></div>吁哉，异也，政当送与龙安照禅师，使一读之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　石台夜坐，赋诗二首。作品：《石台夜坐二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span>《石台夜坐二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石台夜坐二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521023")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521023'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521023'>故乡乃有此丛林，下板何妨著寂音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521023'>永与世遗他日志，尚嫌山浅暮年心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521023'>冻云未放僧窗晓，折竹方知夜雪深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521023'>琢句自应清似玉，更宜坡字硬黄临。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521023'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521023_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521024?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521024'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521024'>岁晚山深过客稀，一灯清坐夜同谁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521024'>滴阶寒响雪消后，通火活红灰陷时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521024'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_521024", 521024, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>敛目</span>旧游真可数，盖棺前事尚难知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521024'>古今不隔诸缘净，画出岩中道者诗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521024'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　代彭以功为丰城华严院僧惠讷作《华严院记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213452' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213452' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213452?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华严院记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213452")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213452_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213452'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213452'>政和四年春二月，余自高安赴官临汝，行丰城境十馀里，奇峰秀深，沃野自献，有白沙清流、茂林脩竹之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213452_comment'></div>望林表，出楯瓦，路人曰：「其下华严院也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213452_comment'></div>遂造焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213452_comment'></div>碧杉脩径，苾刍戢戢出迎客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213452_comment'></div>厦屋崇成，如幻出禅斋，风棂金碧随目，殆应接不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213452_comment'></div>问住持僧惠讷曰：「院以父子传器而服玩不减禅林，何哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213452_comment'></div>讷曰：「教有顿渐，道无禅律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213452_comment'></div>今两者相攻以其私，而佛法微矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213452_comment'></div>譬如枣中虫，徒自蠹坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213452_comment'></div>出家盖大丈夫事，其说甚高，绪馀土苴足以道广孝慈，上助清化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213452_comment'></div>今其衰，其徒特不足知此，如鸢翔青冥而心不忘腥秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213452_comment'></div>求教之兴，三尺童子知其难」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213452_comment'></div>余首肯其说，而心奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213452_comment'></div>秋七月，讷遣僧抵余曰：「吾庐居，于唐光化之元年名报恩，迄本朝治平之三年诏改赐今额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213452_comment'></div>尝烬火废为丘墟，草屋数楹，仅蔽风雨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213452_comment'></div>自善明至怀珍七传，讷实继珍，后因净檀首建三门，作两序屋，修普光明大殿，前峙双阁，一以像僧伽，一以馆钟虡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213452_comment'></div>东为香积厨，绕以复屋，辟典事堂，有廪有厕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213452_comment'></div>西为三圣堂，增其后架设宾客馆，有湢有厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213452_comment'></div>造演法潮音堂，总屋于其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213452_comment'></div>又建华严阁于寝室之上，以实毗卢法宝之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213452_comment'></div>高深雄丽，吞风吐月，凡禅林所宜有者毕备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213452_comment'></div>僧至如归，轰轰鼓鱼，泯泯作息，要不堕诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213452_comment'></div>经始于崇宁癸未之春，断手于政和乙未之冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213452_comment'></div>吾方念能事虽毕，而后之来者未知饭僧报佛无穷之意，而公适俨然辱而临之，非夙缘乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213452_comment'></div>幸强为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213452_comment'></div>余曰：今人持左券以取寓物，未敢必得，然争毛发之利，斫头穴胸，何知虑刑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213452_comment'></div>而讷宴坐一室，影不出山，能使施者填门，不十年之间，化瓦砾之墟为梵释龙天之宫，此其才必有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213452_comment'></div>视其中渠渠，欲置人于慈祥之域，而专欲以精严自砺，与夫裨贩如来以自贼者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213452_comment'></div>使其闻讷之风，亦可以少泚其颡云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1213452_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bea3cc114e7145f9a5fe48d954302107_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bea3cc114e7145f9a5fe48d954302107");'><span id='bea3cc114e7145f9a5fe48d954302107_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年</a>，46岁</div><div id='bea3cc114e7145f9a5fe48d954302107' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年</a>　移住洞山，为逍遥山宜禅师作请茶榜疏。作品：《请逍遥宜老茶榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213580?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请逍遥宜老茶榜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1116年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213580")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213580_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213580'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213580'>宝几珍御，特兴同体之大悲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213580_comment'></div>白牯狸奴，更入遍行之三昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213580_comment'></div>要当语绝渗漏，不令机昧始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213580_comment'></div>如百花醴味绝中边，如三点伊势分宾主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213580_comment'></div>惟灵源洞明此旨，坐昭默独提正宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213580_comment'></div>雅闻宜公禅师，久亲此老法席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213580_comment'></div>长眉尊者，争传亲见佛来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213580_comment'></div>大耳沙弥，自谓久辞祖矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213580_comment'></div>浮尘灭尽，化爱憎为平等之光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213580_comment'></div>大用现前，投同异入寂灭之海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213580_comment'></div>一言相契，千里同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213580_comment'></div>敢违十方兰若之规，敬荐一会伊蒲之馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213580_comment'></div>众所钦伫，俨然肯临，幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213580_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年</a>　与僧自逍遥山经乱石涧入五峰，休于树荫，作偈。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年6月</a>　六月，筠州知州孙于之嫂预知死期，卒，记其事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年7月4日</a>　七月四日，昼梦真净克文教诲久之，觉而作诗示希祖。作品：《七月四日昼梦云庵和尚教诲久之而觉作此示超然》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521003' id='poem_sentence_1_521003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521003'>衬珠定使拳披见，坐榻当令膝处穿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520522")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520522_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520522'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520522'>乌兰洲塞夏国口，大河天来箭激溜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520522'>排空但闻地喘吼，势撞石壁欲穿透。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520522'>石坚捍之不肯受，攧雷溅雪喧夜昼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520522'>千年石骨亦不朽，碎为青红杂怪丑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520522'>疆埸久空烂甲胄，举觞天子千万寿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520522'>李侯横槊千骑后，望云赋诗剑碍肘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520522'>徐涉河流马俯嗅，下马得之等琼玖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520522'>万里来归亦何有，出以示我为拊手。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520522'>敲门那能易升斗，功名偶然梦岂久。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520522'>道人乃尔自薄厚，此石笑汝汝惭否。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520522'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520522_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年1月20日</a>　二十日，与希祖、贤禅师步云归亭，忽忆苏轼此日诗，有怀苏轼，并次其韵。作品：《春日同祖贤二道人步云归亭忽忆东坡此日诗有怀其人次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日同祖贤二道人步云归亭忽忆东坡此日诗有怀其人次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年1月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521084")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521084'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521084'>谁家杨柳欲遮门，依约东坡醉处村。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521084'>捶地不堪华屋句，仰天空记刻舟痕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521084'>尚馀千载风流在，乞与三人语笑温。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521084'>归路松风吹冻耳，共追前事吊英魂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521084'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年2月26日</a>　二月二十六日夜，梦高安城隍神应侯，觉起，为作《高安城隍庙记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高安城隍庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和七年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213438")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213438'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213438'>城隍庙者，故使君应侯庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213438_comment'></div>应侯，世高安，讳瑱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213438_comment'></div>隋季政荒，天下盗起，李密起巩，王仁德起邺，皆称公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213438_comment'></div>李子通起海陵，邵江海起岐州，薛举起金城，窦建德起河间，皆称王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213438_comment'></div>刘武周起马邑，刘元进起晋安，林士弘起豫章，皆窃尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213438_comment'></div>高安，豫章属邑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213438_comment'></div>侯时以布衣募兵乌合而击之，士弘却隐去，因婴城固守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213438_comment'></div>唐武德元年五月甲子，唐公即帝位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213438_comment'></div>五年十月己巳，林士弘殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213438_comment'></div>呜呼，方是时，贼兵浩如海，孤城眇如块，微侯之忠勇义武，则民鱼肉之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213438_comment'></div>朝廷旌其功，授以刺史符，于是千里亲之，如仰父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213438_comment'></div>既没，赠尚书左仆射，庙食此邦盖五百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213438_comment'></div>而书功烈者，词不达意，余尝叹息之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213438_comment'></div>政和六年九月十六日，因请福，许铭庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213438_comment'></div>念文字陈陋，又罪废，惧渎神听，稿成复坏者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213438_comment'></div>越明年二月二十六日，夜梦有客过余，甚都雅，曰：「向许我诗，当以示我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213438_comment'></div>梦中问公谁氏，曰：「我唐人，居湖中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213438_comment'></div>既觉，三鼓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213438_comment'></div>坐而假寐，又梦理前事，旁有赞者曰：「应侯君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213438_comment'></div>于是起呼灯火，洗心为铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1213438'>炀帝南游江都湄，唐公集兵祷晋祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213438_comment'></div>连和突厥人户知，传檄诸郡称义师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213438_comment'></div>豫章邈在江之西，杀气熏烝喧鼓鼙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213438_comment'></div>芟民如刍救者谁，应侯忠勇英特姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213438_comment'></div>精诚贯日如横霓，振臂大呼老幼随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213438_comment'></div>空拳乌合当新羁，贼锋为却气少衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213438_comment'></div>守城泯默天助威，贼虽猖狂其敢窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213438_comment'></div>民甘九死侯生之，不然荡涤无孑遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213438_comment'></div>故宫下瞰缘锦溪，过者肃趋不敢驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213438_comment'></div>功德之大山岳巍，惜其粉饰无雄辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213438_comment'></div>心许作文恨陋卑，梦中索之不呵讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213438_comment'></div>俾侮神者读此诗，知神威灵不可欺。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1213438_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　寒食前，闻龚端将来访，想见李清臣、先臣随行，先一日作诗迎之。作品：《闻龚德庄入山先一日作诗迎之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_520992' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520992' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520992?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闻龚德庄入山先一日作诗迎之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520992")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520992'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520992'>梦暖不知窗雾白，眼寒初爱縠罗轻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520992'>欣闻明日一龚至，想见随轩二李行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520992'>夜雨晓晴寒食近，水流花发子规声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520992'>披襟散坐青林下，依约斜川万古情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520992'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520992_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　龚端出画轴，有二比丘像，乃观世音、得大势至像，为作赞。作品：《放光二大士赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　龚端乞所蓄龙尾砚，既与之，又戏为之赋。作品：《龙尾砚赋序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙尾砚赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213228")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213228'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213228'>予所蓄龙尾砚，比他砚最贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213228_comment'></div>龚德庄从予乞曰：「此石宜宿玉堂，岂公所当有耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213228_comment'></div>既以与之，又戏为之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213228_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213228'>柳子尝有言曰：「砚之美者，唯青石最贤，而绛石次焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213228_comment'></div>自绛、青而下，盖亦不数，而世亦无传」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213228_comment'></div>何温然之子石，出高要之晴川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213228_comment'></div>方其始造也，祠中牢以匈祐，犯惊湍之洄漩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213228_comment'></div>探万仞之崖腹，取劲石之坚圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213228_comment'></div>裹碧草以径出，割紫云之明鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213228_comment'></div>萦金缕于廓岸，张鸲目于坳渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213228_comment'></div>于是房以玉室，而绨以锦衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213228_comment'></div>名以虚中，而以居默字之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213228_comment'></div>适风棂之春昼，偶莫逆于书帏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213228_comment'></div>管城子方蒙茸而落帽，燕客俨峨峨之丰颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213228_comment'></div>爱知白之尽展其底蕴，而看君答烟霞之谭词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213228_comment'></div>粲古今于立顷，而观者若未始与闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213228_comment'></div>而有知以其有是之德，故君子见录而不遗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213228_comment'></div>盖尝罥网而出鲤，昭以佳瑞而生之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213228_comment'></div>涸于顺山而鸽致，浴于越池而水缁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213228_comment'></div>姿端重而有墨侯之封，腰微坳而作郎官之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213228_comment'></div>逸干阗青铁之群，秀蟾蜍玉器之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213228_comment'></div>又尝污卢携之怒裾，印太真之醉掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213228_comment'></div>泮紫金于药鼎，鎗清声于书幌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213228_comment'></div>殆其弃而弗用也，犹赆馀骸于弟子，瘗朽骨于草莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213228_comment'></div>而狂生乃以铁窃其名，而市工仍以瓦肖其像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213228_comment'></div>由此砚之难致，故纷谬伪之欺诳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213228_comment'></div>顾予此砚之清坚，出于歙溪之湄水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213228_comment'></div>乃陋南荒之彘肝，而窃自比于龙尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213228_comment'></div>匀数寸之秋光，温一片之和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213228_comment'></div>疑初得于鲁祠，何朴美之如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213228_comment'></div>从予游亦有年，爱其忍垢之类己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213228_comment'></div>嗟所值之不遭，纷白眼之相视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213228_comment'></div>独一龚之可人，辄倾盖而见喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213228_comment'></div>将提携而去归，置玉堂之棐几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213228_comment'></div>稔亨奋而逃穷，脱怒骂之焚毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213228_comment'></div>终未免腹洞于暮年，而犹胜支床于壮岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213228_comment'></div>子行勉矣，予将观子与管城辈耕于无所不知之乡，而至丰年之义理也已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1213228_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年3月</a>　三月，信州天宁寺住持宗衍禅师遣僧庆瑫来乞文，为作记。作品：《信州天宁寺记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>信州天宁寺记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213437")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213437'>江南山水冠天下，而上饶又冠江南，自昔多为得道者所庐，鹅湖、龟峰、怀玉，号称形胜，而灵山尤秀绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213437_comment'></div>盖唐义武初，西平周王发其天藏也，初建精舍名兴圣，祥符天子改赐普明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213437_comment'></div>沙门德延以讲学聚徒甚盛，弟子德熙者有智略，实阴相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213437_comment'></div>崇宁二年，诏革以为禅林，赐田度僧，听遇天宁节进功德疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213437_comment'></div>太守周公邠命长老德延为第一世，而以僧正德熙董其事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213437_comment'></div>三人者叙立顾瞻而叹曰：「寺以群居，而自为户牖，犬牙相接，如蜂房蚁穴，非相臣所以建请，集禅衲，演祖道，上延睿算之意，于是蝉蜕其卑陋而一新之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213437_comment'></div>入门纵望，序庑翼如而进，层阁相望而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213437_comment'></div>登普光明殿，顾其西，则有云会堂，以容四海之来者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213437_comment'></div>为法宝藏，以大轮载而旋转之，以广摄异根也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213437_comment'></div>顾其东，则有香积厨，以办伊蒲塞馔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213437_comment'></div>为职事堂，以料理出纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213437_comment'></div>特建善法堂于中央以演法，开毗耶丈室以授道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213437_comment'></div>又阁其上，以像观世音，示以闻思修令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213437_comment'></div>学者入道也，粥鱼茶板，霜颅螺顶，凫趋而集，寂无人声馀履声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213437_comment'></div>而禅斋密室，冰怀雪虑，株枯而坐，不见心相惟身相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213437_comment'></div>呜呼，西平王、郡太守虽异世，而姓氏同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213437_comment'></div>前以讲，后以禅，而领袖者虽异趣，而名号同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213437_comment'></div>吾闻浮图未成，故裴公美为玄度之后身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213437_comment'></div>千尺像毕，而僧护为僧祐、道宣之前身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213437_comment'></div>古今所传不可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213437_comment'></div>宗衍禅师出自白牛法窟中来，嗣延公之法席，分照觉之祖焰，道行孤峻，为邦人所钦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213437_comment'></div>然人但见其能集前人之大成，幻出楼观，而不知其游戏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213437_comment'></div>政和元年八月，又诏以天宁万寿名寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213437_comment'></div>七年三月遣僧庆瑫来乞文，以记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213437_comment'></div>余虽未获览山川之佳气，披华搆之雄誇，然能系而为之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213437_comment'></div>辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1213437'>群峰宝势争岧峣，云收眼寒空翠摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213437_comment'></div>灵山独受王水朝，跨水谁作朱飞桥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213437_comment'></div>苍官马鬣低龙腰，谷风吹空翻海潮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213437_comment'></div>忽惊宝坊碍层霄，天花细雨纷堕飘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213437_comment'></div>草衣大士唾雾消，定力持之日劫超。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213437_comment'></div>太霞仙子坐可招，夜晴往往闻吹箫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213437_comment'></div>西平贤王想风标，长剑拄颐气勇骄，擅此兴圣开前朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213437_comment'></div>宋兴和气弥宇宙，佛宫道祠恩益厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213437_comment'></div>初此毗尼相讲授，易为禅林冠江右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213437_comment'></div>大钟横撞午梵奏，紫金光聚世福祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213437_comment'></div>苾刍千指聚拜手，太平天子千万寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213437_comment'></div>切云楼阁谁所搆，臣子净愿力成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213437_comment'></div>白牛乳犊师子吼，虎溪嫡孙气奇茂，学者趋之俯并首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213437_comment'></div>我作铭诗招尔后，斯文与山俱不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1213437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　坐夏洞山，悟珠上人来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　以无住字悟珠，作序。作品：《无住字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213417?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无住字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213417")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213417'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213417'>珠之为物，体舒光而自照，置于盆而未尝定，衡斜圆转，不留影迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213417_comment'></div>众生妙心如之，圆实无住，龙女献之，达么悟之，良有以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213417_comment'></div>君名悟珠，圆明妙心之表也，当以无住为字，作字说云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213417_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年5月1日</a>　佛鉴大师净因出示涟水观音画像，为作赞。作品：《涟水观音像赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522113' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522113' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522113?labeling=true' target='_blank'>涟水观音像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年5月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522113")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522113_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522113'>世传涟水贺生所画观世音像，不减唐吴道子。晚以法授其婿陈守安，守安遂以其画名世。政和七年五月初吉，佛鉴大师因公出其画示余，精深之工，曲尽其妙，可以目追心数其巧，要不可以言得也。谨拜手稽首赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522113_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522113'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522113'>声音语言形体绝，何以称为光世音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522113'>声音语言生灭法，何以又称寂静音。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522113'>凡有声音语言法，是耳所触非眼境。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522113'>而此菩萨名观音，是以眼观声音相。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522113'>声音若能到眼处，则耳能见诸色法。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522113'>若耳实不可以见，则眼观声是寂灭。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522113'>见闻既不能分隔，清净宝觉自圆融。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522113'>以无执故则有光，虽有千臂如两手。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522113'>以无分别故寂灭，虽有千手如一身。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522113'>既无分别亦无执，虽有千眼两目同。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522113'>故称光音寂静音，及观世音三种异。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522113'>稽首对现妙色身，遍一切处如虚空。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522113'>妙哉此像非笔画，厌足佛子欣慕心。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522113'>藕丝铢衣春雾白，覆此随好光明聚。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522113'>一切众生热恼灭，我手方舍甘露枝。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522113'>唯佛子因心清净，如水澄澈月清亮。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522113'>借于画工百巧技，如暗室眼以灯见。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522113'>了知此画非工有，谓灯能见其可哉。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522113'>我无此像乃能赞，如眼见物不自见。<div id='poem_sentence_18_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_522113'>自能说偈不蓄像，眼有见矣灯亦可。<div id='poem_sentence_19_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_522113'>愿持此大解脱门，施众生作无所畏。<div id='poem_sentence_20_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_522113'>世世但无碍辩才，称赞观世音功德。<div id='poem_sentence_21_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_522113'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_522113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522113'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522113_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年5月16日</a>　十六日，午睡起，与阿振步至新丰亭，观真净克文墨宝，东渡五位桥，桥下逢贤禅师，相与濯足于落涧泉，须臾月出留云峰侧，散坐于知隐桥，作诗五首，次日，阿振请录之，乃为之序。作品：《夏日睡起步至新丰亭观云庵墨妙与僧坐松下作五诗明日阿振试沐华矮笺请录之因序言五月十六日大热亭上忽雨如翻盆枕书而寝乃觉日向夕隔墙荷气俱风而至卧见窗间远峰点点可数为之诗曰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《要阿振出门山已瞑而烟翠重重一抹万迭秀峰缺处日脚横度红碧相通余晖光芒倒射作虹霓色微风忽兴新秧翻浪如卷轻罗坐新丰亭流目而长吟读云庵老人戏墨为诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《扶杖至东渡五位桥曲折而北松下逢道人贤公喜为之诗曰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《乃相与濯足于落涧泉语笑不相闻于是听其声于习观亭为之诗曰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《须臾月出迭石峰侧散坐于知隐桥以迟之余谓二子曰兹游也与存豁辈何远所恨倔强嗟不及耳乃咏而归钟已绝而廊庑寂无声为之诗曰》<span id='poem_sentence_2_521484_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年5月21日</a>　二十一日，净因于寂音堂出示真净克文舍利，为作赞。作品：《云庵和尚舍利赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　为净因题唐清凉国师澄观撰《华严纲要》作品：《题华严纲要》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题华严纲要</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213263")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213263'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213263'>华严宗有四种无碍，谓事无碍、理无碍、事理无碍、事事无碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213263_comment'></div>夫言事事无碍者，非有竺梵震旦之异，凡圣小大之殊，而讲师笑枣柏不辨唐梵，又可笑哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213263_comment'></div>此文清凉国师启毗卢藏之钥匙也，其文简而义无尽，其科要而理融通，学者当尽心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213263_comment'></div>方天下禅学之弊极矣，以饱食熟睡、游谈无根为事，而佛鉴乃倡为宗尚之，其亦护法悯俗之慈也欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　为净因跋苏轼《仇池录》作品：《跋东坡恍池录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213356' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213356' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213356?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡𪫤池录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213356")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213356_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213356'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213356'>欧阳文忠公以文章宗一世，读其书，其病在理不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213356_comment'></div>以理不通，故心多不能平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213356_comment'></div>以是后世之卓绝颖脱而出者，皆目笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213356_comment'></div>东坡盖五祖戒禅师之后身，以其理通，故其文涣然如水之质，漫衍浩荡，则其波亦自然而成文，盖非语言文字也，皆理故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213356_comment'></div>自非从般若中来，其何以臻此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213356_comment'></div>其文自孟轲、左丘明、太史公而来，一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213356_comment'></div>然予有恨，恨其窥梦幻如雾见月，虽老而死，古今圣达所不免，譬如昼则有夜，而东坡喜学炼形蝉蜕之道，期白日而骨飞，竟以病而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213356_comment'></div>使其如鲁仲连之不受万钟之位而肆志，则宁复有遗恨哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213356_comment'></div>佛鉴能珍敬其书，则其趣味乃真是山边水边之人，与夫假高尚之名心悦孔方道人者异矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213356_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　为净因跋苏轼缄启。作品：《跋东坡缄启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213357' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213357?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡缄启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213357")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213357'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213357'>东坡海外之文，中朝士大夫编集已尽，虽予之笃好者，亦以为无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213357_comment'></div>佛鉴辄出此帙为示，皆中朝士大夫集中所无者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213357_comment'></div>山林之人，泯泯蘖蘖，若无所用，而其志好尚亦清绝哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213357_comment'></div>譬如无云之月，有目者皆爱仰之，况斯文乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213357_comment'></div>《石门文字禅》卷二七。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　为净因跋黄庭坚与法镜课仙禅师帖。作品：《跋与法镜帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋与法镜帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213370")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213370'>山谷作黄龙书时，与予同在长沙碧湘门外舟中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213370_comment'></div>今馀年，佛鉴出此以示予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213370_comment'></div>昙谛见前身麈尾，山谷醉中仙去，此帖堕空之垢被也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　诚、心二上人来访，作诗赠之。作品：《诚心二上人见过》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诚心二上人见过</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521181")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521181'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521181'>破夏来寻甘露灭，快人如对水晶轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521181'>烟云扫尽词传意，知见不生情透尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521181'>旋缚茅茨吞远壑，偶临檐隙见归人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521181'>露芽便觉如浮雪，品坐同分一盏春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521181'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521181_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　诚上人以真净克文寄张惠渊偈手帖为示，题其后。作品：《题云庵手帖三首》(其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题云庵手帖<span class='inlineComment2'>（三）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年10月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213299")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213299'>右云庵《寄张惠渊偈》一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213299_comment'></div>惠渊予不见二十年，闻其精进日新，真能遵受云庵之言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213299_comment'></div>诚上人来自宣梵，问其师洎惠渊健否，偶记前偈，遂书以授诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213299_comment'></div>归举似惠渊，使较当日之本异同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213299_comment'></div>某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年7月15日</a>　七月十五日夏休，悟珠将经行湘山，袖黄庭坚酺池诗来，为跋其后。作品：《跋珠上人山谷酺池诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋珠上人山谷酺池诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年7月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213369")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213369'>予绍圣初留都下，闻士大夫藉藉诵青石牛诗，而此四绝尤著闻，恨不见此老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213369_comment'></div>阅三年，游石门，林下识君，实骨面善，谈笑相从最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213369_comment'></div>时珠禅垢面不袜，然已超卓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213369_comment'></div>后二十馀年，予还自海外，而君实化去久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213369_comment'></div>丁酉坐夏洞上，有鸭步而至者，问之，乃吾向所识不袜公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213369_comment'></div>于是甘吾老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213369_comment'></div>夏休，珠将经行湘山，袖此卷来，读之，龙蛇飞动，凌跨韩、柳之气，糠秕王侯之韵，如其无恙时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213369_comment'></div>阴晚，坐觉山川增胜，爽然忘其孤废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213369_comment'></div>湘山多高人，识青石牛甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213369_comment'></div>珠可以示之，使其韵摩抟衡、霍，固不佳哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　秋，代为高安居士王询铭其所居喧寂庵。作品：《喧寂庵铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喧寂庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213488")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213488_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213488'>高安居士王询温甫，和易寡欲，靖专无营，特刻意事佛，精严弗懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213488_comment'></div>虽年运往矣，而视听聪明，惟履无玷，故声称闾里，云庵道价值天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213488_comment'></div>元丰间游金陵，舒王施第为寺，以延丛林，号内外护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213488_comment'></div>元祐初，退休来归，说法于洞山九峰，温甫忘冠巾而师事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213488_comment'></div>其法嗣佛照禅师惠泉者与之交善，自泉住上都名刹，士大夫有稀见之者，而与温甫日亲法喜，偈语酬唱不绝，岂所谓千里同风者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213488_comment'></div>政和七年秋结制，对其所居，名曰喧寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213488_comment'></div>余适以事至，访之，温甫方负暄阅经，置卷坐语，语少而理多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213488_comment'></div>于是自愧羁官四方，畏首尾，思蝉蜕垢纷、纵浪閒旷而不可得，乃铭其庵而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213488_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1213488'>孰谈无生，唯老居士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213488_comment'></div>孰为听徒，团栾妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213488_comment'></div>以诸尘劳，而作佛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213488_comment'></div>视其家风，老庞是似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213488_comment'></div>名闻诸方，流辈追崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213488_comment'></div>馀四十年，一节保躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213488_comment'></div>老则结屋，置阛阓中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213488_comment'></div>即喧而寂，盖将无同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213488_comment'></div>贤哉斯人，不二于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213488_comment'></div>蹇寓于世，莫知归宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213488_comment'></div>我睨而视，亦见彷佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213488_comment'></div>出生太虚，陶铸魔佛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1213488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年8月12日</a>　八月初一，净因将往京师探视其师惠杲，来别，十二日，作序赠之。作品：《送因觉先序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213247' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213247' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213247?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送因觉先序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年8月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213247")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213247_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213247'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213247'>觉先，佛照禅师高弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213247_comment'></div>佛照于世有胜缘方，其在山林也，则领匡山鸾溪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213247_comment'></div>及其游城郭也，则住上都崇宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213247_comment'></div>是望刹皆天下之冠，盖梵释龙天之宫从空而堕者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213247_comment'></div>余尝馆丈室之东，见巨公要人入门下马，气摩云天，金朱日塞门如市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213247_comment'></div>佛照者裙才及膝，吉贝缠其脞，勃窣趋迎，权不韵甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213247_comment'></div>然杖拂之下，万指随之，虽往来城郭山林二十年，牧僧行道如一日者，觉先阴相之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213247_comment'></div>觉先有智仞，能立事，数惷其师争曲直，竟袖手还江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213247_comment'></div>佛照思其贤，曲折呼之，觉先坚卧不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213247_comment'></div>政和七年春，诏易天宁为神霄宫，佛照以老病景德房寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213247_comment'></div>觉先曰：「噫，吾西矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213247_comment'></div>秋八月朔来别，坐有献言者曰：「子去京三白矣，乃复往，如山林桎梏之机何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213247_comment'></div>余折之曰：「慈明，吾祖也，而以李公故西游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213247_comment'></div>宝觉，吾大父行也，以王晋卿故亦西游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213247_comment'></div>是二大老，天下之奇德，意有所合，千里从之，矧觉先以师老病而西乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213247_comment'></div>行矣，子于义得矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213247_comment'></div>觉先忻然曰：「敢不受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213247_comment'></div>然吾之所识，皆公故人，能嗣音乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213247_comment'></div>余以屏迹岩丛，栈绝世路，宁当交公卿大夫哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213247_comment'></div>脱有见问者，为言未能为世收寒涕是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213247_comment'></div>中秋前三日，某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213247_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='90aa82b925db4efe9bfe4c37e9aba6c9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("90aa82b925db4efe9bfe4c37e9aba6c9");'><span id='90aa82b925db4efe9bfe4c37e9aba6c9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>，48岁</div><div id='90aa82b925db4efe9bfe4c37e9aba6c9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>　初春，新昌黄檗山下重会言上人，为作诗一首。作品：《重会言上人乞诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重会言上人乞诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521180")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521180'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521180'>海外归来五见春，梨衣两识帝京尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521180'>此生已觉浑无累，为累空惊尚有身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521180'>厚善最怜山解事，岁寒更爱月情亲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521180'>鹫峰峰下重相见，雪作飞花一笑新。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521180'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521180_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

九江（德化）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　游庐山谒洪准禅师，又谒元祐禅师于庐山玉涧寺道林堂。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='d5b5a996accd44909f704dd7f9b547da_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d5b5a996accd44909f704dd7f9b547da");'><span id='d5b5a996accd44909f704dd7f9b547da_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>，23岁</div><div id='d5b5a996accd44909f704dd7f9b547da' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游庐山东林寺，瞻拜常总禅师之塔。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与成绩同游庐山，题天池石间。作品：《题天池石间》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题天池石间</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213474")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213474'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213474'>□绩茂功与德洪觉范道人自虎溪，屏人乘，入资圣庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213474_comment'></div>少焉，历石门涧、锦绣谷，穷高陟险，遂至天池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213474_comment'></div>致敬普见如来，获紫金光明之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213474_comment'></div>越翌日，斋罢，作礼而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213474_comment'></div>闻佛手岩、宝林峰之胜，一一登览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213474_comment'></div>其上望掷笔峰，下瞰圣寺经岩，神刻玉削，不知几千仞，而江流吞天山，接平野，云烟开合，一目千里，兹实匡庐第一境，隐然为天下奇观也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213474_comment'></div>薄晚投宿化城，回望杖屦所经，萝径鸟道，杳然在层崖绝壁之上，殆非人间之游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213474_comment'></div>此身傥未变灭，要当结庐以终。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213474_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fff95d3b023d4d9db2863f7aa5d5e6c5_label'><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520448'>虽有去恶仁，终失存商义。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520448'>夷齐不肯臣，甘作首阳死。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520448'>下视莽操辈，欺孤夺幼稚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520448'>汗面亦戴天，特猴而冠耳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520448'>桓公弄兵权，刘裕窃神器。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520448'>先生于此时，抽身良有以。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520448'>袖手归去来，诗眼饱山翠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520448'>追还圣之清，太虚绝尘滓。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520448'>长恨千载心，断弦掩流水。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520448'>崔子果何人，赏音乃知此。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520448'>与君读此碑，相见一笑喜。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520448'></div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520654' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520654?labeling=true' target='_blank'>器之喜谈禅纵横迅辩尝摧衲子丛林苦之有诗见赠次其韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520654")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520654_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520654'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520654'>彭侯惯法战，机锋吸西江。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520654'>衲子畏面目，望见投矛鏦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520654'>丛林真一害，斯人喧此邦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520654'>我虽耐矢石，貌抗心已降。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520654'>霜钟但摩挲，岂敢施微撞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520654'>时来奋棘髯，剧谈对闲窗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520654'>初见摇心树，久则摧幔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>幢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520654'>遂使浇薄态，琢磨成敦厖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520654'>吾志荷大法，君欲插手扛。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520654'>从来内外护，刘远名亦双。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520654'>斯道久破碎，百孔而千疮。<div 原作慢，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520654_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　居归宗寺，见归宗智常禅师画像，为作赞。作品：《赤眼禅师画像赞序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　再游庐山，见破灶堕和尚像，为作赞。作品：《破灶堕和尚赞序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>破灶堕和尚赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522130")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522130_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522130'>余阅传灯，爱老安之子，所谓破灶堕者，深證无生，恨不与之同时而生也。绍圣中，再游庐山，见其像而赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522130_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522130'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522130'>嵩山屋老灶有神，民争祠之日宰烹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522130'>师与门人偶经行，即而视之因叹惊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522130'>此唯土瓦和合成，是中何从有圣灵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522130'>以杖敲之辄堕倾，须臾青衣出笑迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522130'>谢师为我谈无生，言讫登空如鸟轻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522130'>门人问之拜投诚，伏地但闻破堕声。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522130'>君看一体情非情，皎如朗月悬青冥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522130'>未證据者以事明，鞭草血流石吼升，涅槃门开见户庭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522130'>老安怜儿为作名，金屑虽贵翳眼睛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_522130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522130'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522130_comment'></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年9月6日</a>　九月六日，过庐山，访善权禅师，时善权开应乾法道于此。作品：《题庐山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213473' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213473' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213473?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题庐山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年9月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213473")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213473_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213473'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213473'>余十五六时，游北山，谒准禅师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213473_comment'></div>残僧三四辈，草屋数椽，殆不堪其愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213473_comment'></div>准老而喜饮，时酹一樽，则击罄礼观音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213473_comment'></div>空阶夜雨，弥月不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213473_comment'></div>后二十五年，余还自海外，过此，而山川增胜，楼阁如幻出，大钟横撞，净侣戢戢，而真隐方开石门法道于此，余乃服其老且衰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213473_comment'></div>重九前三日秋阴，皆当时清绝之象，而有今日适悦之情，遂书此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213473_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　观苏庠、祖可唱和善权诗，跋其后。作品：《跋养直可师唱和真隐诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213394' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213394' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213394?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋养直可师唱和真隐诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213394")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213394'>予久不见养直，时时想见其堕帻醉时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213394_comment'></div>忽阅此诗，如行野渡春色中，虽盎盎醇酽，然终有一种清绝气味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213394_comment'></div>可上人语迅快如漱壑夜泉响，扫窗春雾空，不类菜肚阿师语，仲伯连璧士也，而皆友吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213394_comment'></div>巽中传曰：「观其所以游，因以知其为人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213394_comment'></div>吾于巽中亦云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213394_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　与善权、善祐、本忠山行，作诗记之。作品：《仙庐同巽中阿祐忠禅山行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520646?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_520646'>好山不知源，胜处藏叠嶂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520646'>兴来理清游，意适争勇往。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520646'>事异倾同识，顾语山答响。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520646'>拨置形骸外，卸裓藉草莽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520646'>独余衰退姿，面色馀烟瘴。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520646'>胜践偶获陪，兹乐非夙望。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520646'>一笑粲妍鄙，散坐推少长。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520646'>愧无斜川诗，苦语出牵强。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520646'>读之辄自嗟，幸君一拊掌。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520646'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_520646_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　应善权之请，为其侄善祐作字序。作品：《德效字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213416' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213416' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213416?labeling=true' target='_blank'>德效字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213416")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213416_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213416'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213416'>「皇天无亲，常与善人，是耶非耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213416_comment'></div>司马子长视德无效，疑为善未必有祐之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213416_comment'></div>伯夷、叔齐死，越千载有耿光，萧梁武帝亦以饿终，而自瑀及遘八叶为相，与唐室相终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213416_comment'></div>司马子长见于天未定之时，酌其理，则天之常与善，殆不可诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213416_comment'></div>譬如松柏之稚，厄于牛羊，杂于蒿莱，人固易而疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213416_comment'></div>及其天定，则傲雪霜而上青冥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213416_comment'></div>南州之西岳，九江之庐阜，两者之麓，山川之秀气所钟，善人隐德之渊薮，意功名富贵者辈出，而近世特未有著者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213416_comment'></div>士论多司马子长之疑，安知尽出僧中乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213416_comment'></div>高氏世为右姓，诗礼世其家，有奇比丘出焉，石门权巽中是已，吾畏友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213416_comment'></div>以高才卓识振于丛林，一时贤士大夫加手足之敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213416_comment'></div>其侄善祐熏烝见闻，惠敏出其天姿，老杜所谓「毫发无遗恨，波澜独老成」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213416_comment'></div>巽中使余字之，余推为德之理，以酌山川之胜，盛高氏之遗庆，字之曰德效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213416_comment'></div>巽中拊手称善人，序以授之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213416_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年9月9日</a>　重九日，作诗示善权。作品：《九日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521170")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521170'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521170'>去岁重阳瘴海滨，病拈霜蕊嗅清晨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521170'>身闲已断思归梦，山好仍逢称意人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521170'>卯饭露葵欣旋摘，夜窗风栗共尝新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521170'>妙年衲子应相笑，痴钝耽源老应真。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521170'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521170_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　在庐山，送韩驹故人雷从龙之宣州谒知府刘安节签判曾纡。作品：《送雷从龙见宣守》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520485' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520485' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520485?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送雷从龙见宣守</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520485")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520485_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520485'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520485'>子苍布衣昨日脱，今日便校秘阁书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520485'>勿惊韩雷相隐显，今来古孙名姓俱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520485'>君看守道已华国，先生徂徕犹把锄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520485'>嗟君六丧寄空馆，富人满前那可拣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520485'>坏衣悬鹑无一钱，想像郭公四十万。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520485'>青云故人气如春，解令寒谷生和珍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520485'>江浦买舟春水生，片帆何日到宣城。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520485'>府中若见空青老，从渠为觅诗遗藁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520485_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520485'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520485_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　为雷从龙代作上刘安节书。作品：《代上宣守书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213239?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代上宣守书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213239")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213239'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213239'>某闻痴蝇附骥，气凌千里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213239_comment'></div>兔丝依松，势登九霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213239_comment'></div>两物至微陋也，而其气势特能荣耀于昆虫草木者，盖其所遭之时，所托之地适幸而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213239_comment'></div>某寒乡贱微，人不比数，赋命数奇，临事金注，困穷极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213239_comment'></div>所幸少游上庠，识阁下一人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213239_comment'></div>时阁下蔚然自持，如乔松之稚蒿莱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213239_comment'></div>养精蓄骏，如骐骥之困车轭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213239_comment'></div>某因得时，交足以缘仆，络根以蔓衍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213239_comment'></div>呜呼，阁下以冠冕道德，鼓吹六经，声名横翔，捷出搢绅之右；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213239_comment'></div>富贵昂霄，耸壑青云之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213239_comment'></div>方掇天子近侍，出镇大邦，道显著矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213239_comment'></div>某尘埃寒乞，面目可憎，辄敢冒重湖，涉大江，千里至前，引物连类，叙平生游从之好，欲以骇动视听，闻者多窃笑坐睡，然区区之心，终欲一望履舄者，其情有真可哀者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213239_comment'></div>某既为功名误，罪大不孝，二亲之丧，四弟之柩，皆在浅土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213239_comment'></div>家贫族陋，默计之，不一泣诉于门下，是毕世不能举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213239_comment'></div>杜甫寒饿流离，至食橡栗，严武镇两川，甫依之，得不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213239_comment'></div>郭元振为太学生，家送赀四十万，会有缞服者叩门自言五世未葬，元振举以与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213239_comment'></div>呜呼，严武之忠厚，元振之节义盖如此，每读其传，窃欣慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213239_comment'></div>恭惟阁下忠厚，不弃故旧，有严剑南之风度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213239_comment'></div>节义喜施，有郭代公之奇豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213239_comment'></div>而某无杜甫之才，有不质名缞服者之丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213239_comment'></div>某之辞家，里巷聚送，或疑或信，疑者多而信者少，此不足怪，盖节义未尝有故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213239_comment'></div>愿阁下哀怜之，使信者增气，而疑者沮气矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1213239_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f7a00de9a00a4f06aea4141ef1c16195_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f7a00de9a00a4f06aea4141ef1c16195");'><span id='f7a00de9a00a4f06aea4141ef1c16195_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='f7a00de9a00a4f06aea4141ef1c16195' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过江州，作诗招夏倪，时倪知江州。作品：《招夏均父》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521186")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521186'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521186'>北山深转青松壑，万叠烟霏空翠堆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521186'>元亮果堪中路俟，子猷那敢棹舟回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521186'>鸟工魂梦寻公去，蝉蜕尘埃出郭来。<div target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520862_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520862'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520862'>怒龙斗未已，角尾相攀牵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520862'>巨石为解纷，背腹遭虬缠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520862'>千年毒不死，槎牙带云烟。<div id='poem_title_1213594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213594'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213594'>地号云居，非石梁隔分凡境；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213594_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213594_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1128&endYear=1128')">1128年3月18日</a>　三月十八日，为邵阳俭上人跋苏过字。作品：《跋苏叔党子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋叔党字</a><span class='authorDate'>（建炎二年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1213377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213377'>王子敬童稚时，作字行草已超。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213377_comment'></div>故方引纸著腕，右军从后掣其笔不获，乃叹曰：「是儿他日名当大成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213377_comment'></div>予观叔党行草，皆蝉蜕坟尘之类，笔法通亚乃翁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213377_comment'></div>惜其早世不秋，庸讵不以此郎媲子敬耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213377_comment'></div>邵阳俭上人，雨歇携此帖见过，翛然如见父子角巾竹杖，行小港榕林之下，不胜清绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213377_comment'></div>建炎二年三月十八日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213378'>鸡苏，《本草》：「龙脑薄荷也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213378_comment'></div>东吴林下人夏月多以饮客，而俗人便私议坡误用鸡苏为紫苏，可发吴侬一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213378_comment'></div>予将发鸾溪，上人以此轴为示，笔势飞动，皆学坡而未臻坡崄处者，要之如马巷中逢王、谢家子弟，步趋状貌，蕴藉风流，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213378_comment'></div>觉范题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213378_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

id='poem_sentence_2_520922'>梦回清语默，寒重压衣衫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520922'>面壁孤风坐，知谁继夜参。<div id='poem_note_520922'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_520922_0'>⑴ 《锦绣万花谷》、《古今合璧事类备要》作竹相</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520922_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_520923' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520923'>律管未回暖，春先到晓岩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520923_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520923'>与君清作对，得月便成三。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520923_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520923'>秀色报虚幌，幽欣宜衲衫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520923_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520923'>相看超语默，觌露不须参。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520923_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520923'></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《雪后寄荷塘幻住庵盲僧四首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《雪后寄荷塘幻住庵盲僧四首》（其三）<span id='poem_sentence_0_521694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521694'>已喜眼根今现證，何妨要耳作同参。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521695_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521695'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521695'>表里洞然无量相，晦明无计掩藏伊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521695'>庵中但见人孤坐，门外从教事不知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521695_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521695'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521695_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521696' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521696' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_521696_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521696'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521696'>荷塘寺后千竿玉，折脚铛中五合陈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521696'>静里笑看垂钓者，夜深方见把针人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521697'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521697'>檐日未通孤坐暖，雪云都放九峰青。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521697'>空阶夜滴闻铃响，卧学荷塘耳诵经。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521697'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521697_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年1月10日</a>　正月十日，已定居九峰，而希祖等皆在，读《高僧传》，追和帛道猷诗。作品：《追和帛道猷诗一首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520626' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520626' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520626?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追和帛道猷一首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1116年1月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520626")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520626_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520626'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520626'>永怀山阴老，漱流味馀津。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520626_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520626'>幽寻见兰丛，苍然出荆榛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520626_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
