id='poem_sentence_3_520626_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520626'>夜舂博饭吃，犹胜海南民。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520626_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520626'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_520626_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年1月</a>　正月，本忠名其所居为堕斋，为作序，并说三偈。作品：《堕斋偈序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>堕斋偈序</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和六年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213261")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213261'>《圆觉经》云：「居一切时不起妄念，于诸妄心亦不息灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213261_comment'></div>住妄想境不加了知，于无了知不辨真实，如人言蜂酝百花之香为甜耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213261_comment'></div>永嘉曰：「若以知知寂，此非无缘知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213261_comment'></div>如手执如意，非无如意手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213261_comment'></div>若以自知知，亦非无缘知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213261_comment'></div>如手自握拳，非是不拳手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213261_comment'></div>亦不知知寂，亦不自知知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213261_comment'></div>不可为无知，自性了然故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213261_comment'></div>不同于木石，如手不执物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213261_comment'></div>亦不自握拳，不可为无手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213261_comment'></div>以手安然故，不同于兔角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213261_comment'></div>如人言所以，甜者为蜜耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213261_comment'></div>而南泉曰：「三世诸佛，不知有狸奴白牯，却知有如人见蜜及亲尝耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213261_comment'></div>曹山以堕统三法，如人以蜜触舌，自知纯甜，无中边味耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213261_comment'></div>南州道人本忠闻之，击节赏音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213261_comment'></div>余曰：「此郎殆人类精奇，追友其人于百年之上」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213261_comment'></div>遂名其所居曰「堕斋」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213261_comment'></div>请余记之，为说三偈，曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1213261'>生在帝王家，那复有尊贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213261_comment'></div>自应著珍御，顾见何惊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213261_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1213261'>又曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1213261'>纷然同作息，银碗里盛雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213261_comment'></div>若欲异牯牛，与牯牛何别？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213261_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1213261'>又曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1213261'>有闻皆无闻，有见元无物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213261_comment'></div>若断声色求，木偶当成佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213261_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1213261'>政和六年正月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1213261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年2月</a>　二月，作诗示本忠。作品：《示忠子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_520989' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213272?labeling=true' "poem_title_1213272")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213272'>予除刑部囚籍之明年，庐于九峰之下，有苾刍三四辈来相从，皆齿少志大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213272_comment'></div>予晓之曰：「予少时好博观之，艰难所得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213272_comment'></div>既不与世合，又销铄于忧患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213272_comment'></div>今返视缺然，望之则竭，不必叩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213272_comment'></div>若前辈必欲大蓄其德，要多识前言往行，僧史具矣，可取而观」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213272_comment'></div>语未卒，有献言者曰：「僧史自惠皎、道宣、赞宁而下，皆略观矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213272_comment'></div>然其书与《史记》、两《汉》、《南北史》、《唐传》大异，其文杂烦重，如户婚斗讼按检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213272_comment'></div>昔鲁直尝憎之，欲整齐，未遑暇，竟以谪死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213272_comment'></div>公蒙圣恩脱死所，又从鲁直之旧游，能粗加删补，使成一体之文，依仿史传，立以赞词，使学者临传致赞语，见古人妙处，不亦佳乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213272_comment'></div>予欣然许之，于是仍其所科，文其词，促十四卷为十二卷以授之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213272_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2129d2dca3784c119679510410413c90_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2129d2dca3784c119679510410413c90");'><span id='2129d2dca3784c119679510410413c90_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年</a>，46岁</div><div id='2129d2dca3784c119679510410413c90' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晚春，别陈瓘，复归九峰，于道中作诗。作品：《归九峰道中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_521548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521548' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521548'>四五叠峰深处，归去开荒南亩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521548'>是非不得扶犁，春晓一蓑烟雨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521548'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521548_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读李彭匡山道中望天池诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵李商老匡山道中望天池》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_520492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520492?labeling=true' "poem_title_520492")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520492'>幽人修水上，春涨冒陂田。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520492'>时时想见之，笑颊微涡旋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520492'>往来柴桑间，妙语生云烟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520492'>庐山自高寒，青碧开晴天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520492'>倚藤望绝顶，风味如斜川。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520492'>我思从之游，子亦当勉旃。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520492_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至丰家市读李彭诗，次其韵。作品：《至丰家市读商老诗次韵》<span id='poem_sentence_4_520493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520493'>卧看孤灯心耿耿，呼童觅纸聊记之。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520493'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_520493_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>李彭自北山道中作诗见寄，次其韵。作品：《李商老自北山道中作诗见寄次韵》<span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521882'>蹇驴醉颊兀红酣，眼艳秋波望翠岚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521882'>长向诗中见风度，爱君笔力似黔南。<div id='poem_content_521933'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521933'>插身在俗热恼处，留眼看山寒翠中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521933'>修径扫除知有寺，忽惊窗户湿青红。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521933'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521933_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在九峰日，有撰述佛祖旨诀之意，欲以法惠人而自减夙障。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>有僧问临济义玄禅师宾主句，方欲答之，顿见三玄三要之旨，因作《临济宗旨》以示学者。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《禅林僧宝传》附录。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作《临济和尚赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在九峰日，拜通玄禅师塔。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>夏，释《楞严经》毕，题为《尊顶法论》，以之为弘扬佛法之宗趣。<br /></div>

黄梅

class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521031'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521031'>独木江头缆客船，暮江秋色两依然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521031'>落霞片段红绷水，危岫参差碧挂天。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521031_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='12f6990794b7475f917f417e32c3980a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("12f6990794b7475f917f417e32c3980a");'><span id='12f6990794b7475f917f417e32c3980a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>，57岁</div><div id='12f6990794b7475f917f417e32c3980a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年11月</a>　十一月，游蕲州黄梅县四祖山，见栽松道者真身，为仲宣禅师作《栽松庵记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213449' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213449' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213449?labeling=true' target='_blank'>栽松庵记</a><span class='authorDate'>（建炎元年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213449")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213449_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213449'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213449'>《僧史补》曰：四祖道信禅师，以唐武德七年至破头山，爱洞壑深秀，有终焉之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213449_comment'></div>禅者相寻而来，遂成丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213449_comment'></div>有僧不言名氏，日以种松为务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213449_comment'></div>私请祖曰：「衣法可以见付乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213449_comment'></div>祖师老之，曰：「汝能再来乃可耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213449_comment'></div>于是僧出山至浊港，见女子浣，呼曰：「我托宿得否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213449_comment'></div>女曰：「我家具有父兄，可从问之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213449_comment'></div>僧曰：「汝诺我乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213449_comment'></div>女曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213449_comment'></div>女周氏之季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213449_comment'></div>僧即还山中，危坐而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213449_comment'></div>周氏之女因有娠，父母怒而逐之于众屋之中，日庸纺里闬间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213449_comment'></div>已而生子，女以为不祥，弃浊港中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213449_comment'></div>明日视之，跏趺波间，溯流而上，异之，收养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213449_comment'></div>七岁随母往来黄梅道中，四祖偶见，问曰：「童子何姓」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213449_comment'></div>曰：「姓固有，但非常性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213449_comment'></div>祖曰：「是何姓」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213449_comment'></div>对曰：「是佛性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213449_comment'></div>祖曰：「然则汝无姓耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213449_comment'></div>对曰：「惟空故无」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213449_comment'></div>于是四祖笑之，乞于其母，为剃落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213449_comment'></div>二十授以衣法，为第五祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213449_comment'></div>即游䨥峰，见栽松之全身，又至东山，见周氏之全身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213449_comment'></div>浊港周氏子孙之盛，殆今甲黄梅，三尺童能言其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213449_comment'></div>僧赞宁《僧史》曰：「五祖弘忍禅师者，姓周氏，本河南，迁止蕲之黄梅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213449_comment'></div>诞生之夕，异香满室」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213449_comment'></div>此矫诬之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213449_comment'></div>然可證佐者，母既出于周氏，而曰祖师姓周乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213449_comment'></div>僧契嵩作《定祖图》，亦不能辨，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213449_comment'></div>岂当衲子以常理疑之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213449_comment'></div>夫圣人之托化，岂假父母之缘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213449_comment'></div>如伊尹生于空桑，宝公生于鹰巢，独不论父母之缘耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213449_comment'></div>自唐至今，学者疑信相半，不能决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213449_comment'></div>建炎元年十一月记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1213449_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年11月</a>　为仲宣禅师作《栽松道者真身赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>栽松道者真身赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522147")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522147'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522147'>生死变灭，如沤在海。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522147'>无有处所，浩然茫昧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522147'>而此老人，游戏自在。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522147'>出死入生，初无限碍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522147'>譬如壮士，脱袍著铠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522147'>令铠与袍，俨然相对。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522147'>是故山中，两身俱在。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522147'>凡夫众生，为眼所盖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522147'>为抉其膜，使生光彩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522147'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_522147_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522147'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522147_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年12月1日</a>　十二月初一，为仲宣作《双峰正觉禅院涅槃堂记》，时同里僧祖称掌寺事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双峰正觉禅院涅槃堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（建炎元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213435")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213435'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213435'>大江之北，梦泽之东，万山走趋，屹立两峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213435_comment'></div>蟠岸千楹，宝势翔空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213435_comment'></div>烟云开遮，户窗青红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213435_comment'></div>天花堕飘，舞雨旋风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213435_comment'></div>疑登梵释，龙天之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213435_comment'></div>大钟横撞，山空玲珑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213435_comment'></div>犀颅戢戢，步趋肃雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213435_comment'></div>祖印禅师，盖其长雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213435_comment'></div>宽而边幅，壮而疏通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213435_comment'></div>谦以自牧，众所追崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213435_comment'></div>如海下之，百川则宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213435_comment'></div>论其世家，非侯则公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213435_comment'></div>弃之耻言，安乐岩丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213435_comment'></div>与彼假我，染衣妄庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213435_comment'></div>垂涎富贵，忘其顶童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213435_comment'></div>雀卢自诬者，则若不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213435_comment'></div>余自襄沔，南归新丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213435_comment'></div>道由淮上，托宿山中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213435_comment'></div>欣然见我，如旧游从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213435_comment'></div>日陪杖屦，摧颓两翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213435_comment'></div>偶立小语，又指役工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213435_comment'></div>纷然斧斤，声杂鼓钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213435_comment'></div>坐僧日多，其来无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213435_comment'></div>庸免包藏，衰老笃癃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213435_comment'></div>跛盲失心，不祥之凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213435_comment'></div>作堂馆之，工行告终矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213435_comment'></div>要余即之，周行庑廊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213435_comment'></div>入门疏快，密室虚窗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213435_comment'></div>搴帏设帘，宜温宜凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213435_comment'></div>濯衣栅榻，负喧橙床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213435_comment'></div>药炉茶鼎，可剂可汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213435_comment'></div>颐指如意，失其异乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213435_comment'></div>即戏问之，欲资抵掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213435_comment'></div>岂有少年，如邃青狂，法战不胜，舁入此堂者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213435_comment'></div>岂有垂死，如剖倔强，而敢横机，摩叠大阳者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213435_comment'></div>岂有英灵，如黄涅槃，杖擿病者，随起激昂者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213435_comment'></div>岂有病瘉，枵然空房，而尝卧处，尚多痂疮，以火烧之，皆熏陆香者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213435_comment'></div>岂有头陀，以纸为裳，而其迅机，石火电光，方酬洞山，言讫而亡者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213435_comment'></div>祖印愕然，视余嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213435_comment'></div>如子精敏，亦迷怪奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213435_comment'></div>甘弃坦涂，而行崄巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213435_comment'></div>子知太平，无象可窥，雨露霜雪，自然四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213435_comment'></div>我廪既高，里无呼追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213435_comment'></div>鸡豚社饮，老幼扶携，安用鳞凤之与菌芝耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213435_comment'></div>昔维摩病，卧毗耶离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213435_comment'></div>教诲天魔，使令艳姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213435_comment'></div>手提大千，戏而掷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213435_comment'></div>世尊有疾，则异于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213435_comment'></div>背痛乃卧，须乳作麋而已，何尝变化，怖骇群儿乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213435_comment'></div>余闻其说，乃加敬虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213435_comment'></div>而僧祖称，祖印所贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213435_comment'></div>而余里闬，又掌寺权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213435_comment'></div>婆娑献诚，愿拾此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213435_comment'></div>丐余文之，为记以传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213435_comment'></div>夫千里水，滥觞其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213435_comment'></div>若合众流，遂成大川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1213435_comment'></div>则知此堂，众檀成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1213435_comment'></div>增土为阜，增毛为毡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1213435_comment'></div>两尼勤勤，佳其精专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1213435_comment'></div>同其调度，所费缗钱，盖六十万，净愿乃圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1213435_comment'></div>有僧道齐，以身率先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1213435_comment'></div>杂众工中，唱叫挽牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1213435_comment'></div>十方之多，道俗嗟羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1213435_comment'></div>咨尔堂众，谛观病缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1213435_comment'></div>此四大躯，无可肇坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1213435_comment'></div>生死之趣，爱见所缠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1213435_comment'></div>虽相扶持，终各弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1213435_comment'></div>当令以观，常自现前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1213435_comment'></div>授与此疾，非人非天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1213435_comment'></div>是我自业，成熟则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1213435_comment'></div>受尽还无，如鸡出燖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1213435_comment'></div>此心自住，如珠在渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1213435_comment'></div>观苦进道，诸佛悯怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1213435_comment'></div>岁在丁未，建炎改元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1213435_comment'></div>季冬初吉，集者骈肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1213435_comment'></div>叙多率众，二百九员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1213435_comment'></div>领衲景修，守珂、守诠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1213435_comment'></div>至其纲维，又拣耆年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1213435_comment'></div>办众法钦，牧众法琏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1213435_comment'></div>丛林精神，照映云泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1213435_comment'></div>祖印为谁，住持仲宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1213435_comment'></div>而作记者，寂音老禅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_81_1213435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　为仲宣作疏化缘修经藏。作品：《化藏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213603' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213603' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213603?labeling=true' target='_blank'>化藏疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213603")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213603_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213603'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213603'>五天秘轴，三藏微言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213603_comment'></div>结集本藏于龙宫，流传幸出于人世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213603_comment'></div>唯䨥峰之福地，蟠万础之宝坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213603_comment'></div>独经藏之弗修，如面目之有疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213603_comment'></div>议将重建，倚办众檀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213603_comment'></div>愿欢喜以听从，庶庄严之成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213603_comment'></div>菩提园内，共输一雨春回；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213603_comment'></div>香积台前，果见十分月满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213603_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213603_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　又为仲宣作疏化缘修三门。作品：《化三门》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213609' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>化三门疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213609")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213609'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213609'>唯淮山萃僧之海，实祖师选佛之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213609_comment'></div>必由大总持门，方践普光明殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213609_comment'></div>门屋今遂老矣，过者疑将压焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213609_comment'></div>敢罄折干于净檀，祈鼎新为之营建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213609_comment'></div>飞檐走栋，行看掩映于云烟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213609_comment'></div>间碧涂金，想见照临于岩壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213609_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213609_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　复为仲宣作《出檀衣赞》作品：《出檀衣赞二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span>《出檀衣赞二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出檀衣赞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一）</span>二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522144")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522144'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522144'>古佛身上衣，佛佛相付授。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522144'>慈母爱儿心，针针自成就。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522144'>是故吾双峰，自少至白首。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522144'>护惜如镜奁，一尘不敢受。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522144'>何以出檀名，此时无别虑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522144'>如持油钵行，如蹑独木渡。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522144'>永怀毗尼藏，一旦成万古。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522144'>纷纷五群众，来观亦顶礼。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522144'>平时放逸心，化作额间泚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522144'>将见衣匣前，泚流似江水。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522144'>咨尔淮山神，守护当奉职。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522144'>无使尘涴侵，无使云润湿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522144'>谛观不敢瞬，心折三叹息。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522144'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_522144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522144'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522144_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_522145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522145?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522145'>此出檀衣，慈母授我。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522145'>不敢手扑，矧敢覆卧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522145'>五十馀年，俨临清众。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522145'>寒暑不易，尽形受用。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522145'>师后当知，商那和老。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522145'>于母腹中，披九枝草。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_522145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522145'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522145_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　作《定身岩赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定身岩赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522148")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522148'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522148'>淮山深处，容我卓锡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522148'>树下经行，岩间宴寂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522148'>六十馀年，胁不至席。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522148'>天子三诏，掉头不应。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522148'>知不可致，南向加敬。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522148'>山摇海惊，天空地迥。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522148'>后代儿孙，则反于是。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522148'>如乳中虫，贪嗜世味。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522148'>我寻其迹，为陨涕泪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522148'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_522148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522148'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522148_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　拜四祖山法演禅师像，作赞。作品：《双峰演禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双峰演禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522188")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522188'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522188'>三关洞开无锁扃，汝自艰难起战兢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522188'>师过此关悉閒暇，掉臂径趋呼不应。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522188'>如春消冰自涣释，如鲲化鹏谁使令。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522188'>归来笑搭出檀服，依旧淮山千万青。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522188'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522188'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522188_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　与仲宣禅师游黄梅东山，会表自禅师，表自寻卒，作文祭之。作品：《祭五祖自老文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三０。）</span><div id='poem_1213556' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213556' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213556?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭五祖自老文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213556")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213556_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213556'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213556'>古人尚友，不短千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213556_comment'></div>苟曰气合，何必面对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213556_comment'></div>崎岖远来，侥倖为会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213556_comment'></div>坐未欢禅，师不少待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213556_comment'></div>如人噬脐，不及何悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213556_comment'></div>掩泪莫陈，意折心碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213556_comment'></div>十方现前，去来无碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213556_comment'></div>师岂真亡，觌露妙在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213556_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213556_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　东山雪朝，为漳州正道书记跋黄庭坚字。作品：《跋山谷字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　雪后与仲宣登东山五慈观阁，应禅鉴大师无学之请，而为住持慈觉宗致禅师作记。作品：《五慈观阁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213433' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213433' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213433?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五慈观阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（建炎元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213433")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213433_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213433'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213433'>古之仁人，将有为于世，必特立独行，自行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213433_comment'></div>汉将李陵之降虏，致武帝疑其臣属，于是苏武奉使不屈，牧羊海上十九年，起居必仗汉节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213433_comment'></div>宣帝以智力御世，君臣凛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213433_comment'></div>既杀盖宽饶，于是疏广父子袖手而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213433_comment'></div>使人主知区区爵禄不足骄天下之士，岂激颓波而独往，冒冲风而孤骞者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213433_comment'></div>岂惟世之仁人如此，出世之圣师亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213433_comment'></div>三祖璨公既得法隐于淮山，悼学者枯禅缚律，以地位證修为归宿，不信达摩别传之宗，故作《信心铭》，又名其弟子曰道信，造次颠沛，语言寝息，必以信自心为劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213433_comment'></div>呜呼，吾祖之于法道，深切著明，可以想见其馀风遗烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213433_comment'></div>东山住持沙门宗致者，临济十一世之玄孙，而泐潭准禅师之嫡嗣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213433_comment'></div>骨面严冷，英气逸群，以荷担云庵法道为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213433_comment'></div>说法有辩慧，护教有便行，卑丛林以宗旨争沟封，以语言争非是，纷然诸方，方炽未艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213433_comment'></div>名为走道，其实走名，射利裨贩，无所不至，而正宗微矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213433_comment'></div>欲弃之而弗忍，欲导之而弗从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213433_comment'></div>于是为室于方丈之东，名曰慈航，又自名其号曰慈觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213433_comment'></div>犹以为未也，建阁于大门，名曰慈观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213433_comment'></div>蜀僧居竭者，倾长财一百五十万以助成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213433_comment'></div>竭生平自奉甚约，所得檀信之施，毛累寸积，四十年之藏，一旦举以施之，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213433_comment'></div>南晋僧子照者，有实行自然之智，如人信手斫方圆，皆中绳墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213433_comment'></div>慈觉使总院事，事无巨细，谈笑而办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213433_comment'></div>阁经营，照实董其事，垢面龟手，不惮霜雪，伐山相材，运土拾砾，与苍头短发进退，凡半年而落成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213433_comment'></div>竭以财施，而慈觉之志乃克成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213433_comment'></div>师弟子之于宗，皆无所愧，贤矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213433_comment'></div>余与双峰祖印禅师仲宣来游，遂登是阁，晚望淮山，万叠自献，雪尽苍然，却立周视，朱栏碧瓦，荡摩云烟，苾刍往来，午梵方奏，疑其身世之在诸天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213433_comment'></div>祖印问余曰：「慈觉之慈，宗师之慈，其与佛菩萨之慈奚若」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213433_comment'></div>余曰：「如恒河女子抱婴儿欲渡，儿堕水中，女子与之俱死，此爱儿之慈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213433_comment'></div>满慈子曰：『人骂辱我，我则自幸，曰骂辱非拳殴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213433_comment'></div>设或拳殴，又自幸曰：拳殴之酷，不犹愈杖击兵刃乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213433_comment'></div>此忍力之慈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213433_comment'></div>曹溪六祖，夜为男子张行昌所谋，将施刃，六祖笑曰：『止负汝金，不负汝命』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213433_comment'></div>以金赠之使去，人无知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213433_comment'></div>行昌感涕，愿落发为比丘，所至辄访道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213433_comment'></div>复至曹溪，而祖授以法要，使分灯于江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213433_comment'></div>冤亲一揆，是谓等慈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213433_comment'></div>提婆达多每欲害佛，以毒置十指爪中，见佛接足，佛笑曰：『未毒我足，先毒汝手』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213433_comment'></div>又劝国驱千醉象以冲佛驾，象来，佛垂手示之，于是象见十指皆有师子，怖骇遗粪而去，此谓大慈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213433_comment'></div>若慈觉则不受诸慈管摄，击涂毒之鼓，死却偷心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213433_comment'></div>镕凡圣之铜，不存情见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213433_comment'></div>如胜热婆罗之火聚，无厌足王之刀锯，使一切众生触其焰，蒙其刃，皆获无分别智，此盖真慈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213433_comment'></div>夫岂不然哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213433_comment'></div>祖印笑曰：「道人固菩提园中之耆年，何其辩慧乃尔惊群耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213433_comment'></div>龙舒禅鉴大师无学犯众而言曰：「阁成而老师适至，似非苟然，愿为记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213433_comment'></div>余曰：「唯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213433_comment'></div>建炎元年十二月记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1213433_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　无学点茶乞诗，为之作。作品：《无学点茶乞诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无学点茶乞诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520829")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520829_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520829'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520829'>政和官焙来何处，雪后晴窗欣共煮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520829'>银瓶瑟瑟过风雨，渐觉羊肠挽声度。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520829'>盏深扣之看浮乳，点茶三昧须饶汝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520829'>鹧鸪班中吸春露，□□□□□□□。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520829_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520829'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520829_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　为宗致作赞。作品：《五祖慈觉赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　代人作疏，请璞禅师住持东禅寺。作品：《请璞老住东禅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213595?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请璞老住东禅疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213595")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213595_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213595'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213595'>寺近双峰，地连七泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213595_comment'></div>观今法席，号古丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213595_comment'></div>师门挺多，开己见之户牖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213595_comment'></div>学者益众，横臆断之干戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213595_comment'></div>纷然江淮，遂成阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213595_comment'></div>赖有人中师子，来为病者医王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213595_comment'></div>伏惟某人父事僧龙，孙承祖印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213595_comment'></div>重建东山法道，特弘西祖宗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213595_comment'></div>电驰三要之机，雾合六和之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213595_comment'></div>慈云先布，增觉苑之光华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213595_comment'></div>法雨将倾，发道苗之种性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213595_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213595_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　作疏请璞禅师开堂说法。作品：《请璞老开堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213596' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213596' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213596?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请璞老开堂疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213596")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213596_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213596'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213596'>曹溪宗于天下，而黄梅为得法之源；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213596_comment'></div>达磨祖于神州，而东禅盖付衣之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213596_comment'></div>历观先世勃兴，皆道大德全；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213596_comment'></div>俯视今时嗣续，多名存实废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213596_comment'></div>思得逸群耆宿，追还古格丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213596_comment'></div>果有老成，来膺妙选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213596_comment'></div>伏惟某人行业无玷，声称有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213596_comment'></div>为佛印、祖印之儿孙，共东山、西山之云月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213596_comment'></div>旃檀林岂生杞，彫虎穴不容彪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213596_comment'></div>玉聚缙绅，云屯缁衲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213596_comment'></div>伫一音之雷震，特扬古佛之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213596_comment'></div>同万国之山呼，仰祝后天之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213596_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213596_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　为东禅寺僧行月作《传衣阁赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>传衣阁赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522146")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522146'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522146'>达磨信衣，转相传付。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522146'>四传至今，今以付汝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522146'>受授惟艰，命如悬絮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522146'>法遍沙界，此衣乃住。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522146'>想见峰前，父子相语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522146'>唯僧行月，以阁其处。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522146'>坐令朱栏，环绕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>云雨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522146'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_522146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522146'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_522146_0'>⑴ 原作绕，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_522146_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年12月15日</a>　十五日，为少阳义井作记。作品：《少阳义井记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>少阳义井记</a><span class='authorDate'>（建炎元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213451")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213451_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213451'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213451'>建炎元年六月，蔡阳野墅僧子辰俱浔阳檀越陈璹还自白湖，过少阳，渴甚须水，道傍皆近人，积水秽浊不索，相与叹曰：「江淮要冲而地无美泉，何以止往来渴心」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213451_comment'></div>相约出钱开井于湖之左，而白湖杨元广彦隆亦欲协成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213451_comment'></div>有僧祖庆实董其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213451_comment'></div>工毕，泉甘凉，邦人赖以灌畦饮啜，行人盛暑为归宿之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213451_comment'></div>《易》曰：「改邑不改井」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213451_comment'></div>以象正君子之有恤心，虽大行无加，穷居不损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213451_comment'></div>又曰：「井者德之地」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213451_comment'></div>以象有烦心之德，虚其中而不自有之也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213451_comment'></div>呜呼，二三人者不独为济众无穷之利，其亦尚德也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213451_comment'></div>十二月望日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213451_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_0_1213572_comment'></div>大智成就，不隔纤毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213572_comment'></div>自然蝉蜕根尘之间，安用龟藏语默之外？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213572_comment'></div>当有达识，共赏此音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213572_comment'></div>伏惟某人正眼甚明，道根久固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213572_comment'></div>绰有远韵，爰自妙龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213572_comment'></div>云行鸟飞，川流岳峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213572_comment'></div>观其措置，实宗门之爪牙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213572_comment'></div>见其施张，盖法窟之头角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213572_comment'></div>以身徇道，当无系于去留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213572_comment'></div>为法求人，岂有拘于喧寂？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213572_comment'></div>所期甚大，幸毋固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213572_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　代张商英作疏，请惠杲禅师住东京天宁寺。作品：《请杲老住天宁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213573' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213573' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213573?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请杲老住天宁疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213573")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213573_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213573'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213573'>云门之句里呈机，粲玲珑之瓶芥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213573_comment'></div>洞山之正中妙叶，走圆转之盘珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213573_comment'></div>持临济之门风，行黄檗之照用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213573_comment'></div>夺人境于棒下，分宾主于喝中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213573_comment'></div>三宗盛集于帝京，诸老大扬于佛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213573_comment'></div>伏惟某人道韵拔俗，英姿逸群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213573_comment'></div>披沙得金，剖石逢玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213573_comment'></div>识黄龙窟中头角，振青鸾溪上风雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213573_comment'></div>十年之幽兰林香，一旦之颖锥囊露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213573_comment'></div>主张法席，厌饫名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213573_comment'></div>每欲晦藏，辄自昭著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213573_comment'></div>其自治虽无求于世，然寓世当循缘而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213573_comment'></div>奚必山林，终胜朝市？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213573_comment'></div>今者觉天梵侣，上国宝坊，伫法驭以重临，期宗风而大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213573_comment'></div>遥知起定因缘，助发慈心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213573_comment'></div>想见肯来龙象，拥随高步。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213573_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　又代张商英作山门疏。作品：《山门疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213574' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213574' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213574?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山门疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213574")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213574_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213574'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213574'>嵩山宏别传之宗，终依帝里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213574_comment'></div>天台修远举之行，尚游人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213574_comment'></div>观其迹，若未弃世缘，论其心，则深尊法道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213574_comment'></div>盖至人度生，初不泥其出处；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213574_comment'></div>菩萨护念，亦将泯其静喧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213574_comment'></div>仰前鉴之昭然，宜后昆之取法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213574_comment'></div>恭惟某人卓有实行，号称饱参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213574_comment'></div>冰霜居怀，严冷照物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213574_comment'></div>平生刻苦于道，诸方信服其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213574_comment'></div>其阅世也，如风行空，去来无碍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213574_comment'></div>则循缘也，如月印水，成破因时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213574_comment'></div>昔怀云泉终老之归，偶尔西去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213574_comment'></div>今念王臣外护之意，翻然北来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213574_comment'></div>期击电机锋重施，使正法眼藏不灭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213574_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　因叔协律郎彭几在枢密都承旨郭天信家作门客，遂识郭天信，甚得其宠倖，郭天信问传灯之义，作文答之。作品：《答郭公问传灯义》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213425?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答郭公问传灯义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213425")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213425_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213425'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213425'>太尉都承旨问所谓《传灯录》是何义？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213425_comment'></div>对曰：昔达磨大师佩佛心印于梁普通之初，至震旦时，学者方以讲观相高，达磨大师乃曰：「吾不立文字，直指人心，见性成佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213425_comment'></div>如来教外别行，传上根辈」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213425_comment'></div>人始疑之，久而疑信者相半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213425_comment'></div>艰难险阻，六传而至曹溪大鉴禅师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213425_comment'></div>当唐神龙中，天下之疑卒不疑胜，信者之多，于是源分派别，而为南岳、青原两宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213425_comment'></div>枝派蔓衍，而为云门、临济、曹洞、沩仰，与大法眼之五家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213425_comment'></div>其道遂大振于圣朝景德中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213425_comment'></div>东吴僧道原披奕世之祖图，集诸家之语录，由七佛以至大法眼禅师之嗣，凡五十二世，一千七百一人，成三十卷，目之曰《景德传灯录》，诣阙上进，奉冀流布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213425_comment'></div>章圣皇帝诏翰林学士、右司谏、知制诰臣杨亿等同加刊削，俾之裁定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213425_comment'></div>夫所谓佛心印者，众生灵智之府也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213425_comment'></div>其体本自妙而常明，虽万类纷然，日用殊趣，而文彩粲然明了，不差毫末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213425_comment'></div>其知之者，谓之神通光明藏，谓之光严住持；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213425_comment'></div>其不知者，谓之生死趣，谓之无明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213425_comment'></div>始自故證发，虽悟如释迦文佛，亦缘然灯记莂，则师承机语之自，其可废也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213425_comment'></div>《法华经》曰：「世尊放眉间白毫相光，照东方万八千世界」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213425_comment'></div>而弥勒发问，文殊决疑，以谓日月灯明，佛本光瑞如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213425_comment'></div>持是经者妙光法师，得其證者普明如来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213425_comment'></div>《维摩经》为魔女说法曰：「有法门名无尽灯，汝等当学无尽灯者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213425_comment'></div>譬如一灯然百千灯，冥者皆明，明终不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213425_comment'></div>如是诸佛菩萨开导百千众生，令发阿耨多罗三藐三菩提心，于是其道意亦不灭尽，随世说法，而日增益一切善法，是名无尽灯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213425_comment'></div>此其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213425_comment'></div>又问如何是传灯旨要，曰：昼夜分明，瞒他一点也不得。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1213425_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年10月</a>　十月初，代郭天信作《天宁节功德右语》，拜贺徽宗生日。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天宁节功德右语</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213608'>宝运储祥，惊星枢之夕绕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213608_comment'></div>庆云布瑞，睹日毂之朝升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213608_comment'></div>仰依有感之慈，上祝无疆之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213608_comment'></div>伏愿陛下睿齐舜禹，德比尧汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213608_comment'></div>履金轮之福以御天，护玉真之道以应世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213608_comment'></div>奏和气为太平之曲，登斯民于大有之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213608_comment'></div>率土同诚，幸遇千龄之嘉会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213608_comment'></div>瞻天鼓舞，愿同万国之称觞。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年10月10日</a>　十月十日天宁节，郭天信奏赐名并紫衣，徽宗准奏，依恩例诏赐号宝觉圆明。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　游戒坛院，欲观苏轼所画枯木、张大亨题字，未果，作诗示汪迪。作品：《戒坛院东坡枯木张嘉夫妙墨童子告以僧不在不可见作此示汪履道》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年1月15日</a>　正月上元观灯，随郭天信亲见徽宗车驾幸凝祥池，作诗二首纪之。作品：《京师上元观驾二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span>《京师上元观驾二首》（其二）<span id='poem_content_521086'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521086'>及时膏雨已阑珊，黄道新泥晓未乾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521086'>白面郎敲金镫过，红妆人揭绣帘看。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521086'>管弦叫月宣和气，灯火烧空夺暮寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521086'>咫尺凤楼开雉扇，玉皇仙仗紫云端。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521086'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521086_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521087?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年1月15日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521087'>阁雨轻寒敛夕氛，青牛画毂已争奔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521087'>皇州浩荡风光里，紫陌喧阗笑语温。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521087'>冠压花枝驰万骑，帘垂绣箔卷千门。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521087'>特传诏语君恩重，凝睇天阶谢至尊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年1月16日</a>　上元日，龚端新门里居舍失火，后一日，师与彭几、邹正臣、刘棐、希祖共观龚端火余《金刚经》，题记其事。作品：《题灵验金刚经》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题灵验金刚经</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和元年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213270")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213270'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213270'>秘书省校书郎龚德庄初罢官灵寿，来归京师，居新门里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213270_comment'></div>时方上元，山东刘野夫与德庄善，偶折简来约：「十四日可尽室往观，君慎勿出，略相候，欲款语」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213270_comment'></div>德庄素敬惮其人，为独守屋庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213270_comment'></div>二鼓矣，而野夫不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213270_comment'></div>方假寐，家人辈尚未还，俄火自门而烧，德庄但捉诰牒而走，一夕而烬数百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213270_comment'></div>明日迹其屋，灰炭中得《金刚般若》一卷，略无损处，开视明鲜如新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213270_comment'></div>德庄少豪逸嗜酒色，不甚信内典，岂夙世善根，不思议力，以兹发感悟之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213270_comment'></div>观者彭凡、邹正臣、刘棐、僧希祖、德洪，政和元年上元后一日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213270_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_9_520766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520766'>心胸何玲珑，多能吾所伏。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>　一时机要显贵之人，争致之门下，执弟子礼。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>　为贵公子王健作《明极斋铭》作品：《明极斋铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明极斋铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213492")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213492'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213492'>太原王健伯强，名臣惠公之子，皇叔嘉王之婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213492_comment'></div>方壮年则能弃官学道，阅《首楞严经》，至「馀尘尚诸学，明极即如来」，叹曰：「此如来之训，而余之志也，愿以明极名其斋」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213492_comment'></div>而乞铭于余，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213492'>有而寻求，痴暗所囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213492_comment'></div>得而惊异，智浊之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213492_comment'></div>浊澄暗彻，自觉成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213492_comment'></div>如人目睛，一尘不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213492_comment'></div>开睫譬生，明发寄根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213492_comment'></div>歛睫譬死，暗不能昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213492_comment'></div>圣师真慈，开此妙门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213492_comment'></div>睥睨不入，夫岂知恩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213492_comment'></div>枵然丈室，中置匡床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213492_comment'></div>经行宴坐，晨灯夕香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213492_comment'></div>勿使邪念，蔽常寂光。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213492_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_521632'>青山自在人情外，白业空消𡋯土中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521632'>岁晚一帆江海去，群飞争看刺天鸿。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521633?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521633'><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年6月</a>　六月，助张商英奏取陈瓘所撰《尊尧录》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>　作诗次韵太学茂千之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>　在京师日，尝与侯延年、侯彭老兄弟交游。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='c440b4b9c0da472fbe1f0b7f8171412b_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年1月15日</a>　正月，自太原还洪州，过京师，上元，逢蔡子因，约相见相国寺，未至，有道人求诗，为戏作一首。作品：《余昔居百丈元夕有诗后十年是夕过京师期子因不至》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>余昔居百丈元夕有诗后十年是夕过京师期子因不至</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521091")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521091'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521091'>北游烂熳看并川<span class='inlineComment2'>（《冷斋夜话》卷九作山）</span>，重到皇州及上元。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521091'>灯火风光记前<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>事，管弦音节<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>试新翻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521091'>期人不<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>至情如海，穿市归来月满轩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521091'>忽忆寒岩曾独宿，雪窗残夜一声猿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521091'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521091_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_521091'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_521091_0'>⑴ 《冷斋夜话》作楼台思往</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_521091_0'>⑵ 《冷斋夜话》作律</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_521091_0'>⑶ 《冷斋夜话》作未</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_521091_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年1月15日</a>　上元夕宿李德茂之馆，为德茂作书城四友序。作品：《李德茂书城四友序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213464' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213464' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213464?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李德茂书城四友序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213464")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213464_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213464'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213464'>政和五年，余自太原还南州，过都下，上元夕，宿故人李德茂之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213464_comment'></div>德茂环积坟藉，名曰书城，日与笔砚纸墨为四友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213464_comment'></div>余曰：「公通藉金阙，名闻缙绅，而取友乃止是乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213464_comment'></div>德茂笑曰：「昔周公诛管、蔡，张、陈解刎颈，吾未尝不置卷长叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213464_comment'></div>夫疏亲利害，虽大圣不能保其亲，矧以众人之器，登功名之场，而欲全交乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213464_comment'></div>吾家浚之知之，故栖迟林麓，图梁鸿、老莱子之像为友；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213464_comment'></div>太白婆娑江湖，结明月为无情之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213464_comment'></div>吾以为白失之誇，而渤失之诞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213464_comment'></div>管城子，吾益友也，直谅多闻，每与之语，娓娓不倦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213464_comment'></div>燕卿，吾德友也，气清而骨轻，知白而守黑，固胶漆之义，重知见之香；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213464_comment'></div>楮先生，吾畏友也，悃愊无华，见地明白，吾见之，未尝不展尽底蕴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213464_comment'></div>石虚中，吾端友也，天姿刚劲，琢磨以成，温润而有容，知言而能默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213464_comment'></div>是四子从吾游，神交道契，忘义忘年久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213464_comment'></div>子今乃见问，何哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213464_comment'></div>余曰：「苏易简常辅此四人之贤，为文房四宝，意非其所好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213464_comment'></div>德茂不名而友之，宜乎同居于书城之间无厌也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213464_comment'></div>请书以为序，使士大夫知有友四君子者，自德茂始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213464_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为李德茂家坐中所陈阮咸琴镜室端砚诸物作铭。作品：《李德茂家坐中赋诸铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为李德茂作《歙砚铭》二首。（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span>《歙砚铭》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　于李德茂家观磈石假山，作诗。作品：《李德茂家有磈石如匡山双剑峰求诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李德茂家有磈石如匡山双剑峰求诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521090")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521090'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521090'>胸次能藏大千界，掌中笑看小重山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521090'>飞来华岳一峰失，幻出匡庐双剑閒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521090'>偶触篆烟云点缀，戏浇砚滴瀑潺颜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521090'>莫将道眼生分别，随意聊安几案间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521090'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　代德茂为僧志淳寄老庵作记。作品：《寄老庵记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄老庵记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213453")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213453'>高安，南州之属郡，地连西山庐岳之胜，俗美讼简，士大夫自为江西道院，飞楹画栋，间见层出，于茂林修竹，往往皆浮图老子之庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213453_comment'></div>龙城院，去郭馀一舍，山川精神发于云泉林壑间，如人眉目，处余家筠溪之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213453_comment'></div>少时往游焉，穷奇索幽，信宿弥日，便有终焉之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213453_comment'></div>一行作吏，转徙四方，登高临远，未尝忘于龙城也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213453_comment'></div>政和四年冬，余留京师，官冷口众，自厌风埃，又病痁弥月，愈不怿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213453_comment'></div>而觉范道人适自高安来，夜语及龙城旧游，翛然忌纷，而痁亦弃余而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213453_comment'></div>问觉范谁从子游，有老僧志淳者，其为人木讷而静深，易亲而难忘，今结庵于凤回峰之西，名曰寄老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213453_comment'></div>每曰：「高风颓于无勇，白业毁于有累，前圣知之，故令比丘一饭日中，三宿桑下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213453_comment'></div>吾幼知人间情缘为累，故弃之而学道，知方外事法为累，又弃之闲放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213453_comment'></div>然诸馀勃窣，饥飧困卧，犹累于老，未可弃去，故持以寄之，因以名吾庵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213453_comment'></div>嗟夫，世方以累为荣而争趋之，淳独超然高蹈，贤于人远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213453_comment'></div>吾闻天台智者临终，门人问所證，答曰：「我不领众，早净六根，以传法利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213453_comment'></div>生止證内，凡五品耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213453_comment'></div>淳之志，其以是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213453_comment'></div>明年上元，觉范南还，因理其事为之记，使归刻石山中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213453_comment'></div>他年当乞身归田，幅巾杖屦，以从淳游，尚未晚也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213453_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　代德茂为妙湛大师法安之使作《吉州禾山寺记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吉州禾山寺记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213454")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213454'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213454'>始，达磨自西来，以法授少林慧可，而衣钵为信，五传至曹溪慧能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213454_comment'></div>能知其道信于天下也，藏其衣钵而化，故世称曹溪之门得道者，不可以数计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213454_comment'></div>然独大长老行思、怀让克肖前懿，号二甘露门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213454_comment'></div>思眷庐陵山水而老于青原，让亦庵于衡、霍之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213454_comment'></div>石头希迁者，思高弟也，从让游，思实使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213454_comment'></div>马祖道一者，受让记莂，卜邻青原，久之，遂终于石门，让实使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213454_comment'></div>今天下指目江西为禅宗法道之源者，以曹溪一子一孙，首辱居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213454_comment'></div>永新为江西山川形胜之地，城南有山，岿然深秀，晴岚夕晖，应接不暇者，唐僧达奚栖迟之所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213454_comment'></div>奚不知何许人，以文德初始至，刀耕火种，住成法席，致嘉禾之瑞，因以名山，号大智禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213454_comment'></div>院僻崄，初未著于诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213454_comment'></div>吴顺义二年，僧无殷中兴之，恢复法度，学者趋之如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213454_comment'></div>殷，九峰虔禅师之嗣，青原八世孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213454_comment'></div>方是时，禅学之弊，巧见异解，殷以击鼓之机，脱略窠臼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213454_comment'></div>于是宗风大振，学者赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213454_comment'></div>嗣殷者有契云，自云殁，代居者名存实亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213454_comment'></div>大中祥符初，诏改赐甘露禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213454_comment'></div>有楚材者，道价重一时，法席之盛追比殷时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213454_comment'></div>又十世而有德普，有高行，自黄龙窟中来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213454_comment'></div>普殁七世而有妙湛大师法安，初以政和元年自祥符移居之，五年视前营搆，增其所未有者，新其所已坏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213454_comment'></div>于是庄严紫金光聚则有殿栖，称如实旁行之书则有藏会，四海苾刍求寂则有堂，办香积伊蒲塞之馔则有厨，像祖师则有阁，馆钟虡则有楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213454_comment'></div>升座法施之堂则曰无畏，集定传道之室则曰大智，而阁于室之上，名善应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213454_comment'></div>修庑复屋，高深壮丽，冬温夏凉，重规叠矩，丛林号庐陵第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213454_comment'></div>呜呼，妙湛之游戏于是作，可谓集诸老之大成者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213454_comment'></div>安走使京师，乞文记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213454_comment'></div>余方困顿黄尘，寄逸想于云泉杳霭处，恨未能角巾梨杖，与山中高人游，厌饫清境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213454_comment'></div>然余非学佛者，其诡秘多溟涬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213454_comment'></div>然窃尝论之，忠孝硕大如宋王彧、唐魏元忠、徐有功辈，初未必皆深于佛理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213454_comment'></div>观其临祸福，超然自得，岂所谓所闻或浅，而其义甚高者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213454_comment'></div>故余于禅学，凡钩章棘句，凌跨方等，汗漫横流者，则非肉眼所能勘验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213454_comment'></div>至于生死之际，有不容其伪者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213454_comment'></div>无殷将化，集众谓曰：「后学未识禾山，今朝识取」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213454_comment'></div>因怡然而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213454_comment'></div>德普之将化，饮食毕，谈笑而寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213454_comment'></div>然其言论风旨，无所传闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213454_comment'></div>妙湛，雪窦之后，又青原之远裔，吾将观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213454_comment'></div>既论之，又系之以词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1213454'>龙溪落石雪浪奔，万山环之如虎蹲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213454_comment'></div>凌霄白云相弟昆，七十一峰让其尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213454_comment'></div>烟霏摇空含朝暾，微风徐来扫霭氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213454_comment'></div>楼阁时为金碧痕，聪明澄泓自吐吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213454_comment'></div>三伟不见陈迹存，异哉僧奚貌粹温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213454_comment'></div>涧饮婆娑麋鹿群，谁中兴之殷澄源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213454_comment'></div>咄嗟万指鱼鼓喧，普公高喉已语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213454_comment'></div>得法来自黄龙门，弟子生奠手自扪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213454_comment'></div>放箸蝉蜕撼不闻，大士法战著策勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213454_comment'></div>睨视生死等旦曛，君看妙湛愿力熏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213454_comment'></div>楼观幻出高切云，美髯说法起机轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213454_comment'></div>自云的骨雪窦孙，江山偃蹇骄气喷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213454_comment'></div>不受弹压无杰文，愿乞名诗刻云根，导广孝慈酬帝恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1213454_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='554b73da016846bfb9ed19ad0e7ad583_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("554b73da016846bfb9ed19ad0e7ad583");'><span id='554b73da016846bfb9ed19ad0e7ad583_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1126&endYear=1126')">1126年</a>，56岁</div><div id='554b73da016846bfb9ed19ad0e7ad583' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至京师诣刑部陈词，乞别赐改正为僧。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赐重削发，还旧名，既还僧籍，谈者谓宜有宠异之语闻执政，欲上其事，属其时金兵南侵京师，朝廷多故，不果。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
含山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='46dcd97d1b0247e3bbb184638594f991_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("46dcd97d1b0247e3bbb184638594f991");'><span id='46dcd97d1b0247e3bbb184638594f991_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>，23岁</div><div id='46dcd97d1b0247e3bbb184638594f991' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　春，过淮宋之郊，游和州褒禅山，石崖下见一僧，曰识欧阳修。<br /></div>

id='poem_sentence_10_520603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520603'>双林古禅宇，檀越多孝慈。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213471' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213471?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记福严言禅师语</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年三月）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_1213471_comment'></div>五月二十八日，太原造大狱，来追对验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213471_comment'></div>十月六日得放，夜宿沟镇中，中夜行荒陂，阴晦迷失道路，有光飞来照行，坐休则光为止，起进则导之，至榆次凡百里，而晓光乃没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213471_comment'></div>于是口占曰：「大舜鸟工往，卢能渔父归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213471_comment'></div>神光百里送，鬼事一场非」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213471_comment'></div>明年春，见超然于海，昏夜语及之，书以示素所办送者，因觉先忠无外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213471_comment'></div>政和五年三月二日题。</div><div -----title
