"poem_title_520530")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520530'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520530'>西山层翠长倚天，我来正及社燕前。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520530'>城中高阁时纵倚，妙语已复凌芳鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520530'>方将结伴未有侣，而子乃敢犯众先。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520530'>会当披云乱峰顶，却下濯足寒涧边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520530'>遥知笑语山答响，诗句时作何必<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作凌乱何须）</span>编。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520530'>就岩折桂亦细事，海棠烂熳烧晴川。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520530'>归来仰屋念清境，夜未央兮犹不眠。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520530'>此诗未到已如见，戏为图画人间传。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520530_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bc1351ef4e3546c28602b9d8cec5341b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bc1351ef4e3546c28602b9d8cec5341b");'><span id='bc1351ef4e3546c28602b9d8cec5341b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，29岁</div><div id='bc1351ef4e3546c28602b9d8cec5341b' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>滞留南昌，作诗赠南昌县主簿蔡康国。作品：《赠蔡儒效》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520462' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520462' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520462?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠蔡儒效</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520462")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520462_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520462'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520462'>我家与君邻屋居，君昔未生先长我。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520462'>君发齐眉我总角，竹居读书供日课。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520462'>君诵盘庚如注瓶，我读孝经如转磨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520462'>长老奇君王佐才，拭目颙颙观长大。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520462'>十三环坐同赋诗，出语已能惊怯懦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520462'>风雷绕纸成千篇，弃遗不惜如零唾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520462'>神思义表文融明，清绝如珠不受涴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520462'>江左相传纸价增，东坡一读不复和。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520462'>怀高识远不可屈，功成回首破甑堕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520462'>家贫口众难自安，出图斗粟充饥饿。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520462'>闹闻笔阵扫万人，上国英雄胆先破。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520462'>殿前作赋声摩空，盛名四海争掀播。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520462'>华裾如葱马如龙，九衢突若流星过。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520462'>我经忧患早衰微，生怕虚名招实祸。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520462'>方衣童首住江村，饱饭爱寻閒处卧。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520462'>睡馀信手摸书看，会意起来行复坐。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520462'>林泉成趣亦题诗，年来藁帙成堆垛。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520462'>仙郎开卷面发光，誇我雄词惊李贺。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520462'>相期他日同此游，先买邻庵山数朵。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520462'>青松白石闻此言，共作庐山二十个。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520462_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520462'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_520462_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，与康国别后三月，得其所寄诗三十韵，次韵答之。作品：《予与故人别因得寄诗三十韵走笔答之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520501' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520501' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520501?labeling=true' target='_blank'>予与故人别因得寄诗三十韵走笔答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520501")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520501_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520501'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520501'>天不逸群君独立，洞彻心胸秋色入。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520501'>于中堆积万卷馀，笔力至处风雷集。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520501'>刃游理窟无全牛，端与腐儒到固执。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520501'>昔年囊绽露微铓，已陟云梯最高级。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520501'>纵令大醉赋凌云，玄珠闭眼从头拾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520501'>森张秀骨真神驹，顾盻绝尘那可絷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520501'>□□亦是个中流，恨不识君只依悒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520501'>西园道人工文章，览诗愧叹不复习。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520501'>野僧顽钝谁比数，而得听君论轲伋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520501'>别来三月鄙吝萌，闹闻传习新诗什。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520501'>翻澜妙语惊倒人，气燄霜锋光熠熠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520501'>此诗初得喜未展，乌鸣下啄鸡得粒。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520501'>初如积水窥落霞，浅碧秾红相间辑。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520501'>又如霜晓听边风，十万军声何翕翕。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520501'>笔锋正锐物象贫，降旌狼籍诗魔泣。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520501'>嵚嵚太白不得俦，倔强退之自莫及。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520501'>蝇头细字好生书，为君卷束藏幽笈。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520501'>嗟予衰老百无能，园圃自锄瓶自汲。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520501'>人间万事一笑空，流年忽忽将三十。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520501'>形骸念念非昔人，暗中负去何其急。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520501'>朅来蹇剥犹可哂，两眼欲昏愁泪涩。<div id='poem_sentence_20_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_520501'>擎盂专作口腹谋，骨立侯门听与给。<div id='poem_sentence_21_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_520501'>旧山归去成蹉跎，半年飘泊留城邑。<div id='poem_sentence_22_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_520501'>诗源荒涸如废池，浅穴败堤微有湿。<div id='poem_sentence_23_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_520501'>不量更拟和阳春，枯木钻膏竹沥汁。<div id='poem_sentence_24_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_520501'>夜楼无语立西风，月华如水清堪挹。<div id='poem_sentence_25_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_520501'>君居若耶溪水东，我舍秋河半山隰。<div id='poem_sentence_26_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_520501'>露冷亦应思故人，箧有缇衣馀十袭。<div id='poem_sentence_27_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_520501'>碧光当户应可掬，顽翠撑天空嶪岌。<div id='poem_sentence_28_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_520501'>撚须落日意无穷，片片催诗暮云歙。<div id='poem_sentence_29_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_520501'>知君今作蟠泥翁，头角那能久埋戢。<div id='poem_sentence_30_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_520501'>妙龄素有廊庙具，破衮烦君重补缉。<div id='poem_sentence_31_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_520501'>我亦东西南北人，从君预可揩杖笠。<div id='poem_sentence_32_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_520501'>早晚风云际会时，雷震一声龙起蛰。<div id='poem_sentence_33_520501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_520501'></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_520501_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a93d07d07f1d4542bc1b758cb095538d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a93d07d07f1d4542bc1b758cb095538d");'><span id='a93d07d07f1d4542bc1b758cb095538d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，31岁</div><div id='a93d07d07f1d4542bc1b758cb095538d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至南昌，邮亭遇阎孝忠，夜语，并作诗赠之。作品：《赠阎资钦》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠阎资钦</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520503")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520503'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520503'>名都大藩地，英俊蔚如林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520503'>乌靴青衫中，时见阎资钦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520503'>风度若英特，杳然自清深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520503'>借无轩冕意，功名亦相寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520503'>合是廊庙具，下僚那敢沉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520503'>邮亭款夜语，霜清特携衾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520503'>篝灯伴清对，商略杂古今。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520503'>譬如武库开，错粲森球琳。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520503'>诗工出奇丽，写物意在琴。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520503'>绝如欧阳公，但欠雪满簪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520503'>句法本严甚，颇遭韩柳侵。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520503'>愿为匿盆麝，耻作跃炉金。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520503'>世无子期耳，广陵谁赏音。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520503'>何当学梅福，九江归云岑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520503'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_520503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>滞留南昌，登秋屏阁望西山，作《浪淘沙》词以寄意。(城里久偷闲）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《全宋词》页七一三。）</span><div id='poem_218232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_218232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/218232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浪淘沙令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_218232")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_218232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_218232'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_218232'>城里久偷闲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_218232'>尘浣云衫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_218232'>此身已是再眠蚕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_218232'>隔岸有山归去好，万壑千岩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_218232_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_218232'>霜晓更凭阑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_218232'>减尽晴岚。<div id='poem_sentence_5_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_218232'>微云生处是茅庵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_218232_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_218232'>试问此生谁作伴，弥勒同龛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_218232_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e9ad89685abd4d938781d479b0f653d2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e9ad89685abd4d938781d479b0f653d2");'><span id='e9ad89685abd4d938781d479b0f653d2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>，33岁</div><div id='e9ad89685abd4d938781d479b0f653d2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　于南昌南浦亭重会汪藻，时藻丁父忧，作诗赠之。作品：《南昌重会汪彦章》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520537?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南昌重会汪彦章</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520537")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520537_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520537'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520537'>彦章退然才中人，讥诃唾笑皆奇伟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520537'>看君落笔挟风雷，涣然成文风行水。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520537'>坐令前辈作九原，子固精神老坡气。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520537'>儒生寒酸不上眼，此郎要是天下士。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520537'>嗟予生计等飞鸟，翩翩吴头复楚尾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520537'>去年兴废看京华，笑傲清狂人背指。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520537'>君独折简坐致我，迎门欢笑自挈履。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520537'>旧闻牛鸣马不仰，女逐臭夫那有理。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520537'>今年黄花南浦岸，忽然见君失声喜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520537'>僧房借榻营夜语，灯火照人如梦寐。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520537'>怀中卿相且袖手，翰墨风流聊戏耳。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520537'>行看上书苫块中，凛凛范公只君是。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520537'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520537_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1f8e8fc3ef2047a3a13910d504800937_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1f8e8fc3ef2047a3a13910d504800937");'><span id='1f8e8fc3ef2047a3a13910d504800937_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，36岁</div><div id='1f8e8fc3ef2047a3a13910d504800937' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>初秋，至南昌，为知洪州李景直作疏请湛堂文准禅师住分宁黄龙禅院。作品：《请准和尚住黄龙》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213581' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213581' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213581?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请准和尚住黄龙疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213581")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213581_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213581'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213581'>磨砖庵畔，言回智照之光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213581_comment'></div>选佛堂前，喝下證心之第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213581_comment'></div>是续诸佛之寿命，为大法荷担之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213581_comment'></div>丛林兴自江西，家世独闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213581_comment'></div>老南设三关之问，勃然中兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213581_comment'></div>关西藏一点之机，窅然深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213581_comment'></div>恭惟某人关西真子，老南的孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213581_comment'></div>贬剥诸方，疏通正脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213581_comment'></div>自石门而迁幕阜，如别业而归故园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213581_comment'></div>不离先祖道场，旃檀林无别树；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213581_comment'></div>复唱旧时雅曲，优钵华已重开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213581_comment'></div>便请拈提，不劳辞让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213581_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213581_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在南昌，与洪刍、徐俯唱和，洪刍方遇赦自汀州还洪州。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作劝学诗次徐俯韵。作品：《劝学次徐师川韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>劝学次徐师川韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520630")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520630'>揭阳滨瘴海，苦雾搏蛮烟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520630'>自古无衣冠，安得礼义传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520630'>韩子见而叹，岂是终弃捐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520630'>选士得赵德，讲学与周旋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520630'>遂为乡里荣，士慕旧而先。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520630'>却后三十载，才者森排肩。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520630'>东瓯赘华夏，西汉为边沿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520630'>民俗号殷富，亦有佳林泉。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520630'>黠者事商贩，朴者工力田。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520630'>自隋迄于唐，稍知慕华轩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520630'>乃有欧阳生<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作主，据四库本、武林本改）</span>，粹然而出焉。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520630'>古文有师法，学问知渊源。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520630'>其后贤者至，杂遝盛中原。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520630'>至今号多士，富贵争熏天。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520630'>江南佳丽地，南昌富山川。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520630'>幽谷抱欧峰，西山秀气连。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520630'>地灵秘奇运，当有命世贤。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520630'>山辉玉韬石，水媚珠怀渊。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520630'>君看乌衣里，俊雅争清妍。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520630'>治朝开三舍，精拣无遗篇。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520630'>幸当勤灯火，无忘临简编。<div id='poem_sentence_20_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_520630'>会看起白屋，宁遭犯青钱。<div id='poem_sentence_21_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_520630'>大当到三事，小当步八砖。<div id='poem_sentence_22_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_520630'>赵德欧阳生，岂独令居前。<div id='poem_sentence_23_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_520630'>努力各自励，请视徐子言。<div id='poem_sentence_24_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_520630'>穷耕有恶岁，惰农无丰年。<div id='poem_sentence_25_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_520630'>言小可喻大，岁晏宜勉旃。<div id='poem_sentence_26_520630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_520630'></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_520630_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作六言诗戏呈徐俯、洪刍及其甥阿牛。作品：《戏呈师川驹父之阿牛三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《戏呈师川驹父之阿牛三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《戏呈师川驹父之阿牛三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520628'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520628'>闲中过却重阳节，江城风雨吹黄叶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520628'>与君来游亦偶然，聚立西偏读丰碣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520628'>凭栏眼界得天多，雨脚明边飞鸟灭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520628'>西山向人亦倾倒，犯云争来献层叠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520628'>未归负负无可言，相视心知惭在颊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520628'>会当却立云生处，纵望晴江生雉堞。<div id='poem_520613' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520613' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520613?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别潜庵源禅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520613")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520613_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520613'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520613'>宝公禁锁寻常事，形如聚墨非实然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520613'>潜庵去眼十五白，再见敬仰加拳拳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520613'>黄龙今代南阳老，而公不减真耽源。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520613'>眉须俱荒气深稳，幻灭都尽光浑圆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520613'>公登八十我才半，道义乃尔相忘年。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520613'>西山无时渡漳水，洞壑俨在眉目前。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520613'>祝公勿学亮座主，兴来径往呼不旋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520613'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_520613_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赴太原狱别上蓝禅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521176")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521176'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521176'>平昔巾盂共空壁<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作璧，据四库本改）</span>，只今楼观碍层霄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521176'>道心针水妙应在，俗眼云泥谩觉遥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521176'>道路为家身是寄，死生如梦意全消。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521176'>明年五顶东游遍，来听吴音发海潮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521176'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521176_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='79bbde5ecd8d40099c9576df26f6e053_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("79bbde5ecd8d40099c9576df26f6e053");'><span id='79bbde5ecd8d40099c9576df26f6e053_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='79bbde5ecd8d40099c9576df26f6e053' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至南昌上蓝院，见潜庵清源禅师，为作序。作品：《潜庵禅师序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213461' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213461' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213461?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潜庵禅师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213461")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213461_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213461'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213461'>法道东来，授受之际，必因师弟子之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213461_comment'></div>苟非其人，道不虚行，如云起而龙随，鹤鸣而子和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213461_comment'></div>其周旋之久，机缘之著，而特以侍者称者，如鸟窠之有会通，南阳有应真，赵州有文远，南院有守廓，慈明有海善，翠岩有慕哲，而黄龙有公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213461_comment'></div>公讳清凉，洪州新建邓氏子，世力田，幼超卓，短小精悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213461_comment'></div>去依洪崖法智为童子，年二十一落发，受具足戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213461_comment'></div>时武泉常、宝峰月、云居舜道，价压丛林，公游三老间，皆蒙器许，而疑终未决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213461_comment'></div>谒黄龙南禅师，南曰：「昔洞山见云门，门问：『近离甚处』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213461_comment'></div>云：『查渡』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213461_comment'></div>『夏在何处』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213461_comment'></div>曰：『湖南报慈』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213461_comment'></div>曰：『几时离』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213461_comment'></div>『八月二十五』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213461_comment'></div>云：『放汝三顿棒』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213461_comment'></div>公闻之大惊，南公又曰：「洞山又问：『适来祗对有何过，而蒙赐棒』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213461_comment'></div>门云：『饭袋子』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213461_comment'></div>『江西湖南便恁么去商量』」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213461_comment'></div>公大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213461_comment'></div>南公问：「何笑」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213461_comment'></div>对曰：「笑者黄面浙子怜儿，不觉丑耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213461_comment'></div>自是容为入室父子，言论久即令坐于旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213461_comment'></div>去游南岳，时先云庵方出沩山，与公复造积翠，公为侍者七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213461_comment'></div>南公殁，隐迹西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213461_comment'></div>西山有惠严院僧死，屋无像设，露坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213461_comment'></div>公见而喟曰：「古人斫山开基，致无为有，忍怀不举哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213461_comment'></div>乃求居以修完之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213461_comment'></div>不五年，而殿阁崇成，百具鼎新，即弃去，游庐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213461_comment'></div>南康太守徐公闻名，延居南山清隐寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213461_comment'></div>寺在大江之北，面揖庐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213461_comment'></div>公门风孤峻，学者皆望崖而退，以故单丁住山十有八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213461_comment'></div>元符二年秋，余与弟希祖自南昌舟而东下访之，晨香夕灯，升堂说法，如临千众，而丛林所服玩者莫不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213461_comment'></div>时时钁地处置，为余言：「先师初事栖贤諟泐潭澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213461_comment'></div>更二十年，宗门奇奥，经论要妙，莫不贯穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213461_comment'></div>及因文悦以见慈明，则一字无用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213461_comment'></div>设三关，以验天下禅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213461_comment'></div>而禅者如叶公画龙，龙见即怖」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213461_comment'></div>余曰：「每疑三关语垂示平易，而人以为难，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213461_comment'></div>公曰：「众生为解碍，菩萨未离觉大智，如文殊师利欲问空王佛义，即遭摈出，以其堕艰难，故起现行耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213461_comment'></div>呜呼，自堕艰难，故起现行，学者大病，如人开眼尿床，平地吃攧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213461_comment'></div>然今化去三十年，犹有悟其旨者，不无损益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213461_comment'></div>有僧依十有二年，公举令住净众寺，辞行，谓曰：「汝虽在此费岁月，实不识吾家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213461_comment'></div>傥嗣法，当不以世俗欺诳为心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213461_comment'></div>其人乃嗣翠岩机焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213461_comment'></div>南昌隐君子潘延之与为方外友，延之迎归西山，而州郡文争命居天宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213461_comment'></div>衲子方云趋座下，一时名士，抠衣问道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213461_comment'></div>公以目疾隐居龙兴寺房，户外之屦亦满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213461_comment'></div>上蓝忠禅师云，盖智公之子，于公为叔侄，移公居寺之东堂，事之如其师，丛林高其谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213461_comment'></div>余政和四年冬證狱太原，拴缚在旅邸，人讳见之，而公冒雨步至抚慰，为死诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213461_comment'></div>明年南归，幸复见之，轩渠笑曰：「吾不意乃复见子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213461_comment'></div>公寿八十四，目盲复明，此其精敏于道，志愿丛林所致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213461_comment'></div>呜呼，佛法寝远，坏衣瓦器之人亦有侈欲，为人师者争慕华构，便软暖，公独举颓坏而新之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213461_comment'></div>争欲致弟子，不问智愚，欲出门下，而公独精粗之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213461_comment'></div>争欲坐八达衢头，以自卖其道，而公独居荒远以自珍之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213461_comment'></div>争好势利恶丑，而公独犯众恶，自信而力行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213461_comment'></div>每谓弟子曰：「无事外之理，理外之事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213461_comment'></div>观其措置，岂其真然之者耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1213461_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为清源作《童耄竹铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>童耄竹铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213505")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213505'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213505'>霜筠粉节贯四时而不凋者，竹之性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213505_comment'></div>然怜孝子之泣，则为之冬茁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213505_comment'></div>悯忠臣之誓，则为之倒植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213505_comment'></div>余闻心之精微，不可以言传，而可以事著，是二者非忠孝之著乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213505_comment'></div>潜庵老人戏植独竹于庵南之壁阴，期月而笋茁，盖老人以虚心集道，以高节荷法所致，亦精诚之验也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213505_comment'></div>余以童耄名之，又为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213505'>渭川千亩，潜庵一竿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213505_comment'></div>俯视盛衰，禀然岁寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213505_comment'></div>笋茁于夏，解箨颖异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213505_comment'></div>颀然扶疏，如老携稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213505_comment'></div>根岂终独，乃生横枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213505_comment'></div>如其道茂，有子嗣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213505_comment'></div>高情不群，安乐霜雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213505_comment'></div>风来有声，是随宜说。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为清源画像作赞。作品：《潜庵源禅师真赞三首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潜庵源禅师真赞一<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作三，据四库本改）</span>首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522164")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522164'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522164'>十年积翠侍立，学得眼横鼻直。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522164'>平生气压丛林，问著左科背听。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522164'>一庵深藏霹雳，舌从教万象自分说。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522164'>百非四句无处蹲，孤风照人众星月。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522164'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522164'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。又见《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522164_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为清源作南昌高士潘与嗣赞。作品：《潘延之赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潘延之赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522209")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522209'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522209'>毗卢无生之藏，震旦有道之器。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522209'>谈妙义借身为舌，擎大千以手为地。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522209'>机锋不减庞蕴，而解文字禅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522209'>行藏大类孺子，而值休明世。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522209'>舒王强之而不可，神考致之而不起。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522209'>此天下士大夫所共闻，然公岂止于是而已乎。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522209'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_522209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522209'><span class='label'>按：</span>《居士传》卷二五，续藏经第二编乙第二二套第五册。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522209_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为上蓝师忠禅师作赞。作品：《上蓝忠禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蓝忠禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522187")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522187'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522187'>一法能知一切法，应机全不差毫发。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522187_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522187'>如是知见如是解，于一切法中对待。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522187_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522187'>平生脊梁硬如铁，衲僧寻思心智绝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522187_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522187'>城中一室冷如冰，篆烟灭尽灰如雪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522187_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522187'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522187_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522187'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522187_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>见慧明禅师于上蓝院，作诗赠之。作品：《太原还见明于洪水上蓝问明别后尝寓则曰十年客云居感叹其高遁作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太原还见明于洪水上蓝问明别后尝寓则曰十年客云居感叹其高遁作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521177")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521177'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521177'>清软吴音笑展眉，芳鲜犹在雪霜姿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521177'>十年不下欧峰顶，一旦肯来漳水湄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521177'>湘巘春深重记处，风瓯雨歇对闻时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521177'>红尘未可因藏迹，要卜云泉结后期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521177'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为慧明作《解空阁铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213501' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213501' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213501?labeling=true' target='_blank'>解空阁铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213501")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1213501_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213501'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213501'>以色碍眼，铲其云山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213501'>以声聒耳，恶禽间关。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213501'>有大开士，倚栏微笑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213501'>以眼闻色，以耳观鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213501'>石屏玉立，泉以佩鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213501'>乃知解空，不离色声。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1213501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213501'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213501_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为慧明作《堕庵铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213487' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213487' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213487?labeling=true' target='_blank'>堕庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213487")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1213487_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213487'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213487'>心非言传，则无方便。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213487'>以言传之，又成瑕玷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213487'>盖言不言，俱名污染。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213487'>饮光华笑，智海簟卷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213487'>非言不言，惊如掣电。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213487'>异哉曹山，法幢特建。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213487'>以堕一字，雪诸情见。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1213487'>在圣非贵，在凡非贱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1213487'>杂之不藏，著之难辨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1213487'>二乘骨惊，十地魂战。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1213487'>而解空子，乃圆笑靥。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1213487'>善刀藏之，不露锋焰。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1213487'>不动声气，降伏魔怨。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1213487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1213487'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213487_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>见虔州永上人于上蓝，为其昭昭堂作铭。作品：《昭昭堂铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213495' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213495' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213495?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭昭堂铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213495")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213495_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213495'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213495'>虎城永上人游方，晚馆漳水上蓝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213495_comment'></div>余适还太原，见之，话临川旧游，累日不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213495_comment'></div>时方解王事，纵望云山，神魂若飞动，而亦有落叶之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213495_comment'></div>曰欲于崆峒之下作堂，昭昭名之，而乞言于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213495_comment'></div>为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213495'>维尘劳海，是无明窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213495_comment'></div>众生以之，生死出没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213495_comment'></div>而此昭昭，首出万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213495_comment'></div>廓然十方，寂湛遍周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213495_comment'></div>目虽可见，而不可求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213495_comment'></div>倩汝名之，为物之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213495_comment'></div>一堂收身，丈寻之阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213495_comment'></div>歛目大千，都寄毫末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213495_comment'></div>乃欲见见，如鹿方渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213495_comment'></div>大哉此法，明白坦夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213495_comment'></div>昧者迷失，知者得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213495_comment'></div>故甘露灭，为作铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213495_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2c0e6fd928bf4604bec9b731baae310f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2c0e6fd928bf4604bec9b731baae310f");'><span id='2c0e6fd928bf4604bec9b731baae310f_link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521037'>承英连璧光照坐，更著阿隆如鼎安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521037'>老兵先驰启关钥，西山奔走登栏干。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521037'>刘郎端默自凝远，蔡侯奋髯牙齿寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521037'>但馀衰老百无用，搜句倚栏方细看。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521037'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>同吴家兄弟游东山寺，约王仲诚不至，作诗纪之。作品：《同吴家兄弟游东山约仲诚不至》<span id='poem_sentence_0_520705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520705'>闲披白帢登此堂，绛阙神清气深稳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520705'>馀韵夫须百里闻，风露清冥人跨凤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520705_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游西山香城寺，见妙瑛禅师，时潮音堂香花之馆未具，道人严公将出化供，作序送之。作品：《送严修造序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213254?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213254'>南昌千嶂深秀处，忽生水沉奇材，而万峰绕之，遂名香城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213254_comment'></div>显观基肇而来，老颐嗣事，而后殿阁如幻出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213254_comment'></div>唯潮音演法之堂斩新营构，四方衲子雁次猊座下，而恨香花之馆未具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213254_comment'></div>有道人严公犯众请行曰：「吾将化十方男女檀波罗蜜之光以藻饰之，使蓬莱道山，万国春回，香积城头，十分月满」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213254_comment'></div>于是瑛禅师拊手曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213254_comment'></div>使其客甘露灭以序送之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213254_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为妙瑛作赞。作品：《香城瑛禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div href='/Writing/1213418?labeling=true' target='_blank'>师璞字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213418")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213418'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213418'>充耳琇莹，瑛之佩珥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213418_comment'></div>夫佩珂之与琇莹，皆玉之成器者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213418_comment'></div>玉之在璞，其质弗妙，则难以致用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213418_comment'></div>然则能琇莹佩珂者，必在璞而已矣。<div class='inline' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213264")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213264'>瑛公风骨清癯，而神观秀爽，措置加于人一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213264_comment'></div>与南州名士游，淡然无营，独杜门手写此经，精妙简远之韵，出于颜、柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213264_comment'></div>予闻一切贤圣，皆以无为法，而有差别者，皆所庄严之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213264_comment'></div>龙胜菩萨以夙智通力诵持之，实叉难陁以入世间智力翻译之，清凉国师以达佛知见力疏释之，而瑛公以夙净愿、坚固力书写之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213264_comment'></div>予观其心志，端欲候文殊师利之智海，普贤之行愿海，善财童子利生求法精进海，十二时皆在现行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213264_comment'></div>如善现比丘不动真际，现一切色身于十方世界，作大佛事，顾其措置非加于人乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213264_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>香城寺怀吴世承兄弟，作诗。作品：《香城怀吴氏伯仲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213308")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213308'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213308'>宗师之于生死之际，说法作偈者有之，未有自作铭诰者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213308_comment'></div>予观昭默此文，奋激顿挫，精到无馀，虽鸠摩罗什、道安辈平时作为，且不能及，况病与死邻者能尔乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213308_comment'></div>盖其道眼高妙，唯道是视，初不知其有死生之烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213308_comment'></div>不然，何以卓绝高胜如是之盛哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213308_comment'></div>拜读不胜增气。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213308_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e4791ebc64384de68c001a9c01632f2e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e4791ebc64384de68c001a9c01632f2e");'><span id='e4791ebc64384de68c001a9c01632f2e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>，48岁</div><div id='e4791ebc64384de68c001a9c01632f2e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年5月15日</a>　客南昌，十五日，宜春黄先之携李冲元所赠李公麟画阿弥陀佛像来东山寺，为作赞。作品：《李伯时画弥陀像赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李伯时画弥陀像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年5月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522112")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522112_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522112'>政和八年五月十五日，宜春黄先之携李伯时所画阿弥陀像来东山，为示余。观伯时画多矣，大率顾陆之意，意不尽态。故不施五色，而伯时知之耳。问其所得，曰李仲元。仲元中为袁法官，以遗所厚善者，先之苦求得之。余谛视其笔迹，非今辈所能为，其为伯时之笔审矣。稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522112'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522112'>以慈为室，以忍为衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522112'>法空为座，示同体悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522112'>四十八愿，为世所归。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522112'>如日没时，鸟接翅飞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522112'>大哉甘露，妙法总持。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522112'>令我观门，洞开坦夷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522112'>谛见自心，妙绝知思。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522112'>是皈依处，真不思议。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522112'>律我意马，使不妄驰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522112'>光明现前，见白莲池。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522112'>不假中阴，屈伸顷时。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522112'>欣然化生，如八岁儿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522112'>何以至此，请审思之。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522112'>皆我精进，想力所持。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522112'>稽首妙湛，不动巍巍。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522112'>令一切众，绝痴暗疑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522112'>有同愿者，但瞻导师。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522112'>脱然蝉蜕，出五浊泥。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522112'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_522112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522112'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《乐邦文类》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522112_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>　陈瓘侄陈刚自九江来，出示瓘诗，为诗作跋示陈刚。作品：《跋了翁诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋了翁诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213379")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213379'>仁者难逢思有常，平居慎勿恃何妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213379_comment'></div>争先世路机关恶，近后语言滋味长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213379_comment'></div>爽口物多终作疾，快心事过必为伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213379_comment'></div>与其病后求良药，不若病前能自防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213379_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213379'>右了翁送其侄刚胜柔诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213379_comment'></div>胜柔过南昌，出以为示，曰：「伯氏祝曰：傥见觉范，使为汝说破」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213379_comment'></div>予曰：「翁欲汝知，口只好吃饭耳」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213379_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年6月4日</a>　六月四日，为南昌饶益院僧惠超题所书《妙法莲花经》作品：《题超道人莲经》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题超道人莲经</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年6月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213268")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213268'>南昌饶益院除馑惠超，自幼出家诵此经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213268_comment'></div>年二十六试于有司，以精通得度，即受具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213268_comment'></div>游诸方，事善知识，发明心要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213268_comment'></div>及还，掩关以金为墨，书《妙法莲华经》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213268_comment'></div>政和八年六月四日清晨，携以示予，开卷熟视，笔墨精到，衡斜布列，皆有节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213268_comment'></div>非精诚尽力于此法，莫能臻是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213268_comment'></div>予闻一切契经，皆佛所演，而此经独称过去诸佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213268_comment'></div>先说法喻，双举莲之为喻，以三世同时，十方同会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213268_comment'></div>方其开时，即有果；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213268_comment'></div>方于果中，即有因，莲华、莲实、莲密是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213268_comment'></div>诸子虽分布，而会聚之未尝隔断，此其名莲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213268_comment'></div>莲，连也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213268_comment'></div>《般若》曰：「一切智智，清净无二」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213268_comment'></div>无二分无别、无断故者以是哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213268_comment'></div>梁大沙门僧祐，平生书写诵持，未舍受即身为烂瓜香，已舍受即舌本为青莲华香，皆其精进真信之力所成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213268_comment'></div>陈大沙门惠思诵至「是真精进，是名真法供养如来」，恍然见灵山一会，俨然如昨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213268_comment'></div>盖此经有不思议力，入二十五种三昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213268_comment'></div>以大行慈悲入中观，以梵行慈悲入幻观，以胜行慈悲入止观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213268_comment'></div>令一切众生自然见如是事，入菩萨一切色身，三昧之旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213268_comment'></div>今超师坏衣钵，食一室，枵然与世相忘，以精勤之力，致工于此法，可谓知本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213268_comment'></div>予将见生身，发无垢智光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213268_comment'></div>方吾法下衰，而超用志如是，谁不随喜，愿世世同超？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213268_comment'></div>登内院，见慈氏，预闻妙义，顿舍人法二执證，对现色身，此予志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213268_comment'></div>甘露灭某谨题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1213268_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ff128e9cffd14855a042cd64d99414ca_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ff128e9cffd14855a042cd64d99414ca");'><span id='ff128e9cffd14855a042cd64d99414ca_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>，48岁</div><div id='ff128e9cffd14855a042cd64d99414ca' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>　为狂道士诬以为张怀素党人，八月十六日，入南昌右狱，作对治偈。作品：《八月十六入南昌右狱作对治偈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_521996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521996?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八月十六入南昌右狱作对治偈</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521996")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521996'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521996'>那落迦中，论劫受苦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521996'>焚铁其地，汁铜其柱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521996'>鱼鲙而脔，爪分而锯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521996'>于一日夕，有万痛楚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521996'>我避世纷，重闭其户。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521996'>而此知识，勃然而怒。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521996'>吏收付官，于此土住。<div id='poem_sentence_6_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_521996'>自寻其罪，焦芽石女。<div id='poem_sentence_7_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_521996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_521996'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一七。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_521996_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年11月</a>　坐南昌狱百余日，十一月初一，改元重和，大赦天下，出狱，欲往长沙谷山依希祖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>　李生来谒，出百丈怀海、汾阳善昭二祖师像为示，摹之，并作诗。作品：《出狱李生来谒出百丈汾阳二像为示因而摹之作此时即欲还谷山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_4_520935_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年11月17日</a>　十一月十七日，自南昌还谷山，作诗。作品：《十一月十七日发豫章归谷山》<span -----title
高安

<div class='label1' id='e239e935f15f4e4eb753801314b08237_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e239e935f15f4e4eb753801314b08237");'><span id='e239e935f15f4e4eb753801314b08237_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　至筠州高安，作诗赠李敬修。作品：《赠李敬修》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠李敬修</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520512")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520512'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520512'>荷山锦水灵秀钟，半千嘉运生英雄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520512'>李郎年少韵洒落，天容道骨轩仙风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520512'>下帷默与贤圣对，钩深索隐皆旁通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520512'>肝肠盘屈叠丽锦，心胸洞彻光玲珑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520512'>文章气燄长万丈，那应笔梦生春虹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520512'>桂枝未折白月窟，麻衣尚走红尘中。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520512'>岩僧素有孝基眼，观人虽众无如公。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520512'>昂霄耸壑跬可待，行行不用啼途穷。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520512'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520512_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='98f338e43cb34b91a3847a9928b7a767_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("98f338e43cb34b91a3847a9928b7a767");'><span id='98f338e43cb34b91a3847a9928b7a767_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，31岁</div><div id='98f338e43cb34b91a3847a9928b7a767' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>访高安米山陈尊宿道踪影堂，作序。作品：《陈尊宿影堂序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213459' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213459' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213459?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈尊宿影堂序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213459")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213459_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213459'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213459'>陈尊宿者，断际禅师之高弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213459_comment'></div>尝庵于高安之米山，以母老于睦，遂归编蒲屦，售以为养，故人谓之陈睦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213459_comment'></div>临济至黄檗，众未有知之者，而公独先知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213459_comment'></div>尝指似断际曰：「大黄之门，必此儿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213459_comment'></div>云门秘传于公，人所知之，而公更使谒雪峰曰：「当嗣之，不然，吾道终不振矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213459_comment'></div>云门、临济能不忘其言，故宗一代，天下古今，依此以扬声，其德泽方进未艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213459_comment'></div>夫二子方其匿耀也，其施为未有以异于人，而卒不能逃公之言，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213459_comment'></div>古之人笃闻其信己，故其处心也公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213459_comment'></div>惟其公，是以自知之审，而知人之详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213459_comment'></div>今之世，虽有通人远才，不小同己则横议，疾之不掩则谤之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213459_comment'></div>通人远才固自负，而群小又工于为谤，宜乎其赘隅于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213459_comment'></div>而庸下之徒能阿其所好，故争厚恩之，环目迟以为嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213459_comment'></div>庸下者固欲显于人，而好名者素快同于己，宜乎其丰隆于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213459_comment'></div>吾行四方有年矣，见此种人何限，而恬然不知怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213459_comment'></div>世衰道微，一至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213459_comment'></div>使其闻公之风，见公之像，其何以施眉目耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213459_comment'></div>呜呼，期临济必大黄檗之门，而其嗣方大盛，知人之详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213459_comment'></div>祝云门，嗣雪峰，庶未其诘，自知之审也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213459_comment'></div>《传》曰：「知人则哲，自知则明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213459_comment'></div>吾于睦州公见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213459_comment'></div>公之影堂在高安南之四十里，所谓米山者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213459_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>拜陈尊宿画像，作赞。作品：《陈尊宿赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522133?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈尊宿赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522133")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522133_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522133'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522133'>云门临济，一龙一夔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522133'>嗣存参运，皆公使之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522133'>丛林米岭，众不满百。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522133'>佥一典客，觉有难色。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522133'>即袖手去，古寺閒房。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522133'>织屦养母，自含其光。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522133'>钦其遗风，秋满须发。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522133'>唯不少贬，是真宏法。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522133'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_522133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522133'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522133_comment'></div></div><br class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，32岁</div><div id='46ca7ca3af5d4ea8a5b48317d4f2626d' class='detail'><span id='poem_sentence_0_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520490'>故山有屋埋深云，一夜归心掣不断。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520490'>山舟日夜去无休，挽绳欲系惭无由。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520490'>纷纷世态真一梦，顾我所为如直钩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520490'>绿锦江头识谅禅，倾坐高谈象帝先。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520490'>疑君即是僧太白，不然无乃真弥天。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520490'>仙风袭人欲轻举，天容道气出眉宇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520490'>拥坐衣裳堕不收，山水怀云轻百补。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520490'>我今老倦亦慵参，去死正如三眠蚕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520490'>相看一笑有佳约，他日同归五老庵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520490'>人生真若屈伸肘，萍浮梗泛因邂逅。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520490'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_520490_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>谅上人作南轩避暑诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵谅上人南轩避暑》<span id='poem_sentence_0_521078'>人间酷暑推不去，爱此南轩一榻空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521078_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521078'>眼倦抛书成午睡，梦悠谁复羡王公。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵苏通判观牡丹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_520719_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520719'>天涯也识洛阳面，露丛幽蕊生奇葩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520719_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年4月</a>　四月，到筠州高安县，喜作诗二首。作品：《至筠二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span>《至筠二首》（其二）<span id='poem_sentence_1_521167'>父老相逢班草坐，风光初过采茶时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521167_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521167'>摩挲禅榻营春睡，想像斋厨办晚炊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521167'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521167_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_521168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521168'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521168'>偶唤归舟隔乱溪，春山偏与晚相宜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521168'>自寻熟路悬崖去，正是新秧刺水时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521168_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521168'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　馆于高安县大愚山荷塘寺，即资国寺，乞食故人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　于荷塘寺幻住庵见本明师弟，本明双目已盲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年4月25日</a>　经行宴坐之暇，名其斋曰合妙，四月二十五日作记。作品：《合妙斋记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>合妙斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213436")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213436'>无尽居士真拜之明年，大晟乐成，诏试于西府，余适在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213436_comment'></div>无尽曰：「声起于日而律起于辰，四十有一而阳数全，三十有六而阴气备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213436_comment'></div>如黄钟之律，九寸而为宫，增之毫釐，减之杪忽，则其音不应宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213436_comment'></div>苟适其和，是谓之雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213436_comment'></div>熟视其理，盖大遍无外，细入无间」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213436_comment'></div>余曰：诸佛众生日用，无以异于此，其体本自妙而常明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213436_comment'></div>因缘时节，不借语默，其义自见；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213436_comment'></div>违时失候，则拟议而动，其义自隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213436_comment'></div>诸佛知此者也，故善用而合本妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213436_comment'></div>《首楞严》岂不曰「虽有妙音，若无妙指，终不能发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213436_comment'></div>如我按指，海印发光」哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213436_comment'></div>众生昧此者也，故不善用而成粗大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213436_comment'></div>《智度》岂不曰「犹如利刀，惟用割泥，泥无所成，刀日就损」哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213436_comment'></div>余涉世多艰，困于忧患，后三年，华发海外，翩然来归，依资国寺，乞食故人而老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213436_comment'></div>晨香夕灯，经行晏坐，翛然静住，索尔虚闲，追绎大晟乐之和雅，而庶几善用其心，以合本妙之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213436_comment'></div>遂以名其斋曰合妙，又为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213436_comment'></div>政和四年二十五日书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　石门老衲文首座来访，喜作诗。作品：《喜文首座至》<span
