id='poem_sentence_6_522175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522175'>稽首寄老，后身宝公。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522175'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_522175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522175'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522175_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗赠觉成上人。作品：《赠觉成上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521921' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521921' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521921?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠觉成上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521921")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521921_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521921'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521921'>云泉措置万事外，须发凋零伸欠中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521921_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521921'>想见龙城山下路，一川秋色稻花风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521921_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521921'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521921_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5c9845a34f3747cfb5a1a90425b028f2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5c9845a34f3747cfb5a1a90425b028f2");'><span id='5c9845a34f3747cfb5a1a90425b028f2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='5c9845a34f3747cfb5a1a90425b028f2' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过高安，登朱氏延真阁，为隐君子朱坚作《延真阁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱氏延真阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213444")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213444'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213444'>出高安之西门，行五十里，山川有佳气，草木有华滋，桑林有秀色，民俗有古风，如武陵桃源，如剡溪赤城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213444_comment'></div>有隐君子朱坚伯固者世家于此，特临广陌为危阁，以延真为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213444_comment'></div>余自京来归，过而登焉，凭栏而睇，烟云杳霭，形胜纤秾，一览而尽得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213444_comment'></div>而恨其名未足以副其趋，谓伯固曰：「君风度儒者也，年方壮，有美材，乃不以功名富贵为急，甘隐约于山林也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213444_comment'></div>而雅志欲延真，岂有说乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213444_comment'></div>伯固曰：「然，吾当语子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213444_comment'></div>夫功名富贵偶然尔，士以身徇，惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213444_comment'></div>何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213444_comment'></div>汉武帝见相如赋，喟曰：『吾安得与此人同时』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213444_comment'></div>及见之，止以为上林令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213444_comment'></div>富贵若不可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213444_comment'></div>唐太宗见马周之论，促使召之，接武于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213444_comment'></div>及见之，谈笑而断国论，富贵又若可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213444_comment'></div>李广之伎无双于天下，及从式师出征，迷失道路，竟不得侯而死，功名若不可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213444_comment'></div>薛仁贵白衣从征辽东，以三矢而定天山，卒为名将，功名又若可必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213444_comment'></div>吾以谓人生百岁，如驹过隙，要当从吾之志耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213444_comment'></div>昔梅子真补南昌尉，时放浪此邦，有别业之遗基在焉，已为道士庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213444_comment'></div>元始中，弃妻子归寿春，后人见之于稽山，变姓名为吴门卒，而传不书其终，其为仙明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213444_comment'></div>庸讵知其不杂屠沽，尚往来故居乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213444_comment'></div>吾为阁以延之，傥幸及见，又庸讵知不携吾登毛车，渡弱水，以游道山哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213444_comment'></div>余不得而答，乃叙其说，援笔而记于壁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213444_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游筠州太平泗州院，见僧元鉴蓄旃檀白衣观音像，为之作赞。作品：《泗州院旃檀白衣观音赞序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州院旃檀白衣观音赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522086")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522086_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522086'>筠州太平泗州院僧元鉴，所蓄观音菩萨之相，慈严妙丽，灵异殊胜，如上天竺所见者。问何自得之，鉴曰：始有客舟载而至，传数家，家辄祸，至灭亡者，皆畏不敢迎，独吾迎事之而无异焉。余曰：昔庐山文殊师利之像，不肯留寒溪，而喜随远公归东林。金陵弥勒像不肯住景德，而现梦于舒王，永居华藏。今此像乃独乐寓于鉴，是皆与菩萨有大因缘。不然圣心岂有所择而避就之耶？为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522086'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522086'>我闻菩萨昔因地，所供养佛名观音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522086'>从闻思修入悟心，心精遗闻而得道。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522086'>见闻觉知不可易，譬如西北与东南。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522086'>而此乃曰闻可遗，令人罔然堕疑网。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522086'>龙本无耳闻以神，蛇亦无耳闻以眼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522086'>牛无耳故闻以鼻，蝼蚁无耳闻以身。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522086'>六根互用乃如此，闻不可遗岂理哉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522086'>彼于异类昧劣中，而亦精妙不间断。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522086'>况我自在慈忍力，无畏解脱独不然。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522086'>钟鼓俱击声不同，知其不同是生灭。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522086'>而二种声不相参，即是同时寂灭法。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522086'>稽首净智功德聚，广大庄严悲愿海。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522086'>悯我心明力不逮，时时种子发现行。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522086'>如人因酒而发狂，戒饮辄复逢佳酝。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522086'>愿灭颠倒痴暗障，愿获辩才智慧藏。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522086'>游戏十方微尘刹，亦施无畏利众生。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522086'>凡曰有心能闻者，同入圆通三昧海。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522086'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_522086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522086'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522086_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗书元鉴香严堂。作品：《书鉴上人香严堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一０。）</span><div id='poem_521018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书鉴上人香严堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521018")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521018'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521018'>堂前丛玉知谁种，丛下高人自扫除。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521018'>未论击声回顾眄，先欣秀色上眉须。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521018'>随宜万偈风宣说，顿现千身月写摹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521018_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='55b3a436ac784ef699117f1bf38a49d7_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　本明师弟讣闻，与希祖疾驰三日回筠州荷塘寺，作文祭之。作品：《祭幻住庵明师弟文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213554' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213554' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213554?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭幻住庵明师弟文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213554")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213554'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213554'>子少弃家，从我游嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213554_comment'></div>三十一年，如梦顷时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213554_comment'></div>于此梦境，忧患半之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213554_comment'></div>我窜万里，白骨重肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213554_comment'></div>子卧一庵，亦失双目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213554_comment'></div>心知馀年，再见不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213554_comment'></div>敢料来归，先馆子庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213554_comment'></div>即视模索，认声惊呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213554_comment'></div>我亦念子，形神已枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213554_comment'></div>百不如人，谓当寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213554_comment'></div>心期恻然，正尔难保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213554_comment'></div>携法兄祖，疾驰三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213554_comment'></div>瓦灯昼昏，寂然空室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213554_comment'></div>相视以恸，荐此钵食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213554_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213554_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年1月1日</a>　正月元日，梦真净克文携登塔，觉而作偈。作品：《戊戌岁元日梦云庵携登塔问答甚多觉而忘之作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_522009'>政和八年四十八，一念了知一切法。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522009'>颠倒妄想垢消灭，平等性智光通达。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522009'>常令现前绝功勋，不欲染污差毫发。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
衡山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='243fe062b27f4d87bc7ec733b7c7ad2d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("243fe062b27f4d87bc7ec733b7c7ad2d");'><span id='243fe062b27f4d87bc7ec733b7c7ad2d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1094')">1093-1094年</a>，23-24岁</div><div id='243fe062b27f4d87bc7ec733b7c7ad2d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　南穷苍梧，休于衡山之下，见秦少逸、李师尹，结为友，与之游久，秋，哲宗诏下，作序送二人赴京师应礼部试。作品：《送秦少逸李师尹序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213248' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213248' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213248?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送秦少逸李师尹序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213248")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213248_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213248'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213248'>余久厌大梁车马之尘，而思江湖渔樵之乐，故自淮宋之郊，再游匡庐，南穷苍梧，休于衡山之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213248_comment'></div>爱其洞壑深邃，愿为终焉之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213248_comment'></div>林间有人焉，望之如琼林玉树，恍然如行金明、绿野之郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213248_comment'></div>见狂游贵公子，揖而问之，则此邦贤者秦少逸、李师尹辈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213248_comment'></div>徐扣其所蓄，盖亦无所不观，因结为友，与之游久而益敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213248_comment'></div>会天子诏下，将校艺于有司，送别于碧岩之阿，而告之曰：前志多云并、汾、汝、洛之间土厚水深，浅井十馀丈，清凉甘滑，土无横文，色如烝面，故其俗重迟美茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213248_comment'></div>士君子博学而知要，古今光明秀杰之士，排肩而出，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213248_comment'></div>大江之南，荆湖之间，其地卑湿，人心轻浮，偏急多争，故士君子学问苟简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213248_comment'></div>切观前代，能以功名富贵终始者无几，后生未进，皆以其风俗素轻浮，故甘自废弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213248_comment'></div>余切以为过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213248_comment'></div>昔谢安有鼻疾，故咏书之音重浊，当时名流慕其为人，皆掩鼻效之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213248_comment'></div>杨绾以清约自律，而当时贵人有为减驺从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213248_comment'></div>是皆以天姿嗜好成一时之风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213248_comment'></div>东瓯之民，朴野不学，自古鲜有仕于朝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213248_comment'></div>欧阳詹以秀才倡之，至今号为多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213248_comment'></div>潮阳在瘴海之隅，民未知学，韩文公以赵德为之师，其俗称为易治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213248_comment'></div>以是又激厉学行，成两邦之美化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213248_comment'></div>今之学者，能知之而莫能行之，行之而不见其效，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213248_comment'></div>自信之不笃，自重之不至耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213248_comment'></div>使其能自信，虽箦中之死人，足以自致青云之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213248_comment'></div>能自重其材，则跨下之饿夫，足以建立而称孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213248_comment'></div>岂奔走仁义，有王佐之略者，而以风俗为病哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213248_comment'></div>盖士能成天下之风俗，而风俗有不能为士之病明矣，诸君勉之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213248_comment'></div>吾将见君辈角立齿列，出于卑薄之地，仕而达，发其毫末，犹能无愧王、谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213248_comment'></div>不幸而穷蹇，则犹不失为欧阳詹、赵德而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213248_comment'></div>其勿以吾言为誇也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1213248_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　作诗谢李师尹赠端砚。作品：《李师尹以端砚见遗作此谢之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_521119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李师尹以端砚见遗作此谢之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521119")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521119'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521119'>歙珍先数刷丝纹，那料端溪更逸群。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521119'>已作退闲今似我，温然自重尚如君。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521119'>岂宜禅室埋声价，合在文场著策勋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521119'>忍垢风棂应有梦，梦随笔阵扫烟云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521119'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521119_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　作诗送秦少逸赴京师。作品：《送秦少逸》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_521145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送秦少逸</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521145")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521145'>秦郎毛骨玉壶秋，望见令人忘百忧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521145'>便觉宗之未潇洒，肯容如晦独风流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521145'>来为南岳翛然别，去作东华烂熳游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521145'>想见醉围红粉处，雪笺佳句挽银钩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　游衡山南台寺，见释玄泰祭石头行明禅师文。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9fc465bf386a4259889b567799e5a4ea_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9fc465bf386a4259889b567799e5a4ea");'><span id='9fc465bf386a4259889b567799e5a4ea_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，30岁</div><div id='9fc465bf386a4259889b567799e5a4ea' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游南岳衡山。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游福严寺，与僧读怀让和尚传，题其后。作品：《题让和尚传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题让和尚传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213273")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213273'>心之妙，不可以语言传，而可以语言见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213273_comment'></div>盖语言者，心之缘、道之标帜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213273_comment'></div>标帜审则心契，故学者每以语言为得道浅深之候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213273_comment'></div>予观南岳让禅师初见六祖，祖曰：「什么物与么来」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213273_comment'></div>对曰：「说似一物即不中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213273_comment'></div>曰：「还假修證也无」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213273_comment'></div>对曰：「修證即不无染污，即不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213273_comment'></div>祖叹曰：「即此不染污，是诸佛之护念」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213273_comment'></div>大哉言乎，如走盘之珠，不留影迹也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213273_comment'></div>然让公犹侍六祖十有五年乃去，庵于三生石之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213273_comment'></div>时天下尚以律居，未成丛席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213273_comment'></div>有僧忘其名，为总众事二十年，为县官勘其出纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213273_comment'></div>先是，寺未尝藉其资，僧方囚，自念久已忘之，仰祝让公求助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213273_comment'></div>于是一夕通悟，尽能追忆二十年间物件，不遗毫发，乃得释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213273_comment'></div>故以让公为观音大士之应身，而让居庵中，未尝知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213273_comment'></div>予游福严，与僧读其事，僧疑以问予：「此何理哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213273_comment'></div>予曰：「《涅槃经》云：『外道妒世尊入其国，驱五百醉象来奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213273_comment'></div>世尊垂手示之，而象见五指轮中皆出师子，于是怖伏遗粪而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213273_comment'></div>世尊曰：尔时我指实无师子，而是护财狂象，自然见之，皆我慈善根力』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213273_comment'></div>故夫世尊慈善根力，要不可以有思议心测之，而可以无隐藏事證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213273_comment'></div>如月在天，光遍溪谷，初不择溪谷之浊清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213273_comment'></div>而水之澄澈，必有月影；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213273_comment'></div>水之澄澈，则月现影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213273_comment'></div>而善恶之必有所感，乃不见慈善根力哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213273_comment'></div>则让公坐令其曾获聪明之辩，要不足怪也」。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1213273'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1213273_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>观福严寺所藏唐僧楚云刺血写《妙法莲华经》<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>福严寺观乾明崇进和尚舍利，作赞。作品：《郴州乾明进和尚舍利赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至法轮寺访彦孜禅师。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>彦孜见《进和尚舍利赞》，作诗，次其韵。作品：《余作进和尚舍利赞迁善见而有诗次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520553?labeling=true' target='_blank'>余作进和尚舍利赞迁善见而有诗次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520553")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520553'>进公事业颇拔俗，欲凭妙语招遗魂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520553'>文章种性欠疏理，焦芽故态何足论。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520553'>心知高人笑谀墓，抱羞无地容逃奔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520553'>佳章忽来生喜气，风轮载我登昆崙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳弥陀和尚赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522158")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522158'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522158'>与之食则食，与之衣则衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522158'>无衣衣木叶，无食食土泥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_522158_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4967a64e1bf246a2b800a74784b7cb5e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4967a64e1bf246a2b800a74784b7cb5e");'><span href='/Writing/520547?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠石头志庵主</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520547")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520547_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520547'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520547'>陜西道人最声价，自与老南相逼亚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520547'>常恐清尘补缀难，那知乃有如君者。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520547'>争传绝似馀杭标，十年梦想空飘飖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520547'>迩来衡岳祝融下，一见便令人意消。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520547'>道骨清闲神秀彻，湛湛光风磨霁月。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520547'>高谈未了山日斜，篆烟已灭灰如雪。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520547'>平生安得情相似，可怜投分今如此。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520547'>且作山中盛事传，我忘朴陋君忘年。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520547'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520547_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>问怀志住山趣味，怀志答以偈二首。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>题石庵钝斧亭。作品：《题石庵钝斧亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一七。据《元丰九域志》卷六，祝融峰属衡山县，现属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>将登南岳绝顶，怀志赠小团茶，作诗谢之。作品：《将登南岳绝顶而志上人以小团斗夸见遗作诗谢之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_521132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将登南岳绝顶而志上人以小团斗夸见遗作诗谢之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521132")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521132'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521132'>壑源独步宝带夸，官焙无双小月团。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521132'>未作浓甘生齿颊，先飞微白上眉端。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521132'>汤声蜂稚秋窗晚，乳面鹅儿春瓮寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521132'>饮罢为君登绝顶，俯临落日看跳丸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521132_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521132'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521132_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>登祝融峰，题诗草衣岩。作品：《题草衣岩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一七。据《元丰九域志》卷六，祝融峰属衡山县，现属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e37581a53ac74580a7621f3243845293_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年5月</a>　将赴廉州，五月，至南岳，为法轮寺彦孜禅师石菖蒲作诗。作品：《孜迁善石菖蒲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520552'>戏将红玉旋螺石，共置雪色花磁盂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520552'>沙泉甘<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作石）</span>滑见毛发，时时酌以浇根须。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520552'>苍然棐几明窗下，五月秋色磨肌肤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520552'>已忘身世在南岳，勿觉梦寐游西湖。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520552'>遥知夏木午阴静，篆畦半破烟舒徐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520552'>莫翁睡足百事懒，相看微笑依圆蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520552'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_520552_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　彦孜作《丰年断》诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵莫翁丰年断》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_520554' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520554' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520554?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵莫翁丰年断</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520554")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520554'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520554'>此山分得僧中龙，独论悬断今年丰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520554'>定知胸次有造化，是非饱更田舍翁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520554'>清晨一雨符君说，喜如初得丹砂诀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520554'>精神矍铄口垂涎，一饱可期扶病劣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520554'>老来百事不如人，但愿𥝧稏秋如云。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520554'>莫如往年水车联，龟兆坼出生黄尘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520554'>莫翁心地绝榛卤，圆中规而方中矩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520554'>千偈平生如建瓴，此诗可意真时雨。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520554'>我诗脱口酬未当，只欲与君凭阁望。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520554'>万顷连天绿锦光，舞浪崩腾似春涨。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520554'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520554_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　因霖雨久困南岳禹溪，游南岳福严寺，访思大师遗迹，读其文，作诗。作品：《游南岳福严寺》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_520541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520541?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游南岳福严寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520541")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520541'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520541'>生计居然成脱略，投老南来看衡岳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520541'>禹溪久留困霖雨，低摧闷若剪翎鹤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520541'>朝来南寻度坡垄，针水秧齐鸟声乐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520541'>风光融融一都会，鬼祠雄深抱山脚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520541'>梯空延缘止巉绝，瘦策扶衰意超豁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520541'>拂云苍杉杂锦石，紫藤绿蔓相连络。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520541'>石桥下视隔人世，但觉岚光翠如泼。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520541'>亭泓无波自绀碧，涧草有香空错莫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520541'>忽惊梵宇堕林梢，宝势飞翔照深壑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520541'>攲斜万础盘苍崖，十步一楼五步阁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520541'>冰柱琼窗不知数，旒苏一一垂帘箔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520541'>犀颅道人相笑迎，冰雪形容无住著。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520541'>午梵清圆林叶动，天花细雨无时落。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520541'>凭高且复息疲颈<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作胫）</span>，心清别殿鸣风铎。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520541'>云开千里上眉睫，吴楚江山见浓薄。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520541'>𡺸阇如有女正色，春不洗妆秋拂掠。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520541'>紫盖颀然似矜妒，半出晴烟翠棱抹。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520541'>三生来游等儿戏，灵山一会俨如昨。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520541'>他年遗迹旧岩下，拴索犹存众惊愕。<div id='poem_sentence_22_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_520541'>故庵遗塔尚依然，行诵神交付冥漠。<div id='poem_sentence_23_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_520541'>影不出山岂难事，准拟茅斋就林缚。<div id='poem_sentence_24_520541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_520541'>退之南迁曾过此，好语誇词杂嘲噱。<div id='poem_520542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福岩寺梦访廓然于龙山路中见之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", id='poem_sentence_0_520542'>山高夜气催烦暑，竹风为作南轩雨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520542'>梦随柔橹到西兴，舣舟步入龙山坞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520542'>萧萧松下逢睿郎，问信远来亦良苦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520542'>觉来但记谈笑欢，不省欢时竟何语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520542'>卧看篝灯一点明，岭海茫茫隔吴楚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520542'>安得却如清梦中，杖履追随长尔汝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520542'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_520542_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='6946b9fec5a2423e9cf53d7ce8314a09_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6946b9fec5a2423e9cf53d7ce8314a09");'><span id='6946b9fec5a2423e9cf53d7ce8314a09_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='6946b9fec5a2423e9cf53d7ce8314a09' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至南岳岣嵝峰法轮寺，为景齐禅师薝葡轩作序，借薝葡异香重申鼻观之义。作品：《薝葡轩序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213466' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213466' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213466?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薝卜轩序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213466")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213466_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213466'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213466'>法轮齐禅师开轩于不思议室之西，薝卜林之间，因以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213466_comment'></div>门弟子告语曰：「吾师以异方便附物显理，盖其华萼六出，所以殊众卉，如心花发明诸地故；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213466_comment'></div>其叶之寒茂，所以傲雪霜，如道根深固抑魔外故；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213466_comment'></div>其色至洁，因地法行盛明净故；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213466_comment'></div>其实至黄，慈悲摄物道中利故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213466_comment'></div>余疑其说而造焉，目击而坐，了无问答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213466_comment'></div>微风披拂，枝叶参差，异香郁然，纯一无杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213466_comment'></div>鼻观通妙，闻慧现前，譬如两镜相临于中，无像而灯忽举，知相摄入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213466_comment'></div>虽接武至者，云拥而集，当又如百千镜中，各纳灯体，圆备同彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213466_comment'></div>更为主客，融通自在，成法解脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213466_comment'></div>昔黄龙三关神通游戏于语默之外，宝觉之拳独体全露于背触之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213466_comment'></div>今禅师乃宴坐不言之中，使来者嗅薝卜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213466_comment'></div>乃翁乃祖皆以举手动足为佛事，克家之子又以清芬转法轮，非纵非横，非同非异，如伊之字摩醯之目，非化变诸幻而开幻众者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213466_comment'></div>师之所示如月标指，我作是说如绘虚空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213466_comment'></div>指非月体，则此轩之所以构也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213466_comment'></div>空无受绘之曲，则言语文字独何伤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213466_comment'></div>禅师抚掌大笑，因戏录为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213466_comment'></div>使登之者援笔而赋，盖自石门某始。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213466_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为景齐禅师薝葡轩作诗。作品：《法轮齐禅师开轩于薝葡丛名曰薝葡二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span>《法轮齐禅师开轩于薝葡丛名曰薝葡二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_521137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_521165'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521165'>天风吹笑落人间，白发新从死地还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521165'>往事暗惊如昨梦，此生重复见名山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521165'>倦禅想见堆危坐，知法应抛放纵闲。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521165'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>泉州商贩徐五叔自澄迈登舟始，步随护送七十驿，至南岳方广寺，乃拜辞，因以所读《左传》授与之。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至方广寺，谒从誉禅师。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>观邹浩赠从誉诗卷，跋其后。作品：《跋道乡居士诗》<span href='/Writing/1213389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋道乡居士诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213389")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213389'>道乡以说禅口谈医国法门，雷霆一世，初非以诗鸣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213389_comment'></div>而此诗句句有法，盖其胸次如春之盎盎著物成容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213389_comment'></div>今既已矣，万人何赎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213389_comment'></div>俨师题于衡山之麓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>馆于方广寺灵源阁下，因名其居曰甘露灭，法太请晓其说，为作序。作品：《甘露灭斋铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213491' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甘露灭斋铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213491")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213491_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213491'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213491'>政和四年春，余还自海外，过衡岳，谒方广誉禅师，馆于灵源阁之下，因名其居曰甘露灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213491_comment'></div>道人法太请晓其说，余曰：三祖北齐天平二年得法于少林，隐于𡷗山，终身不言姓氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213491_comment'></div>老安隋文帝开皇七年括天下私度僧尼验勘，安曰：「本无名」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213491_comment'></div>遂遁于嵩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213491_comment'></div>二大老厌名迹之累，而精一其道盖如此，余实慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213491_comment'></div>乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213491'>吾闻甘露，食之长生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213491_comment'></div>而寂灭法，乃有此名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213491_comment'></div>寂灭而生，谷神不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213491_comment'></div>唯佛老君，其意如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213491_comment'></div>我本超放，忧患缠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213491_comment'></div>今知脱矣，须发伽梨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213491_comment'></div>安遁嵩少，璨逃潜霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213491_comment'></div>是故觉范，老于衡岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213491_comment'></div>山失孤峻，玉忘无瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213491_comment'></div>当令舌本，吐青莲华。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1213491_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为法太名所居曰明极，作铭。作品：《明极堂铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213494?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明极堂铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213494")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213494_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213494'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213494'>道人法太少年追随翰墨，所与游多一时显人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213494_comment'></div>晚居衡岳，一衲穷年，垂涕扪虱，猥衰坐睡，守粪垆煨芋，直名其所居为明极，取《首楞严》「馀尘尚诸学，明极即如来」义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213494_comment'></div>欲以道人坐进此道，为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213494'>见明之时，此见明者，缘明开达；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213494_comment'></div>则见暗时，此见暗者，不明自发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213494_comment'></div>见则常明，寄根成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213494_comment'></div>见岂明生，暗能昏否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213494_comment'></div>我观明暗，尚难掩藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213494_comment'></div>岂生死门，乃欲存亡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213494_comment'></div>惟道人太，以壁为口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213494_comment'></div>全机现前，不落渗漏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213494_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读法太诗卷，作诗赠还之。作品：《还太首座诗卷》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_521144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>还太首座诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521144")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521144'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521144'>料理诗情难复难，萦心结思倾毫端。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521144'>夺回天地英秀气，坐令落纸生风寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521144'>老猿夜月叫苍壁，孤鹤晓霜疏羽翰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521144'>精神清韵知几许，付与后来能者看。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521144_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521144'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521164")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521164'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521164'>老俨化身甘露灭，不妨须发著伽梨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521164'>虚舟阅世鸱夷子，彗帚□除王伯齐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521164'>香火共<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作自）</span>修心老大，楼钟重听意凄迷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521164'>馀生未觉全无累，折脚铛犹手自提。<div id='poem_522081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>余日<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>渡海即号甘露灭所至问者尤多时作偈答益不解乃告之曰涅槃经云甘露之性食之令人不死若合异物亦能不死维摩经亦曰得甘露灭觉道成又为之偈</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_522081_0'>① 武林本作白，疑当作自</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522081'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522081'>万象独露身，三世一切说。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522081'>解闻寂静音，方见甘露灭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522081'>从来几生死，何处今堆叠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522081_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>，49岁</div><div id='4d7f8b08096c4f01b6e82b158d0a679a' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，与郭天信子中复游衡山南台寺，观飞来罗汉像，为长老定昭禅师作罗汉像赞并序。作品：《衡山南台寺飞来罗汉赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为定昭长老作《一麟室铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213497' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213497' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213497?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一麟室铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213497")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213497_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213497'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213497'>南台禅师昭公住山之明年，新其丈室，而以「一麟」名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213497_comment'></div>使丛林想见哲人之遗风馀韵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213497_comment'></div>甘露灭某为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213497'>麒麟之性，不可系羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213497_comment'></div>非如犬羊，可驱东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213497_comment'></div>有大比丘，人类精奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213497_comment'></div>在驱乌中，服勤祖师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213497_comment'></div>及其将化，使之寻思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213497_comment'></div>赏其神骏，思则有辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213497_comment'></div>众角一麟，迁其以之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213497_comment'></div>禅师昭公，来自大沩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213497_comment'></div>分空印澄，名誉日驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213497_comment'></div>顾瞻山川，怃然嗟咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213497_comment'></div>想其高风，屋宇故基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213497_comment'></div>以麟名室，非苟然为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213497_comment'></div>佳羽百鸟，宗教日衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213497_comment'></div>庶异人出，支此颓隳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213497_comment'></div>耆阇倚天，胜气华滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213497_comment'></div>当磨云根，刻此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213497_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='986b212df6da44a093435eecb6a72f23_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("986b212df6da44a093435eecb6a72f23");'><span id='986b212df6da44a093435eecb6a72f23_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>，49岁</div><div id='986b212df6da44a093435eecb6a72f23' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　游法轮寺，为本才禅师题所藏惟清禅师帖。作品：《题才上人所藏昭默帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题才上人所藏昭默帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和元年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213302")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213302'>《传》曰：「虽无老成，尚有典刑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213302_comment'></div>然则老成，典刑所不逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213302_comment'></div>予还自海外，丛林顿衰，心不为之动者，恃昭默在耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213302_comment'></div>今又弃我而先，惟之不自知涕零也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213302_comment'></div>宣和元年八月游法轮，见东瓯才公道人出此轴为示，知师弟子之间盖如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213302_comment'></div>衲子动成阡陌，而才独轸念昭默，岂妄与人者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213302_comment'></div>予既见其笔迹，又得与才游弥日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213302_comment'></div>兹游也，岂虚行哉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213302_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f4e04260660647c79c927be7f6f23e52_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f4e04260660647c79c927be7f6f23e52");'><span id='f4e04260660647c79c927be7f6f23e52_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>，50岁</div><div id='f4e04260660647c79c927be7f6f23e52' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至南岳方广寺，为法惠题其所写《宗镜录》作品：《题法惠写宗镜录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。据《元丰九域志》卷六衡山属衡山县，今属衡阳市南岳区。）</span><div id='poem_1213271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题法惠写宗镜录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213271")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213271'>龙胜菩萨曰：「众生心性，犹如利刀，唯用割泥，泥无所成，刀日就损」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213271_comment'></div>理体常妙，众生自粗能善用心，即合本妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213271_comment'></div>余观世之人，疲精神于纸墨者，多从事于无用之学，皆以刀割泥者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213271_comment'></div>明州翠岩僧法惠独施力写永明所撰《宗镜录》一百二十卷，与方广禅寺大法宝藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213271_comment'></div>呜呼，惠师可谓善用其心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213271_comment'></div>夫能使天台、贤首、唯识三宗之旨趣，大乘深经六十卷妙义，西天此土三百家之法句，杂传要说契心之至理，镜为一心，心之所缘，笔之所及，常在现前，余以谓此道人即入摩诃衍遍知称性之海，即具普贤一真光明微尘数，不思议行门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213271_comment'></div>予幸得托名卷末，愿慈氏大士从知足天来，主龙华时，同闻此录，知今日自作随缘，其心非谬也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为方广寺圆首座题所藏灵源惟清遗墨。作品：《题昭默遗墨》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题昭默遗墨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213307")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213307'>昭默老人，道大德博，为丛林所宗仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213307_comment'></div>虽其片言只偈，翰墨游戏，学者争秘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213307_comment'></div>非以其书词之美也，尊其道师之德耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213307_comment'></div>予游诸方，处处见之，开卷辄识其真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213307_comment'></div>精到之韵，骨枯老状，盖其退居时笔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213307_comment'></div>南岳见方广圆首座，出此为示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213307_comment'></div>噫，圆知敬慕昭默，其亦贤于人远矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213307_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1e34d872d9a34bf3966838eb120c0f17_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1e34d872d9a34bf3966838eb120c0f17");'><span id='1e34d872d9a34bf3966838eb120c0f17_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a color: gray;'>▪</span>登控鲤亭望孤山，作五言、六言绝句各一首。作品：《登控鲤亭望孤山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。此诗为五言，全文为“大江自吞空，中流涌孤山。欲取藏袖中，归置几案间。”）</span>《登控鲤亭望孤山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。此诗为六言，全文为“水面微开笑靥，山形故作横陈。彭泽诗中图画，为君点出精神”）</span><br /></div>
-----end
