id='poem_title_520906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵云庵老人题妙用轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520906")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520906'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520906'>开轩閒隐几，万象竞趋陪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520906'>风揭松声去，云推山色来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520906'>观身真作梦，视世一浮埃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520906'>日暮庭阴转，幽禽接趐回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520906'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520906_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读大愚守芝禅师问文殊、罔明出女子定话，作偈记之。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读黄檗希运禅师语录，手校而藏之，书其卷末，以示同学。作品：《题断际禅师语录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题断际禅师语录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213275")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213275'>禅师初与异僧游天台，渡溪方悟其为异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213275_comment'></div>悔不能早识之，且将折其胫而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213275_comment'></div>寻北游，值老妪于洛下，与之语，多所发药，遂侍以师礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213275_comment'></div>妪知其非寻常人，俾更谒江西大寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213275_comment'></div>既至而祖已化去逾月矣，而见其子海公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213275_comment'></div>海以所尝悟明之缘示之，公悟大法于言下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213275_comment'></div>海曰：「他日其嗣大寂可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213275_comment'></div>公笑曰：「是岂义也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213275_comment'></div>海叹己而为不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213275_comment'></div>常谓其徒曰：「吾顷游方，无所不问，虽草根岩壁中有人，必往穷诘其所得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213275_comment'></div>又曰：「马祖之下得正法眼，归宗耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213275_comment'></div>而牛头以降，皆不可当其意者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213275_comment'></div>岂公取舍，故欲异于世也，亦抑世之人见其不与己合，而诉以为异者也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213275_comment'></div>古之人所以大过人者，信己之专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213275_comment'></div>惟信己，故不惑世人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213275_comment'></div>是故所立卓绝，非常人所能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213275_comment'></div>公之器识宏远，刚正自性，出其天性，岂非以谓道之所在，非凡圣男女之间，晦显长少之际？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213275_comment'></div>而是非取舍，不可以苟而已，而取人不必以求其全也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213275_comment'></div>今之学者，既下视天下之士，而又工于怪奇诡异之事，衒名逐世，不顾义理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213275_comment'></div>求人必以其全，而议论多胶于所爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213275_comment'></div>名为走道，其实走名，纷纷冗冗，皆禅师之门罪人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213275_comment'></div>禅师之所养，其峻严广大如此，其语言断断如药石，深可以治晚世学者之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213275_comment'></div>是知其言，盖所养也，卷舒放肆，驱逐邪妄，开辟正信，直明一心，以归合佛祖之言，可谓深渺宕肆，大哉洋洋乎光明之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213275_comment'></div>余因手校而藏之，又列其所施为者以自警，书于卷之尾，且以示同学云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1213275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>受克文启发，一日顿脱所疑，述偈示同学，克文喜，得掌记室。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>克文举风穴延昭禅师颂，于言下有省。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>因违禅规，遭删去，别克文，携希祖、本明二法弟出山。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='62f16c3be7ba4e4d9a7a9fc0b6f7cd56_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("62f16c3be7ba4e4d9a7a9fc0b6f7cd56");'><span id='62f16c3be7ba4e4d9a7a9fc0b6f7cd56_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>，33岁</div><div id='62f16c3be7ba4e4d9a7a9fc0b6f7cd56' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　与希祖至靖安县宝峰拜真净克文塔。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年10月15日</a>　十月十五日，作克文行状。作品：《云庵真净和尚行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213541?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云庵真净和尚行状<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁二年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年10月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213541")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213541_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213541'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213541'>师讳克文，黄龙南禅师之的嗣，陕府阌乡郑氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213541_comment'></div>生而颖异，在龆龀中，气宇如神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213541_comment'></div>与群儿戏，辄相问答，语言奇怪，闻者骇愕不能晓，则复轩渠笑悦而去，奕世缙绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213541_comment'></div>既长，喜观书，不由师训，自然通晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213541_comment'></div>事后母至孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213541_comment'></div>母嚚，数困辱之，亲旧不忍视其苦，使游学四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213541_comment'></div>旅次复州北塔寺，长老归秀道价方重于时，词辩无碍，因侧聆坐下，感悟流涕，愿毁衣冠，为门弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213541_comment'></div>秀笑曰：「君妙年书生，政当唾手取高第荣亲，乃欲委迹寂寞，岂亦计之未熟耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213541_comment'></div>对曰：「心空及第，岂止荣亲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213541_comment'></div>又将济之，委迹寂寞，非所同也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213541_comment'></div>秀奇其志而纳之，服勤五年如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213541_comment'></div>年二十五岁，试所习为僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213541_comment'></div>明年受具足戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213541_comment'></div>即游京洛，翱翔讲肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213541_comment'></div>贤首、慈恩性相二宗，凡大经论，咸造其微，解帙捉麈，词音朗润，谈辩如云，学者依以扬声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213541_comment'></div>燕居龙门山，偶经行殿庑间，见塑比丘像，蒙首瞑目，若在定者，忽自失，谓同学者曰：「我所负者如道子画人物，虽曰妙尽，终非活者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213541_comment'></div>既焚其疏义，包腰而南，平易艰险，安乐劳苦，诸方大道场，多所经历，自重其才，以求师为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213541_comment'></div>尝至云居谒舜老夫，机语不契，不宿而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213541_comment'></div>又至德山，应禅师方夜参，雌黄先达，有六祖不及云门之语，失笑，黎明发去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213541_comment'></div>闻云峰悦禅师之风，兼程而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213541_comment'></div>至湘乡，悦已化去，叹曰：「既无其人，吾何适而不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213541_comment'></div>山川虽佳，未暇游也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213541_comment'></div>因此行寓居大沩，夜闻僧诵云门语曰「佛法如水中月是否」，云：「清波无透路」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213541_comment'></div>豁然心开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213541_comment'></div>时南禅师已居积翠，径造其庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213541_comment'></div>南曰：「从什么处来」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213541_comment'></div>曰：「沩山」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213541_comment'></div>南曰：「恰值老僧不在」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213541_comment'></div>曰：「未审向什么处去也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213541_comment'></div>南曰：「天台普请南岳云游」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213541_comment'></div>曰：「若然者，亦得自在去也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213541_comment'></div>南曰：「脚下鞋是甚处得来」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213541_comment'></div>曰：「庐山七百钱唱得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213541_comment'></div>南曰：「何曾得自在」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213541_comment'></div>师指曰：「何曾不自在耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213541_comment'></div>南公大骇，参依久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213541_comment'></div>辞去，至西山翠岩，长老顺公与之夜语，自失曰：「起临济者子也，厚自爱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213541_comment'></div>而师亦神思豁然，德其赏音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213541_comment'></div>及南公居黄龙，复往省觐，南公尝谓师曰：「适令侍者卷帘，问渠：『卷起帘时如何』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213541_comment'></div>曰：『照见天下』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213541_comment'></div>『放下帘时如何』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213541_comment'></div>曰：『水泄不通』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213541_comment'></div>『不卷不放时如何』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213541_comment'></div>侍者无语，汝作么生」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213541_comment'></div>师曰：「和尚替侍者下涅槃堂始得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213541_comment'></div>南厉语曰：「关西人真无头脑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213541_comment'></div>乃顾旁僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213541_comment'></div>师指之曰：「只这僧也，未梦见在」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213541_comment'></div>南公笑而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213541_comment'></div>隆庆閒禅师与师友善，方掌客，閒问曰：「文首座何如在黄檗时」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213541_comment'></div>南公曰：「渠在黄檗时，用钱如粪土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213541_comment'></div>今如数世富人，一钱不虚用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213541_comment'></div>自是为同时饱参者所服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213541_comment'></div>南公入灭，学者归之如云，所至成丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213541_comment'></div>熙宁五年住筠州大愚，太守钱公弋来游，怪禅者骤多，众以师有道行，奔随而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213541_comment'></div>钱公即其室，未有以奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1213541_comment'></div>翌日命斋，师方趋就席，有犬逸出屏帷间，师少避之，钱公嘲之曰：「禅者固能伏虎，反畏犬耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1213541_comment'></div>师应声曰：「易伏隈岩虎，难降护宅龙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1213541_comment'></div>钱公大喜，愿日闻道，乃虚圣寿寺，命师居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1213541_comment'></div>师方饭于州民陈氏家，使符至，遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1213541_comment'></div>钱公系同席数十人将僧吏，求必得之而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1213541_comment'></div>有见于新丰山寺者，即奔往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1213541_comment'></div>陈氏因叩首泣下曰：「师不往，吾党受苦矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1213541_comment'></div>师曰：「以我故累君辈如此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1213541_comment'></div>因受之，遂阐法焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1213541_comment'></div>未几移居洞山普和禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1213541_comment'></div>元丰之末，思为东吴山水之游，舍其居，扁舟东下，至钟山谒丞相舒王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1213541_comment'></div>王素知其名，阅谒喜甚，留宿定林庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1213541_comment'></div>时公方病起，乐闻空宗，恨识师之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1213541_comment'></div>谓师曰：「诸经皆首标时处，《圆觉经》独不然，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1213541_comment'></div>师曰：「顿乘所谈，直示众生，日用现前，不属今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1213541_comment'></div>只今老僧与相公同入大光明藏，游戏三昧，互为宾主，非关时处」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1213541_comment'></div>又曰：「经云：『一切众生，皆證圆觉』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1213541_comment'></div>而圭峰易『證』为『具』，谓译者之讹，其义如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1213541_comment'></div>师曰：「圆觉如可改，则维摩亦可改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1213541_comment'></div>维摩岂不曰『亦不灭受而取證』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1213541_comment'></div>夫不灭受蕴而取證，与皆證圆觉之义同，盖众生现行无明，即是如来根本大智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1213541_comment'></div>圭峰之言非是」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1213541_comment'></div>公大悦，因舍第为寺以延师，为开山第一祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1213541_comment'></div>又以神宗皇帝问安汤药之赐崇成之，是谓报宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1213541_comment'></div>岁度僧买庄土，以供学者，而自撰请疏，有「独受正传，力排戏论」之句者，叙师语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1213541_comment'></div>又以其名请于朝，赐紫方袍，号真净大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1213541_comment'></div>金陵江淮大会学者，至如稻麻粟苇，寺以新革，室宇不能容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1213541_comment'></div>士大夫经游无虚日，师未及嗽盥，而户外之屦满矣，殆不堪劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1213541_comment'></div>于是浩然思还高安，即日渡江，丞相留之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1213541_comment'></div>遂卜老于九峰之下，作投老庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1213541_comment'></div>绍圣之初，御史黄公庆基出守南康，虚归宗之席以迎师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1213541_comment'></div>师曰：「今老病如此，岂宜复刺首迎送？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1213541_comment'></div>为我谢黄公，乞死于此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1213541_comment'></div>其徒哀告曰：「山穷食寡，学者益众，师德腊虽高，而精神康强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1213541_comment'></div>康山自总祐二大士之后，丛林如死灰，愿不忘祖宗，赴舆情之望」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1213541_comment'></div>不得已乃行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1213541_comment'></div>先是，黄公尝望见师于丞相广坐中，师既去，丞相语公曰：「吾阅僧多矣，未有如此老者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1213541_comment'></div>故公尽礼力致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1213541_comment'></div>庐山诸刹，素以奢侈相矜，居者安软暖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1213541_comment'></div>师率以枯淡，学者困于语言，醉于平实，师纵以无碍辩才，呵其偏见，未期年翕然成风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1213541_comment'></div>三年，今丞相张公商英出镇洪府，道由归宗，见师于净名庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1213541_comment'></div>明年迎居石门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1213541_comment'></div>崇宁元年十月示疾，十六日中夜沐浴更衣趺坐，众请说法，师笑曰：「今年七十八，四大相离别，火风既分散，临行休更说」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1213541_comment'></div>遗戒弟子皆宗门大事，不及其私，言卒而殁，寿七十八，腊五十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1213541_comment'></div>茶毗之日，五色成焰，白光上腾，烟所及处，舍利分布，道俗千馀人皆得之，馀者尚不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1213541_comment'></div>塔于独秀峰之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1213541_comment'></div>师纯诚慈爱，出于天性，气韵迈往，超然奇逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1213541_comment'></div>见人无亲疏贵贱，温颜软语，礼敬如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1213541_comment'></div>主持丛林法度甚严，有犯令者，必罚无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1213541_comment'></div>以故五坐道场，为诸方所法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1213541_comment'></div>得游戏三昧，有乐说之辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1213541_comment'></div>词锋智刃，斫伐邪林，如堕云崩石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1213541_comment'></div>开发正见，光明显露，如青天白日，人人自以谓臻奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1213541_comment'></div>至于入室投机，则如铜崖铁壁，不可攀缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1213541_comment'></div>性喜施，随有随与，杖笠之外，不置一钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1213541_comment'></div>行道说法五十馀年，布衣坏衲，翛然自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1213541_comment'></div>于江西有大缘，民信其化，家家绘其像，饮食必祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1213541_comment'></div>嗣法弟子自黄檗道全、兜率从悦而下十人馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1213541_comment'></div>此其平生大概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1213541_comment'></div>至其道之精微，皆非笔墨可能形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1213541_comment'></div>窃尝论之，其弃儒冠而入道类丹霞，奔经论之学而颖悟类南泉，寻师之艰苦，凛然不衰类雪峰，说法纵横、融通宗教类大珠，至于光明伟杰、荷担宗教类百丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1213541_comment'></div>此非某之言，丛林学者之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1213541_comment'></div>呜呼，兼古宗师之美而全有之，可谓集厥大成、光于佛祖者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1213541_comment'></div>崇宁二年十月十五日，门人某谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_119_1213541_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f6e40239a60e4f3abc410fb5a81eb53a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f6e40239a60e4f3abc410fb5a81eb53a");'><span id='f6e40239a60e4f3abc410fb5a81eb53a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年</a>，36岁</div><div id='f6e40239a60e4f3abc410fb5a81eb53a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年10月16日</a>　十月十六日，真净克文忌日，过靖安宝峰禅院，作文祭之。作品：《祭云庵和尚文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213550?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭云庵和尚文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年10月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213550")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213550'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213550'>我生九岁，则知有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213550_comment'></div>寤寐悦慕，想见形仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213550_comment'></div>识师新丰，等父母慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213550_comment'></div>欣然摩顶，使执军持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213550_comment'></div>长游大梁，薙发而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213550_comment'></div>省于九峰，凛然德威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213550_comment'></div>霜雪雨露，物以茂滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213550_comment'></div>师成就我，妙如四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213550_comment'></div>紫霄之下，泐水之湄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213550_comment'></div>前后七年，龙起云随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213550_comment'></div>今古一律，妒毁陷挤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213550_comment'></div>爱怜收拾，终不弃遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213550_comment'></div>我昔出山，师则有辞：「子幼英发，终必有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213550_comment'></div>顾吾老矣，见子无期」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213550_comment'></div>指其二子：「藉汝教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213550_comment'></div>谴呵皆可，不可相离」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213550_comment'></div>德音在耳，星霜八移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213550_comment'></div>师成新塔，我亦陈衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213550_comment'></div>昔师既化，品坐对啼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213550_comment'></div>佥遣本明，远乞铭诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213550_comment'></div>事济而还，僵仆于地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213550_comment'></div>山川隔阻，久绝音题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213550_comment'></div>独携希祖，千里来辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213550_comment'></div>一酬夙心，死无憾悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213550_comment'></div>师之平生，累德巍巍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213550_comment'></div>必兴其后，在我无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213550_comment'></div>敢不激励，上答恩私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1213550_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1106&endYear=1106')">1106年10月18日</a>　十月十八日，为僧一题克文手帖。作品：《题云庵手帖三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。另外两篇不知作于何时，姑不录。）</span><div id='poem_1213299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题云庵手帖<span class='inlineComment2'>（三）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年10月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213299")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213299'>右云庵《寄张惠渊偈》一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213299_comment'></div>惠渊予不见二十年，闻其精进日新，真能遵受云庵之言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213299_comment'></div>诚上人来自宣梵，问其师洎惠渊健否，偶记前偈，遂书以授诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213299_comment'></div>归举似惠渊，使较当日之本异同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213299_comment'></div>某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213299_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='6d5237cab681446fbdae5e963d3cf0d5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6d5237cab681446fbdae5e963d3cf0d5");'><span id='6d5237cab681446fbdae5e963d3cf0d5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>，37岁</div><div id='6d5237cab681446fbdae5e963d3cf0d5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>　别临川，至靖安双林院，为院主作疏化六斋。作品：《为双林化六斋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为双林化六斋疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213611")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213611'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213611'>寺凭幽谷，门对双峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213611_comment'></div>日陈一味之禅，岁仗千家之供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213611_comment'></div>金躯灌沐，始兴离垢之方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213611_comment'></div>软草精持，次结护生之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213611_comment'></div>主事枉抛油酱，寒山举拂以生瞋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213611_comment'></div>匿王自恣修营，庆喜持盂而启教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213611_comment'></div>象骨辊毬之暇，火焰上转大法轮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213611_comment'></div>虎溪种藕之馀，橘盘中深谈实相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213611_comment'></div>六时嘉会，百福具崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213611_comment'></div>幸开乐施之心，仰赞文明之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213611_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213611_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年12月</a>　十二月十六日，发靖安双林院，至石门宝峰寺，作诗怀真净克文，兼简湛堂文准。作品：《十二月十六日发双林登塔头晓至宝峰寺见重重绘出庵主读善财遍参五十三颂作此兼简堂头》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520464' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520464' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520464?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十二月十六日发双林登塔头晓至宝峰寺见重重绘出庵主读善财遍参五十三颂作此兼简堂头</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520464")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520464_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520464'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520464'>十年怀石门，今日石门去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520464'>双林动曦光，跋河开宿雾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520464'>力微藉古藤，泥软脱芒屦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520464'>风泉白云壑，夜雨青松路。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520464'>我生百事废，齿发行衰暮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520464'>但馀爱山心，不逐年华故。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520464'>此山甲天下，自昔家吾祖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520464'>峰如青莲花，千叶晓方吐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520464'>烟云浮香色，清凉洗肝腑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520464'>异哉万木间，白塔岿然古。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520464'>此老无恙时，超放殊媚妩<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作谁与伍）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520464'>万象供谈笑，大千为戏具。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520464'>我曾从之游，绝尘追逸步。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520464'>谁云今已亡，塔开全体露。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520464'>永怀凭妙观，此意竟凄<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作楚）</span>楚。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520464'>那知深林间，聊与故人遇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520464'>电眸霹雳舌，咳唾成妙语。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520464'>笔端撼江海，千偈浩奔注。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520464'>人间有此客，自可忘百虑。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520464'>堂头百衲师，嶷嶷法王辅。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520464'>君看说禅口，未肯让前古。<div id='poem_sentence_20_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_520464'>夜阑对昏灯，豪迈激顽鲁。<div id='poem_sentence_21_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_520464'>相逢俱偶然，此生真逆旅。<div id='poem_sentence_22_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_520464'>何当各努力，业已共骑虎。<div id='poem_sentence_23_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_520464'>诗成对轩渠，一笑小天宇。<div id='poem_sentence_24_520464_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_520464'></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_520464_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a976009359b94216a26fa8ddf903a998_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a976009359b94216a26fa8ddf903a998");'><span id='a976009359b94216a26fa8ddf903a998_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='a976009359b94216a26fa8ddf903a998' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年10月</a>　十月，至洪州靖安县石门宝峰寺，作文准禅师行状。作品：《泐潭准禅师行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三０。）</span><div id='poem_1213542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泐潭准禅师行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213542")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213542'>公讳文准，兴元府唐固梁氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213542_comment'></div>生始幼，见佛像辄笑张牙，不喜闻酒胾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213542_comment'></div>金仙寺沙门虚普乞食至其家，师应门酬酢如老成，时年八岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213542_comment'></div>即辞父母，愿从普归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213542_comment'></div>授以《法华经》，伊吾即上口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213542_comment'></div>元丰僧检，童子较所习，以藉名先后度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213542_comment'></div>师艺精，坐年少不得奏名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213542_comment'></div>陕西经略范公过普庐，普腊高，应对领略，师侍其旁，申辩详明，进止可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213542_comment'></div>范公欲携与俱西，师辞曰：「登山求玉，入海求珠，人各有志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213542_comment'></div>本行学道，世好非素心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213542_comment'></div>范公阴奇其语，度以为僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213542_comment'></div>剔发既，往依梁山乘禅师，呵曰：「驱乌未受戒，敢学佛乘乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213542_comment'></div>师捧手曰：「坛场是戒耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213542_comment'></div>三叠结磨梵，行行阿阇梨是戒耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213542_comment'></div>乘大惊，师笑曰：「虽然，敢不受教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213542_comment'></div>遂受具足戒于唐安律师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213542_comment'></div>遍游成都讲肆，倡诸部纲目，即弃去曰：「吾不求甚解」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213542_comment'></div>大法师昙演佳其英特，抚之曰：「汝法船也，南方有亚圣大士，有若沩山真如、九峰真净者，知之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213542_comment'></div>宜往求之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213542_comment'></div>师拜受教，与同学志恭出诣沩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213542_comment'></div>久之不契，乃造九峰，见真净于投老庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213542_comment'></div>问曰：「什么处来」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213542_comment'></div>对曰：「兴元府」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213542_comment'></div>曰：「近离何处」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213542_comment'></div>曰：「大仰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213542_comment'></div>曰：「夏在什么处」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213542_comment'></div>曰：「沩山」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213542_comment'></div>真净展手曰：「我手何似佛手」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213542_comment'></div>师罔然，左右视，真净呵曰：「适来句句无丝毫差错，灵明天真，才说个佛手，便成隔碍，病在甚处」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213542_comment'></div>师曰：「不会真净」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213542_comment'></div>曰：「一切现成，更教谁会」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213542_comment'></div>师服膺，就弟子之列，馀十年，所至必随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213542_comment'></div>绍圣三年，真净移居石门，衲子益盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213542_comment'></div>凡入室叩问，必瞑目危坐，无所示见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213542_comment'></div>来者必起从园丁壅菜，率以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213542_comment'></div>师每谓公曰：「老汉无意于法道乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213542_comment'></div>莫能测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213542_comment'></div>一日举杖决渠水溅衣，因大悟，方见老人平日用处，走叙其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213542_comment'></div>真净骂曰：「此中乃敢用磊苴耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213542_comment'></div>自是迹愈晦，而名声愈著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213542_comment'></div>自其东游淮浙，所至衲子成丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213542_comment'></div>显谟阁待制李景直守洪州，仰其风，请开法于云岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213542_comment'></div>未几，殿中监范公帅南昌，移居泐潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213542_comment'></div>方是时，禅林以饮食为宗，以软暖为嗜好，以机缘为戏论，师悲叹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213542_comment'></div>师槌拂之下，常三百人，而宿户外者又百馀许，求入室就学，师难之，乃谓之曰：「十方无壁落，四面亦无门，阇梨从什么处入」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213542_comment'></div>对皆不契，每曰：「我只畜一条柱杖，佛来也打，祖来也打，不将元字脚涴汝枯肠如此，临济一宗不到冷落」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213542_comment'></div>学者莫窥其奥，然升堂说法，辩如建瓴，不留影迹，一时公卿大夫宗向之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213542_comment'></div>以政和五年夏卧病，侍者进药饵，师泛然如无意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213542_comment'></div>诫须忌食毒物，师亦未尝从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213542_comment'></div>有问其故，曰：「病有自性乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213542_comment'></div>病无自性，则毒物宁有心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213542_comment'></div>以空纳空，吾未尝颠倒，而汝辈欲吾昏迷耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213542_comment'></div>七月二十二日更衣说偈而化，阅世五十有五，坐三十五夏，阇维得舍利晶圆，净光不坏，道俗千馀人皆得之，门弟子等收塔于南山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213542_comment'></div>呜呼，云庵之神悟于南公之门，超轶绝尘者也，予每疑嗣之者难及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213542_comment'></div>观师之风格，殆所谓家名辩才，气宇逸群者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213542_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1213542_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年10月</a>　谒文准禅师塔，作诗悼之。作品：《谒准禅师塔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521690?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒准禅师塔</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521690")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521690_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521690'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521690'>同条生不同条死，觌露全机谁后先。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521690'>一句鹘崙难劈破，一时乞与子孙传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521690'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521690_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为文准禅师作赞。作品：《宝峰准禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝峰准禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522178")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522178'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522178'>洞庭无盖，虚空有口。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522178'>步水东山，藏身北斗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522178'>石门壁立万仞，踞地一声哮吼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522178'>惊得四序回旋，喝下须弥倒走。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522178'>是谓湛堂老人，不落威音之后。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522178'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_522178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522178'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522178_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年10月7日</a>　十月七日，于宗杲处读文准禅师语录，题其后。作品：《题准禅师语录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题准禅师语录</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213291")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213291'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213291'>石门云庵示众之语，多脱略窠臼，于时衲子视之，如春在花木，而不知其所从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213291_comment'></div>予每以谓此老人可以起临济之仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213291_comment'></div>哲人逝矣，切嗟悼之，以为世莫有嗣之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213291_comment'></div>湛堂于予为弟昆，自其开法，未尝闻其举扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213291_comment'></div>殁后百馀日，得此录于杲上人处，读之喟曰：「云庵之馀波，乃能发生此老种性耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213291_comment'></div>政和五年十月七日题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为宗杲题所辑文准小参。作品：《题小参》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213292' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213292' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213292?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题小参</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213292")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213292'>如来世尊说般若，传至震旦者，无虑数百万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213292_comment'></div>其要不过曰一切智智，清净无二，无二分无别无断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213292_comment'></div>故杜顺宏《华严入法界旨诀》终必曰：「一切智通无障碍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213292_comment'></div>古之宗师于世尊之意神而明之，独云门大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213292_comment'></div>云门灭百年有云庵老师，握临济剑，得云门之旨，于说法时如月在千江，不借言诠，一切见者，心得意了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213292_comment'></div>自老师之化，出其门者皆不足以知此，独湛堂师兄知其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213292_comment'></div>予三复斯语，为之叹息，使云门、云庵而在，见此语当抚掌一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213292_comment'></div>盖其谨严如欧阳率更小字，端方如颜平原大字，秀整姿媚如钟太傅表章，精奇雅丽如王会稽《兰亭记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213292_comment'></div>呜呼，何其盛哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213292_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为志端首座作《藏六轩铭》，以讽后学事虚名为实效者。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二０。）</span><div id='poem_1213499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>藏六轩铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213499")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213499_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213499'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213499'>端首座从吾磊苴兄游有年，方埋光彩禅林，而学者已相仍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213499_comment'></div>开轩于室之后，乞名于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213499_comment'></div>余为名曰藏六，且以讽后学事虚名、为实效者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213499_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213499'>寡欲养心，以直养气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213499_comment'></div>抱其德全，龟以蝉蜕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213499_comment'></div>情缘峥嵘，欲犬怒吠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213499_comment'></div>端方藏六，攫抟无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213499_comment'></div>学者阗门，伫思拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213499_comment'></div>如大火聚，不宿蚊蚋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213499_comment'></div>我观此老，非愚非慧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213499_comment'></div>人趋所争，师取其弃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213499_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　在靖安，为高天倪、高冲、善机、善权之母冯氏作墓铭。作品：《冯氏墓铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冯氏墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213549")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213549'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213549'>洪州布衣高天倪弟冲、赐紫沙门善机、传法沙门善权，以政和五年十月某日葬其母冯氏于幽谷山之阳，附于皇考隐君之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213549_comment'></div>冲茹哀具书曰：「祸衅鏖罚，不自殒灭，上延慈侍，冲尚忍言之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213549_comment'></div>先妣于正月三日弃诸孤于正寝，享年七十有三，愿请文以昭后世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213549_comment'></div>三反而不得辞，乃叙曰：夫人靖安冯氏，年十六归同邑隐君子高广仲容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213549_comment'></div>入门和敬，动履规矩，懿淑而敏，出于天姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213549_comment'></div>媪御喜之，与夺从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213549_comment'></div>时皇舅春秋高，癯而盲，夫人行立必掖，食必尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213549_comment'></div>姑有风痹疾，夫人视卧起，进剂饵，皆毕世不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213549_comment'></div>里闬称其孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213549_comment'></div>仲容三弟稚幼，夫人皆自栉沐缝纫之，以至成立，择师使授学，典婚使纳妇，有劳有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213549_comment'></div>夫人幼孤，未尝学，隐君好与禅衲游，屏听其论而悦之，遂能诵经晓字义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213549_comment'></div>隐君无经世意，多往林墅屏处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213549_comment'></div>五子，皆夫人教之，训严色庄，衣冠取法焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213549_comment'></div>初，幼子善权俊发，夫人曰：「此儿非仕林可致也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213549_comment'></div>施以从石门道人应乾游，以文学之美，致高名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213549_comment'></div>第三子善机，亦授笔，与之俱，丛林期以起东林之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213549_comment'></div>长子天倪，粹温而厚，诚款而文，里巷往来，稀识其面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213549_comment'></div>第四子冲，久游太学，以能文举于礼部，所与交皆一时伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213549_comment'></div>次子怛，廓落有奇节，不幸早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213549_comment'></div>而孙楷，学成而乡贡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213549_comment'></div>夫人喜燕赏，酒酣，冲必利髻为童子戏，婆娑起舞，皆中部节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213549_comment'></div>第侄以次上寿，观者欢哗，夫人为笑而罢，率以为常，邑人慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213549_comment'></div>女一人，适贡士刘杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213549_comment'></div>孙九人，皆嶷嶷争秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213549_comment'></div>曾孙两人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213549_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1213549'>俊发矫士母数责，孟轲废学母断织，凛然夫人嗣遗则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213549_comment'></div>子孙绳绳诗与书，名闻缙绅荣里闾，何以训之孚威如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213549_comment'></div>膝下时闻裂缝掖，颔之而笑无吝色，衣冠三彦僧连璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213549_comment'></div>死生亦大能了然，诵经而化如蜕蝉，我作铭诗骋其贤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1213549_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　为靖安胡氏所蓄观音像作赞。作品：《靖安胡氏所蓄观音赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>靖安胡氏所蓄观音赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522087")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522087'>稽首净智甘露门，稽首无碍悲愿海。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522087'>稽首紫金光聚山，稽首心精遗闻地。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522087'>愿赐威光加被我，摧灭一切夙障山。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522087'>令我一切刹尘中，见此百福如月面。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522087'>菩萨常念诸众生，譬如慈母忆怜子。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522087'>子若昼夜常念母，母子百劫必相见。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522087'>如针之契诸磁石，如雷之文于象牙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522087'>皆即自然如是应，非诸心识可思量。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522087'>鹰巢现形蚌中出，化为画女并鱼师。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522087'>皆随众生心所变，一一成办无遗馀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522087'>妙哉三十二应身，一十四种无畏力。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522087'>愿于一念净心现，譬如秋月现止水。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522087'>一切众生见者闻，皆入圆通三昧海。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_522087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522087'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522087_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='6fc70d11869845d18c4eae678eab7468_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6fc70d11869845d18c4eae678eab7468");'><span id='6fc70d11869845d18c4eae678eab7468_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>，47岁</div><div id='6fc70d11869845d18c4eae678eab7468' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至洪州石门宝峰寺，宗杲出示李彭诗偈，跋其后。作品：《跋李商老诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋李商老诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213384")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213384'>予至石门，杲禅出商老<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1213384", 1213384, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>诗偈</span>巨轴，读之茫然，知此道人盖滑稽翰墨者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213384_comment'></div>又欲入社作云庵客，试手说禅，便吞云门、临济，如虎生三日，气已食牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213384_comment'></div>衲子哗曰：「甘露灭非错下注脚」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>跋李彭大书克文偈。作品：《跋李商老大书云庵偈二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋李商老大书云庵偈<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213401")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213401'>商老以大父事云庵，以伯父事天宁，则予盖其叔父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213401_comment'></div>仰山曰：「东院师叔若在，惠寂不到寂寞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213401_comment'></div>商老，寂子后身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213401_comment'></div>然甘露灭固未死，而商老与其弟未尝不啼饥，其大言以诟骂魔佛，高自许可，盖习气也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>次韵李彭送宗杲还石门诗偈。作品：《次韵李商老送杲上人还石门》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_521999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521999?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵李商老送杲上人还石门</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521999")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521999_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521999'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521999'>解弹无弦琴，急拍红牙碎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521999'>得生睹史天，冤债有头对。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521999'>须知泐潭禅，妙出言诠外。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521999'>猛焰炉中堕指冰，箭锋拄处君休昧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521999'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521999_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>宗杲刻大宁道宽禅师语录，为作序。作品：《洪州大宁宽和尚语录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_1213257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州大宁宽和尚语录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213257")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213257'>但识纲宗，本无实法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213257_comment'></div>又曰：若以实法与人，土亦难消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213257_comment'></div>岩头说法，指人甚要而语不烦，亦何尝钩章棘句，险设诈隐，务为玄妙哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213257_comment'></div>故其得友如雪峰，有子如罗山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213257_comment'></div>于生死之际，如洞视户庭，未尝留情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213257_comment'></div>近世丛林失其渊源，以有思惟心，争求实法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213257_comment'></div>唯其以是为宗也，故高则妄见胜妙之境，下则波为世谛流布，而纲宗丧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213257_comment'></div>余犹及见前辈，能言老黄龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213257_comment'></div>同时所游从，有若杨歧会、翠岩真、大宁宽，皆一时号明眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213257_comment'></div>而会与真所得法子照映江左，语言布寰宇，独宽公少见机缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213257_comment'></div>有石门宗杲上人，抗志慕古，俊辩不群，遍游诸方，得此录读之而喜曰：「虽无老成，尚有典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213257_comment'></div>此语老宿典刑也，其可使后学不闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213257_comment'></div>即唱衣钵，从余求序，其所以命工刻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213257_comment'></div>呜呼，杲之嗜好，可谓与世背驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213257_comment'></div>彼方尊事大名誉者，传授其语，而杲独取百年物故老僧之语，欲以誇学者，不亦迂乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213257_comment'></div>虽然，会有赏音者耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213257_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>读宗杲作《汾阳十智同真颂》，大为赞叹。<br /></div>
-----end

金溪

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>　上蓝长老至临川，居一日，同游疏山，饭于逆旅，上蓝画案勘验，以画圆相答之。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
抚州（临川）

class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520564'>临川富山水，井山最深幽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520564'>愧我今日来，自非清散游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520564'>试问井中龙，吾行汝知不。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520564'>高秋嗜酣卧，此计非良谋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520564'>晚稻已及穗，一雨足可收。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520564'>曷不跃而起，霈然泻南州。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520564_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为许中复作祈雨文。作品：《祈雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213645")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213645'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213645'>仍岁馑凶，民之艰食，亦以众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213645_comment'></div>而菜色喘沫者，犹并首以望有秋，如痿者之不忘起也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213645_comment'></div>春夏之交，风雨时若，方将奋跃，似有生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213645_comment'></div>而比日毒暑益炽，四无云阴，车鸦夜鸣，田龟昼坼，馑凶之忧，恐在朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213645_comment'></div>传曰：「亨牛而不咸，败所成矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213645_comment'></div>又曰：「行百里者半九十，为不克终」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213645_comment'></div>岂神之赐，昌其始而终夺之邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213645_comment'></div>吏以不职，上天降罚，吏躬任之，民其何辜，而神亦坐视其病哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213645_comment'></div>谨率丞佐，群趋并走，致恭于祠下，雀息以俟休答，神其哀怜之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213645_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>雨降，作谢雨文。作品：《谢雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213646?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213646")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213646_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213646'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213646'>比日以来，民以不时霣雨，望天焦劳，盖饥馑之馀，情易惊扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213646_comment'></div>如禽伤弦，念痛于曲木；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213646_comment'></div>如稚惊雷，失声于破釜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213646_comment'></div>是用率丞佐上渎神聪，香火未收，云气已布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213646_comment'></div>连日继夕，霖雨沾足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213646_comment'></div>呜呼，虽父兄之所哀怜，其必从何以迨此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213646_comment'></div>舞翠浪于山原，兆黄云于囷廪，岁登讼简，民乐吏閒，荷神之赐，孰大于此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213646_comment'></div>式奠昭告，岂不休哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213646_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作诗赠许邦基。作品：《赠许邦基》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠许邦基</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520472")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520472'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520472'>邦基今年方十九，美如濯濯春月<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作日）</span>柳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520472'>龙章凤姿绝世无，金马玉堂如故有。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520472'>酒阑爱捉玉麈尾，玉色正同批诰手。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520472'>高烧银烛拥新妆，看君落笔龙蛇走。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520472'>欲驱清景入秀句，万象奔趋不敢后。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520472'>人疑锦绣缠肺肠，不然笔端应有口。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520472'>谪仙风流今复见，况亦彷佛外尘垢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520472'>但恐功名缠缚人，未放青山挂窗牖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520472'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作词赠魏坛观女真。作品：《西江月》（十指嫩抽春笋）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《全宋词》页七一二。）</span><div id='poem_218226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_218226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/218226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西江月<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_218226")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_218226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_218226'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_218226'>十指嫩抽春笋，纤纤玉软红柔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_218226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_218226'>人前欲展强娇羞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_218226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_218226'>微露云衣霓袖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_218226_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_218226'>最好洞天春晚，黄庭卷罢清幽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_218226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_218226_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游陈公美贯时轩，作诗。作品：《陈公美贯时轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游承天寺，读旧碑，知为大法眼文益禅师开法之故基，观影堂壁间画像，为作赞。作品：《清凉大法眼禅师真赞序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清凉大法眼禅师真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522136")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522136_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522136'>余元符初，至临川承天寺。寺基宏壮，可集万指，而食堂萧然，残僧三四辈而已。因读旧碑，乃知为大法眼禅师开法之故基，影堂壁间，画像存焉。神宇静深，眉目渊然，而英特之气不没。岂荷负大法，提挈四生者，其表故如是耶？稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522136'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522136'>非风幡动，非风铃语。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522136'>见闻起灭，了无处所。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522136'>何以明之，俱寂静故。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522136'>此光明藏，平等显露。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522136'>由本无明，爱欲悭妒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522136'>如隔日疟，痛自遮护。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522136'>有能了者，即同本悟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522136'>索尔虚闲，随缘静住。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522136'>一切仍旧，自无染污。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522136'>为物作则，崄崖之句。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522136'>不可犯干，如大火聚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522136'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_522136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522136'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522136_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>道逢南岳僧法太，法太北游京师，作诗戏赠其行。作品：《道逢南岳太上人游京师戏赠其行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年6月</a>　六月，过临川，为宝应寺律师宝觉大士慕寂作塔光赞。作品：《临川宝应寺塔光赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_1213524' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213524' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213524?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临川宝应寺塔光赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213524")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213524_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213524'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213524'>维宝应寺律师宝觉大士，慕寂修大殿之崇成，妙天下之壮丽，有光夜现于塔，万众为之作礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213524_comment'></div>光虽不言而意传，盖旌功德之殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213524_comment'></div>客疑余之言，曰：「光不言则是光尝言，塔意传则是塔有意，宁有是理」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213524_comment'></div>余曰：「佛以光为舌，说《华严》之法门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213524_comment'></div>又以塔为耳，听《法华》之妙义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213524_comment'></div>所以明根尘之同源，而情与无情之不二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213524_comment'></div>嗟众生之颠倒，分色身之臭味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213524_comment'></div>苟返流而證真，遗六用而俱弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213524_comment'></div>非特塔光而已，一切诸法皆如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213524_comment'></div>故葵藿向日而回旋，磁石与针而冥契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213524_comment'></div>空桑能孕贤圣，山岳解呼万岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213524_comment'></div>夫岂不然哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213524_comment'></div>客曰：「塔庙之在震旦者不知其几，胡为皆无光见，而此塔独尔耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213524_comment'></div>于是甘露灭笑曰：「譬月之在天，影落众水，水浊则月隐，水澄则月现。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213524_comment'></div>月故常明，而以水之浊清，故见不见尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213524_comment'></div>吾以是知此邦民信心清净，所以致此奇瑞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213524_comment'></div>我作赞辞，非止见闻随喜，又以为翰墨之游戏也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213524_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

南陵

id='poem_content_520453'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520453'>沙村宿雨馀，炊烟淡寒色。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520453'>山墟蚕市休，野饭渔舟隔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520453'>忽逢柳际门，知有道人宅。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520453'>下有洄涡泉，甘凉冰齿颊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520453'>勿轻一脉微，去涨万顷泽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520453'>吾行无疾徐，住佳去亦得。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520453'>欲收有声画，绝景为摹刻。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
都昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c01b3b239f154827b5d9c46476ec2465_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c01b3b239f154827b5d9c46476ec2465");'><span id='c01b3b239f154827b5d9c46476ec2465_link' -----title
潜山（怀宁）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='93410540e1a0404c9d5e42cc6a25d7f8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("93410540e1a0404c9d5e42cc6a25d7f8");'><span id='93410540e1a0404c9d5e42cc6a25d7f8_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，29岁</div><div id='93410540e1a0404c9d5e42cc6a25d7f8' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游潜山天柱峰，遇大方禅师从誉。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>识老僧子琼于潜山司命峰下，子琼言黄龙慧南住山作止甚详。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>子琼以小字书《金刚经》，为之作赞。作品：《小字金刚经赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>小字金刚经赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522142")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522142_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522142'>琼上人以饱霜兔毫数茎束为笔，其锐如麦芒，临纸运肘，快等风雨。书金刚般若经于兼寸环轮中，望之团团如珠在薄雾间，即而视之，其行如人挽发作烟鬟。自非思力精微，何以臻此哉？为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522142'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522142'>昔有佛子根猛利，能观空性则是色。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522142'>欲显空色不思议，仰空书此金刚句。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522142'>至今风雨被原野，诸樵牧者集其下。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522142'>乃知肉眼不能见，譬如水中有盐味。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522142'>唯道人琼思精奇，能观色性即是空。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522142'>视此纤管大如椽，挥翰如行九轨道。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522142'>故于兼寸环中备，足广大言说身世。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522142'>人可见，不可读，譬如婴儿亲崖蜜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522142'>我于此经能證入，初中后善三法门。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522142'>忽然落笔如建瓴，不复现行生倒想。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522142'>由色空观入诸境，奏刀肯綮无全牛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522142'>尽持此法施群生，甚微细智愿同證。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_522142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522142'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。又见《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522142_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至舒州，为太平寺法演禅师杏壳观音作赞。作品：《杏壳观音菩萨赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522111?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杏壳观音菩萨赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522111")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522111_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522111'>龙舒演上人持鸭脚壳中银杏木所刻观音像，庄严妙丽，如无边春。随好光明，尘尘具足。稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522111'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522111'>对现色身，色身三昧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522111'>如无边春，透尘透海。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522111'>使诸众生，道与神会。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522111'>知寂灭法，不以身碍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522111'>随欲观者，非小非大。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522111'>此银杏壳，纤秾向背。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522111'>百福庄严，千花自在。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522111'>稽首大慈，如大地载。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522111'>如皎空月，无所覆盖。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522111'>舍精进幢，如坚刚铠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522111'>太虚殒消，我愿不退。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522111'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_522111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522111'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div "poem_title_1213575")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213575_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213575'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213575'>香象本狂，依宝坊而驯伏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213575_comment'></div>怒虎方斗，遇禅者之解纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213575_comment'></div>顾惟齿发之所惭，曾彼性灵之不若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213575_comment'></div>闻斯妙义，皈命慈严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213575_comment'></div>恭惟某人如月在天，非厌污而匿照；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213575_comment'></div>如雷振物，岂择地而发声？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213575_comment'></div>闹传法驭之肯来，故已舆情之喜惬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213575_comment'></div>云山在目，何妨掉臂即行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213575_comment'></div>龙象拥随，正好逢场作戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213575_comment'></div>副我有求之恳，愿开无碍之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213575_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213575_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在舒州日，登惟清之门。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为舒州怡然居士陈显仁梦蝶斋作铭。作品：《梦蝶斋铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213493' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213493' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213493?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦蝶斋铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213493")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213493_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213493'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213493'>龙舒陈显仁和粹而喜客，慈祥而乐善，宗族朋友皆称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213493_comment'></div>余以怡然居士之斋为梦蝶，而为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213493'>浩荡之春，万物发饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213493_comment'></div>淮山花开，丽其风日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213493_comment'></div>蛱蝶何为，栩栩自适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213493_comment'></div>朱门青鞍，群色棋布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213493_comment'></div>富贵鼎来，宾客鸳鹭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213493_comment'></div>居士欠申，蘧然而寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213493_comment'></div>岁时献寿，举杯怡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213493_comment'></div>堕帻一醉，其乐也天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213493_comment'></div>纷纷万绪，成我日用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213493_comment'></div>睨而视之，开睫之梦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213493_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
杭州（钱塘）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4db77ae26f864f5b9ced99d5a26bf470_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4db77ae26f864f5b9ced99d5a26bf470");'><span id='4db77ae26f864f5b9ced99d5a26bf470_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，29岁</div><div id='4db77ae26f864f5b9ced99d5a26bf470' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　游东吴，至杭州，寓西湖净慈寺，读《宗镜录》，题其后。作品：《题宗镜录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题法惠写宗镜录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213271")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213271'>龙胜菩萨曰：「众生心性，犹如利刀，唯用割泥，泥无所成，刀日就损」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213271_comment'></div>理体常妙，众生自粗能善用心，即合本妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213271_comment'></div>余观世之人，疲精神于纸墨者，多从事于无用之学，皆以刀割泥者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213271_comment'></div>明州翠岩僧法惠独施力写永明所撰《宗镜录》一百二十卷，与方广禅寺大法宝藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213271_comment'></div>呜呼，惠师可谓善用其心者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213271_comment'></div>夫能使天台、贤首、唯识三宗之旨趣，大乘深经六十卷妙义，西天此土三百家之法句，杂传要说契心之至理，镜为一心，心之所缘，笔之所及，常在现前，余以谓此道人即入摩诃衍遍知称性之海，即具普贤一真光明微尘数，不思议行门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213271_comment'></div>予幸得托名卷末，愿慈氏大士从知足天来，主龙华时，同闻此录，知今日自作随缘，其心非谬也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　读赞宁《宋僧史》，怪其不为云门文偃禅师立传。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在净慈寺，以颂发明风穴延昭意，寄呈真净克文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　阅汾阳善昭禅师语录，至《三玄颂》，频有所证，于是胸次洗然，辨博无碍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　作诗偈颂汾阳善昭禅师十智同真。作品：《汾阳十智同真二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《汾阳十智同真二首》（其二）<span 四库本、武林本作斥</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520508_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在杭州，游灵隐寺，观飞来峰，临冷泉，作诗。作品：《飞来峰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520574' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520574'>云开飞来峰，岿然眉睫上。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520574'>气势欲翔舞，秀色无千嶂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520574'>万物皆我造，何从有来往。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520574'>大千等毫末，古今归俯仰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520574'>心知目所见，皆即自幻妄。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520574'>如窥镜中容，容岂他人像。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在杭州，拜契嵩禅师塔，作诗。作品：《谒嵩禅师塔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520637' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_5_520637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520637'>后世师韩辈，穴攘<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作长）</span>犹可怜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520637'>哗然皇祐间<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作初）</span>，飞蚊闹喧阗。<div
