id='poem_sentence_2_521112'>已嗟心折垂垂老，忍看花飞片片春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521112'>满眼闲愁图不得，江南无奈到心频。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521112'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　游西湖北山，作诗。作品：《游西湖北山二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span>《游西湖北山二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游西湖北山二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521822")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521822'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521822'>幽草青青绕竹扉，雨馀人在杏园西。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521822'>无端黄鸟惊春梦，正向绿萝深处啼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521822'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521822_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521823?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521823'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521823'>春园南北笋过墙，墙下离离草更香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521823_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521823'>啼鸟野花无问处，苍山牢落下残阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521823_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521823'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　跋法眼文益禅师所笺注石头希迁《参同契》，以为尚未知石头之论。作品：《题清凉注参同契》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题清凉注参同契</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213279")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213279'>丛林故宿相传，谓石头《参同契》明佛心宗，后辈鲜有深识其旨者，独清凉大法眼禅师注文发明居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213279_comment'></div>故南唐后主读至「玄黄不真，黑白何咎」处，爽然开悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213279_comment'></div>余谓后主所悟，盖悟法不真而已，非因其语以了石头明暗本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213279_comment'></div>如安禅师破句读《楞严》而悟，句读且尔，矧所谓义味乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213279_comment'></div>然安于心法无疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213279_comment'></div>予尝深考此书，凡四十馀句，而以明暗论者半之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213279_comment'></div>篇首便曰：「灵源明皎洁，枝派暗流注」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213279_comment'></div>乃知明暗之意根于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213279_comment'></div>又曰：「暗合上中言，明明清浊句」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213279_comment'></div>调达开发之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213279_comment'></div>至指其宗而示其趣，则曰：「本末须归宗，尊卑用其语」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213279_comment'></div>故其下广叙明暗之句，奕奕缀联不已者，非决色法虚诳，乃是明其语耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213279_comment'></div>洞山悟本得此意，故有五位偏正之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213279_comment'></div>至于临济之句中玄，云门之随波逐浪，无异味也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213279_comment'></div>而晚辈乘其言，便想像明暗之中，有相藏露之地，不亦谬乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213279_comment'></div>大率圣人之言不明于后世，注疏之家汩之，非独此文也，余不可以不辩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　思睿见之，使亟言其理，因西湖夜语，归记之。作品：《记西湖夜语》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213468' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213468' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213468?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记西湖夜语</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213468")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213468_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213468'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213468'>余旧阅洞上语句，知悟本禅师一宗，盖神明石头之道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213468_comment'></div>石头为物之旨，见于《参同契》，而法眼所笺盛传世间读其词与余昔所闻多异同，因跋于后以自志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213468_comment'></div>而吾友睿廓然见之，谓余曰：「公以法眼之玄悟，尚未为知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213468_comment'></div>石头之论，骇人视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213468_comment'></div>业已出其语，曷不亟谈其故，而微出疑论于其后，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213468_comment'></div>余曰：「古之圣人有所示，其言未尝不略也，非痛爱其法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213468_comment'></div>以谓不略则学者不思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213468_comment'></div>不思而得者，闻异论则惑，非居之安之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213468_comment'></div>余非敢上配作者，然立言之体要，自不得不尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213468_comment'></div>虽前设未能别白其意者，当试广之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213468_comment'></div>夫正传至六世而大振，天下谓之宗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213468_comment'></div>宗门所趣，谓之玄旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213468_comment'></div>学此道者，谓之玄学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213468_comment'></div>当时之人，根性猛利，臻其妙者，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213468_comment'></div>虽石头大恐后世不能完闻其说，故见于语言，此《参同契》之所由作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213468_comment'></div>所谓宗旨者，以三句标准之，乃体中玄、意中玄、句中玄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213468_comment'></div>自「灵源明皎洁，句意相缀延」至于「然于一一法，依根密分布」处，乃体中玄出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213468_comment'></div>又自「本末须归宗，开达错综」，至「乘言须会宗，勿自立规矩」处，乃句中玄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213468_comment'></div>如「宗门所论，以明暗相对，如步之前后以理事，如函盖箭锋之相应，则非无功」至「玄之旨，故反破曰万物」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213468_comment'></div>自「有功，物之有功，则可名求之乎」，故终其言曰「乘言须会宗」，以此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213468_comment'></div>言有上中，句有清浊，暗则合其言，明则亦不违其句，此其所以门门之境华，参错回互，而寂然依位而住也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213468_comment'></div>自是而论，盖石头以三玄旨趣示，于此所明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213468_comment'></div>法眼所谈，但体中玄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213468_comment'></div>故追逐其句辞而即解之，而不复顾首尾立言之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213468_comment'></div>昔荐福古禅师论三玄旨趣，号为明眼，亦曰体中玄，甚合法眼宗枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213468_comment'></div>以其言印余之心，合者甚多，但不欲亟言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213468_comment'></div>今廓然之言为骇人视听，且使亟言之，其知我爱我之深，亦□□惟令不复详论之，则闻者安得不以余为誇也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213468_comment'></div>古之人其身可以折辱困穷之，而不能屈其言者，以有理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213468_comment'></div>余之所谈者，求理之所在，初不谓有法眼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213468_comment'></div>法眼而之理之所在，非余之所能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213468_comment'></div>人之观听，虽骇亦非世所恤也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213468_comment'></div>廓然笑曰：「安得起法眼与子辩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213468_comment'></div>吾不能晓子矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213468_comment'></div>余归述其语，以连前说，以示同学云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1213468_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
常州（武进）

id='poem_sentence_2_520807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520807'>惠崇逸想巧图画，定应爱汝梦漏清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/521046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汪履道家观古书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_521046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　苏钧、汪迪试墨，为作诗。作品：《苏子平汪履道试李潘墨》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520479'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520479'>南阳国师古禅伯，玉殿以棋聊戏客。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520479'>客虽四海棋绝伦，我解两奁俱用黑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520479'>侍臣大惊帝微笑，客亦袖手吁莫测。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520479'>黑中优劣自能分，正似苏汪今试墨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520479'>老潘气韵凌阿宽，二李不平有矜色。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520479'>坐令好事旁舍郎，瞠视无言受巾帼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520479'>我非南阳不能辨，以手扪头空叹息。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520479'>径当相携诣瞽叟，夜半一辨须明白。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年5月</a>　五月，与张大亨兄弟复会于常州。作品：《与嘉父兄弟别于临川复会毗陵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520594'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520594'>君家兄弟万人杰，何止才容誇两绝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520594'>忆昨江南山尽头，西津渡口曾相别。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520594'>君时惨然缞制中，行将扶护归吴越。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520594'>我亦买舟还故山，社燕秋鸿那忍说。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520594'>客中不觉舟壑走，迩来飘忽经岁月。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520594'>毗陵那料又相逢，喜君美髯冰玉颊。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520594'>竹轩堆髻话临川，清论无穷如锯屑。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520594'>意消已觉在秋乡，坐令五月失炎热。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520594'>欲看騕袅付王良，相鼎烦君为调燮。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520594'>平生无求任所见，往往撩人面红冽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520594'>恃君犹作故人看，此诗聊当名纸谒。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年5月</a>　读张氏兄弟诗，题其后。作品：《跋张七诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋张七诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213387")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1213387_comment'></div>泉不可呼也，而忠之至，则呼泉亦洌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213387_comment'></div>虎不可使令也，而有德者役以橐经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213387_comment'></div>乙不可教诲也，而有义者致其同室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213387_comment'></div>予观两张之诗，引物连类，折之以至理，而秀杰之气不没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213387_comment'></div>读之使人一唱三叹，岂笔端有口之徒欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213393'>东坡以建中靖国元年七月二十七日殁于常州，时钱济明侍其傍，白曰：「端明平生学佛，此日如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213393_comment'></div>坡曰：「此语亦不受」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213393_comment'></div>遂化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213393_comment'></div>李豸为文以吊之曰：「道大难名，才高众忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213393_comment'></div>皇天后土，知平生忠义之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213393_comment'></div>名山大川，还千载英灵之气」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213393_comment'></div>士大夫称其词该而美，今录以示常道人，亦可以举似山中诸道友也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213393_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

丹阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='861c67daacdf4c6fb90f4bfe67e2999b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("861c67daacdf4c6fb90f4bfe67e2999b");'><span id='861c67daacdf4c6fb90f4bfe67e2999b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，30岁</div><div id='861c67daacdf4c6fb90f4bfe67e2999b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　离常州，舟至丹阳，僧温关西来附舟，与之共谈苏轼、黄庭坚。<br /></div>

id='poem_sentence_0_521658'>履稀瘦处却知肥，间物须防狱治之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521658_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521658'>虎穴魔宫同止住，寒灰枯木是男儿。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年7月7日</a>　七月七日，王朴、李孝遵来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　记梁高僧宝志事，作《钟山道林真觉禅师传》，中有十二面观音之说。作品：《钟山道林真觉大师传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213540' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213540' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213540?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钟山道林真觉大师传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213540")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213540_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213540'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213540'>梁大菩萨僧宝公，以宋元嘉中生于金陵之东阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213540_comment'></div>民朱氏之妇，上巳日闻儿啼鹰巢中，梯树得之，举以为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213540_comment'></div>面方，莹彻如镜，手足皆鸟爪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213540_comment'></div>七岁去依钟山大沙门僧俭，为童子，俭名之曰宝志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213540_comment'></div>长而落发，专修禅观，坐必越旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213540_comment'></div>久之，忽无定居，多往来𤾂山剑岭之下，发而徒跣，著锦袍，饮啖，同于凡俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213540_comment'></div>恒以镜铜剪刀镊属挂杖，负之而趋，经聚落，儿童哗逐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213540_comment'></div>或徵索酒殽，或累日不食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213540_comment'></div>尝从食鲙者求鲙，食者与而心笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213540_comment'></div>即起，吐水中，皆成鱼，相传始惊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213540_comment'></div>时时题诗，初不可晓，后皆有验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213540_comment'></div>建元间，异迹甚著，丞相高嵩为武帝言之，以礼自皖山迎至都，舍于陈征虏之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213540_comment'></div>辄自釐其面，分披之，出十二首观世音，慈严妙丽，倾都聚观，欲争尊事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213540_comment'></div>武帝忿其惑众，收付建康狱，旦夕咸见游行市里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213540_comment'></div>既而检校，犹在狱中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213540_comment'></div>其夜又语吏：「门外有两舆，金钵盛饭，汝可取之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213540_comment'></div>果文惠太子竟陵王送供至建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213540_comment'></div>令吕文显以事启帝，帝迎至禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213540_comment'></div>俄有旨，屏除后宫，为家人宴，公例常与众出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213540_comment'></div>已而犹见行道于景阳山，比丘七辈从其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213540_comment'></div>帝怒，遣使至阍，吏曰：「公久出，在省中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213540_comment'></div>吏就视之，身如涂墨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213540_comment'></div>武帝闻之大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213540_comment'></div>陈显达镇江州，大司马段齐之从行，往辞公，公无他语，但引纸画鸦，画毕授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213540_comment'></div>曰：「缓急可用此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213540_comment'></div>显达叛，齐之遁去，显达大怒，遣骑追之，将及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213540_comment'></div>齐之窘甚，见鸦喧暮林，即匿其下，鸦翔集自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213540_comment'></div>骑既失其踪，但见鸦林，必非人所寄，遂去，齐之方悟公意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213540_comment'></div>鄱阳忠烈王饭公于私第，顾左右，觅荆枝，有折以献者，则以安门上而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213540_comment'></div>俄有旨，以王领荆州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213540_comment'></div>卫尉胡谐卧病，以书哀诉，幸以屈临，庶几疾有瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213540_comment'></div>公题其书尾曰：「明屈」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213540_comment'></div>翌日果卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213540_comment'></div>僧法平欲以衣献公，不知所寓，遣使遍求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213540_comment'></div>龙光、罽宾两寺皆曰：「夜宿此，黎明去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213540_comment'></div>又尝所厚善厉侯伯家，侯伯曰：「公夜行道于此，今睡未兴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213540_comment'></div>使人视之，笑去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213540_comment'></div>公在华林园，忽重著三布帽，亦不知自何得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213540_comment'></div>俄而武帝崩，文惠太子、豫章文献王相继崩，齐亦于此年□矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213540_comment'></div>灵味寺沙门宝亮，欲以衲帔遗之，未及有言，公忽来牵帔而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213540_comment'></div>蔡仲熊尝问仕何所至，公不自答，直解杖头左索绳掷与之，莫之解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213540_comment'></div>仲熊果至尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213540_comment'></div>永明中，住东宫后堂，平旦门中出入，末年忽云：「门上血污衣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213540_comment'></div>褰裳走过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213540_comment'></div>至郁林见害，果以犊车载尸自此门舍故阉人徐龙驹宅，而帝头血流于门限焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213540_comment'></div>建武中，明帝害诸王，高士江泌忧念南康王子琳以访公，问其祸福，公覆香炉示之曰：「都尽无馀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213540_comment'></div>后皆如其语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213540_comment'></div>徐陵儿时，其父携诣公，公拊之曰：「天上石麒麟也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213540_comment'></div>陵果名誉显于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213540_comment'></div>又文惠太子迎释僧惠至京师，惠过公，公拊其背曰：「亦龙子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213540_comment'></div>慧终以辩才显闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213540_comment'></div>其徒屯骑桑偃，有不臣之心，公见之，戟手诟曰：「若乃欲反耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213540_comment'></div>奈斫头穴胸何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213540_comment'></div>偃汗下不敢仰视，遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213540_comment'></div>梁武帝受禅，尤深敬事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213540_comment'></div>前朝以超放动辄禁锢，至是下诏释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1213540_comment'></div>尝问曰：「弟子烦惑未除，何以治之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1213540_comment'></div>答曰：「十二」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1213540_comment'></div>又问：「十二之旨在何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1213540_comment'></div>答曰：「书字时节刻漏中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1213540_comment'></div>又问：「何时得净心修习」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1213540_comment'></div>答曰：「安乐禁之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1213540_comment'></div>又问：「年祚远近」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1213540_comment'></div>答曰：「元嘉元嘉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1213540_comment'></div>帝欣然以为享祚倍宋文之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1213540_comment'></div>天监五年冬旱，雩祭备至，而雨不降，公谓左右曰：「吾病不差，就官乞活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1213540_comment'></div>傥不奏白，官应得祸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1213540_comment'></div>即上启，愿于华光殿讲《圣鬘经》请雨，帝即命沙门讲之，终夕雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1213540_comment'></div>公又以刀横水盂良久，又雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1213540_comment'></div>帝初繁刑，公假以神力，令见高祖，受极苦于地下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1213540_comment'></div>自是省刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1213540_comment'></div>诏画工张僧繇写公像藏禁中，僧繇下笔辄不自定，叩头哀恳，公笑曰：「毗婆尸佛早留心，直至而今不得妙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1213540_comment'></div>帝偶与公临流纵望，有物溯流而上，公举杖引之，随杖而至，盖紫栴檀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1213540_comment'></div>诏供奉官俞绍雕公像，顷刻而肖，神情如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1213540_comment'></div>帝大悦，命置内庭，为子孙世世福田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1213540_comment'></div>法云寺云光师讲经，天为之雨华，帝意其證圣，夜于含光殿焚疏，命公、云光、僧俭、傅大士齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1213540_comment'></div>翌日独云光不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1213540_comment'></div>公尝听法云讲《妙法莲华经》，至「假使黑风问『风果有否』，答曰『世故有第一义谛，故无』」，公曰：「若体是假有，此亦可解耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1213540_comment'></div>法云默然，公则自为主客，辩难锋生，一坐尽倾，然莫有解者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1213540_comment'></div>帝尝从容问国祚有留难否，公但指喉示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1213540_comment'></div>侯景之乱，尤追绎公言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1213540_comment'></div>有僧浮杯来谒帝，帝方与客棋，吟曰：「杀之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1213540_comment'></div>棋罢命僧，侍卫奏曰：「适蒙旨，已杀之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1213540_comment'></div>帝嗟悼不已，以问公，公曰：「陛下前身，蚯蚓也，僧尝为薙草者，误杀之，今偿夙债耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1213540_comment'></div>天监十三年，公移华林园，金像置所居房，帝闻之曰：「师将去我耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1213540_comment'></div>是岁十二月，忽命奏丝竹彻昼夜，至六日，终于兴皇寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1213540_comment'></div>临亡，然一烛以付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1213540_comment'></div>后阁舍人吴庆以闻，帝叹曰：「大师不复留矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1213540_comment'></div>烛者，将以后事嘱我乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1213540_comment'></div>帝昔与公登钟山之定林，指前冈独龙阜曰：「此为阴宅则永」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1213540_comment'></div>其后帝曰：「谁当得之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1213540_comment'></div>公曰：「先行者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1213540_comment'></div>至是念公以此言，以金二十万易其地以葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1213540_comment'></div>皇女永康公主薨，尽施其妆奁建浮图五层于其上，置以无价宝珠，仍建开善精舍，敕陆倕制铭于冢内，王筠勒碑于寺门，处处传其遗像焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1213540_comment'></div>毕工，驾御寺，公忽现于云间，万众欢呼，声振山谷，敕谥广济大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1213540_comment'></div>公显迹之著数可五六十许，及终亦不老，莫测其年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1213540_comment'></div>有徐犍道者，年九十三，自言是公外舅弟，小公四岁，计其时九十七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1213540_comment'></div>李氏有国日，谥曰妙觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1213540_comment'></div>公作《四柱记》、《五公符》、《十二时偈》、《璧记》、《心镜图》数千言传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1213540_comment'></div>本朝太平兴国七年，舒州民柯萼者遇异僧于岁山下，以杖指松根，令萼钁之，得瑞石，一篆文，皆谶圣宋国祚无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1213540_comment'></div>萼进其石于京师，太宗皇帝遣中使置斋于钟山，诏自今不可以名斥，以显尊异，赐号道林真觉大师。</div><div id='poem_sentence_100_1213540_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　王朴问宝志谶记，为题其后。作品：《题宝公谶记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题宝公谶记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213287")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213287'>王敦素问予，宝公《谶语》，视千百年如一日，此何道而至之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213287_comment'></div>予曰：「清明在躬，志气如神，有物将至，其兆必先者，孔子之语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213287_comment'></div>凡夫所见，莫非倒想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213287_comment'></div>倒想若灭，洞见三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213287_comment'></div>宝公岂有倒想者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213287_comment'></div>敦素拊手曰：「美哉之论也，然灭倒想，宁有道乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213287_comment'></div>予曰：「当不忘正观」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213287_comment'></div>曰：「是眼则不能自见，其己体自体尚不见，云何见馀物？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213287_comment'></div>若树是见，复云何树？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213287_comment'></div>若树非见，云何见树？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213287_comment'></div>现在若有过去未来，亦应是有过去未来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213287_comment'></div>若无现在，亦应是无故杂华」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213287_comment'></div>曰：「法眼不思议，此见非颠倒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213287_comment'></div>敦素瞠然良久，曰：「此语令人溟涬然弟之哉」！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　作《宝公画像赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝公画像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522124")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522124'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522124'>水月道场严净久，空华人世落残馀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522124'>骨埋龙阜谁名宝，却在鹰巢不姓朱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522124'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_522124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522124'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522124_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　为李孝遵母作挽辞。作品：《李道夫母挽辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李道夫母挽辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521374")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521374'>缙绅家法想清规，平昔高风此一时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521374'>居约云山夫有道，客陪房杜子无疑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521374'>九原泪湿老莱袂，千字碑传幼妇词。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521374'>他日欲寻贤母墓，北山松雨路人悲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521374'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　游北山，读叶集之同高茂华、王朴、李孝遵会于周氏书房诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵叶集之同秀实敦素道夫游北山会周氏书房》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵叶集之同秀实敦素道夫游北山会周氏书房</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520586")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520586'>王郎本豪放，富贵缠缚之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520586'>颇复厌丝竹，来听松风悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520586'>叶侯须似棘，谈兵辄纷披。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520586'>恃此文武胆，英气吐北西。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520586'>正直威鬼神，动欲焚淫祠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520586'>道夫忧国心，造次常念兹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520586'>事功未入手，愤酒谁共酾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520586'>正恐追老范，一吐胸中奇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520586'>秀实气刚大，归宿未易期。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520586'>新诗弄清婉，霜晓临湘湄。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520586'>钟山冠世境，登赏乃所宜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520586'>林间见隐者，面有无求姿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520586'>不必问贤否，但读诸公诗。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520518'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520518'>我有忘年生，气韵亦秀拔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520518'>岂惟有诗癖，亦醉凌波袜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　与王朴同游法云寺，看壁上苏轼所画枯木。作品：《法云同王敦素看东坡枯木》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520595?labeling=true' target='_blank'>法云同王敦素看东坡枯木</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_520595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520595'>君看壁间耐冻枝，烟雨楂芽出谈笑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520595'>想当却立盘礴时，醉魂但觉千岩晓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520595_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520595'>恨翁树间不画我，拥衲扶筇送飞鸟。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年6月</a>　六月，于钟山观僧元净移写云门文偃禅师画像，为作赞。作品：《云门匡真禅师画像赞二首并序》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span>《云门匡真禅师画像赞二首并序》（其二）<span id='poem_sentence_0_522138'>见流滔天，公峙如山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522138'>壁立万仞，捍其狂澜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522138'>可望而却，不可览攀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522138'>我不得济，大地是浪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522138'>忽然现前，清机历掌。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522138'>阿罗汉有，三毒捺落。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年7月7日</a>　七月七日，卧病钟山，王朴报李孝遵已至北山，使作诗促之。作品：《七夕卧病敦素报云道夫已至北山迟迟未入城其意耽酒用其说作诗促之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>七夕卧病敦素报云道夫已至北山迟迟未入城其意耽酒用其说作诗促之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年7月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520577")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520577'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520577'>去年钟山今夕晴，二豪兴发来扣扃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520577'>开轩咄嗟办法供，一味万壑松风声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520577'>颓然意适相枕卧，便觉语笑纷先争。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520577'>我方小立倚风槛，君忽蹶起孤髻撑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520577'>今年此乐堕渺莽，维摩卧疾毗耶城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520577'>乌衣郎亦憎俗子，闭户卧看星河横。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520577'>美髯和易坐畏暑，扁舟散发歌月明。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520577'>遥知君定宿浮玉，诗狂欲跨横海鲸。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520577'>传闻已至蒋陵坞，留滞未归宜一抨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520577'>连床夜语久不理，砚席忍垢珠网生。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520577'>乃尔弥日复信宿，不为万顷无浊清。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520577'>推挤不去有深意，恋此百瓮郎官清。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520577'>瓮边被缚真有道，酒后耳热良高情。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520577'>不嫌折简苦招唤，要看款段兀醉酲。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520577'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_520577_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　作诗次韵李孝遵题寄傲轩。作品：《次韵寄傲轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵寄傲轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521206")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521206'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521206'>道夫飞鸟倦知还，一钵安巢又故山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521206'>无累自然增逸兴，有名终恐废长闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521206'>背时生计风烟上，随意园林指顾间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521206'>应笑市朝争夺者，暗惊清镜失朱颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521206'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　读吴则礼送王铚诗，因作诗寄之。作品：《吴子副送性之诗有老子只堪持蟹螯之句因寄之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520520?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴子副送性之诗有老子只堪持蟹螯之句因寄之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520520")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520520'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520520'>秋来残暑犹顽赖，推挤不去吁可怪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520520'>哦君妙语齿颊清，冰壶照人吐精彩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520520'>绝知此公风味高，想见尊前持蟹螯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520520'>说禅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>不用朱藤杖，看月却披宫锦袍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520520'>大藩衣冠蔚城市，君所过从天下士。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520520'>忘怀一笑饯年华，醉里千篇是生计。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520520'>相知何必盖须倾，此语荒唐却甚真。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520520'>人生怀抱要磊落，他年相逢是故人。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520520'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_520520'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_520520_0'>⑴ 原作蝉，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520520_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　闻芙蓉道楷禅师事，作《定照禅师序》，以示识道楷者。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213462' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213462' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213462?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定照禅师序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213462")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213462_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213462'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213462'>达磨之道六传而至曹溪，自曹溪派而为江西、石头二宗，既昭天下，学者翕然从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213462_comment'></div>由二宗以列为五家，于今唯临济、云门为特盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213462_comment'></div>洞山悟本禅师机锋竖亚而出，年代寝远，惜其无传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213462_comment'></div>元丰中有大长老道楷者，赫然有声于京洛间，问其师承，乃投子青华严嫡嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213462_comment'></div>青公为大阳真子，盖洞山七世玄孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213462_comment'></div>大观元年，京师大法云寺虚席，有司以公有道行，请于朝，愿令继嗣住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213462_comment'></div>奉圣旨，可其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213462_comment'></div>未几，开封大尹李孝寿表公谈以禅学卓冠丛林，宜有以褒显之，即赐紫方袍，号定照禅师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213462_comment'></div>左珰持诏至法云，楷谢恩已，乃为表辞曰：「伏蒙圣慈特差彰善阁祗候谭稹赐臣定照禅师号及紫衣牒二道，臣戴睿恩，已即时焚香升座，仰祝圣寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213462_comment'></div>伏念臣行业迂疏，道力绵薄，尝发誓愿，不受利名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213462_comment'></div>坚持此志，积有岁年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213462_comment'></div>庶几如此，僧道后来使人专意佛法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213462_comment'></div>今虽蒙异恩，若遂忝冒，则自违素愿，何以教人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213462_comment'></div>岂能仰称陛下所以命臣住持之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213462_comment'></div>所有前件恩牒，不敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213462_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣愚悃，非敢饰辞，特赐允俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213462_comment'></div>臣没齿行道，上报天恩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213462_comment'></div>上阅之，以付李孝寿，躬往谕朝廷旌善之意，而楷执拗不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213462_comment'></div>开封府尹具以其事闻，上大怒，收楷送大理寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213462_comment'></div>吏知楷忠诚，而适批逆鳞，有怜之之意，问曰：「长老枯悴，有病乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213462_comment'></div>楷曰：「无之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213462_comment'></div>吏曰：「有疾则免刑配」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213462_comment'></div>楷曰：「平时有疾，今实无，岂敢藉疾，侥倖圣朝，欲脱罪谴耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213462_comment'></div>吏叹息久之，竟就刑，缝掖其衣，编管缁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213462_comment'></div>都城道俗，观者如市，皆为之流涕，而楷神和气平，安步而去如平日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213462_comment'></div>至缁州，僦屋以居，而四方衲子争奔随之，接武于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213462_comment'></div>嗟乎，禅师粹然一出，支洞山已颓之纲，道显著于时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213462_comment'></div>而圣朝方以道治天下，海内肃清，旌表有德，天时人事，适相偶如此，而楷独罹此祸，可疑也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213462_comment'></div>岂斯道疑独间关至此，卒不能以振兴之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213462_comment'></div>抑亦夙殃成就缘会如是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213462_comment'></div>闻之者莫不长喟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213462_comment'></div>余因疏其事以授尝识禅师者，使学者知道固如是，而视欲胜天灭命者，可以发一笑也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1213462_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　作诗寄道楷。作品：《寄楷禅师》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄楷禅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521067")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521067'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521067'>龙蛇头角混埃尘，临死方知老净因。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521067'>三度傲辞天子敕，一生甘作净名身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521067'>虎皮羊质成何事，牛马襟裾亦谩陈。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521067'>须信屈原千载后，空门犹有独醒人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521067'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521067_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　在江宁，为华藏寺弥勒佛像作赞。作品：《华藏寺慈氏菩萨赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华藏寺慈氏菩萨赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522085")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522085_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522085'>金陵华藏禅院旃檀慈氏菩萨像，相好之工妙天下，而神异灵感未易以一二数，居景德寺之后殿。舒王尝梦像求易居甚切，既觉而忘之，已而复梦理前事。公梦中固留之，像则泣下，起而视之，真有泪零。因大惊异，即迎至华藏之大殿。俄景德寺火，一夕而烬。呜呼，三灾弥沦，大千灭坏，像岂得久留人间世？而痛自亸免，为此儿戏狭劣相耶？是盖护法诸天，以像之灵瑞佑之则然，非菩萨意也，其不可以不辨。稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522085'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522085'>何人寄逸想，游戏浮沤间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522085'>以如幻之力，刻此旃檀像。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522085'>坐令众妙好，秀发千花中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522085'>天冠束绀发，铢衣络华鬘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522085'>种种妙庄严，成此功德聚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522085'>当时亿万种，感极则悲号。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522085'>楼观出谈笑，秘护百宝攒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522085'>如登睹史天，如集龙华会。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522085'>嗟哉像教末，羽嘉成百鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522085'>棘生薝卜林，龙神为悲恸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522085'>王臣寔外护，异梦非意思。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522085'>愿推明月轮，出此蓬勃烟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522085'>愿回紫金山，安置清凉处。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522085'>至今百福相，俨然临人天。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522085'>神力吁莫测，拜起涕汍澜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522085'>我谛观十方，实无心外境。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522085'>自然离依地，及与遍计执。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522085'>即今目所见，非有亦非无。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522085'>如像现镜中，非镜亦非像。<div id='poem_sentence_18_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_522085'>愿入此三昧，识心自然明。<div id='poem_sentence_19_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_522085'>于十方国土，而作大佛事。<div id='poem_sentence_20_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_522085'>稽首大慈尊，證我如是说。<div id='poem_sentence_21_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_522085'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_522085_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522085'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522085_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　秋，转运使吴幵请住清凉寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　将升清凉之坐，李之仪、李孝遵来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　李之仪将自江宁往当涂，作诗寄之。作品：《李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首》（其四）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首》（其五）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_521491' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李端叔自金陵如姑溪寄之五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521491")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521491_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521491'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521491'>东坡坐中醉客，让君翰墨风流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521491'>为作羊昙折意，莫年泪眼山丘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521491'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521491_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521492?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521492'>老去田园可乐，秋来禾黍登场。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521492'>相见鸡豚社饮，諠哗暧热溪堂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521492'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521492_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521493' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521493' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521493?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521493_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521493'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521493'>数叠夕阳秋巘，雨馀眼力衰时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521493'>可是招要归思，故应酝造新诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521493'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521493_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521494?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521494_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521494'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521494'>月下一声风笛，尊前万顷云涛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521494_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521494'>玉堂他年图画，卧看今日渔舠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521494_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521494'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521494_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521495' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521495' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521495?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521495_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521495'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521495'>举世誇君笔语，雾豹渠知一斑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521495_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521495'>莫问人间非是，且看醉里江山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521495_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521495'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521495_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　与李之仪邂逅于崇因寺，遂出寄之仪诗示之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　主持清凉寺，上堂，示众举《楞严经》如来语阿难，言及鼻观之义，又举《大智度论》，言及合本妙之义。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　僧处晓出进英禅师所撰智本禅师行状，乞塔铭于吴幵，代为作之。作品：《夹山第十五代本禅师塔铭序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213544' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213544' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213544?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夹山第十五代本禅师塔铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213544")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213544_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213544'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213544'>师讳智本，筠高安郭氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213544_comment'></div>生五岁大饥，有贵客过门，见其气骨，留万钱与其父母，欲携去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213544_comment'></div>祖母刘适从旁舍归，顾见怒曰：「儿生之夕，吾梦天雨华吾家，吉兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213544_comment'></div>宁饥死，不以与人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213544_comment'></div>推钱还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213544_comment'></div>既长大，游报慈寺，闻僧说出家因缘，愿为门弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213544_comment'></div>刘氏喜曰：「此吾志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213544_comment'></div>年十九试经为僧，明年受具足戒，即往游方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213544_comment'></div>时云居舜老夫、开先暹道者，法席冠于庐山，师往来二老之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213544_comment'></div>久之，闻法华端禅师者深为法窟，气压丛林，盖临济九世之孙也，而杨岐会公之的嗣也，师往谒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213544_comment'></div>遂留十年，名声远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213544_comment'></div>舒州太守李公端臣，请说法于龙门，辞去之日，端领众送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213544_comment'></div>师马逸而先，顾端曰：「当仁不让」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213544_comment'></div>端笑谓大众曰：「国清才子贵，家富小儿骄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213544_comment'></div>其父子法喜游戏多类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213544_comment'></div>未几，屏院事，乃还庐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213544_comment'></div>时曾丞相由翰林学士出领长沙，以礼迎居南岳之法轮，学者争宗向之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213544_comment'></div>迁居南台，自南台迁居道林，自道林迁居云盖，自云盖迁居石霜，凡十三年，道大显著，劝请皆一时名公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213544_comment'></div>师既老矣，而湖北运使陈公举必欲以夹山致师，师亦不辞，欣然曳杖而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213544_comment'></div>人登问之，答曰：「系情去留，岂道人事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213544_comment'></div>湖南、湖北，真一梦境尔，何优劣避就之耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213544_comment'></div>以大观元年上元夕，沐浴更衣，端坐终于夹山之正寝，阅世七十有三，僧腊五十有二，阇维齿骨，数珠不坏，葬于乐普庵之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213544_comment'></div>师性真率不事事，胆气盖于流辈，作为偈语，肆笔而成，亦一时禅林之秀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213544_comment'></div>余未识师，闻清凉洪禅师言其为人甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213544_comment'></div>后二年，门人处晓出开福英禅师所撰行状来乞铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1213544'>定慧圆明，力无所畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213544_comment'></div>显于湘南，遂起临济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213544_comment'></div>学者如云，异人辈出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213544_comment'></div>唯会与南，绝群超逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213544_comment'></div>号末法中，二甘露门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213544_comment'></div>唯夹山本，实会的孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213544_comment'></div>七移法席，籍其声华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213544_comment'></div>迅机雄辩，能世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213544_comment'></div>放怀清真，亦足风味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213544_comment'></div>睥睨死生，盖其一戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213544_comment'></div>白塔林间，矫如飞鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213544_comment'></div>不涉春缘，碧岩花落。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1213544_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　入清凉寺未阅月，为狂僧诬，以为伪度牒，且旁连前狂僧法和等议讪事，入江宁制狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　初入制狱，作诗，又作偈。作品：《金陵初入制院》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span>《初入制院》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_521156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金陵初入制院</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521156")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521156'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521156'>依然收付建康狱，拴索珑璁惊市人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521156'>寄语小儿休嬲相，未妨大士戏分身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521156'>懒于梦境分能所，枉把情缘比客尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521156'>笑视死生无可拣，目前刀锯若为神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521156_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521156'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521156_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_522080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初入制院</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522080")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522080'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522080'>无所住生心，佛语祖师意。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522080'>何人赏此音，空弦闲妙指。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522080'>清歌饯馀年，坚卧答万语。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522080'>了知空花间，无地容生死。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522080'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　春，病卧狱中，正月二十五日，德逢禅师以书来，为惟清作《昭默禅师序》，以授德逢使者，往谒邹浩求文，刻石于山中。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213460?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭默禅师序<span class='inlineComment2'>（大观四年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213460")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213460'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213460'>李北海以字画之工，而世多法其书，北海笑曰：「学我者拙，似我者死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213460_comment'></div>当时之人不知其言有味，余滋爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213460_comment'></div>盖学者所贵，贵其知意而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213460_comment'></div>至于踪迹绳墨，非善学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213460_comment'></div>岂特世间之法为然，出世间法亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213460_comment'></div>黄檗运公师事百丈大智禅师，而迅机大用，每凌压之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213460_comment'></div>百丈固尝叹曰：「见与师齐，减师半德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213460_comment'></div>见过于师，方堪传授」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213460_comment'></div>玄沙备师从雪峰真觉禅师最久，备遂为谈根门无功幻生，幻生法门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213460_comment'></div>其论皆揭佛祖之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213460_comment'></div>雪峰亦尝抚其背曰：「岂意衰暮，闻此妙法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213460_comment'></div>汝再来人也，吾所不及」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213460_comment'></div>然雪峰、百丈之道益尊，而黄檗、玄沙得为的嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213460_comment'></div>初未尝印脱其语言，顺味其机因，以欺流俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213460_comment'></div>此道寂寥久矣，乃今于黄龙清禅师见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213460_comment'></div>公为晦堂老人侍者，而名声已闹闻丛林，其超情独脱之论，无师自然之智，当机密用，人不敢触其锋，虽晦堂，唯知加敬而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213460_comment'></div>双井徐禧德占、黄庭坚鲁直，此两翁世所谓人中龙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213460_comment'></div>往来山中，与公语，未尝不屈折咨嗟，以为不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213460_comment'></div>以故天下士大夫悦慕愿见，想望风采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213460_comment'></div>公名惟清，自号灵源叟，世为洪州武宁陈氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213460_comment'></div>童子时诵书日数千言，伊吾上口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213460_comment'></div>有异比丘过书肆见之，引其手熟视，大惊，劝其父母使出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213460_comment'></div>公即忻然往依高居某为师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213460_comment'></div>几何为僧，受具足戒，即起游方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213460_comment'></div>初谒法安禅师，欲倾心受法，法安曰：「子他日洗光佛日，照耀末运，苦海法船也，一壑岂能畜汝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213460_comment'></div>行矣，无自滞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213460_comment'></div>公因遍历诸方，晚归晦堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213460_comment'></div>久之，初开法于舒州之太平，衲子雷动云合而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213460_comment'></div>未尝谨规矩，而人人自肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213460_comment'></div>江淮丛林，号称第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213460_comment'></div>洪州转运使王公桓迎公归黄龙，欲以继晦堂老人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213460_comment'></div>未几晦堂化去，公亦移病，乃居昭默堂，宴坐一室，颓然人莫能亲疏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213460_comment'></div>然见之者，皆各得其欢心，至于授法，钳椎鍜炼，则学者如烟菟视水车然，莫知罅隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213460_comment'></div>其提唱议论，初不许学者传录，有得其片言只句者，甚于获夜光照乘然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213460_comment'></div>余于公为法门昆弟，气宇英特，慎许可，独首肯余可以荷担大法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213460_comment'></div>顷于山中日有异闻，尝曰：「今之学者，多不脱生死者，正坐偷心不死耳，然非学者过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213460_comment'></div>如汉高帝诏韩信以杀之，信虽死，而其心果死乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213460_comment'></div>今之宗师为人多类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213460_comment'></div>古之道人于生死之际，游戏自在者已，死却偷心耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213460_comment'></div>如侯景兵至建邺，武帝御大殿见之，神色不变，软语抚慰，而侯景汗下，不敢仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213460_comment'></div>退谓人曰：『萧公天威逼人，吾不可以再见也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213460_comment'></div>侯景固未尝死，而其心已灭绝无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213460_comment'></div>古之宗师为人多类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213460_comment'></div>吾观今诸方说法者，钩章棘句，烂然骇人，正如赵昌画花，写生逼真，世传为宝，然终非真花耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213460_comment'></div>其应机引物以晓人皆类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213460_comment'></div>大观三年秋，余以弘法婴难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213460_comment'></div>越明年春，病卧狱中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213460_comment'></div>公之的子德逢上人以书抵余曰：「昭默病，遂有书付禅师，使人不能候而去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213460_comment'></div>余矍然而起，坐念公平生奇德美行，恐即死后，世莫得以闻，故为疏其略以授逢，使往谒道乡居士，求文刻石于山中，以传信后世云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213460_comment'></div>大观四年正月二十五日，石门某序。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1213460'></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1213460_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　于制狱病中作诗八首，托德逢使者以寄山中故旧。作品：《病中寄山中故旧八首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《病中寄山中故旧八首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《病中寄山中故旧八首》（其六）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《病中寄山中故旧八首》（其七）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《病中寄山中故旧八首》（其八）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_521396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521396?labeling=true' id='poem_content_521396'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521396'>室空无侍者，唯置一匡床。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521396_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521397?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_521399_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521400?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521400'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521400'>心光本无碍，悭贪空盖缠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521400_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521401?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521401'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521401'>灵源坐痴兀，万事付天真。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521401_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521402?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521402'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521402'>临济十世孙，泐潭克家嗣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521402'>一唱主中宾，不容留意地。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521402'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521402_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521403?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521403'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521403'>本色出家儿，机轮盘珠走。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521403'>须学老华亭，用处无渗漏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521403'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　病中，希祖携泉侍者来探狱慰问，甚喜，作诗。作品：《僧超然携泉侍者来建康狱慰余甚喜作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>超然携泉侍者来建康狱慰余甚喜作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520608")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520608'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520608'>堂堂福德相，凛凛龙泉威。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520608'>天神护戒足，山鸟曾巢衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520608'>弥天并舆载，清凉七帝师。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520608'>其徒今日荣，渠心终笑之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520608'>一钵游人间，不言行四时。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520608'>胡为肯至此，惊定心愈疑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520608'>乃知明月净，曾不憎污池。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520608'>异哉月旁星，随逐相因依。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520608'>群囚手加额，雀息瞻梵仪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520608'>吾亦失沉痾，一笑欢解颐。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520608'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520608_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年3月6日</a>　二月十九日夜，卧缧绁之中，梦十二面观音像，三月初六，德逢以书来讯，言及二月十九遣僧诣涟水画观音像事，为作《涟水观音画像赞》作品：《涟水观音画像赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>涟水观音画像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年3月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522083")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522083_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522083'>大观四年春二月戊子之夕，病比丘德洪累然卧缧绁之中，梦至一处，庭宇阒然。有僧导入室中，举烛视壁间，有钟山宝公菩萨之像。意欣然，欲得之，而像辄自堕手中。复展视之，则化为十二面观音慈严之相。心大惊异，遂觉，已三鼓矣。三月甲辰，南州德逢上人以书来讯，且曰：吾以衣钵遣僧诣涟水画观音像至，其庄严妙天下之手。德洪追忆前事，问其遣僧之日，乃其得梦之夕。因自感叹，菩萨以大悲等慈哀怜照临，如是昭著，其恩何德以报之？惟以笔舌言词，喻海之深，誇日之明耳。谨稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522083'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522083'>稽首净圣甘露门，无量胜身遍沙界。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522083'>应诸众生心所求，譬如春色花万卉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522083'>西方肃杀忧愁地，故住宝陀落伽山。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522083'>此方教体在音闻，故称名者得解脱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522083'>一切众生杀心盛，痴暗不见不发心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522083'>故现鹰巢蚌蛤中，亦作画师画其像。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522083'>菩萨岂有种种心，皆其悲愿力如是。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522083'>何人毫端寄逸想，幻出百福庄严身。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522083'>屹然欲动千光集，譬如将回紫金山。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522083'>瞭然欲瞬众生好，譬如欲坼青莲花。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522083'>蛮奴水王来献诚，想见细雨天花落。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522083'>众生五浊热恼中，色欲爱见所熏炙。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522083'>忽然睹此宝月相，一切毛孔皆清净。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522083'>成此不思议功德，皆因上人心所献。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522083'>愿我早熏知见香，愿我常披慈忍服。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522083'>愿魔障山速崩裂，愿大智慧常现前。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522083'>心精遗闻證圆通，自然静极光通达。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522083'>我当定如观世音，一切众生愿如我。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522083'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_522083_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522083'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《佛祖纲目》，《林间后录》。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522083_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　念故山经行处，作八诗寄山中道友。作品：《余在制勘院昼卧念故山经行处用空山无人水流花开为韵寄山中道友八首》（其一）<span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　欲往南岳，由筠州之袁州，逢石门徽上人将北行，作诗送之。作品：《秀江逢石门徽上人将北行乞食而予方南游衡岳作此送之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520540' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520540' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520540?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秀江逢石门徽上人将北行乞食而予方南游衡岳作此送之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520540")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520540_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520540'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520540'>筠袁唇齿邦，一水连清碧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520540'>朝行筠溪边，暮见秀江色。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520540'>忽闻儿童音，乃知身是客。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520540'>独归江上寺，杖笠倚空壁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520540'>犀颅会四海，香火自朝夕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520540'>相逢作熟视，面数心莫识。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520540'>但记石门时，笑颊清光溢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520540'>惊定喜失声，卒语成小立。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520540'>是时夜气清，隙月金蛇掷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520540'>念君当北行，钵饭从谁乞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520540'>我虽能少留，秋燕社已逼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520540'>一欢偶然耳，分首成陈迹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520540'>他年何处逢，话此空叹惜。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520540_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520540'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_520540_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='082e576552d842ac9f51c1c2acbe046d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("082e576552d842ac9f51c1c2acbe046d");'><span id='082e576552d842ac9f51c1c2acbe046d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript:
