gray;'>▪</span>在袁州，见崇胜寺后有一竹秀出，呼为竹尊者，为作诗。作品：《崇胜寺后竹千余竿独一根秀出呼为竹尊者》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崇胜寺后<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补下有有字）</span>竹千馀竿独一根秀出呼为竹尊者<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521013")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521013_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_521013_1'>① 以上五字钞补作人呼为竹尊者因赋诗</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521013'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521013'>高节长身老不枯，平生风骨自清癯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521013'>爱君脩竹为尊者，却笑寒松作大夫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521013'>不见同行<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作未见同参）</span>木上座，空馀听法石为徒<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作于菟）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521013'>戏将秋色供<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作分）</span>斋钵，抹月披云<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作风）</span>得饱无。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521013'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521013_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>崇胜寺观从密禅师草书，跋其后。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游王表臣忘机堂，作诗次蔡德符韵。作品：《王表臣忘机堂次蔡德符韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王表臣忘机堂次蔡德符韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520525")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520525'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520525'>风埃九陌吹冠巾，冻蚁旋磨无富贫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520525'>忧患著人骨肉隔，奔势熏天吴楚亲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520525'>何妨社栎神其拙，壑舟不暇供岁月。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520525'>句法不医霜鬓秋，迩来览镜茎茎雪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520525'>蔡侯大家言不诬，笔端五色图空虚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520525'>酒阑耳热题诗处，豪放超逸先锋车。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520525'>古来百局坐奇智，并头暗中争射利。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520525'>对人含笑真含沙，幻影浮屠同一世。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520525'>世味甘于涴蜜刀，舐之割利那可逃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520525'>痴儿坐守忘啼哭，乃欲避就空勤劳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520525'>君看秋风秀江叟，枯木形骸外尘垢。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520525'>屋下沙鸥交友同，耳边胜利蚊雷吼。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520525'>水光绿静山青葱，意行回反遭路穷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520525'>莞然一笑答山谷，忽见幽林小径通。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520525'>我诗赠君无杰句，碧湾明月不可取。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520525'>游人欲上忘机堂，请哦蔡侯醉时语。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520525'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_520525_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='afcd9886e81c4e739e7e5b2470e327ce_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("afcd9886e81c4e739e7e5b2470e327ce");'><span id='afcd9886e81c4e739e7e5b2470e327ce_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='afcd9886e81c4e739e7e5b2470e327ce' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过袁州，于知州曾孝序之室见灵源惟清门榜，题其后。作品：《题灵源门榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题灵源门榜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213303")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213303'>灵源初不愿出世，堤岸甚牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213303_comment'></div>张无尽奉使江西，屡致之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213303_comment'></div>久之，翻然改曰：「禅林下衰，弘法者多假我偷安，不急撑拄之，其崩颓跬可须也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213303_comment'></div>于是开法于淮上之太平，予时东游登其门，丛林之整齐，宗风之大振，疑百丈无恙时不减也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213303_comment'></div>后十五年，见此榜于逢原之室，读之凛然，如见其道骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213303_comment'></div>山谷为擘窠大书，其有激云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213303_comment'></div>呜呼，使天下为法施者，皆遵灵源之语以住持，则尚何忧乎祖道不振也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213303_comment'></div>《传》曰：「人能弘道，非道弘人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213303_comment'></div>灵源以之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>跋曾孝序蓄黄庭坚书《士大夫食时五观》作品：《跋山谷五观》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋山谷五观</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213365")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213365'>舒王在钟山，多与禅者游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213365_comment'></div>王以宗乘关捷问之，莫不瞠若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213365_comment'></div>若以肤浅问之，莫不听莹，于是大讶其寡闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213365_comment'></div>尝问一僧五观法，使诵之，往往不能句者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213365_comment'></div>呜呼，非施法之过，学者亦罪焉，以其不能从师授也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213365_comment'></div>山谷冠冕，道德伟俊，耸于缙绅，宜其倚花叫饮，高追晋、宋风流之游方，其穷约乃知跏趺而食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213365_comment'></div>又作观法，非直己好之，且欲移于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213365_comment'></div>其信道为法之勤，可谓透脱情境者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213365_comment'></div>逢原蓄此，疾欲以示学者，庶几其有能动心者耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>袁州拜见许几，时几贬永州团练副使，袁州安置。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='78d0fd899dda47b29c5b44865b57f42c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("78d0fd899dda47b29c5b44865b57f42c");'><span id='78d0fd899dda47b29c5b44865b57f42c_link' id='poem_sentence_1_521313'>解分钵饭如摩诘，欲散天花欠阿蛮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521313'>属稿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>新诗追鲍谢，抗行醉墨似杨颜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521313'>遥知穿市听归驭，及我昏鸦落照间。<div /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521314'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521314'>兄弟令人眼倍明，六经心醉几时醒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521314'>韵高山岳横南极，机妙鲲鹏化北溟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521314'>丽句重逢天下白，俊才今见海东青。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521314'>数篇秀色凌千嶂，来慰摧颓病掩扃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521314_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521314'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521314_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为王裕之作砚铭。作品：《王裕之求砚铭为作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213514?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王裕之求砚铭为作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213514")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213514_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213514'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213514'>吾闻大梁之东郭有砚台焉，而自然成坳渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213514_comment'></div>挽九江之水以为滴，聚桐柏之色以为烟，借温江卓笔之峰以蘸其尖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213514_comment'></div>展青天以为纸，书吾饯君之诗，情与旷野以相连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213514_comment'></div>吾辈留滞南楚，思上国，而未得以还辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213514_comment'></div>虽然，会当与君握手州桥，踏月以话湘川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213514_comment'></div>是时君必折蟾宫之桂，我亦腰金纡紫，揖让于人主之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213514_comment'></div>此言盖理有固然，非狂且颠也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213514_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f7f336d3fd134b45a917c4e545924371_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f7f336d3fd134b45a917c4e545924371");'><span id='f7f336d3fd134b45a917c4e545924371_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a id='poem_sentence_3_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520551'>柳丝不胜绾，笋庭春脉动。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520551'>春色已如许，乐事非一种。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520551'>平生所怀人，忽此笑语共。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520551'>云轩为谁停，危坐山衲拥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520551'>眼高空丛林，志大骨森耸。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520551'>开怀见赤心，亹亹饱谈诵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520551'>坐客<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_520551", 520551, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>鹤脑侧</span>，我亦快心孔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520551'>袖中出新诗，笔力发豪纵。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520551'>风日丽醇酽，黄泥初扬瓮。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520551_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　希祖作春日湘上诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵超然春日湘上二首》（其一）<span id='poem_title_521824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521824'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521824'>暮年身世极南边，病眼愁看北客船。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521824'>忆著金明池上路，宝津晴瓦隔霏烟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521824_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　三月三日，忆往昔与真净克文此日山行，作诗纪之。作品：《上巳日有怀昔从云庵老人此日山行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520469?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳日有怀昔从云庵老人此日山行</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520469_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520469'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520469'>今年上巳日，久客望江南。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520469_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520469'>双林接脩水，石路入烟岚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520469_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520546")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520546'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520546'>范韩醉倒眠荒丘，撼之不应民始愁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520546'>天生公副天下望，雷霆声名塞九州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520546'>立朝严冷传铁面，坐令鼠辈惊鱼头。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520546'>上前论事伤太直，逆鳞投笏来南陬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520546'>长沙共渡一水碧，中流笑语惊沙鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520546'>湘西古寺夜对榻，高论自破千人浮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520546'>华藏法界在掌握，遇缘即宗甘自由。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520546'>世惊海隅在万里，我视阎浮同一沤。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520546'>坐中忽举毗卢印，印海印毛皆遍周。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520546'>大哉此法本无碍，从公一游容我不。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520546'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520546_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在道林寺，有僧言悟六祖慧能风幡因缘事，戏讥之。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为僧慎修作须菩提真赞。作品：《空生真赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>空生真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522089")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522089_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522089'>漳南僧慎修游吴中，得此画于败垣破壁间，拂除埃翳，神观静深，如维摩大士得心解脱时。出以示余，为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522089'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522089'>以空寂身，无所倚依。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522089'>而捉杖藜，以灵知心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522089'>不在散摄，而玩贝叶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522089'>不舍声色，而證真空。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522089'>与我日用，能所心同。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522089'>于一切处，寂入法海。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522089'>如风行空，无所妨碍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522089'>但离二执，圆成普会。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522089'>当慎以修，入此三昧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522089'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_522089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522089'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。又见《林间后录》，《吴都法乘》卷一一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522089_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>慎修留于道林寺一月，既还西湖，作序送之。作品：《送修彦通还西湖序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213249' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213249?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送脩彦通还西湖序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213249")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213249'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213249'>东吴山川清胜，甲于天下，而湖山深秀，正如美丈夫之眉目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213249_comment'></div>大通禅师淡然无营于林石之间，而声光照曜于四海之外，如晓天之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213249_comment'></div>从而游者，睿郎廓然焉，其高秀之韵，烂然相映，如长庚之星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213249_comment'></div>吾友彦通既以父事大通，而其德友廓然，又如无心之云，往来于湖山之上，从容二老之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213249_comment'></div>舒徐容曳，油然自得，其直谅多闻之实，道德光华之言，与夫幽寻清讨之趣，固已厌饫平生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213249_comment'></div>而又周游淮海，浮飘大江，经行于炉峰之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213249_comment'></div>久之，南穷衡岳，辽绕数千里，吊古圣之陈迹，览林壑之形胜，求诸宗故老而扣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213249_comment'></div>其异家入道之智，差别之旨，无所不闻，于是浩然有归欤之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213249_comment'></div>为余留于湘江道林者一月，既旦行，余执其手而语之曰：昔雪峰道经祝融，人劝其一登绝顶，掉头掣肘曰：「青山长在，知识难逢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213249_comment'></div>且山林虽佳，于道无所益也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213249_comment'></div>马祖谓紫玉曰：「山水之秀可居，益汝道气」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213249_comment'></div>是若有益于道者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213249_comment'></div>及观兴化之论，乃曰：「吾虽嗣临济，而发药之友者，大觉是已，山林未暇论也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213249_comment'></div>而师且后之，是胜侣之德，其不可不重，如是其甚也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213249_comment'></div>呜呼，是三者，古之人有得于一，则固已誇谈于丛林，而传诵于后世，矧吾彦通兼取而有之，可谓盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213249_comment'></div>独余奇穷，侵寻老境，得一而志二，相视无所逃其羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213249_comment'></div>虽然，于其私则若不足，而能喜彦通之乐有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213249_comment'></div>诸公咸赋诗，而余叙此为赆，彦通其见怜乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>拜长沙东明寺石观音像，作赞付住持智海禅师。作品：《潭州东明石观音赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州东明石观音赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522088")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522088_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522088'>长沙马氏时，一夕东城雉堞间光属天，达旦不灭。州人按其处，有石卧古井旁，半为土所吞，其色青莹。相与发之，即大悲观音之像。挹水灌沐，妙容慈相忽然显露，如莲花之出泥。大众欢呼爱慕之极，又如婴儿之见母。于是建寺号东明，初以律兴。馀百年，民恃以为福田。元祐初长老迁公以禅易之，未几弃去。今海禅师自沩山来，宴坐于室，不蓄粒米，倚此像以饭四方来者，崇堂邃宇又加丽焉。余闻菩萨之悲愿于浊恶世，一切众生之用处，化身为鱼米，为肉山，以足其欲心。今夜半光耀，乃其一戏，遂与无穷之众，园林花观饮食卧具充足耶？谨拜手稽首，对像说偈曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522088'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522088'>大悲智光本无碍，于一切处常发现。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522088'>岂特夜半瓦砾间，始复烂然上霄汉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522088'>此邦众生共胜业，时节成熟故如是。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522088'>譬如日月行虚空，水无秽洁皆照临。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522088'>灰沙若沉波自寒，圜影于中迥殊特。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522088'>稽首妙智光世音，是娑婆界真教体。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522088'>应机而现为说法，信心起处说法竟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522088'>我今见境得成就，亦同音闻获圆通。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522088'>六根迟速虽不齐，要是一精明所现。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522088'>我知暗相不能昏，与彼心精遗闻处。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522088'>众尘隔越妄分别，常真实中无是事。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522088'>死生之变尚不改，岂有根尘乃能蔽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522088'>愿令持此妙法门，于此刹土为佛事。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522088'>一切声色热恼中，与众生作清凉处。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522088'>皈命救世大悲者，愿赐威光加被我。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522088'>令我获无作妙力，令我亦名无所畏。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522088'>令我具无碍辩才，令我入一切种智。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522088'>我及一切诸有情，皆如观音得自在。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522088'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_522088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522088'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522088_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春末，游长沙鹿苑寺虎岑堂，见景岑禅师画像，作赞。作品：《长沙岑大虫真赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: id='poem_title_521121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521121'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521121'>睡起春衫取次披，髻云随从倚栏时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521121'>生憎柳底莺声巧，不分花前日影移。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521121'>伊昔笑来忧易老，而今思去恨难追。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521121'>林梢悬挂团团日，无语东风玉箸垂。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520685'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520685'>公才如天骥，超绝气逸群。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520685'>低摧簿书中，一笑置勿论。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520685'>我如剪翎鹤，俛啄穷朝昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520685'>生涯无窖子，乞食尝扣门。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520685'>但为口腹累，乖隔如参辰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520685'>此夕复何夕，共宿湘山云。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520685'>境清藏胜气，情高发幽欣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520685'>天风吹笑语，乞与人间闻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520685'>念公翰墨场，少年策奇勋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520685'>世味如嚼蜡，喜著磨衲裙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520685'>裴公师黄檗，圆泽友李憕。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520685'>因法偶相逢，则以法为亲。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520685'>安知我与子，夙昔非弟昆。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520685'>吾闻三生石，曾歌旧精魂。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520685'>他年葛洪陂，相寻定烦君。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520685'>先当理故事，过山寻老仁。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520550'>平生贮书腹，中有文武胆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520550'>材如骆宾王，其直亦不减。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520550'>上书论国事，忌讳失料拣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　会黄庭坚于长沙碧湘门外舟中，其舟乃知潭州李闳所借官舟。<br /><a href="javascript: showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题昭默墨迹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213304")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213304'>余还自海南，馆于道林，道人朱公破雨自云盖来，坐未定，出昭默书一轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213304_comment'></div>予久去箴诲，初见必辄辍熟，视之不自觉意消也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213304_comment'></div>秦少游至钱塘，见功臣山政禅师书，叹以为非积学所致，其纯美之韵，如水成文，出于自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213304_comment'></div>昭默暮年臻妙，其以是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213304_comment'></div>颜平原有大节于唐，而以书名，识者惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213304_comment'></div>予以谓斯人德高，而名往就之耳，借使此老书不工，尤当宝秘，况工乎，愈可宝也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213304_comment'></div>然与其门人书，语多以见及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213304_comment'></div>余衰退流落，又自恨生所知遇，不能不短气耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>于卿上人处得见苏轼画应身弥勒像，作赞。作品：《东坡画应身弥勒赞序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游岳麓寺，见智海禅师。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='1bfba95536b244a0830387c2afbfedcb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1bfba95536b244a0830387c2afbfedcb");'><span id='1bfba95536b244a0830387c2afbfedcb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1119')">1118-1119年</a>，48-49岁</div><div id='1bfba95536b244a0830387c2afbfedcb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213496")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213496_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213496'>南楚山水，湘西为甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213496_comment'></div>湘西法席，保宁为甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213496_comment'></div>余既幸馆于其中，无别职事，一堂窅然，终日卧听楼钟而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213496_comment'></div>则又以今寂为甲，乃名其堂曰要默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213496_comment'></div>为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213496'>此无比法，如难信珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213496_comment'></div>虽曰得之，非实非虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213496_comment'></div>默而未说，岂有说乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213496_comment'></div>虏中吾趾，矢贯其膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213496_comment'></div>即烹汝父，遗我杯羹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213496_comment'></div>直中有曲，令尔当行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213496_comment'></div>是法平等，无有高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213496_comment'></div>定当作佛，普告来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213496_comment'></div>而常不轻，乃遭诟骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213496_comment'></div>其珠圆彻，内外俱定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213496_comment'></div>自牖见子，呼之听莹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213496_comment'></div>顾其粪除，则肯受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213496_comment'></div>自是而观，则有纲宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213496_comment'></div>以火触火，鍜凡圣铜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213496_comment'></div>纵使自返，窒使求通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213496_comment'></div>面壁而坐，理锄而扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213496_comment'></div>要使求者，鼻直眼横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213496_comment'></div>是为大智，破灭无明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213496_comment'></div>提婆祖以无所嗜好，祈神求信，自贬其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213496_comment'></div>校此两士，则为颠倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213496_comment'></div>湘西之麓，古屋数椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213496_comment'></div>卧德楼钟，饯吾华颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213496_comment'></div>谓终不说，夫岂真然？</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1213496_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年12月30日</a>　除夕在谷山，次韵苏轼《馈岁》、《别岁》、《守岁》三诗，寄彭以功。作品：《馈岁次东坡韵寄思禹兄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span>《守岁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span>《别岁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520643?labeling=true' target='_blank'>馈岁次东坡韵寄思禹兄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年12月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520643")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520643_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520643'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520643'>我来客湘江，独泛无人佐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520643'>封疆接南越，都会列百货。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520643'>方嗟岁除矣，仍喜此月大。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520643'>思归姑置之，且枕曲肱卧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520643'>馈问亦未能，起看灯照座。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520643'>念贫米无舂，笑富粉转磨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520643'>二者分劣优，等是一年过。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520643'>唯有东坡翁，作诗今续和。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520643'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520643_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520644?labeling=true' target='_blank'>守岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年12月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520644")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520644'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520644'>除夕自不寐，守岁世事杯<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作驱睡蛇）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520644'>念此岁月往，嗟哉难蔽遮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520644'>旧岁幸无疾，新岁知如何。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520644'>此夕且相守，拊掌一笑哗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520644'>静闻闹市中，夜鼓不停挝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520644'>弟兄醉酩酊，冠巾堕攲斜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520644'>我居岩壑中，不觉日蹉跎。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520644'>和诗无好句，其敢对人誇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520644'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520644_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年12月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520645")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520645'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520645'>新岁压已至，旧岁去不迟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520645'>我尚留不住，石火那能追。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520645'>不知岁所在，凫雏喧水涯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520645'>父老相邀迓，年年知此时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520645'>梅花只落尽，又见春水肥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520645'>我本无欣喜，何尝有戚悲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520645'>想见君饮酣，一举时一辞。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520645'>春容尚能老，此身那不衰。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520645'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520645_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年1月</a>　在谷山，立志撰述，乃集云门、曹洞、沩仰、临济、法眼五宗纲宗偈、付法偈等为《五宗纲要旨决》，正月，书成。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　作《五宗纲要旨诀序》，以书授学者。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五宗纲要旨诀序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213255")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213255'>传曰：「人能自重，然后可与言学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213255_comment'></div>余以谓自重者，必其天资才全而识远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213255_comment'></div>何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213255_comment'></div>张子房三世相韩，韩为秦所灭时，年二十许，弟死不葬，袖铁椎击始皇，误中副车，走匿下邳，乃能跪履于父老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213255_comment'></div>及佐高帝定天下，汉业已成，秕糠王侯，掉头不顾，思与赤松子游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213255_comment'></div>韩信微时，自藏于怯，淮阴少年易之，使出跨下，一市大笑，而色不怍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213255_comment'></div>及为高帝大将，一军尽惊，而气不矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213255_comment'></div>谈笑而破赵，名震天下，得亡虏而师事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213255_comment'></div>子房勇击始皇而谦辞封爵，韩信智出跨下而明师亡虏，非材全者，能自重如是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213255_comment'></div>邴原诣安丘孙崧学，崧以书相分，原得书不读，曰：「夫学者以智高者通，书何为哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213255_comment'></div>藏书于家，游学四方，学成以书还崧，解不传书之意，崧服其敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213255_comment'></div>徐旷学于太学时，沈重讲授门弟子常千人，旷所质问，数日辞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213255_comment'></div>或问其故，曰：「先生所讲，纸上语耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213255_comment'></div>若奥境，彼所未见，尚何观」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213255_comment'></div>重知之，惮其能根矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213255_comment'></div>智识粹美，不在糟粕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213255_comment'></div>文远巧妙，非止准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213255_comment'></div>非识远者，能自重如是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213255_comment'></div>吾故曰必因其天资也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213255_comment'></div>夫刻志功业，倾心名节者，世间之学耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213255_comment'></div>若离三界、出五有者，非梦幻功业，戏剧名节可尽，而天资无张、韩、邴、徐之英，余窃忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213255_comment'></div>诸佛三昧，谓之甚微细智，粗浮心识，其能至哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213255_comment'></div>菩萨行海，谓之旋陀罗尼门，鄙陋志操，其能入哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213255_comment'></div>学者之才，如蓬芒之微；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213255_comment'></div>而所授之道，如万钧之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213255_comment'></div>虽至愚，知其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213255_comment'></div>然犹纷然不知愧，可笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213255_comment'></div>为弟子者，心非其师而貌敬之，为师者实鄙弟子而喜授以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213255_comment'></div>上以数相羁縻，下以谄相欺诳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213255_comment'></div>慢侮法道，甚于儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213255_comment'></div>呜呼，昔清辨菩萨以芥子击修罗窟，而隐候龙华道成，乃问未决之事，谓今弥勒未具遍知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213255_comment'></div>辨之求师，何其难也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213255_comment'></div>达摩达恨师子尊者不令嗣祖，渡溪见女子浣，露其足，念曰：「此胫乃尔白皙耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213255_comment'></div>师子忽至曰：「今日之心可嗣祖乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213255_comment'></div>师子之求弟子，何其审也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213255_comment'></div>大法寖远，名存实亡，其势则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213255_comment'></div>盖尝中夜起喟，为之涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213255_comment'></div>余少游方，所历丛林几半天下，而师友之间通疏粹美者尚多见，至精深宗教者亦已少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213255_comment'></div>又三十年，还自海外，罪废之馀，丛林顿衰，所谓通疏粹美者又少，况精深宗教者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213255_comment'></div>百丈法度，更革略尽，辄波及纲宗之语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213255_comment'></div>如云门纲宗偈曰：「康氏圆形滞不明，魔深虚丧击寒冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213255_comment'></div>凤翥已飞霄汉去，晋锋八博拟何凭」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213255_comment'></div>云门非苟然作也，而昧者无地寄其意识，辄易以循其私，曰「晋锋八法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213255_comment'></div>审如易者之意，则「康氏圆形」、「魔深虚丧」，又何义哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213255_comment'></div>洞山渡水见影，偈曰：「切忌从他觅，迢迢与我疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213255_comment'></div>吾今独自往，处处得逢渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213255_comment'></div>渠今正是我，我今不是渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213255_comment'></div>应须与么会，方始契如如」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213255_comment'></div>其言「契如如」，但一文殊，无二文殊，故曰「渠今正是我，我今不是渠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213255_comment'></div>旨甚明白，而昧者易之曰：「渠今不是我，我今不是渠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213255_comment'></div>遂令血脉断绝，岂曹洞旨趣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213255_comment'></div>仰山临终付法，偈曰：「一二二三子，平目复仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213255_comment'></div>两口无一舌，即是吾宗旨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213255_comment'></div>「两口无一舌」，沩山之牛，一身两号之意，而昧者易之曰：「两口一无舌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213255_comment'></div>审如易者之言，则是共功时功，尚何论哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213255_comment'></div>临济付法偈曰：「沿流不止问如何，真照无边说似他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1213255_comment'></div>离相离名人不禀，吹毛用了急须磨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1213255_comment'></div>吹毛，剑也，用即磨之，意不欲犯锋耳，而昧者易之「急还磨」，旨趣安在哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1213255_comment'></div>而以之不疑，可谓陋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1213255_comment'></div>独法眼未遭更易，行恐不免耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1213255_comment'></div>昔阿难闻诵佛，偈曰：「若人生百岁，不识水潦鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1213255_comment'></div>未若生一日，而得决了知」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1213255_comment'></div>谓曰：「吾从佛所闻异于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1213255_comment'></div>应曰『不善诸佛机』，非水潦鹤也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1213255_comment'></div>诵者告其师，师应曰：「阿难耄矣，所记错谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1213255_comment'></div>夫诸佛机久而尚为水潦鹤，岂『渠今正是我，我今不是渠』，不作梁武喧争之语；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1213255_comment'></div>『晋锋八博』，不作右军草书乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1213255_comment'></div>因编《五宗机缘》，以授学者，使传诵焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1213255_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bebec4f1f4224870af9244c3165dc978_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bebec4f1f4224870af9244c3165dc978");'><span id='bebec4f1f4224870af9244c3165dc978_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>，49岁</div><div id='bebec4f1f4224870af9244c3165dc978' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年3月7日</a>　返长沙，三月七日，云盖守智禅师忌日，报慈僧持守智写真来，为作赞。作品：《云盖生日三月初七报慈僧持真求赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云盖生日三月<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>初七报慈僧持真求赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年3月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522172")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522172_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_522172_0'>① 云盖生日，三月初七报慈僧持真求赞。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522172'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522172'>平生脊骨，生铁铸就。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522172'>关门理锄，揎起两手。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522172'>禅者见之，立不敢久。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522172'>问未及答，已欲返走。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522172'>如老黄龙机锋，如英邵武□<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作拙）</span>叟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522172'>如雪峰之崄，如百丈之寿。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522172'>末后报慈寺中，笑中打个筋斗。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522172'>试问是何宗旨，代云合取狗口。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522172'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_522172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522172'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522172_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　在长沙，邂逅宣城李德孚。作品：《舫斋记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舫斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213441")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213441'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213441'>宣城李德孚有美才，善属文，宣和初与余邂逅于长沙，年既相若，且同学，又相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213441_comment'></div>久之，德孚侍亲移漕江左，而官之金陵，即官舍之东，辟室以观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213441_comment'></div>其室连数楹而户相重，东西而视，如在船中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213441_comment'></div>乃以「舫斋」名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213441_comment'></div>有客聿至，视其榜，揭而疑之曰：「以子为隐者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213441_comment'></div>则忠义之色，功名之志，见施为语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213441_comment'></div>以子为非隐者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213441_comment'></div>则山水之意，嗜好之异，与侪辈不侔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213441_comment'></div>于是避席而问之曰：「夫渺漫际天，一碧万顷，微风徐来，雪浪山涌，一叶傲睨其中覆，却陈乎其前而不入其舍者，津人之妙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213441_comment'></div>子宁欲从事于此乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213441_comment'></div>曰：「操舟之为，非吾事也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213441_comment'></div>「害利之域，并首而趋，憎爱横生，顷刻万态，瓦合流俗，与之偕而不与之俱逝，是知津之妙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213441_comment'></div>子宁于是有得乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213441_comment'></div>曰：「问津之学，非吾志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213441_comment'></div>「然则既不事乎操舟之为，又不志乎问津之业，而乃列五经之遗编，布百家之陈说，明窗棐几，继晷然膏，冥搜博求，探颐索隐，与古圣贤相际于百千岁之后，若心同而意契，德符而道通，殆将简之而弗得，所谓吾无间然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213441_comment'></div>其或醉心坟典，则直造渊源；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213441_comment'></div>玩意群书，则涉猎涯涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213441_comment'></div>放浪诗书之奥，望洋浑灏之间，则孔子之所得知之矣，其浮游万物之祖者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213441_comment'></div>送之者皆目崖而返矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213441_comment'></div>德孚仰而笑，俯而应曰：「吾非放愁也，但吾以忠信孝友为烟波，随所寓而安之为舟舫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213441_comment'></div>昔冯夷得之以游大川，渔父语已缘苇而去，意窃慕之，如是而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213441_comment'></div>客愕然无对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213441_comment'></div>明年复来长沙理前事，以语余，请书以为记，于是乎书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1213441_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　谒枯木大士法成禅师于长沙道林寺，同游清富堂，作《忠孝松记》以美聂山。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213443' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213443' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213443?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忠孝松记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213443")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213443_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213443'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213443'>宣和元年，余谒枯木大士成公于道林，是日游客喧阗，喜气成雾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213443_comment'></div>余曰：「噫嘻，登高望远，此日犹然，其荆楚旧俗哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213443_comment'></div>成笑曰：「有异木产吾冢巅，非缘佳节也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213443_comment'></div>于是导余登清富堂，下临潇湘，如开画牒，千里纤秾，一览而尽得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213443_comment'></div>盖龙图聂公以诗眼增损，发其天藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213443_comment'></div>故其形胜，冠于湘西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213443_comment'></div>暇日必俱宾客，燕赏于此堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213443_comment'></div>公所建也，想见其风流馀韵，不减叔子之岘首，而其去思遗爱，有类召伯之甘棠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213443_comment'></div>左有奇石，状如覆斛，稚松贯石而出，初如插秧，未阅旬高尺许，孤根秀拔，分枝调达，紫鳞翠鬣之中，已有合抱凌云之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213443_comment'></div>岂地灵献瑞，著公拔擢之异乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213443_comment'></div>公自荆湖奉使入对，未几年三迁要职，遂尹京都，实钟临川之英气，而其学出于舒王，有石之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213443_comment'></div>松为苍官，为十八公玉版之荣，金瓯之拜，跬步可待，有松之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213443_comment'></div>丁生梦之，犹为后世美谈，况目睹其异乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213443_comment'></div>成曰：「心法之妙，不可以言传，而著为忠孝之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213443_comment'></div>故种石而玉生，知其孝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213443_comment'></div>倒植而竹茂，知其忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213443_comment'></div>譬如太平无象，而出菌芝，见麟凤，然彼各得其偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213443_comment'></div>如公则道契主上，名落天下，富贵追逐之不赦，而忠孝之瑞并见于松石之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213443_comment'></div>盖理之固然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213443_comment'></div>于是像公之形仪，置堂之上，而名其松曰忠孝，以慰邦人之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213443_comment'></div>顾未纪其岁月，于是使其客甘露灭为之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213443_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为法成作诗题清富堂。作品：《题清富堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题清富堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521201")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521201'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521201'>此堂冠绝湘西胜，枯木名多道不穷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521201'>用谷量云当衣钵，以江盛月展家风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521201'>买山归隐真寒乞，借竹为轩落笑中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521201'>绿锦涨连青玉浦，剪裁磨琢费诗工。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521201_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521201'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521201_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为法成作赞。作品：《道林枯木成禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道林枯木成禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522181")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522181'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522181'>扬广山头种性，雷衡洞里根苗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522181'>法云明暗体露，道林知见香飘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522181'>试问春风吹不起，何如黄河冻连底。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522181'>十分似九不欲全，一身两号只这是。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522181'>大千戏以一尘摄，又譬此尘取空劫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522181'>置于掌间剔突圞，挝鼓升堂普请看。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522181'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_522181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522181'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522181_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为法成作芙蓉道楷禅师赞。作品：《芙蓉楷禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>芙蓉楷禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522179")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522179'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522179'>望之翛然，冰枯而天粹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522179'>即之渊然，云闲而水止。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522179'>意坐石而情无住著，故杖瘦藤而欲起。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522179'>人言即俗复即真，出尘之相加冠巾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522179'>非因引法忤圣主，我宗僧俗两不存。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522179'>五位正宗将仆地，以手挈之阅人世。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522179'>屹然万仞捍狂澜，荷负大法当如是。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522179'>纷纷鄙夫拜公像，譬如蝼蚁见龙象。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522179'>惊魂已化千微尘，岂特形容先沮丧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522179'>火刀直裰谁得之，醉李故时捕鱼师。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522179'>岭梅已熟莫咬破，核子乞与宁馨儿。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522179'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_522179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522179'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522179_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　法成将赴韶州南华寺之命，作诗饯行。作品：《饯枯木成老赴南华之命》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饯枯木成老赴南华之命</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520794")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520794'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520794'>正中妙叶如何会，罗仙隐身露衣带。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520794'>芙蓉克家桐城孙，海上閒名闻至尊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520794'>天书夜到道林宫，大钟横撞山𤤮珑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520794'>山容光泽鸟声乐，一番佳气生岩丛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520794'>曹溪宝林甲天下，楼观翔空盘万瓦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520794'>梦中先已逢祖师，异世曾同香火社。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520794'>人言骨清辟瘴雾，隘词一律撩人怒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520794'>大阳直裰果有灵，所至自有天龙护。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520794'>寄语山头锡杖泉，久枯遽涌宁非天。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520794'>老师不作奇特想，已脱圣凡情量缠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520794'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　法云禅师继住道林，为之作送法成南华茶榜。作品：《云老送南华茶榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云老送南华茶榜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213586")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213586'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213586'>一衲生涯而名闻天子，万夫阡陌而位继祖师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213586_comment'></div>是必于曹溪有大因缘，不然乘般若昔所愿力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213586_comment'></div>时节既至，毫发弗差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213586_comment'></div>岂特增宗门之光，抑亦为法乳之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213586_comment'></div>未忘世礼，少展舆情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213586_comment'></div>恭惟某人恩踰父母，故言所不能形容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213586_comment'></div>道绝功勋，故意所不能测度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213586_comment'></div>云无限碍，宁分岭外湘中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213586_comment'></div>月有照临，岂择曲江楚水？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213586_comment'></div>暂驻随轩之法侣，愿陈荐钵之溪蘋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213586_comment'></div>想蒙哀怜，特有肯诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213586_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213586_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　坐夏于长沙谷山，发所藏蓄《百禅师传》余稿，得七十余人，仿前史作赞，即《僧宝传》初稿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年4月23日</a>　四月二十三日，东瓯宗上人录《僧宝传》毕，为题其后。作品：《题宗上人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题宗上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年4月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213313")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213313'>予撰此传方定稿，上净三昔，而东瓯道人将还石门，自沩水过谷山款予，见其书曰：「噫嘻，此一代之博书，先德前言往行具焉，愿手录以示江南道侣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213313_comment'></div>即挂巾屦坐夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213313_comment'></div>四月二十三日录毕以示予，予叹曰：「夫弹冠必整衣，心敬必形肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213313_comment'></div>宗非至诚爱，重法道，其谨楷精严，渠能至是哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213313_comment'></div>欧阳率更以书画名世，见钟太傅碑，爱其笔法，卧其下三昔不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213313_comment'></div>率更嗜世间法且尔，况出世间法乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213313_comment'></div>宗为法坐夏，贤于率更远甚」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　宗上人将还石门，以偈送之。作品：《宗上人求偈之江南》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宗上人求偈之江南</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521752")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521752'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521752'>川舌一从尝虏馔，山衣三载湿湘云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521752'>挑包又过江南去，鶗鴂遥知半路闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521752'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　僧璲、彦珣自汀州来，彦珣出示南安岩主自严定光古佛化身木刻像，为作赞。作品：《南安岩主定光古佛木刻像赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南安岩主定光古佛木刻像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522139")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522139_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522139'>僧彦珣自汀州来，出示定光化身木刻像，平生偈语百馀首，皆称性之句，非智识所到之地，真云门诸孙也。珣求赞辞力甚，谨再拜为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522139'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522139'>秦时𨍏轹，如刀口希。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522139'>廓然见前，石火莫追。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522139'>法于是中，不著思惟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522139'>举既不顾，咦之而往。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522139'>天中函盖，目机铢两。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522139'>久雨不晴，清机历掌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522139'>孰传其要，绝尘逸群。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522139'>深明二子，详豁诸孙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522139'>维定光佛，出豁之门。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522139'>以真如用，使令万象。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522139'>反易黠鲁，纵夺雨旸。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522139'>洗痴暗目，回颠倒想。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522139'>示汝语言，一切智畏。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522139'>如月入水，如风行空。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522139'>无所妨碍，赠以之中。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522139'>又复怜汝，□□未识。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522139'>方其死时，谓是生日。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522139'>如光照珠，如甜说蜜。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522139'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_522139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522139'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522139_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　璲、珣二僧录《僧宝传》副本，为题其后。作品：《题珣上人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题珣上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213312")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213312'>予初游吴，读赞宁《宋僧史》，怪不作《云门传》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213312_comment'></div>有耆年曰：「尝闻吴中老师自言，尚及见宁，以云门非讲学，故删去之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213312_comment'></div>又游曹山，拜澄源塔，得断碣曰：「耽章号本寂禅师，获《五藏位图》，尽具洞山旨诀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213312_comment'></div>又游洞山，得《澄心堂录》，书谷山崇禅师语，较《传灯》皆破碎不真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213312_comment'></div>于是喟然而念，云门不得立传，曹山名亦失真，崇之道不减岩头，丛林无知名，况下者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213312_comment'></div>自是始有撰叙之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213312_comment'></div>凡经诸方三十年，得百馀传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213312_comment'></div>中间忘失其半，晚归谷山，遂成其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213312_comment'></div>时长汀璲、珣二衲子来从予游，录此副本易曰：「多识前言往行，以大畜其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213312_comment'></div>是录也，皆丛林之前言往行也，能不忘玩味，以想其遗风馀烈，则古人不难到也，二子勉之」！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　彦珣作诗偈八首，和之。作品：《和珣上人八首》（其一）<span id='poem_title_521476_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521476'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521476'>万法如有功，梦事应存体。<div
