id='poem_sentence_0_521477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521477'>电光石火上，不许更追维。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521477'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521477_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521478?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521478'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521478'>毁誉不入念，方知心已空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521478_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521478'>魔宫并虎穴，还与道场同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521478_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521478'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521478_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521479?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521479'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521479'>问讯跛挈师，汝今亦知有。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521479'>棒打不回头，乃尔能掣肘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　璲首座出示善权诗，作诗赠之。作品：《璲首座出示巽中诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>璲首座出示巽中诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521068")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521068'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521068'>左手不仁右手明，怀情亦复弃藜床。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521068'>不知门外山花发，但觉君来笑语香。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521068'>颀绍神情扫秋晚，瘦权诗句挟风霜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521068'>两翁杖屦相追逐，此夕因依夜话长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521068'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年5月</a>　五月，为长沙开福寺道宁禅师门人法圆所建转轮藏作记。作品：《潭州开福转轮藏灵验记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213427' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213427' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213427?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州开福转轮藏灵验记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213427")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213427_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213427'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213427'>长沙，楚之大藩，民俗殷富可也，而山水之富亦擅名天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213427_comment'></div>千雉垣叠，万井喧阗，而嚼岳色之芳鲜，饮湘流之甘寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213427_comment'></div>宝坊精舍，楼观追逐，烟云蔽亏，梵放酬酢，如钱塘之西湖，伊洛之嵩少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213427_comment'></div>开福在郡城之北，基构雄誇，尽占形胜，昔马氏植福之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213427_comment'></div>弘法聚徒，皆当时之望士，号大丛林，名镇诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213427_comment'></div>马氏尝命苾刍智光建东藏，奉安法宝，欲增妙丽，规法忉利诸天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213427_comment'></div>光以意造，不合教乘，议者曰：「惟劲禅师隐居岳中三十年，得心法之要，而淹通三藏，异迹甚著」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213427_comment'></div>厚礼致之，劲果来于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213427_comment'></div>布地文石为云涛之状以象海，琢石云涛之上以象须弥山，建大轮山之颠而辅以小轮四，棋布峙立，如人聚五指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213427_comment'></div>翔空为朱栏青锁，间见层出，以象忉利宫阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213427_comment'></div>光之徒颇相折难，劲博引《楼炭》等经，《瑜伽》、《俱舍》诸论，證尤甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213427_comment'></div>会尊者室利嚩啰者来自五天，是劲之说，而藏乃克成，为湖湘第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213427_comment'></div>政和之初，长老道宁开东山法道食堂，日五千指，百须颐指可办，门人法圆实阴相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213427_comment'></div>圆，宜丰人，短小精悍，而材能任事，宁使牧众，典金谷，道俗归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213427_comment'></div>宁剋日而化，潭帅以大长老智公黄龙高弟，时年九十馀，可嗣其席，遣令佐即云盖迎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213427_comment'></div>智以老辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213427_comment'></div>令佐曰：「太守请饭乃不赴，贻法门之咎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213427_comment'></div>智至，即鸣鼓问其故，曰：「请师住持也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213427_comment'></div>心知堕其计中，受之未几，以职事付其嫡子文正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213427_comment'></div>文正本色，饱参有局量，克肖前懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213427_comment'></div>圆不以新故二其心，唯集诸功德成就胜缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213427_comment'></div>三年化众檀钟瑜等翻修藏殿，五年秋将毕工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213427_comment'></div>九月己卯，梦合抱之木半空而止，圆蒲伏，疑将压焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213427_comment'></div>呼曰：「谁为此木危人如此乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213427_comment'></div>有答者曰：「此藏心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213427_comment'></div>黎明觊州男子程俊来谒，愿施木以修藏，如梦中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213427_comment'></div>自是施者日填门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213427_comment'></div>十月癸丑，使木工张询梯其颠，施斧凿，得木镂谶文，其略曰：「吾成此藏，魔事极多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213427_comment'></div>不踰二百年，有吾宗法子革作转轮，此其基也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213427_comment'></div>住持者，荆山宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213427_comment'></div>法子者，月望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213427_comment'></div>匠者，弓长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213427_comment'></div>自伪天福癸丑，至宣和改元己亥，盖百九十馀年，夫岂偶然也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213427_comment'></div>余获拜观，遣十辈下推其毂，五轮俱旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213427_comment'></div>其上涂金间碧，电驰风绕，庄严之丽，惟见者心了，而言所不能形容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213427_comment'></div>圆自言其巧非木工所能，皆梦中若有指授者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213427_comment'></div>凡费缗钱五百万，六年而后成，且求文以记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213427_comment'></div>余闻三世如来教法，有微尘数偈句，藏于龙宫，秘于五天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213427_comment'></div>太山毫芒尔，而流传中国者，才五千轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213427_comment'></div>然众生痴迷，且不闻其名，况义味乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213427_comment'></div>双林大士以平等慈，行同体悲，广摄异种，为此方便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213427_comment'></div>如疲军闻梅林，虽未及见，而渴心止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213427_comment'></div>如病夫入药肆，虽未得饮，而病已除，况于见之而获饮者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213427_comment'></div>虽若简易，然不犹贤于未知者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213427_comment'></div>晋道人惠受，尝宿王坦之园，梦以园营精庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213427_comment'></div>既觉讶之，假寐复理前梦，以语坦之，遂果其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213427_comment'></div>已而又梦得刹柱，明日行江亭，获随流之木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213427_comment'></div>唐法师昙彦居越州龙兴寺，大殿隳坏，众请彦修之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213427_comment'></div>彦曰：「非贫道力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213427_comment'></div>却后三百年，有非衣檀越来兴此殿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213427_comment'></div>及期，太守裴肃果符其谶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213427_comment'></div>呜呼，圆退然寒窭，一钵行人间而已，梦如惠受，而非有王氏之园为之赀谶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213427_comment'></div>如昙彦，而非有裴公之力成其愿，乃能不起于座，出双林之横枝，续光明之千焰，必有大过人者，可无书乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213427_comment'></div>五月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1213427_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为开福长老文玉禅师作赞。作品：《报慈宣秘禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>报慈宣秘禅师赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522184")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522184'>二百员衲子领袖，三十年丛林耆旧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522184'>所至楼阁森然，自然眷属成就。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522184'>诸方度脚买鞋，报慈就身剪裁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522184'>莫嫌此老无巴鼻，曾见西堂古佛来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522184'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522184_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年6月25日</a>　《僧宝传》书既成，净因禅师愿首传以为毕生之玩，命敏传抄录之，时宜禅师亦在此，六月二十五日，为净因禅师提《僧宝传》作品：《题佛鉴僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213310' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213310' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213310?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题佛鉴僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年6月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213310")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213310'>禅者精于道，身世两忘，未尝从事于翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213310_comment'></div>故唐宋僧史，皆出于讲师之笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213310_comment'></div>道宣精于律，而文词非其所长，作禅者传，如户婚按检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213310_comment'></div>赞宁博于学，然其识暗，以永明为兴福，岩头为施身，又聚众碣之文为传，故其书非一体，予甚悼惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213310_comment'></div>顷尝经行诸方，见博大秀杰之衲，能袒肩以荷大法者，必编次而藏之，盖有志于为史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213310_comment'></div>中以罪废逐，还自海外，则意绪衰落，魂魄遗失，其存者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213310_comment'></div>宣和改元夏，于湘西之谷山，发其藏畜，得七十馀辈，因仿前史作赞，使学者概其为书之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213310_comment'></div>书既成，有佛鉴大师净因者曰：「噫嘻，此先德之懿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213310_comment'></div>愿首传以为毕生之玩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213310_comment'></div>因以父事佛照，以大父事云庵，而视余为季父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213310_comment'></div>因生庐山之阳，游方饱丛林，参道有知见，恭谨孝友，盖其天性，而酝藉雅尚，若出自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213310_comment'></div>与余游馀二十年，久而益敬，故余欣然授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213310_comment'></div>因以谓此书当得妙于笔札者传之，于是凭川道者敏传，愿施其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213310_comment'></div>传以伯父事佛照，以兄事佛鉴，其能书乃夙习，笔楮不择精粗，飞翰如蚕食叶，俄顷千字，其衡斜布列，擘窠棋画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213310_comment'></div>非特字工而已，工诗善丹青，兼众妙而有，然未尝以自多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213310_comment'></div>长坐不睡，一食终日者十二年矣，人以为难，而传以为易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213310_comment'></div>久游灵源之门，得其旨要者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213310_comment'></div>六月二十五日，佛鉴携此书来请记其本末，而以谓先觉之前言往行，不闻于后世，学者之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213310_comment'></div>闻之而不能以广传，同志之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213310_comment'></div>今予既以传次之，而因又善传，传公又成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213310_comment'></div>呜呼，后世学者读之，当想见法席之盛也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　觉慈来谷山相从，夏休，觉慈求诗，为作一首。作品：《谷山沙弥求诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谷山沙弥求诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521274")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521274'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521274'>十里松风长不老，一庭秋色为谁闲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521274'>偶逢此日休新夏，偏见耆年忆故山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521274'>贫里有秋同举箸，法中添口共开颜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521274'>偶然弄笔成诗句，乘兴留题屋壁间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521274'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521274_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年8月</a>　七月九日，智海禅师示寂，八月，代人作《岳麓海禅师塔铭》作品：《岳麓海禅师塔铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岳麓海禅师塔铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213548")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213548'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213548'>师名智海，姓万氏，吉州太和人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213548_comment'></div>幼静专，无适俗韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213548_comment'></div>去事普觉道人楚金，为弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213548_comment'></div>年二十一，剃发受具，辞金游方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213548_comment'></div>金出邓峰永公门，父子道价，逼亚东林总、玉涧祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213548_comment'></div>故师依玉涧、东林最久，然无所契悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213548_comment'></div>晚抵仰山，陆沉于众，佛印元公独异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213548_comment'></div>师方锐于学，喜翰墨，元呵曰：「子本行道，反从事语言笔画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213548_comment'></div>语言笔画借工，于道何益？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213548_comment'></div>矧未工乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213548_comment'></div>师于是弃去，经行湘南诸山，依止大沩十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213548_comment'></div>真如门风，号称壁立，学者皆望崖而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213548_comment'></div>师独受印可辈流下之真如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213548_comment'></div>赴诏住上都相国寺，师雅志不欲西，首众衲于衡阳花药山，分座说法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213548_comment'></div>元符己卯，开法于城东之东明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213548_comment'></div>崇宁乙酉，迁居于湘西之岳麓，劝请皆一时名公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213548_comment'></div>明年正月八日，麓火，一夕而烬，道俗惊嗟，以死吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213548_comment'></div>师笑曰：「梦幻成坏，盖皆戏剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213548_comment'></div>然吾恃愿力，宫室未终废也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213548_comment'></div>于是就林缚屋，单丁而住，杂苍头厮养，运瓦砾，收烬馀之材，造床榻板隔，凡丛林器用所宜有者皆备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213548_comment'></div>曰：「栋宇即成，器用未具，是吾忧，故先办之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213548_comment'></div>闻者窃笑而去，师自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213548_comment'></div>未几月，富者以金帛施，贫者以力施，匠者以巧施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213548_comment'></div>十年之间，厦屋崇成，盘崖万础，飞楹层阁，涂金间碧，如化成梵释龙天之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213548_comment'></div>人徒见其经营之功日新，而不知其出于閒暇谈笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213548_comment'></div>宣和己亥七月九日，以平生道具付侍者，使集众估唱，黎明漱盥罢，坐丈室，闻粥鼓，命门弟子，因叙出世本末，祝以行道勿懈，说偈为别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213548_comment'></div>有智暹者进曰：「师独不能少留乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213548_comment'></div>师以手摇去，复周询左右良久，右胁而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213548_comment'></div>阅世六十有二，坐四十有二夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213548_comment'></div>又七日，阇维收骨石，塔于西崦舜塘之阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213548_comment'></div>余官长沙，始款师，虽其道眼无分别相，而州里情亲，若出自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213548_comment'></div>故知其为人惠敏，有智略，恤孤老，赴急难，常器人于羁贱中，屡折不困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213548_comment'></div>其尊礼贤者，乐于人为善，则其天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213548_comment'></div>尝叩其论于宗门，号饱参于教观，甚博而知要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213548_comment'></div>不见十日，而以讣闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213548_comment'></div>呜呼，余闻论事易，成事难，舍生易，处死难，师皆返是，岂无德而然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213548_comment'></div>南牧齐公状其平生，乞铭于余，因为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1213548'>临济纲宗，遇风则止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213548_comment'></div>昭忧其谶，得念而喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213548_comment'></div>湘南有圆，汾阳之嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213548_comment'></div>遂兴其宗，克肖前懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213548_comment'></div>衲子方来，归之如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213548_comment'></div>南真两俊，绝尘逸群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213548_comment'></div>海公于真，盖其的孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213548_comment'></div>独敢袒肩，荷担宗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213548_comment'></div>天资慈祥，一目贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213548_comment'></div>幻出宝坊，实依净愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213548_comment'></div>冤亲赞毁，初莫能辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213548_comment'></div>及其将化，则有明验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213548_comment'></div>人死之难，如登焚轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213548_comment'></div>师独易之，如臂屈伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213548_comment'></div>塔曰无缝，岂有新陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213548_comment'></div>我作铭诗，昭示学人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1213548_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='166b700ea27a47f285919ef4a20df23f_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>，49岁</div><div id='166b700ea27a47f285919ef4a20df23f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　返长沙，住鹿苑寺，仲仁送墨梅来，求诗还乡。作品：《光上人送墨梅来求诗还乡》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>光上人送墨梅来求诗还乡</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521271")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521271'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521271'>南岳有云留不住，东归结伴过湘湄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521271'>解将疏影横斜句，不换垂珠的皪诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521271'>癯甚鸢肩寒入画，清哉鹤骨老难医。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521271'>定知入岭风烟暮，正及追胥馈岁时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　作诗谢仲仁惠墨梅。作品：《谢妙高惠墨梅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年10月1日</a>　十月一日，在鹿苑寺虎岑堂题首山省念禅师传法偈。作品：《题首山传法偈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题首山传法偈</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和元年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213285")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213285'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213285'>诸佛甚微细智，以金刚为喻，非凡夫粗浮心识所能了达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213285_comment'></div>《华严·十定品》：「入刹那际，诸佛三昧乃能灭众生颠倒想」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213285_comment'></div>宣和元年十月吉日，余在湘西鹿苑虎芩堂，早作静坐，念曰：今日盖首山生辰，追想为人，书其传法偈并汾州无德禅师注释，详味父子，真能入诸佛甚微细智者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年10月8日</a>　十月八日，临川瞻上人出示蔡子因诗书，为跋其后。作品：《跋蔡子因诗书三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span>《跋蔡子因诗书三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span>《跋蔡子因诗书三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋蔡子因诗书<span class='inlineComment2'>（一　宣和元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213398")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213398'>欧阳文忠公尝非笑肥字，而誇杜子美独贵瘦硬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213398_comment'></div>东坡作诗曰：「杜陵论书贵瘦硬，此论未工吾不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213398_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1213398", 1213398, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>丰妍</span>瘦容各有态，飞燕玉环谁敢憎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213398_comment'></div>予因此帖，可谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1213398", 1213398, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>丰妍</span>者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213398_comment'></div>观其俊气横逸，不受富贵鞚勒之韵，宜从古人中求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213398_comment'></div>宣和元年十月八日，临川瞻上人出以为示，便觉神魄飞越于铁瓮城之下，瓜洲杳霭之闾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1213398_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1213399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋蔡子因诗书<span class='inlineComment2'>（二）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213399")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213399'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213399'>文章天下第一数东坡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213399_comment'></div>子因，蔡氏子弟，而饮食梦寐以之，其种性妙非习俗所能移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213399_comment'></div>使东坡而在，见子因，当不减张曲江之与李泌也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213399_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1213400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋蔡子因诗书<span class='inlineComment2'>（三）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213400")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213400'>予久不见梦蝶，偶得此诗湘西山水间，时松风盘空，林月滉荡，如顾虎头对刘琨展其画像也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1213400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　临川旼禅者出示苏轼与了元禅师帖，跋其后。作品：《跋东坡与佛印帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡与佛印帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213352")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213352'>东坡骑鲸上天去，十九白矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213352_comment'></div>平生文章流落世间者，所在神物护持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213352_comment'></div>然士大夫罕蓄之，多见山人野士之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213352_comment'></div>汝水旼禅者出此帖示予，虽其一期酬酢之语，而谦光烛人，三复之，想见幅巾杖屦，翛然行儋石水溢间，如渊明在柴桑、斜川时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213352_comment'></div>某题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213352_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年11月</a>　十一月，代彭以功为宜春天宁寺长老德公一击轩作记。作品：《一击轩记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一击轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和元年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213442")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213442'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213442'>宣和元年冬，余自临汝以职事来宜春，暇日与客游天宁宫，爱小轩脩竹，解衣磐礴，终日不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213442_comment'></div>长老德公请名其轩，余曰「一击」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213442_comment'></div>客问其说，余曰：「香严闲禅师参道于沩山，久而不契，乃焚画饼之书，归庵南阳，粪除瓦砾，击竹而悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213442_comment'></div>余以是知道不可求也，使道而可求，则肉饭鹰兕，身当坐榻，与夫伐冰食玉之贵，谷量牛马之富者，皆举意而得，有谋而获者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213442_comment'></div>客曰：「然则道终不可见欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213442_comment'></div>余曰：「吾闻诸云庵，以谓道不可求而可致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213442_comment'></div>如人市黑白，暗走岭海，望京师，疲岁月于道路，卒不能获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213442_comment'></div>居肆于八达之衢，不以必得为计，则货也有时而自致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213442_comment'></div>昔人尝嗜草书，行则书空，卧则划席，夜闻滩声而得妙，晓见蛇斗而入神，与香严同科而异致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213442_comment'></div>且道岂有粗妙哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213442_comment'></div>学者根有稚敏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213442_comment'></div>时方贵敏，故丛林有思齐之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213442_comment'></div>石霜一年而悟道，吾以为敏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213442_comment'></div>永嘉一宿而悟，曹溪以为敏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213442_comment'></div>香严一击而悟，庸讵知此君不以为敏乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213442_comment'></div>德公请以为记，余知其为云庵之嗣也，故并书载其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213442_comment'></div>宣和元年十一月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为一击轩题诗。作品：《题一击轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520957?labeling=true' "poem_title_520957")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520957'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520957'>閒把松枝彗，扫除门径尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520957'>惊闻一击竹，顿见十方身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520957'>烟翠连窗暗，霜筠解箨新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520957'>老禅搆轩意，应欲悟来人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520957'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　为公翼题所蓄华光仲仁画湘山树石图。作品：《题公翼蓄华光所画湘山树石》<span id='poem_title_1213336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题橘洲图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　题公翼所作平沙远水图诗。作品：《题平沙远水图五首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213337' class='_poem'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213337'>公翼诗云：「萧然野趣忽在手，彷佛江南烟雨村」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213337_comment'></div>此殆笔端能生烟云，非胸次有江山，何能作此语！<div class='inline' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213338")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_1_1213338_comment'></div>盖荆山之人，以玉抵鹊，而秦乃割其十五城以求璧，岂世以希见为贵，初无定情耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213338_comment'></div>予生长山林，而目不自观。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题平沙远水图<span class='inlineComment2'>（四　惠子所蓄。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213340")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1213340'>「好在华光真子，过于云屋之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213340_comment'></div>春色都随谈笑，袖中仍有湖山」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213340_comment'></div>宣和元年十二月初五日，惠子出其师所作湖山平远，曰：「此盖老人得意时笔也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213340_comment'></div>予平生无所嗜山水，少年游戏钱塘，眷湖山之胜，欲老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213340_comment'></div>以诗写之不能肖，逮今衰暮，虽与华光善，得其戏笔，必为人持去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213340_comment'></div>惠子呵予不能善秘之，予曰：「凡四海九州，山川烟云，皆吾画笥也，奈何为儿戏，蓄纸墨间乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213340_comment'></div>惠子笑曰：「公惝恍大言，盖其天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213340_comment'></div>然为题此纸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213340_comment'></div>于是书六言付之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213340_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1213341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题平沙远水图<span class='inlineComment2'>（五　称上人所作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_2_1213341_comment'></div>称妙思如此，力之不已，当不减华光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213341_comment'></div>口占曰：「袖里两枝烟雨，门前一片潇湘」。</div><div id='poem_title_1213325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题言上人所蓄诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213325")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213325_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213325'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213325'>予幻梦人间，游戏笔砚，登高临远，时时为未忘情之语，旋踵羞悔汗下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213325_comment'></div>又自觉曰：「譬如候虫时鸟，自鸣自已，谁复收录」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213325_comment'></div>宝山言上人乃编而为帙，读之大惊，不复料理其讹正，可为多言之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213325_comment'></div>然佳言之好学，虽鄙语如予者亦收之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213325_comment'></div>世有加予数十等之人，其语言文字之妙，能录藏以增益其智识，又可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213325_comment'></div>夫水发岷山，其滥觞至楚国，则万物至满，则合之者众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213325_comment'></div>善学者，其能外此乎？<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年12月1日</a>　十二月初一，江寒欲雪，为祖称禅师题其所画橘洲断岸平远图。作品：《又称上人所作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年12月5日</a>　十二月初五日，为法惠上人所蓄华光仲仁湖山平远图作六言一首，并题其后。作品：《又惠子所蓄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六，内含六言诗。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　涌禅师寄仲仁墨梅山水图，为跋其后。作品：《题墨梅山水图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题墨梅山水图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213332")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213332'>华光老人眼中阁，烟雨胸次有丘壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213332_comment'></div>故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1213332", 1213332, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>戏笔</span>和墨，即江湖云石之趣，便足春色，不可收畜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213332_comment'></div>而此老人藏于耐寒冻枝头，一时高韵，哗于士林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213332_comment'></div>而其所畜，又其尤精选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213332_comment'></div>以病举以付其子涌，涌如获夜光，照乘千里，以书誇于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213332_comment'></div>不有是父，安得此子哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213332_comment'></div>欧阳率更见《索靖碑》，因留不去，竟寝其下三昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213332_comment'></div>文字画刻是中，安得美味而嗜好有如此者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213332_comment'></div>予初大怪之，及视涌之好尚，率更要不足怪也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213332_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　与达臣知县祈雪罢同游岳麓寺次韵其诗分韵得游字。作品：《次韵达臣知县祈雪游岳麓寺分韵得游字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵达臣知县祈雪游岳麓寺分韵得游字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520955")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520955'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520955'>丛祠香火罢，山寺偶同游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520955'>炉拨红金涌，窗空碧缕浮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520955'>旋敷白氎布，暖甚紫茸裘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520955'>试作吉祥卧，梦清如素秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520955'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520955_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5a3e744d061e4c1a8f21a91602547b9d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5a3e744d061e4c1a8f21a91602547b9d");'><span id='5a3e744d061e4c1a8f21a91602547b9d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>，50岁</div><div id='5a3e744d061e4c1a8f21a91602547b9d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年3月</a>　三月初，自鹿苑寺迁居水西南台寺，与鹿苑元禅师为邻。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年3月6日</a>　初六日，大风雨，洪州崇顗禅师持苏庠诗轴来，为跋其后。作品：《跋养直诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213395' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213395?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋养直诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年3月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213395")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213395_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213395'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213395'>宣和三年三月，予迁居水西南台寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213395_comment'></div>初六日，颠风搅林，东轩小寝，俄大雨，起步脩廊，复坐，颓然昏睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213395_comment'></div>南州道崇难者，持此轴来，隐几读之，如观飞菟顿尘，追风趁日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213395_comment'></div>然其诗词所及，皆予故人，而予亦尝落悯怜中，盖方窜海外时帖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213395_comment'></div>昔曾鲁公问予曰：「苏养直闻齿少而诗老，恨未识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213395_comment'></div>子见其诗否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213395_comment'></div>予曰：「李太白诗语带烟霞，肺腑缠锦绣，以予观，养直之诗，逮又过之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213395_comment'></div>鲁公骇予此论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213395_comment'></div>今数诗，惜公不见，以验前语耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213395_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　崇顗求传录《五宗语要》，录毕，为题其后。作品：《题五宗录》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213286?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题五宗录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213286")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213286'>性觉本自妙，而常明以无性故不自知，谓之无明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213286_comment'></div>一切众生以无明迷醉，如目有翳，善知识如医师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213286_comment'></div>东坡曰：「医师但有除翳药，且无与明药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213286_comment'></div>如可与明，还应是翳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213286_comment'></div>此殆天下之名言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213286_comment'></div>予所集《五宗语要》，如医师除翳药方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213286_comment'></div>从前先德用之有验，故乐以传世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213286_comment'></div>书成于宣和元年正月，明年有漳南道人崇顗者愿求传录，录毕相示，其笔力详楷，非诚之至、志之确，不能如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213286_comment'></div>然能并除万虑，燕坐一室，追绎先德所行之事，研味诸家所示之语，以校日用，则予之所集不为徒尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213286_comment'></div>顗之精勤，不为虚行也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年3月</a>　风雨日，有怀禅首座，戏书寄之，禅首座与季真游交往，且时访史资深，亦闲过南台寺。作品：《禅首座自海公化去见故旧未尝忘追想悼叹之情季真游北游大梁闻其病忧得书辄喜为人重乡义久要不忘湘西时访史资深亦或见寻此外闭门高卧耳宣和二年三月日风雨有怀其人戏书寄之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521305?labeling=true' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521305")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521305'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521305'>前时无际曾入梦，近日真游又得书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_520927_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年3月17日</a>　三月十七日，黄龙慧南忌日，因阅祖心禅师偈，作偈祭之，自迁南台，此后每岁比作。作品：《黄龙生辰因阅晦堂偈作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄龙生辰因阅晦堂偈作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年3月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522004")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522004'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522004'>万古知音是今日，晦堂古锥口门窄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522004'>今既不来昔不往，桃花落尽春狼籍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522004'>南台茗碗荐炉香，世礼丛林笑未忘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522004'>只个死生收不得，梦中声色谩遮藏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522004'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522004_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　名南台寺所居曰明白庵，为之作铭。作品：《明白庵铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明白庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213479")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213479'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213479'>余世缘深重，夙习羁縻，好论古今治乱是非成败，交游多讥诃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213479_comment'></div>独陈莹中曰：「于道初不相妨，譬如山川之有飞云，草木之有华滋，所谓秀媚精进」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213479_comment'></div>余心知其戏，然为之不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213479_comment'></div>大观元年春，结庵于临川，名曰明白，欲痛自治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213479_comment'></div>莹中闻之，以偈见寄，曰：「庵中不著毗耶坐，亦许灵山问法人，便谓世间憎爱尽，攒眉出社有谁瞋」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213479_comment'></div>于是堤岸辄决，又复滚滚多言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213479_comment'></div>然竟坐此得罪，出九死而仅生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213479_comment'></div>恨识不知微，道不胜习，乃收招魂魄，料理初心，为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1213479'>雷霆发声，万国春晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213479_comment'></div>闻者不言，心得意了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213479_comment'></div>木落霜清，水归沙在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213479_comment'></div>忽然震惊，闻者骇怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213479_comment'></div>合妙日用，如春雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213479_comment'></div>背觉合尘，如冬震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213479_comment'></div>万机俱罢，随缘放旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213479_comment'></div>尚无了知，安有倒想？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213479_comment'></div>永惟此恩，研味其旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213479_comment'></div>一庵收身，以时卧起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213479_comment'></div>语默不昧，丝毫弗差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213479_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1213479", 1213479, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>蒙杂</span>而著，随孚于嘉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　著疏经论，发挥秘奥，及解《易》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年3月28日</a>　三月二十八日，枣柏大士李通玄忌日，因读《易》豫卦有感，作诗纪之。作品：《枣柏大士生辰因读易豫卦有感作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>枣柏大士生辰因读易豫卦有感作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年3月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520857")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520857'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520857'>人间解纕沙，开视儿眼前。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520857'>钵饭度永日，一裘支十年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520857'>月岩与云壑，佳处辄留连。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520857'>谁云道林黠，犹觅买山钱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520857'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520857_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　新昌故里你、能、禅三禅僧宿南台寺，作诗赠之。作品：《你能禅三乡俊宿山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>你能禅三乡俊宿山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520725")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520725'>湘西春色无人要，万顷镜空飞白鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520725'>小阁披衣眼力衰，一声欸乃酬清晓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520725'>芒鞋闲穿聚落来，此岸绿阴行不了。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520725'>南台老未忘乡井，抵掌清谈辄高笑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520725'>烹茶煮笋未当勤，放意赋诗语奇峭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520725'>此生何处不戏剧，万事随缘真道妙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520725'>何当借子西斋宿，共看湘月千峰表。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　送《楞严经》与彦珣，作诗赠之。作品：《送楞严经珣维那》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送楞严经珣维那</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521336")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521336'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521336'>尸罗清净心清净，寄迹南台亦偶然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521336'>室掩香灯见行道，壁悬巾屦伴孤禅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年4月</a>　四月，宜禅师过南台寺，将归北山坐夏，作诗送之。作品：《送谊叟归北山》<span id='poem_sentence_0_521282'>南台山浅北山深，深处开轩更茂林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521282_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521282'>作夏悬知成契阔，扁舟乘兴一相寻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521282_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521282'>灯青竹屋风雨夕，溪绕石门乡井心。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521282_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521282_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　会福严慈觉大师，作诗赠之。作品：《会福严慈觉大师》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520717?labeling=true' "poem_title_520717")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520717'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520717'>慈觉初见我，背呼仰而应。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520717'>遂同宿湘上，夜语如建瓴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520717'>犀颅气不詟，虎颔目有棱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520717'>精彩类澄观，突兀掩万僧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520717'>乔岳占南极，寒翠知几层。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520717'>此老家此山，亲分漳水灯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520717'>宝坊天雨华，午梵盘清冥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520717'>欲知法席盛，但看道价增。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520717'>破夏出山来，乃尔忘规绳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520717'>盖皮为之灾，公卿慕声称。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520717'>我幸无子累，痴钝人所憎。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520717'>平生寝饭外，摩挲一枝藤。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520717'>少年入三吴，题诗遍西兴。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520717'>归来舟彭蠡，浪山雪崩腾。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520717'>匡庐落笑中，万叠横空青。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520717'>又尝游并汾，趼足渡河冰。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520717'>冲虎上太行，鸡鸣见日升。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520717'>此乐堕渺莽，坐睡头鬅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>鬙。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520717'>朅来湘西坞，倦鹤整羽翎。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520717'>只待秋风健，祝融期再登。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520717'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_520717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_520717'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_520717_0'>⑴ 原作髯，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520717_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　在长沙，为县令李德孚舫斋作记。作品：《舫斋记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舫斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1119年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213441")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213441'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213441'>宣城李德孚有美才，善属文，宣和初与余邂逅于长沙，年既相若，且同学，又相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213441_comment'></div>久之，德孚侍亲移漕江左，而官之金陵，即官舍之东，辟室以观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213441_comment'></div>其室连数楹而户相重，东西而视，如在船中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213441_comment'></div>乃以「舫斋」名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213441_comment'></div>有客聿至，视其榜，揭而疑之曰：「以子为隐者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213441_comment'></div>则忠义之色，功名之志，见施为语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213441_comment'></div>以子为非隐者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213441_comment'></div>则山水之意，嗜好之异，与侪辈不侔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213441_comment'></div>于是避席而问之曰：「夫渺漫际天，一碧万顷，微风徐来，雪浪山涌，一叶傲睨其中覆，却陈乎其前而不入其舍者，津人之妙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213441_comment'></div>子宁欲从事于此乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213441_comment'></div>曰：「操舟之为，非吾事也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213441_comment'></div>「害利之域，并首而趋，憎爱横生，顷刻万态，瓦合流俗，与之偕而不与之俱逝，是知津之妙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213441_comment'></div>子宁于是有得乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213441_comment'></div>曰：「问津之学，非吾志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213441_comment'></div>「然则既不事乎操舟之为，又不志乎问津之业，而乃列五经之遗编，布百家之陈说，明窗棐几，继晷然膏，冥搜博求，探颐索隐，与古圣贤相际于百千岁之后，若心同而意契，德符而道通，殆将简之而弗得，所谓吾无间然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213441_comment'></div>其或醉心坟典，则直造渊源；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213441_comment'></div>玩意群书，则涉猎涯涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213441_comment'></div>放浪诗书之奥，望洋浑灏之间，则孔子之所得知之矣，其浮游万物之祖者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213441_comment'></div>送之者皆目崖而返矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213441_comment'></div>德孚仰而笑，俯而应曰：「吾非放愁也，但吾以忠信孝友为烟波，随所寓而安之为舟舫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213441_comment'></div>昔冯夷得之以游大川，渔父语已缘苇而去，意窃慕之，如是而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213441_comment'></div>客愕然无对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213441_comment'></div>明年复来长沙理前事，以语余，请书以为记，于是乎书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1213441_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　作祭郭天信文示郭中复。作品：《祭郭太尉文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213557' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213557' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213557?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郭太尉文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213557")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213557_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213557'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213557'>公起徒步，丝絇入侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213557_comment'></div>遂断国论，危言谠议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213557_comment'></div>在妒忌中，刚而有礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213557_comment'></div>天子敬之，爱等昆弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213557_comment'></div>虽无知名，民阴受赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213557_comment'></div>如汉子房，如唐陆贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213557_comment'></div>人众胜天，觉中妒忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213557_comment'></div>公笑径去，道固如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213557_comment'></div>一斥不复，而又早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213557_comment'></div>奸邪色矜，天下陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213557_comment'></div>我初闻讣，中夜而喟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213557_comment'></div>公之精神，与天终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213557_comment'></div>宜终功名，宜身富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213557_comment'></div>乃殁瘴乡，又寓旅邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213557_comment'></div>人之奇祸，至此极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213557_comment'></div>唯德是辅，殆虚语耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213557_comment'></div>天定胜人，果不容伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213557_comment'></div>妒忌伎穷，反自相噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213557_comment'></div>邪正日分，晓如泾渭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213557_comment'></div>今馀十年，归骨万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213557_comment'></div>我昔观光，混迹都市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213557_comment'></div>游公卿间，如梁宝志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213557_comment'></div>公每延礼，忘其势位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213557_comment'></div>我亦径造，必至卧内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213557_comment'></div>兵卫如云，不敢呵止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213557_comment'></div>爱憎相夺，有万赞毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213557_comment'></div>坐尝厚善，囚我棘寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213557_comment'></div>几失头颅，终御魑魅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213557_comment'></div>敢期白发，奠于湘水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213557_comment'></div>世相新奇，习为巧士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213557_comment'></div>教训谄谀，钩取禄利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213557_comment'></div>貌虽光泽，行可愧耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213557_comment'></div>闻公之风，面热颡泚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213557_comment'></div>吾闻阴德，荣亨必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213557_comment'></div>不身尝之，当在其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213557_comment'></div>格言不欺，果见伟器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213557_comment'></div>沐浴道德，冠冕仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213557_comment'></div>定世其家，行矣是似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213557_comment'></div>则公之生，亦何尝死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213557_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1213557_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a
