id='poem_sentence_6_520710'>我诗聊寄耳，猥语凭见删。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520710'>峻句乃见辱，崄如履潼关。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520710'>细看秀争发，红英微雨斑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520710'>坐令十年心，清凉去煎烦。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520710'>竹林在何许，延颈伫望间。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520710'>遥知醉逃暑，玉纤侍丫鬟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520710'>得句有奇趣，笑涡印朱颜。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520710'>引纸欲续和，自叹才涩悭。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520710'>应当恕不迨，乡闾念疏顽。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520710'>把卷味长哦，松风嗽齿寒。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520710'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_520710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　次韵子中题兀翁瑞筠亭。作品：《次韵题兀翁瑞筠亭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵题兀翁瑞筠亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520714")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520714'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520714'>大圆镜空越数量，是中岂容男女相。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520714'>风橐俱声未易分，前身后身翻覆掌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520714'>种石王生砚出芝，人亡物在何足奇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520714'>请看襄母千里至，庭竹骈根生瑞枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520714'>人言亲少而子老，异事相传争绝倒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520714'>心法之妙传以粗，此理难与俗人道。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520714'>云居的孙难共语，辩如建瓴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>空气宇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520714'>不将双脚踏城闉，郤侯诗句能写真。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520714'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_520714'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_520714_0'>⑴ 原作瓶，据四库本、武林本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520714_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　作诗次韵兀翁。作品：《次韵兀翁》<div id='poem_521742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵兀翁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521742")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521742'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521742'>渔人寄语兀翁道，出没烟波各有由。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521742'>死见镬汤如攧浪，爱鱼心在未甘休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521742'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521742_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　秋，为道隆禅师题所录《僧宝传》作品：《题隆道人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题隆道人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213319")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213319'>古之学者，非有大过人者，惟能博观约取，知宗而用妙耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213319_comment'></div>唐沙门道宣通兼三藏，而精于持律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213319_comment'></div>持律，小乘之学也，而宣不许人呼，以为大乘师枣柏长者，力弘佛乘，而未尝一语及单传心要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213319_comment'></div>方是时，曹溪之说信于天下，非教乘之论所当杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213319_comment'></div>宣公甘以小乘自居，枣柏止以教乘自志，竟能为百世师者，知宗用妙而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213319_comment'></div>禅宗学者，自元丰以来，师法大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213319_comment'></div>诸方以拨去文字为禅，以口耳受授为妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213319_comment'></div>耆年凋丧，晚辈猬毛而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213319_comment'></div>服纨绮，饭精妙，施施然以处华屋为荣，高尻罄折王臣为能，以狙诈羁縻学者之貌而腹非之，上下交相欺诳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213319_comment'></div>视其设心，虽侩牛履狶之徒所耻为，而其人以为得计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213319_comment'></div>于是佛祖之微言，宗师之规范，扫地而尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213319_comment'></div>予未尝不中夜而起，喟然而流涕，以谓列祖纲宗至于陵夷者，非学者之罪，乃师之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213319_comment'></div>以苟认意识为智證，为师者之门望，见以轻慢之心萌矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213319_comment'></div>非特然也，又执己是而去取诸方，贱目睹而尊信传说，故不见至道之大全，古人之大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213319_comment'></div>因编五宗之训言，诸老之行事为之传，必书其悟法之由，必载其临终之异，以讥口耳授受之徒，谓之《禅林僧宝传》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213319_comment'></div>书成，而九嶷道人道隆阅之，一月而𡵻𡵻上口，两月而娓娓成诵，三月而能为末学者举纽领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213319_comment'></div>夏于云盖，闭门寝饭之外，口诵而录之，非诚著于学，志存于道，何能臻是哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213319_comment'></div>然其为人不甘为哑羊苾刍混处，疾之甚至于诟骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213319_comment'></div>喜与有识博闻者游，意所合则不问道俗，千里从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213319_comment'></div>呜呼，丛林博闻者，既不可人求之，而哑羊苾刍，动成阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213319_comment'></div>隆虽口受吾文，抱吾所集以游诸方，亦安能忘诟骂之喙乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213319_comment'></div>宣和二年秋，得得自山中来，出此编为示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213319_comment'></div>予佳其好学，为书其本末，以告未知隆者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1213319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　觉慈蓄李彭书，见之，为跋其后。作品：《跋李商老大书云庵偈二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213402?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋李商老大书云庵偈<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213402")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213402'>近世要人达官，其气焰摩层霄，而门可附而炙手者，不翅百千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213402_comment'></div>然其语言翰墨，人见之，皆如拒顽百姓见催租文，引恚视之，不弃掷幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213402_comment'></div>商老灌园脩水之上，而笔画一出，人争传宝，以相矜誇，吾是知道德无贫贱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213402_comment'></div>觉慈生一十年，去年从余，而知有商老，偶出所蓄一轴，见嬉喜而书其尾，且以雪道向无知之耻云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213402_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　元轼禅师易本际庵为甘露灭，以书招住之，为赋《归去来词》作品：《沩山空印禅师易本际庵为甘露灭以书招予归隐复赋归去来词》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沩山空印禅师易本际庵为甘露灭以书招予归隐复赋归去来词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213226")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213226'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213226'>归去来兮，沩山有人呼我归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213226'>碧暮云之凝合，空夜鹤之怨悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213226'>省一念之有差，虽百悔其何追。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213226'>探蚁穴之意适，俄梦觉而知非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213226'>幸牛羊之弗践，有坠露之沾衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213226'>恨无前知之明，及未著而知微。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213226'>缅怀万峰，如蹲如奔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1213226'>而烟霏开，窈窕其门。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1213226'>东庵西井，古迹犹存。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1213226'>俯拾枯松，旋安茶樽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1213226'>并两山之寒翠，煮万仞之潺颜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1213226'>想锸锹之寂子，对牧牛之懒安。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1213226'>妙机锋之虽触，无生死之相关。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1213226'>挹前辈之宏规，揆今事而默观。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1213226'>唯空印之中兴，取高风而追还。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1213226'>耿终力之弗寐，心欲绝而桓桓。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1213226'>归去来兮，永结无情之游。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1213226'>盖大欲之已去，复于世而何求？<div id='poem_sentence_17_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1213226'>笑朝三而莫四，纷众狙之喜忧。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1213226'>爱芙蓉之倚天，势独立而无畴。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1213226'>昔尚反顾，今则覆舟。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1213226'>弓精尽于九年，履考祥于一丘。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1213226'>卷正宗而怀之，悲末学之横流。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1213226'>如韩信之已死，而其心岂真休？<div id='poem_sentence_23_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1213226'>已矣乎，沩山吾归今其时，如鱼纵壑不可留。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1213226'>今而不归欲何之？<div id='poem_sentence_25_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1213226'>行以到为是，食以饱为期。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1213226'>虽灵根之深密，护空慧以培耔。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1213226'>听耆年之夜语，诵诸衲之清诗。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1213226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1213226'>知沙纕之非饭，情断意讫复何疑！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1213226_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　元轼禅师易本际庵为甘露灭，以书招住之，时未能往，作诗寄元轼。作品：《空印见招住庵时未能往作此寄之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>空印见招住庵时未能往作此寄之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521258")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521258'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521258'>独立天衣四世孙，作家手段典刑存。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521258'>大沩路峻诸方让，空印风高四海闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521258'>有愿欲依龙象众，无求羞逐鹜鸡群。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521258'>此生一聚灰中骨，终葬千峰顶上云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521258'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521258_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　元轼唱和，复用原韵答之。作品：《空印见和用韵答之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>空印见和用韵答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521259")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521259'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521259'>棋布诸方尽子孙，道缘浑似雪峰存。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521259'>全提盖色骑声句，直要临机以眼闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521259'>围绕千僧名冠世，指挥万象语惊群。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521259'>独能收此无家客，分占沩源一坞云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521259'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521259_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　送悟上人归沩山礼觐元轼。作品：《送悟上人归沩山礼觐》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送悟上人归沩山礼觐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520733")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520733'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520733'>乱峰踼卓不容数，宝构翔空盘万础。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520733'>沩源水作青莲香，攧雷溅雪出烟雨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520733'>住山老如大雄虎，暗谷行藏文彩露。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520733'>说禅不费丝毫力，以空为印印诸祖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520733'>道人乃是小于菟，气已食牛难共语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520733'>悠然踪迹似孤云，羡侬先我山中去。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520733'>会当出钵螺顶间，见此颀然秀眉宇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520733'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_520733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年8月1日</a>　八月初一，元轼自沩山过南台寺，夜语及山中之胜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年8月14日</a>　八月十四日，为元轼作《沩源记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213448' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沩源记</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213448")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213448_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213448'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213448'>岷江因山为名，初发泫然滥觞，漫衍而至楚，则为际天之云涛，万斛之舟，解风而不敢济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213448_comment'></div>沩山因水为名，众泉觱发于烟霏空翠之间，旋绀走碧，汇为方渊，蒸之成云雨，放之成江河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213448_comment'></div>盖岷江资之者众，而沩水善养其源也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213448_comment'></div>住山空印禅师笑曰：「一法界中，无假法者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213448_comment'></div>故揭于大仰堂之南荥曰沩源，欲学者观水之有源，知自心之灵源未尝竭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213448_comment'></div>盖岷江之资众，知众智之不可不学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213448_comment'></div>然先究自心，后资众智，道之序盖如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213448_comment'></div>故善财童子南询诸友，必曰：「我先发菩提心，如何名菩萨行」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213448_comment'></div>有人于此，因山中之气候，更四时之晴阴，入重重法界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213448_comment'></div>方其宿雾蒙蔽，微见渊色，则若凡夫，虽有染心，而性常明洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213448_comment'></div>雾开而澄滓，日光下彻，则若二乘已澄诸念，定慧超越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213448_comment'></div>更昏昕之湛然，视纤埃之不隔，则若人牛两忘，而蓑笠未彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213448_comment'></div>微风徐来，方渊鳞鳞波波之中，顿见方渊而波非大，方渊遍入众波而渊非小，则若歛目于楼阁之前，见三世于一念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213448_comment'></div>呜呼，沩山为湘南大丛林，而空印道光两本，挝大鼓，临人天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213448_comment'></div>万指围绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213448_comment'></div>今乃退藏于不言之中，借山泉为嵚体，听万象以说法，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213448_comment'></div>盖道不可以言传，故前圣贱言语，小譬喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213448_comment'></div>又欲学者自得之，故设象比兴，以达其意，鞞瑟支罗不言，佛身不可以色相求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213448_comment'></div>而供养栴檀，塔座多宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213448_comment'></div>如来不言，根尘俱寂，即是自身也，而以宝塔听经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213448_comment'></div>余观前圣莫不然，何独空印哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213448_comment'></div>宣和二年八月初吉，会余于湘西之濒，夜语及山中之胜，曰：「恨子未见吾泉，然强为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213448_comment'></div>余戏曰：「师以山泉为舌，为衲子说法界，自在缘起无生之法，而余以翰墨为五色藻，辩才而画图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213448_comment'></div>他日有寻流而得源，悟意而忘象者，可以拊手一笑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213448_comment'></div>中秋前一日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1213448_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年8月</a>　为元轼作诗题沩源。作品：《题沩源》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520983?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题沩源</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520983")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520983'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520983'>临机不堕照，如水已知源。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520983'>从此常流出，其声离语言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520983'>算沙嗟意马，捉月笑情猿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520983'>若解提空印，休登立雪轩<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《石门文字禅》卷九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520983'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520983_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a4916c0788bb4b3faf6598eedbfa3ae0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a4916c0788bb4b3faf6598eedbfa3ae0");'><span id='a4916c0788bb4b3faf6598eedbfa3ae0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>，50岁</div><div id='a4916c0788bb4b3faf6598eedbfa3ae0' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>返南台寺，闻九月十七德士复僧诏，换新度牒必输文五千，困窘，作文求檀越之化。作品：《德士复僧求化二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span>《德士复僧求化二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213626' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213626' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213626?labeling=true' target='_blank'>德士复僧求化疏<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213626")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213626_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213626'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213626'>寺虽律名，堂乃衲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213626_comment'></div>续香灯于永夕，纷禅诵以成群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213626_comment'></div>坐使古风，行于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213626_comment'></div>一昨教门，小有更变，加以冠巾，朅来圣恩，大为发扬，再除须发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213626_comment'></div>欢声震于夷夏，喜气动于龙天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213626_comment'></div>著旧僧衣，虽限一岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213626_comment'></div>换新度牒，必输五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213626_comment'></div>而家在异乡，客于贤里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213626_comment'></div>清净自活，望之如登天之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213626_comment'></div>檀信可干，成之若反掌之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213626_comment'></div>必有深怜之者，愿施不报之恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213626_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1213627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213627?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213627'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213627'>去年春，朝廷以钵食膜拜为西国之仪，乃诏僧尼，令衣褐顶冠，从中华之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213627_comment'></div>比奉圣恩，许还旧观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213627_comment'></div>人神交庆，夷夏增欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213627_comment'></div>仰惟圣主之心，实通天下之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213627_comment'></div>然每一名之度牒，必输五缗于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213627_comment'></div>如须必济之舟，如望及时之雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213627_comment'></div>顾惟齿发之外，凡皆檀信可成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213627_comment'></div>敢领众一登高门，愿因时以成胜事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213627_comment'></div>所施虽少，其利甚丰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213627_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>自居南台寺，僧众相从，拒之不得，然寺小僧众，故送僧外出乞食。作品：《送僧乞食序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213246' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213246' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213246?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧乞食序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213246")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213246_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213246'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213246'>曹溪六祖初以居士服至黄梅夜舂，以石坠腰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213246_comment'></div>牛头众乏粮，融乞于丹阳，自负米斛八斗，行八十里，朝去暮归，率以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213246_comment'></div>隆化惠满，所至破柴制履，百丈涅槃，开田说义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213246_comment'></div>坠腰石尚留东山，破柴斧犹存邺镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213246_comment'></div>江陵之西有负米庄，车轮之下有大义石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213246_comment'></div>衲子每以为游观，不可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213246_comment'></div>世远道丧，而妄庸寒乞之徒入我法中，其识尚不足以匡欲，其可荷大法也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213246_comment'></div>方叠花制袜以副丝绚，其可夜舂乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213246_comment'></div>纤罗剪袍以宜小袖，其可破柴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213246_comment'></div>升九仞之峻，仆夫汗血，不肯出舆，其可负米乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213246_comment'></div>方大书其门，云当寺今止挂搭，其肯开田说义乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213246_comment'></div>余尝痛心抚膺而叹者也，屡因弘法致祸，卒为废人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213246_comment'></div>方幸生还，逃遁山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213246_comment'></div>而衲子犹以其尝亲事云庵，故来相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213246_comment'></div>余畜之无义，拒之不可，即闭关坚卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213246_comment'></div>有扣其门而言者曰：「云庵法施如智觉爱众，如雪峰出其门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213246_comment'></div>今皆不然，道未尊而欲人之贵己，名不耀而畏人挨己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213246_comment'></div>下视禅者，如百世之冤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213246_comment'></div>谄事权贵，如累劫之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213246_comment'></div>师皆笑蹈此污而去，庶几云庵爪牙矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213246_comment'></div>于是蹶然而起曰：「然则无食奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213246_comment'></div>曰：「当从净檀行乞，亦如来大师之遗则也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213246_comment'></div>老人肯出，则庶使丛林知云庵典刑尚存」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213246_comment'></div>余嘉其言，因序古德事以慰其意，当有赏音者耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1213246_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>时南台寺有僧十九人，乃作文示施主以求供养。作品：《化供八首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_520947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题使台后圃八首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>会心堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520947")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520947'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520947'>称意有余乐，幽欢常会心。<div id='poem_content_520947'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520947'>称意有余乐，幽欢常会心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520947'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>门人愈、崇二弟子欲归江南，作偈送之。作品：《愈崇二子求偈归江南》<span target='_blank'>愈崇二子求偈归江南</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520972")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520972'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520972'>人笑南台小，难安十八僧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520972'>日贫因日富，宜减不宜增。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520972'>忽去两禅衲，如分一室灯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520972'>床宽齐顶礼，睡快免相憎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520972'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>元轼修普同塔成，遣侍者觉惠来求文，为作记。作品：《普同塔记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213447' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213447' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213447?labeling=true' target='_blank'>普同塔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213447")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213447_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213447'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213447'>人之有死生，如日之有明暗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213447_comment'></div>死生相寻于无穷，而明暗迭更，未始有既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213447_comment'></div>然知其明暗者，固自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213447_comment'></div>生顺而死逆，众生当其变，则骇异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213447_comment'></div>孔子但曰：「原始要终，知死生之故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213447_comment'></div>知其故则知其不骇，盖不欲深言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213447_comment'></div>庄子曰：「死生亦大矣，而不得与之变」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213447_comment'></div>既不与之变，当卓然而独存者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213447_comment'></div>庄子著其理而未尽其情，若西方之教，则痛言之而尽其情曰：若先有生而后有死者，则世未见不死而生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213447_comment'></div>若先有死而后有生者，亦未见有不生而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213447_comment'></div>譬如寻始末于环轮之上，求向背于虚空之中，则死生之情尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213447_comment'></div>自佛法入中国，奉持之者，缆总其法度，参差不齐，独百丈大智禅师以禅律之学，约之人情，折中而为法，以寿后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213447_comment'></div>故其生依法而住，谓之丛林；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213447_comment'></div>及其化也，依法而火之，聚骨石为塔，号普同塔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213447_comment'></div>诸方皆建塔近僧坊，远不过一牛鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213447_comment'></div>盖大众将送火化，则荷薪而临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213447_comment'></div>沩山独拘于阴阳之说，谓近寺不宜为葬地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213447_comment'></div>自开山迄今三百年，建塔于回心桥之南，其去寺十里，故亲临之法，往往不能继也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213447_comment'></div>空印禅师轼公住山十馀年，百废具兴，其所以安僧宜有者大备，独以普同塔未建为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213447_comment'></div>一旦与侍者登山之西崦，相其形胜，施长材鸠工以为之，开大穴以石为宫，又屋于其上，栋楹翔空，云烟蔽亏，万众欢呼，声应山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213447_comment'></div>兴修于宣和二年之春，断手于秋八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213447_comment'></div>空印恨未有记，以纪其岁月，遣侍者觉惠来求文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213447_comment'></div>余叹曰：丛林之衰，诸方皆轻僧，厌其多而窘于食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213447_comment'></div>空印既成堂宇，浩然如江河之无极，至者必纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213447_comment'></div>又为造塔以待其终，其敬僧荷法之心，可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213447_comment'></div>呜呼，僧者佛祖所自出，厌僧厌佛祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213447_comment'></div>安有称传佛祖之印，而反厌佛祖者，能契圣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213447_comment'></div>空印之意，可无书乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1213447_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为觉惠作清梦轩诗。作品：《惠侍者清梦轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>惠侍者清梦轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520846")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520846'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520846'>小轩面层崖，丛蕉手自种。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520846'>高风追二朗，生涯与师共。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520846'>默坐每观身，炉烟作云涌。<div id='poem_title_1213374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡山谷墨迹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1213374_comment'></div>宣和二年冬，涌师于湘西古寺中出以为示，如见苏、黄连璧下马，气如吐霓也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1213374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　为涌禅师题华光仲仁《鉴湖图》作品：《题华光鉴湖图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题华光鉴湖图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213331")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213331'>予建中靖国游西湖，航西兴，游浙东，以病不果，甚以为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213331_comment'></div>读东坡诗，见山川之精神，如儿稚对蜜知其甜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213331_comment'></div>今观《鉴湖图》，如华光戏以蜜置舌书间耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213331_comment'></div>涌师俄收之而去，儿稚虽痴，然亦知蜜不可如饭尝食之也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213331_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　作诗赠涌禅师。作品：《赠涌上人乃仁老子也》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521123?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠涌上人乃仁老子也</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_9_520651'>会看为天作喉舌，愿听高风淮海滨。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520651'>要知未必与世合，载之诣世世不答。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520651'>譬如瓶中有渑淄，虽与世混终不杂。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520651'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520651_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　残暑卧病，作诗次许顗韵。作品：《卧病次彦周韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卧病次彦周韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_8_520697'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520697_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　病脾气，李宜中教服仙茅，乃从许顗乞之，许呵其钝根败阙，得药，作诗谢之。作品：《余病脾气李宜中教余服仙茅乃从彦周乞之彦周袒肩荷临济呵余钝根败阙病辄服药是以生死为二耶得药作此谢之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520700?labeling=true' id='poem_content_520700'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520700'>嗟余早衰人，多病良业疾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520700'>脾劳禁晚餐，腿重怯下湿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520700'>尔来又增添，冷气攻胁脊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520700'>愁坐如蹲猿，呻吟喧四壁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520700'>闻世有仙茅，温中等金石。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520700'>恐能祛吾疾，侥倖延馀息。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520700'>恐余偷心在，指数烦口击。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520700'>负负无可言，颓然惭道力。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520700'>检蜜念慧远，诵咒忆罗什。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520700'>两翁例一笑，颠倒不足惜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520700'>世尊病须乳，侍者遣行乞。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520700'>达磨五遭毒，知毒乃敢食。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　许顗和其诗，复答之。作品：《彦周见和复答》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520701'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520701'>既有疾可示，非是都无疾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520701'>如春有阳燄，渴鹿想为湿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（以上《石门文字禅》卷一九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522214_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522214'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_522214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　时作《冷斋夜话》，尝记许顗言李元膺丧妻长短句，许顗见《冷斋夜话》评李商隐语，以为不妥，遂即时删去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年7月22日</a>　七月十五日，张廓然罢长沙之教官，渡湘，将北归，馆于道林寺，二十二日，陪张廓然游山，会于道林寺四绝堂者十人，以苏轼诗“故山去千里，佳处辄迟留”分字为韵，赋诗纪其事，分题得山字，又得先字，作二首。作品：《陪张廓然教授游山分题得山字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span>《又得先字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪张廓然教授游山分题得山字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年7月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520726")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520726'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520726'>先生如梁鸿，德耀亦爱山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520726'>湘西十日留，笑语烟云间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520726'>弄泉石梅坞，唤舟青蘋湾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520726'>藉草饮松下，松风当吹弹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520726'>二妙生清妍，山花插云鬟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520726'>粲然起为寿，舞袖相翩翻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520726'>先生堕帻醉，颇觉天地宽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520726'>醉语忽成诗，为题苍壁颜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520726'>城郭遥相望，但见千峰寒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520726'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520726_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又得先字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年7月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520727")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520727'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520727'>青山随处有，见之辄欣然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520727'>独于湘上山，欲买归休田。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520727'>此邦多君子，故欲吾终焉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520727'>先生人品高，白鸥春水前。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520727'>弟子亦<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作殊）</span>秀发，玉树相明鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520727'>颇怪翰墨场，亦著白发禅。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520727'>分题得难韵，下笔风雷旋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520727'>诗成愕众口，不复较后先。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520727'>闲中有此乐，安用食万钱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520727'>紫芝爱陆浑，遂为好事传。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520727'>悠然见眉宇，宁复羡遗编。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520727'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_520727_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年7月23日</a>　七月十五日，张廓然罢长沙之教官，渡湘，将北归，馆于道林寺，二十二日，陪张廓然游山，会于道林寺四绝堂者十人，以苏轼诗“故山去千里，佳处辄迟留”分字为韵，赋诗纪其事，次日，诸公皆以诗来，为作序。作品：《四绝堂分题诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四绝堂分题诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和三年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213262")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213262'>宣和三年秋七月，青社张廓然罢长沙之教官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213262_comment'></div>十五日，渡湘将北归，馆于道林寺，携家遍游湘山胜处，如人经故乡，恋恋不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213262_comment'></div>门弟子相守不舍，又如痴儿之嗜蜜，日追随于晴岚夕晖之间，笑语于千岩万壑之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213262_comment'></div>二十二日，会于四绝堂者十人，而余适至，廓然顾嗟叹息曰：「爱山吾天性，所以迟留未发者，眷此邦之多奇士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213262_comment'></div>不然，吾何适而不可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213262_comment'></div>余曰：「东坡尝曰：『故山去千里，佳处辄迟留』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213262_comment'></div>此语殆为公今日之游说也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213262_comment'></div>于是分其字以为韵，赋诗纪其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213262_comment'></div>未及点笔，会余有急客至，驰归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213262_comment'></div>廓然与诸公登清富堂，汲峰顶之泉，试壑源茶，下鹿苑寺，散坐于青林之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213262_comment'></div>久之，并岸而北，遂经槲林坞，至南台莫夜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213262_comment'></div>呼灯小酌，剧谈赋诗，诗成而情不尽，饮少而欢有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213262_comment'></div>是夕风高月黑，万树秋声，廓然长揖飘然而归道林，余使人秉炬追送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213262_comment'></div>明日，诸公皆以诗来，廓然曰：「湘西盖冠世绝境，而吾客皆韵人胜士，兹游也无愧山阴冶城子，宜序以冠群诗之首」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213262_comment'></div>余曰：「唯唯」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1213262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　作诗送张廓然。作品：《送廓然》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520728' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520728' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520728?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送廓然</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520728")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520728_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520728'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520728'>长沙古都会，何以冠荆楚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520728'>但曰财富强，山水最佳处。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520728'>那知号大藩，寔以英俊聚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520728'>张侯官虽冷，藉甚有名誉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520728'>心胸高崔嵬，万卷相撑拄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520728'>君看逸群姿，矫不受控御。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520728'>罢官当北归，一室哗儿女。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520728'>想见驼铎声，桑枣黄尘路。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520728'>倚马草十制，胆气见眉宇。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520728'>此职谁当之，夫子无愧负。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520728'>璧门黄金闺，独宿无晤语。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520728'>时应梦湘江，醉卧闻柔橹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520728'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520728_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　秋，萍乡文彦直还自京师，过南台，夜语及里中奇豪高侯。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年10月1日</a>　十月初一，了心（仲怀）禅师过南台，出示妙湛禅师思慧（廓然）示徒语，为作序。作品：《临平妙湛慧禅师语录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临平妙湛慧禅师语录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213258")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213258'>《传》曰：「虽无老成，尚有典刑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213258_comment'></div>典刑且次之，则老成盖前人所甚贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213258_comment'></div>又曰：「恶夫珷玞之乱玉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213258_comment'></div>则似之而非者，又其所甚疾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213258_comment'></div>贵老成，疾似之而非者，一人之情，千万人之情是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213258_comment'></div>近世禅学者之弊，如珷玞之乱玉，枝词蔓说似辩博，钩章棘句似迅机，苟认意识似至要，懒惰自放似了达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213258_comment'></div>始于二浙，炽于江淮，而馀波末流，滔滔汩汩于京、洛、荆、楚之间，风俗为之一变，识者忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213258_comment'></div>俄有丛林老成者崭然出于东吴，说法于钱塘，诸方衲子愿见争先，川输云委于座下，法席之盛，无愧圆照大通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213258_comment'></div>于是天子闻其名，驿召至京师，住大相国寺智海禅院，是谓妙湛禅师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213258_comment'></div>慧公未尝贬剥，而诸方屈伏，不动声气，而万僧让雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213258_comment'></div>彼似之而非者，不攻而自破，如郭中令之单骑见虏，孔北海之高气詟魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213258_comment'></div>以其荷负大法，故称法窟龙象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213258_comment'></div>以其搏噬邪解，故称宗门爪牙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213258_comment'></div>余与禅师游旧，且少相好，不见之二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213258_comment'></div>宣和三年十月初吉，有仲怀禅者过余湘上，出其示徒语为示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213258_comment'></div>昔莲花为聪道者作礼，曰云门儿孙犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213258_comment'></div>余则以手加额，望临平呼曰：岂雪窦显公复为吴人说法乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213258_comment'></div>何其似之多也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213258_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年10月</a>　与了心夜语，作诗怀思慧、有规二禅师。作品：《心上座余故人慧廓然之嗣而规方外之犹子也过余于湘上夜语有怀廓然方外作两绝》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span>《心上座余故人慧廓然之嗣而规方外之犹子也过余于湘上夜语有怀廓然方外作两绝》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521958?labeling=true' target='_blank'>心上座余故人慧廓然之嗣而规方外之犹子也过予于湘上夜语有怀廓然方外作两绝<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521958")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521958_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521958'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521958'>十年不得吴中耗，凋尽耆年付等閒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521958'>闻道瘦规颜愈少，独馀此老殿湖山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521958'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521958_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521957?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521957'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521957'>风骨东瓯语带吴，见君满眼是西湖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521957'>径山河上今佳否，想见年来鬓亦枯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521957'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年10月</a>　万公弟子简素客南台寺，出示其师之瓦瓢，为作赞。作品：《瓦瓢赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瓦瓢赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522213")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522213_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522213'>南昌西山有异人，年三百馀，面有孺子之色。多往来蒲城弋阳之间，童稚呼以为万公。宣和二年重九，殁于朝奉郎宣骥骏元之家。以大瓮二口合而葬之后圃。十月，弟子简素先生用临川隐者马安道之语来发瓮。但馀瓦瓢弊履，而万公不见，盖尸解也。明年十月，简素客湘西之南台寺，追绎其师之懿行潜德，出此瓢以相示，戏为之赞：</div><div id='poem_preface_522213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522213'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522213'>异哉此瓢，脩吭矬身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522213'>弗生爪蔓，生陶家轮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522213'>我疑其中，藏十洲春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522213'>昔有列仙，杂于市人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522213'>屋檐悬之，自旦及申。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522213'>辄入其中，偃仰而卧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522213'>而楼居者，见之胆破。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522213'>遂从之游，推挤莫可。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522213'>挽而同登，相向而坐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522213'>如四老人，会商山果。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522213'>唯简素公，道貌天容。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522213'>岂其人欤，出处略同。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522213'>道山岿然，弱水之东。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522213'>何时来归，泠然御风。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522213'>而以此瓢，挂之瘦筇。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522213'>我作妙语，天葩粲红。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522213'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_522213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522213'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522213_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　许顗将北归，作诗送之。作品：《送彦周》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520703' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520703' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520703?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送彦周</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520703")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520703_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520703'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520703'>虞卿脱魏齐，弃意与俱去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520703'>公卿一破甑，掉臂不复顾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520703'>萧何追韩信，弃车遂徒走。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520703'>贪贤如攫金，不见市人聚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520703'>会合意倾写，掩书想风度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520703'>彦周虽绿发，风味映前古。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520703'>高论倾座人，能破万毁誉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520703'>独立傲世波，屹然如砥柱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520703'>令人每见之，不敢发鄙语。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520703'>推堕吾法中，偃蹇揖佛祖。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520703'>死生人所怖，玩之于掌股。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520703'>此生几离别，此别觉酸楚。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520703'>夜寒众峰高，独看霜月吐。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520703'>明日解归舟，西风白蘋浦。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520703'>君去我独留，苍茫烟水暮。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520703'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_520703_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年10月</a>　十六日，真净克文忌日，作偈祭之。作品：《云庵生辰十一首》（其九）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云庵生辰十一首<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：后有政和二年琼南时作。）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522042")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522042'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522042'>云庵化去二十载，今日重闻说法音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522042'>觌露全身太分晓，森罗万象自平沈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522042'>攀缘路绝无生死，栽接情忘透古今。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522042'>此老伤慈真故态，依前饶舌老婆心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522042'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522042_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　代彭以功为僧守道作宝峰院记。作品：《宝峰院记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝峰院记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213455")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213455'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213455'>余家筠溪，溪出新吴车轮峰之阳，其阴凤皇、幕阜诸峰，黛横玉立，娠奇畜秀，解楚山而益峻，隋朝而来，为得道者所庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213455_comment'></div>又黄龙、龙安、兴化、云岩四大刹，皆其遗地，相去百里，丛林之盛，冠映诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213455_comment'></div>自大长老宝觉、佛寿相续而兴，禅学宗天下，衲子动成阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213455_comment'></div>而宝峰善思院者，世以律居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213455_comment'></div>然夕灯午梵，斋鱼茶板，与四大刹者争雄长，而凤皇、幕阜之雄深，亦让其形胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213455_comment'></div>余外舅家西安，往来闻之熟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213455_comment'></div>宣和三年罢官临汝，道经双井而造焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213455_comment'></div>渡溪东望，奇峰峻冈，堕吾马首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213455_comment'></div>据鞍回视，飞楹画栋，翔出林表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213455_comment'></div>入重门，顾两庑翼如而入焉，禅斋云堂，绿疏青琐，大殿层阁，涂金间碧，像设之妙，服具之华，见者知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213455_comment'></div>登法堂，望寝室，窅然靖深，耆年僧雏，倒屣迎客，客至如归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213455_comment'></div>退视其私，则厨库廪厩，莫不整洁，游衲解包，颐指如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213455_comment'></div>于是慨然叹曰：「谁为之者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213455_comment'></div>何其材乃尔有馀耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213455_comment'></div>住持僧守道曰：「院基于唐，有田亩山林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213455_comment'></div>五代烽火之馀，券牒亡失，多为比邻所侵，院因荒残，如逃亡人家者二十馀年，诏赐今额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213455_comment'></div>熙宁之初，僧圆智者白官，请牒来居焉，有恢复之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213455_comment'></div>未几物故，至是化为麋鹿狐豹之区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213455_comment'></div>元祐六年，县以玉溪僧子瘦领住持事，经画三年，未举而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213455_comment'></div>守道实传器于瘦者，母李氏，悯其颓坏，施妆奁以开垦田亩，用阴阳家之说，下旧院百步，伐山为基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213455_comment'></div>鸠工于崇宁元年之春，断手于政和八年之秋，而吾院克成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213455_comment'></div>其弟守达者实阴相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213455_comment'></div>余闻曹溪祖师也，而腰石夜舂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213455_comment'></div>牛头宗师也，而躬自负米，皆以供僧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213455_comment'></div>及其衰也，称嗣祖传法者，护食而拒僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213455_comment'></div>道公于是时，乃能犯拒僧者之怒而延纳之，此心日月不能老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213455_comment'></div>道曰：「吾非有心，以时特爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213455_comment'></div>惜普光禅师与众力耕，见金而不取，同伴诘之，曰：『今吾未用也，俟吾他日』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213455_comment'></div>把茅盖头，资以饭僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213455_comment'></div>味其存心，与今认十方僧物为己有者异矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213455_comment'></div>道慧敏而老，其立事有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213455_comment'></div>遣其徒宝宗来求文以记，余爱道所论，并为书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1213455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　许顗寄诗来，次韵答之。作品：《彦周以诗见寄次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520702_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520702'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520702'>两诗护宗旨，万仞仰峻岭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520702'>攀缘不可及，妙语出锋颖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520702'>钝根遭讥诃，正坐不勇猛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520702'>譬如策疲羸，强以扛九鼎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520702'>顽冥虽难化，岂不发深省。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520702'>坐令跛驴心，奋迅起驰骋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520702'>爱君辩纵横，又畏面严冷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520702'>直谅有如子，敢不加虔诇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520702'>归来渡湘江，一叶浮万顷。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　闻许顗作出家庵，又自为铭，作诗寄之。作品：《彦周法弟作出家庵又自为铭作此寄之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521249'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521249'>迂阔庵成又自誇，要令妙语发天葩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521249'>未容临济终仆地，正赖云门已出家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521249_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521249'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　冬，陪陈思忠县令、李得孚县令、杜司录岳麓祈雪，以“岳麓祈雪”四字分韵得岳字，作诗和杜司录。作品：《和杜司录岳麓祈雪分韵得岳字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_520770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和杜司录岳麓祈雪分韵得岳字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520770")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520770_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520770'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520770'>岁晚湘水滨，黄尘似河朔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520770'>江流涸欲尽，瓶罂汲馀浊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520770'>闹<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作忽）</span>闻双旌出，千骑烁山岳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520770'>雪云卷山去，天宇献辽邈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520770'>娇<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作昏）</span>鸦集风枝，冻鹤时俛啄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520770'>谭兵杜牧之，赋诗果横槊。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520770'>山虽非故人，识面亦已数。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520770'>文章固馀事<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作丰年属胜游）</span>，正尔全<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作与我同）</span>三乐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520770'>太丘令国器，谠议久扬榷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520770'>长吉有美才，崭然见头角。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520770'>君看分韵诗，夭力那容学。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520770'>嗟余老山林，辈流殊龌龊。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520770'>宁料寒窘中，见此三卓荦。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520770'>和诗无杰句，钝涩费磨琢。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520770'>穷略似孟郊，必劣追韩偓。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520770_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520770'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_520770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>　冬，陪陈思忠县令、李得孚县令、杜司录岳麓祈雪，以“岳麓祈雪”四字分韵得岳字，作诗和杜司录，又以麓字韵和李德孚县令。作品：《和李令祈雪分韵得麓字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和李令祈雪分韵得麓字</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_520810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520810'>江寒云怒相摹胡，雪意欲作先停蓄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520810'>连空推下翻玉英，想见轩渠笑捧腹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520810'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520810_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　新年，作偈三首送亲上人外出乞食。作品：《送亲上人乞食三首》（其一）<span "poem_title_521986")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521986_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521986'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521986'>荆簪女，工采桑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521986'>画鸦女，衣罗纨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521986'>赤脚人，趁兔鹿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521986'>著靴人，饱食肉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521986'>百丈出家不害痴，一日不作一日饥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521986'>后生十指不点水，得便宜是落便宜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521986'>亲禅学道不檐板，自然公办私亦办。<div id='poem_sentence_6_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_521986'>新年持钵走衡湘，要令一众毛孔香。<div id='poem_sentence_7_521986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_521986'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_521986_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521987?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521987'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521987'>虽应锋机，不是语句。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521987'>鸭寒下水，鸡寒上树。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521987'>不妨办众，推究自己。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521987'>一手摸鱼，一手戽水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521987'>推开三玄玉锁，揩拭同真十智。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521987'>要知天下南台，口含三十六齿。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_521987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_521987'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_521987_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521988?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521988'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521988'>以有梦幻身，安能亸饥渴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521988'>剃头舍饰好，则以乞为活。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521988'>鍊尽世间心，方称閒披衲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521988'>格言非汝欺，馀尘尚诸学。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521988'>吾师三界尊，食时亦持钵。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521988'>春风吹湘云，万峰寒踢卓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521988'>出门一句子，团团生四角。<div id='poem_sentence_6_521988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_521988'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_521988_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年1月7日</a>　正月初七人日，为觉慈跋苏轼书简。作品：《跋东坡书简》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡书简</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和四年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213358")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213358'>王逸少骨鲠，颜平原刚正，两公皆有立朝大节，而后世以字画称，予尝嗟惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213358_comment'></div>然名德之重，故世珍其笔迹，盖理之固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213358_comment'></div>东坡之于王、颜，又其逸群绝尘者，其法权极可宝秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213358_comment'></div>宣和四年人日，觉慈轴以来示予，予忻然喜其嗜好，若可教也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年2月22日</a>　二月二十二日，湘西真身禅寺新堂成，同道林法云禅师、鹿苑元禅师往登览，元禅师请以待月名其堂，为住持妙德禅师作序。作品：《待月堂序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213467' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213467' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213467?labeling=true' target='_blank'>待月堂序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213467")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213467_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213467'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213467'>宣和四年二月辛亥，湘西真身禅寺新堂成，余同道林真教禅师、鹿苑希一禅师往登焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213467_comment'></div>堂临晴湖，日光下彻，俯见游鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213467_comment'></div>聚立纵望，湘西山云之纤秾，草木之深密，一览而尽得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213467_comment'></div>真教拊栏哦曰：「山边水边待月明，暂向人间借路行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213467_comment'></div>而今却向山边去，只有湖水无行路」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213467_comment'></div>语未卒，住持禅师妙德欣然曰：「吾经行诸方倦矣，既老来归，将为终焉之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213467_comment'></div>此句是吾心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213467_comment'></div>希一请以待月名其堂，而使寂音记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213467_comment'></div>德公得法于智海佛印清公，临济十世孙，世为泉南人，朴茂而历落者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213467_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　春，萍乡高侯以书求为布景堂作记。作品：《布景堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213450' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213450' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213450?labeling=true' target='_blank'>布景堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213450")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213450_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213450'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213450'>宣和三年秋，萍乡文益之还自大梁，过湘上会余，夜语及里中奇豪，而高侯尤其魁垒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213450_comment'></div>侯学精敏而齿少，行修洁而材高，虽隐约寂寞之滨，而名满缙绅之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213450_comment'></div>所居有风泉云壑之胜，茂林脩竹之美，四时之景，阴晴异态，秾纤毕见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213450_comment'></div>构亭佳处，而名之曰布景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213450_comment'></div>余因得其为人，而想见其处，恨未能与益之从侯相佯乎其上，援笔而赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213450_comment'></div>越明年春，以书抵余曰：「山川之妍美，阅古今而不尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213450_comment'></div>万物之荣谢，供四时而无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213450_comment'></div>然特若为闲适者所施设，而为悲愁者所乾没也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213450_comment'></div>玉轮流辉，苍崖哀湍，天下之清绝也，而倚娉婷者不见，节丝竹者不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213450_comment'></div>昼公曰「月色静中见，泉声幽处闻」者，讥之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213450_comment'></div>红艳之闲美，鸣禽之过前，物外之奇观也，而忧国者以为悲，行役者以为愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213450_comment'></div>少陵曰「感时花溅泪，恨别鸟惊心」者，哀之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213450_comment'></div>吾口先王之法言，逢至治之圣世，勤田园以供伏腊，玩琴书以娱宾客，偏亲慈和而耳目聪明，弟昆孝友而乐易贤雅，所谓悲愁者于我亦安能神哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213450_comment'></div>以吾之闲适，较市朝当十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213450_comment'></div>吾亭虽陋，然万景分布吾前，受吾约束，真造物之为施设，非经营而得招要而至者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213450_comment'></div>子其为我书之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213450_comment'></div>余曰：昔支遁之爱山，乃买沃洲之小岭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213450_comment'></div>贺知章之爱水，特上疏以乞鉴湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213450_comment'></div>其风味虽清妙，而正所谓经营招要者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213450_comment'></div>若之紫芝则不然，偶爱陆浑山水之佳，遂留六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213450_comment'></div>余观高侯之趣味，殆亦紫芝之流，乃欣然为记之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213450_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为萍乡高侯作钓鱼台诗。作品：《高氏钓鱼台》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高氏钓鱼台</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520521")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520521'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520521'>当时吕望要周室，渭水垂纶恣遗佚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520521'>后来严陵傲汉家，七里滩头钓月华。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520521'>二贤一旦辞隐沦，当年平步升青云。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520521'>至今踪迹耀经史，千载何人能继此。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520521'>宜阳高人真贤族，构亭仍以钓鱼目。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520521'>君不见吴山青，湘水绿，唯爱夏弦春诵声相续。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520521_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520521'>以轲雄百氏为丝纶，以周孔六经为饵属。<div
