ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　周达道校证《北里志》，跋其后。作品：《跋北里志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋北里志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213345")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213345'>《春秋传》书六鹢退飞，石陨五，微事也，何足书乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213345_comment'></div>先儒曰：「圣人之意，以谓如鹢与石，无预于道德性命之理，且犹谨严详次如此，况道德性命乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213345_comment'></div>《北里志》戏剧之文，而达道校證藏之，岂五石六鹢之意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213345_comment'></div>舒王曰：「司马君实平生大过人者，临事不苟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213345_comment'></div>于达道亦云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　跋周达道所蓄伶玄《赵飞燕外传》作品：《跋达道所蓄伶子于文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋达道所蓄伶子于文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213346")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213346_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213346'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213346'>风行水上，涣然成文者，非有意于为文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213346_comment'></div>余读此传，盖通德娓娓而语，子于笔追而书之，非有意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213346_comment'></div>然通德所论惠男子，殆天下名言，吾以谓子于之室有此婢，如维摩诘之有天女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213346_comment'></div>达道手校诸书，而此本最美，非好古博雅，何以至是？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213346_comment'></div>司马君实无所嗜好，独蓄墨数百尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213346_comment'></div>或以为言，君实曰：「吾欲子孙知吾所用此物何为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213346_comment'></div>达道之蓄书，其亦司马之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1213346", 1213346, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>墨癖</span>也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213346_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年4月9日</a>　四月九日，作书与陈瓘，遣人走楚州送之，发书当日，陈瓘卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　先上人自江西来，示潜庵清源禅师画像，作偈送之。作品：《送先上人亲潜庵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_521984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送先上人亲潜庵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521984")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521984'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521984'>潜庵九十一，自是百岁人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521984'>造物偶遗漏，顿置漳水滨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521984'>先禅江西来，邈得渠侬真。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521984'>展挂雪色壁，毛发皆精神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521984'>三玄合水乳，五位透金尘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521984'>譬如百衲帔，岁晚思惠新。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521984'>臊僧不肯信，眼肉悬千斤。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为先上人题清源禅师书。作品：《题潜庵书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213309?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题潜庵书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213309")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213309_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213309'>《传》曰：「有国者非谓有乔木也，谓有世臣也」。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　作《智证传》，离合宗教，引事比类，折衷禅宗五家宗旨。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　注《云岩宝镜三昧》，中有以《易》之卦解曹洞宗五位君臣者，注毕，作诗一首纪之。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_521196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521196'>圆伊三点分宾主，妙挟双明绝正偏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213317' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213317?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题范上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213317_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213317'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213317'>蚍蜉细字欲阑斑，病眼临窗看亦难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213317_comment'></div>八十一人闲鼻孔，那卢穿在一毫端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213317_comment'></div>且道有鼻孔，从范上座穿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213317_comment'></div>只如怀禅师无鼻孔，作么生下手？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213317_comment'></div>若也道得西川漏篮子，一钱买三个；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213317_comment'></div>若道不得，南台门外是湘江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213317_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213317_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　潭州知州曾孝序遴选诸方禅师十余人住持湘南名刹，为之作疏，请道林法云禅师住持龙王寺。作品：《请道林云老住龙王诸山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213585' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213585'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213585'>诸方丛社，盛莫甚于湘中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213585_comment'></div>五派家风，传莫密于洞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213585_comment'></div>号称法窟，指曰道林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213585_comment'></div>盖旃檀林郁密，不与荆棘并生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213585_comment'></div>则真虎行藏，岂容彪兕止住？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213585_comment'></div>恭惟某人枯木嫡子，芙蓉长孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213585_comment'></div>应缘东吴，知名南楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213585_comment'></div>金篦刮膜，廓开空劫光明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213585_comment'></div>宝鉴当台，顿见今时影迹。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请宝觉臻禅师住天宁寺。作品：《请宝觉臻公住天宁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213583' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213583'>佛之法道，世所追崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213583_comment'></div>虽外护付诸王臣，然荷负必须龙象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213583_comment'></div>咨之于众，爱憎或出于人情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213583_comment'></div>公则生明，真伪难逃于智鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213583_comment'></div>来膺妙选，果得耆年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213583_comment'></div>伏惟宝觉大士臻公，以禅寂为家乡，以翰墨为游戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213583_comment'></div>閒房古寺，甘毕生于折脚铛中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213583_comment'></div>各梦同床，曾失笑于破头山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213583_comment'></div>而判府待制妙于庞老识丹霞，初不出门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213583_comment'></div>应叹仲尼知伯雪，犹资击目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213583_comment'></div>今日重新法席，一时共赞天宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213583_comment'></div>演畅宗乘，聚三湘之云衲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213583_comment'></div>祝延睿算，同万国之山呼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213583_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请沩山湘书记住神鼎山。作品：《请湘公住神鼎》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213582'>道不可传，则释迦不当饶舌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213582_comment'></div>法如可说，则维摩岂得无言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213582_comment'></div>赖离微不犯之锋机，决祖宗未了底公案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213582_comment'></div>要须圆融之士，密开方便之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213582_comment'></div>恭惟某人少小偶家沩山，寅缘亲承空印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213582_comment'></div>譬如懒融道者，坐致双峰祖师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213582_comment'></div>熏烝见闻，霜露成熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213582_comment'></div>蕴醉显举足之辩，有白云越阃之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213582_comment'></div>领神鼎之名山，适丛林中兴之日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213582_comment'></div>行雪窦之正令，酬王臣外护之恩。<div class='inline' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213589_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213589'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213589'>湖南报慈寺，天下选佛场。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请殊禅师住云峰。作品：《请殊公住云峰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213584' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213584")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213584'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213584'>有志于立事，而事之竟成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213584_comment'></div>无心于求名，而名之不舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213584_comment'></div>似水滴石，积之以日而石自穿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213584_comment'></div>如麝匿香，覆之以缶而香愈著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213584_comment'></div>非形势之激尔，盖物理之固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213584_comment'></div>恭惟某人东林广惠之曾孙，南岳慈觉之嫡子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213584_comment'></div>撝谦荣利，嘉遁丛林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213584_comment'></div>王臣悦闻，授以传衣之职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213584_comment'></div>道俗勤请，愿闻飞锡之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213584_comment'></div>龙象毕临，山川改观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213584_comment'></div>昔时把定，俗子涴我白毡巾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213584_comment'></div>今日放行，真珠撒出紫罗帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213584_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213584_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请了心禅师住东明寺。作品：《请东明疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213587?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请东明疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213587")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213587_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213587'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213587'>云门之宗风，昔中兴于雪窦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213587_comment'></div>而雪窦之法派，今特盛于临平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213587_comment'></div>声名振于诸方，道德冠于列祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213587_comment'></div>登其法席，夫岂庸流？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213587_comment'></div>恭惟某人久游临平之门，饫闻云门之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213587_comment'></div>薄游南楚，混迹东明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213587_comment'></div>钵具笑移，大类云居之简；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213587_comment'></div>使符自至，未惭沩水之诠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213587_comment'></div>朱紫堵观，道俗云集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213587_comment'></div>升堂作象王，回旋则是真顾鉴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213587_comment'></div>酬机如师子，返掷则不涉离微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213587_comment'></div>愿赴王臣外护之勤，为扬针水不传之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213587_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213587_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请海印奭禅师住云盖。作品：《又疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213592' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213592' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213592?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213592")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213592_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213592'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213592'>观名实无当而万法本闲，何必不物于物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213592_comment'></div>如天地不言而四时自运，是谓无功之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213592_comment'></div>所以有言忌犯当头，自然临机不留朕迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213592_comment'></div>其妙见于此耳，孰能神而明之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213592_comment'></div>恭惟某人遍领名蓝，久临清众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213592_comment'></div>芬芝兰之声誉，皎冰雪之行藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213592_comment'></div>衣裓谢聚落之氛，谈笑有山林之韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213592_comment'></div>一音普證，万指齐瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213592_comment'></div>海印成章，檄祖令于教外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213592_comment'></div>宝云作盖，施法雨于人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213592_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213592_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请云盖奭禅师茶榜。作品：《请云盖奭老茶榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213590' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1213590_comment'></div>至于流末之馀，驯成戏论之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213590_comment'></div>师承大坏，法道寖微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213590_comment'></div>妄庸假我以偷安，名实因兹而愈滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213590_comment'></div>坐令洞上之宗风，来振湘中之法席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213590_comment'></div>果逢神颖，为整颓纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213590_comment'></div>恭惟某人芙蓉嫡孙，枯木真子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213590_comment'></div>疏通莅众，故遇缘则应；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213590_comment'></div>折节荷法，故律身甚严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213590_comment'></div>名誉排缙绅齿牙，威仪为道俗指目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213590_comment'></div>諠哗沙步，争传孤锡之重来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213590_comment'></div>狼藉封云，正赖清风之一扫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213590_comment'></div>敢荐蘋藻之馔，用庆丛林之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213590_comment'></div>未离旃檀之林，一句百味具足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213590_comment'></div>行据狻猊之座，三玄五位纵横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213590_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213590_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为潭州知州曾孝序作疏，请云盖奭禅师药石榜。作品：《又药石榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213591' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213591")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213591'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213591'>坐致王臣之劝请，蔚为缁白之荣观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213591_comment'></div>脱烦笼如蝉蜕尘埃，遂深隐如豹藏烟雾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213591_comment'></div>敢庆常规之苛礼，特陈过午之伊蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213591_comment'></div>恭惟某人满腹精神，实头声价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213591_comment'></div>不住城隍聚落，久藏禅板蒲团。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213591_comment'></div>要成保社丛林，敢负火刀直裰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213591_comment'></div>以云作盖，故我宗得妙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213591_comment'></div>以海为印，故按指发光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213591_comment'></div>挟路通途，则一日两兼名刹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213591_comment'></div>回机转位，则四年三易道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213591_comment'></div>重重锦缝，解合枯木开花；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213591_comment'></div>片片赤心，果见泥牛入海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213591_comment'></div>特迂威重，普共證明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213591_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213591_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　代为奭禅师作贺北禅寺子方禅师书。作品：《代云盖贺北禅方老书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代云盖贺北禅方老书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1213231_comment'></div>流通法藏，乃释子之本心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213231_comment'></div>于其可为之时，盖亦何胶于迹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213231_comment'></div>远公老矣，竟不过于虎溪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213231_comment'></div>南阳翻然，乃肯来于凤阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213231_comment'></div>观其以道自重则或异，惟其以身徇法则皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213231_comment'></div>伏惟某人清明在躬，淳化接物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213231_comment'></div>凡于闻见，无不欢哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213231_comment'></div>属叨疾衰，尚稽展对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213231_comment'></div>谨奉启陈贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213231_comment'></div>春色向暄，尤冀珍重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520658' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520658?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵明应仲宗传送供</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520658")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520658_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520658'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520658'>老住江上村，随分亦迎送。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520658_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520658'>陪堂一钵饭，不得日日供。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520658_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>与洗妒悭，何止愈头痛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520658_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520658'>吾闻佛事门，同宗而异用。<div 原缺，据武林本补</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520658_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年8月</a>　八月初，得陈瓘讣，七日，饭僧为陈瓘荐冥福，时洪州昙珠禅师携陈瓘书轴来，为跋其后。作品：《跋了翁书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213380?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋了翁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213380")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213380_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213380'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213380'>宣和二年夏得翁书：「前去无日矣，能复一来相见乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213380_comment'></div>翁平生刚方，吐言如刀锯，而此书若悽冷，私怪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213380_comment'></div>明年四月遣书走山阳，八月人还云：「翁方发书日下世矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213380_comment'></div>盖四月九日也，闻之酸鼻累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213380_comment'></div>翁视死生一戏耳，予重为天下惜此人品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213380_comment'></div>翁知国如陆忠公，临大节不夺如颜鲁公，文章光明赡博如白乐天，通达宗教如裴公美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213380_comment'></div>然四公者，皆享富贵，建功名，死无遗恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213380_comment'></div>而翁兼四公之长，而以一斥不能复，遂坐废三十年，予所以追悼而不去心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213380_comment'></div>八月七日，方饭僧荐冥福，病卧，刺然刀画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213380_comment'></div>而南州珠上人携此轴来，读之而长叹，哲人逝矣，予何所税驾乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213380_comment'></div>此去死生一决耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213380_comment'></div>珠包腰一钵，苦硬有胆气，而能蓄此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213380_comment'></div>今丛林禅和子以为何种故纸，然则珠殆亦有佳处，因为流涕而书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1213380_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为昙珠题所蓄诗卷。作品：《题珠上人所蓄诗卷》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题珠上人所蓄诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213330")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213330'>予于文字，未尝有意，遇事而作，多适然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213330_comment'></div>譬如枯株，无故蒸出菌芝，儿稚喜争攫取之，而枯株无所损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213330_comment'></div>宝峰珠上人，湛堂公之高弟，其为人精敏能办事，于佛事欲营之，盖不知艰崄为何等物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213330_comment'></div>在丛林中为众推，盖其气不受控勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213330_comment'></div>日涉园夫李商老，每于人物特慎许可，而赠珠以诗，曰「喷玉渥洼种」者，佳湛堂之有子也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213330_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　跋江公望所作愿文，愿文乃山本禅师作序，陈瓘作跋。作品：《跋江民表愿文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋江表民愿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213383")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213383'>世尊论学道，特言富贵为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213383_comment'></div>表民官为左司，风节凛然，天下畏仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213383_comment'></div>贵显矣，而与其夫人俞氏一饭奉身，清净自活，毕世真如德生童子、有德童女，岂特求于今为鲜，虽从古人中求亦无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213383_comment'></div>予阅其愿文，广大坚固，深切著明，真黑暗崖之火炬，生死海之舟楫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213383_comment'></div>为之序者，净慈禅师退然，才中人，而以大法为己任，如雪窦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213383_comment'></div>为之跋者，延平了翁，立朝正色，刚而有礼，愈斥而愈忠，如鲁公：皆表民之友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213383_comment'></div>而三友者，联翩欲删去，予而自游普贤愿海又可乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　于长沙南楚门舟中为杜绾作《五老砚铭》作品：《五老砚铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213513'>杜季杨奉使湘南，过九江，见庐山而爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213513_comment'></div>得拳石于九嶷山之下，类五老峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213513_comment'></div>有坳其痕如砚，季杨欣然置几案间，名之曰五老砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213513_comment'></div>岂其游戏，分身则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213513_comment'></div>下有坳处，形如玉渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_520853'>道山归计好，高情付疏慵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520853'>何独谢夫人，特有林下风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520853'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520853_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520854?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520854'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520854'>暮年一杯春，愁边<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作春愁）</span>赖开拓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520854'>醉乡归路稳，城郭见隐约。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520854'>万事付颓然，破帻风堕落。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520854'>胸次竟何有，八窗洞空廓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520854'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520854_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　元勋知县寄诗来，次其韵。作品：《次韵元不伐知县见寄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵元不伐知县见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520720")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520720'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520720'>我读元侯诗，崄若过惊浪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520720'>忽于旋涡中，溅雪涌千嶂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520720'>又如曹征西，唾手缚袁尚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520720'>又如花间春，熟视迷背向。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520720'>何从得此客，要是万夫望。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520720'>少年翰墨场，开口取卿相。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520720'>低摧牛刀中，轩特见雅量。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520720'>君看风月湖，自是无尽藏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520720'>应手物华妙，纤秾见情状。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520720'>平生冥搜眼，已照鲍谢上。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520720'>自当走奇勋，岂止称师匠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520720'>嗟余衰退者，那敢论辈行。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520720'>正如羊叔子，坚卧答陆抗。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520720'>诗成急雨来，扫尽层云障。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520720'>重惭无杰句，酬君语豪壮。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520720'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_520720_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　偶于南台寺寂音堂壁题诗。作品：《偶书寂音堂壁三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>偶书寂音堂壁三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521285")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521285'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521285'>霜须瘴面老垂垂，瘦搭诗肩古佛依。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521285'>灭迹尚嫌身是累，此生永与世相违。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521285'>残经倦读闲凭几，幽鸟独闻常掩扉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521285'>寝处法华安乐行，荡除五十二年非<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《石门文字禅》卷一二）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521285'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　九月二十七日夜，为众说《参同契》，灯下为弟子福唐太淳上人书题《僧宝传》后。作品：《题淳上人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题淳上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213315")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213315'>问：「如何是火性」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「热是火性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213315_comment'></div>问：「如何是水性」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「湿是水性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213315_comment'></div>问者欣然而有得，水火之义尽于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213315_comment'></div>又问：「何以谓之恕」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「如我之心以待人则恕矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213315_comment'></div>又问：「何以谓之慎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「心之一具德见于慎耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213315_comment'></div>问者又欣然有得，盖恕、慎之理极于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213315_comment'></div>此世间义理之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213315_comment'></div>义理者，心之尘垢也，其去佛道不翅如百亿天渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213315_comment'></div>然昔者有问竹林：「如何是法身」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「法身无相」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213315_comment'></div>又问：「如何是法眼」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213315_comment'></div>答曰：「法眼无瑕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213315_comment'></div>为道吾众中，所失笑者宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213315_comment'></div>近世邪师相与传授，谓无有悟，但直问直答，谓之于法中不生异见，纷然棋布名山，称嗣祖、沙门，学者例无英气，往往甘心屈伏，每为之流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213315_comment'></div>宣和四年九月二十七日夜，为众说《参同契》，至「本末须归宗，尊卑用其语」处，曲折引譬，以发明先圣之意，使忱信而虔敬者，一洗其矫诬宗旨之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213315_comment'></div>而福唐太淳上人适出此编，示予灯下，为书以付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213315_comment'></div>淳能识宗，则知尊卑之语不出义理之域，而悟首山独坐无尊卑，从上无一法与人，为太老婆饶舌矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为太淳作字序。作品：《无染字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无染字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213420")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213420'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213420'>《起信论》曰：「智净相者，谓依法力熏习，如实修行，满足方便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213420_comment'></div>故破和合识，相灭相续，心相显现法身，智淳净故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213420_comment'></div>又曰：「法出离镜，谓不空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213420_comment'></div>法出烦恼碍、智碍，离和合相，淳净明故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213420_comment'></div>夫破和合识，灭相续心，则曰淳净智；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213420_comment'></div>出烦恼碍、智碍，离和合相，则曰淳净明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213420_comment'></div>《首楞严》曰：「净极光通达，寂照含虚空，皆太淳，故净而明矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213420_comment'></div>故太淳宜字无染。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年10月16日</a>　十月十六日，真净克文忌日，作烧香偈。作品：《云庵和尚生辰烧香偈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_521979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521979?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云庵和尚生辰烧香偈</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年10月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521979")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521979'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521979'>直心是道无虚假，是牛何曾呼作马。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521979'>平生日日常一般，但知九旬为一夏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521979'>声色峥嵘争盖覆，法身散失无寻处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521979'>因缘时节属今朝，不用追求全体露。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521979'>七十八年弹指过，元来诸数不曾堕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521979'>南台再拜炷炉香，重渠当时不说破。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521979'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_521979_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年11月</a>　十一月，为弟子惠英题《僧宝传》作品：《题英大师僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题英大师僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213321")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213321'>老子曰「为学日益，为道日损」者，理之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213321_comment'></div>「博观而约取，厚积而薄施，多识前言往行」者，日益之学也，如春夏之水方增川，浩然不可测其际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213321_comment'></div>思之又思之，以至于无思，如囱之在顶，盖造形之极，不可以数量情识得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213321_comment'></div>孔子晚乃悟曰：「天下何思何虑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213321_comment'></div>如秋冬之水缩，廓然见其涯涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213321_comment'></div>呜呼，丛林法道之坏，无如今日之甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213321_comment'></div>非特学者之罪，实为师者之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213321_comment'></div>学者方蒙然无知，而反诫之曰：「安用多知，但饱食默坐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213321_comment'></div>虽若甚要，然亦去愚俗何远？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213321_comment'></div>予所录《僧宝传》，先叙其悟道之缘，又书其死生之际，欲学者法前辈为道之精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213321_comment'></div>而惠英大师，年二十馀，生海上，独挺然有志，不肯碌碌，而哑羊者固已憎之如十世雠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213321_comment'></div>手写此书，携以过予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213321_comment'></div>予佳其勤，扶此心以自此趋无上佛果，如顺风扬尘耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213321_comment'></div>宣和四年十一月题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　题惠英所录诗。作品：《题所录诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题所录诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213322")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213322'>海南道人惠英，字颖孺，生十有二日而失母，年七龄而为沙门，二十岁从予游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213322_comment'></div>予所作语言遍丛林，未尝收录，而英编两巨帙为示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213322_comment'></div>既有愧于九祖，欲焚去之，又念英之好学，为一笑而置之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213322_comment'></div>然流俗寡闻，见少年嗜笔砚者，不背数，必腹非之，以谓禅者不当以翰墨为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213322_comment'></div>宁知龙胜诗流震旦□□□首，论□动以亿万□多为言哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213322_comment'></div>英勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213322_comment'></div>老子言：「为学日益，为道日损」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213322_comment'></div>使其未尝学也，何所损哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213322_comment'></div>如川之增者学也，水落石出者损也，然未易与粥饭僧论此也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213322_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　惠英手录《冷斋夜话》为示，戏题其尾。作品：《英上人手录冷斋为示戏书其尾》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521932?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_1213620_comment'></div>药山草衣橡食，略露家风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213620_comment'></div>南北随缘任运，尚求冬煖夏凉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213620_comment'></div>今岁郁密堂深，犹少炭炉红火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213620_comment'></div>有忠道者，潜来献诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213620_comment'></div>要令坐对红金，实藉十方檀信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213620_comment'></div>醉馀一掷之戏，化为海众冬温。<div class='inline' id='poem_1213621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213621?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年12月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213621_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213621'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213621'>当寺依山林，有原隰，以累年律居，皆斫伐荒废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213621_comment'></div>以是逐年油炭，尚须干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213621_comment'></div>今岁尤不熟，麻油价腾涌，樵薪已竭，而寒凝日增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213621_comment'></div>虽欲安坐，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213621_comment'></div>约用三十千，便成光明，便化温煖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213621_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月14日</a>　十四日，僧义一持张商英所作慧照禅师塔铭语句来，录两诗以赠之，并作序。作品：《送一上人序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送一上人序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年12月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213253")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213253_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213253'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213253'>无尽居士，崇宁二年自政府谪亳、蕲两州，以宫祠罢归，舟而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213253_comment'></div>时龙安照禅师自西安往迎之，至夏口，遂与无尽俱载登赤壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213253_comment'></div>余闻之，作诗寄之曰：「无尽、龙安两勍敌，大梅、庞老是同参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213253_comment'></div>近闻赤壁同登赏，想见清风助笑谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213253_comment'></div>已作泛舟游夏口，又成横锡过江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213253_comment'></div>归来万壑松声在，依旧闲云没草庵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213253_comment'></div>明年夏，无尽来招住峡州天宁，辞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213253_comment'></div>已而问来僧，尝记觉范言句乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213253_comment'></div>僧诵前诗，无尽忻然和之曰：「心月澄澄映碧潭，曾参错认作曹参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213253_comment'></div>若非临济具只眼，争得维摩相对谈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213253_comment'></div>万象森罗皆拱北，百城迢递谩游南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213253_comment'></div>直须取惜眉毛落，烧却山头洛浦庵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213253_comment'></div>宣和四年十二月十四日，龙安之门弟子义一，持无尽所作照公塔铭语句来，时无尽亦殁逾年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213253_comment'></div>余游二老，盖三十年，今俱成千古，独余身在，然亦折困于梦幻数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213253_comment'></div>是夜义一先寝于坐，念旧游如前身事，录两诗以授之，使归，举似山中之耆年，庶其哀余之志也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1213253_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月</a>　为义一跋张商英与慧照帖。作品：《跋无尽居士帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213397?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋无尽居士帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213397")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213397_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213397'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213397'>无尽登庸，百僚畏詟，坐政事堂，德长于两府，诸公自刘中书、吴门下皆昆弟蓄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213397_comment'></div>观其退归山林，与衲子游，书词谆谆，不翅如骨肉然，贤者莫不怪之，安知此老人以法为亲乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213397_comment'></div>龙安照公、倚公之风，遂托名不朽，其亦老赞公、卢玉川、希上人之流亚也耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213397_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月</a>　为义一跋韩驹问慧照帖。作品：《跋韩子苍帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋韩子苍帖后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213403")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213403'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213403'>苏东坡伯仲文章之妙，无愧相如、子云，而其见道之大全，则杨、马瞠若乎后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213403_comment'></div>子苍文字，师法苏氏，西蜀后来之骏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213403_comment'></div>读其问照公向上一路，后照未见詶语，予为代之曰：「不辞向汝道，只恐撞见刘幽求，大帽压耳手提油」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213403_comment'></div>子苍他日见之，定是无语。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　堪禅师自印福绝湖而来，出示晦堂祖师心禅师墨迹，题其后。作品：《题晦堂墨迹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二五。）</span><div id='poem_1213296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题晦堂墨迹</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213296")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213296'>右晦堂大和尚墨迹三纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213296_comment'></div>佛印盖公辈流也，而其言推敬之，至称为老师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213296_comment'></div>退之之与柳子厚，欧阳永叔之与杨大年，道枢不同，而韩、欧之称柳、杨，唯恐不师尊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213296_comment'></div>议者以谓避争名之嫌，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213296_comment'></div>前辈倾倒，法当然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213296_comment'></div>公道德冠丛林，而器资与公辈一时，又名卿且留情吾道者，今皆成千古，堪师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213296_comment'></div>能畜此帖，嗜好，大是不凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213296_comment'></div>宣和四年自印福绝湖来，出以示其侄，因流涕书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　观堪禅师所蓄陈瓘答仰山希祖禅师书，跋其后。作品：《跋莹中帖》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋莹中帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213381")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213381'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213381'>莹中窜海上，而名震天下，不减司马丞相之在洛中时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213381_comment'></div>平生多与山林之人游，处处见其翰墨，虽戏语亦如雪中春色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213381_comment'></div>予观堪公所蓄《答仰山真慧禅师》，简重而谨严，如其为人，味其立朝尽节，无愧宋广平、陆宣公也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1213381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　堪禅师移居南台寺旁，作诗和之。作品：《和堪维那移居》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_520768' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520768' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520768?labeling=true' "poem_title_520768")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520768_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520768'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520768'>世路惊风波，山林知岁寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520768'>君看争夺中，忽觉深渺漫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520768'>归来湘西寺，兀坐依蒲团。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520768'>摩挲折脚铛，规以稳处安。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520768'>湘山亦多态，扶杖时游观。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520768'>偶逢林下人，班草一笑欢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520768'>霜风水痕落，岁月难遮拦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520768'>但觉颔髭白，不复<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>知岁残。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520768'>堪公故园旧，义胆见急难。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520768'>往事都莫理，有求真祸端。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520768'>饭罢口挂壁，□□发长叹。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520768'>暮寒因有雪，炉暖且檀栾。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520768_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 原作知，据武林本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520768_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　为堪禅师作《破尘庵铭》作品：《破尘庵铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213489' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213489' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213489?labeling=true' target='_blank'>破尘庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213489")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213489_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213489'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213489'>道人堪师庵于水西南台之下，名曰破尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213489_comment'></div>为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213489'>取大经卷，破此一尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213489_comment'></div>何以破之，智为斧斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213489_comment'></div>尘非断空，可破非有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213489_comment'></div>了然而知，空亦不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213489_comment'></div>异哉湘麓，庵此老堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213489_comment'></div>视其庵名，如车指南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213489_comment'></div>堪虽可即，语默弗及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213489_comment'></div>如指自触，如眼自觌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213489_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月18日</a>　十八日，大雪，注《法华经》罢，有僧来劝归庐山，僧去作诗。作品：《十二月十八夜大雪注莲经罢有僧来劝归庐山僧去作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_9_520736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520736'>坐令冷斋中，忽然变春温。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（以上《石门文字禅》卷六）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520736'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_520736_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年</a>　送元（希一）禅师住清修院。作品：《送元老住清修》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_520769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送元老住清修</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520769")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520769'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520769'>湘水有庐山，蜀僧有吴韵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520769'>无尘而俱清，雪月夜相映。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520769'>书痴喜借人，香癖出天性。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520769'>垂涕拨黄独，粪火曾发哂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520769'>三年我东邻，家颠开小径。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520769'>一饭必招呼，嘲之终不愠。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520769'>明朝趣去我，岁逼青阳近。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520769'>子已饱丛林，件件无遗恨。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520769'>赠子湘源春，山穷春不尽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520769'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月</a>　代长沙孙承之为僧禀淳作花药进英禅师行状。作品：《花药英禅师行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213543' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213543' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213543?labeling=true' target='_blank'>花药英禅师行状<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213543")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213543'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213543'>临济九世之孙，云庵真净之嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213543_comment'></div>师讳进英，字拙叟，出于罗氏，其先吉州太和人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213543_comment'></div>幼孤，母怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213543_comment'></div>性慧敏，龆龀中日诵千馀言，通诗礼大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213543_comment'></div>与群儿嬉游，侮玩之气出其上，亲旧爱敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213543_comment'></div>使著缝掖为书生，辄病，至于死邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213543_comment'></div>母泣曰：「吾始娠，梦有乘空而语曰：『而出家则疾有瘳矣』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213543_comment'></div>于是击钟梵，放誓于佛前，乞以为僧洞隆童子，而藉名于善集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213543_comment'></div>才年十八，试所习得度，受具戒，即欲经行诸方以观道，报劬劳之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213543_comment'></div>其母有难色，于是庵于母室之外，名曰精进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213543_comment'></div>士大夫喜其为人，赋诗为赠，多佳句，螺川父老迨今道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213543_comment'></div>母殁，心丧三年，修白业为冥福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213543_comment'></div>即游淮海，所至少留，当时号明眼尊宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213543_comment'></div>遍谒已，虽未契而尝识多贤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213543_comment'></div>晚谒云庵，夜参闻贬剥诸方，以黄檗接临济，云门接洞山机缘，为入道之要，擿其疑处以启问，师恍然大悟，如桶底脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213543_comment'></div>佛印禅师，丛林号大宗师，有盛名，慎许可，独以师为俊彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213543_comment'></div>师有爽气，喜暴所长以激后学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213543_comment'></div>三十年一节不移，故佛印呼为铁喙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213543_comment'></div>初开法，住长沙之开福，十年之间，殿阁崇成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213543_comment'></div>又五年弃之，翩然北游五台，遍览圣迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213543_comment'></div>乃南还，庵梁山，天下衲子益追崇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213543_comment'></div>政和甲午，衡阳道俗迎住花药之天宁，劝请皆一时名公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213543_comment'></div>师以教外别传之宗授上根，以沤和般若化道俗，老益康强，精进不替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213543_comment'></div>尝中夜礼佛，作息饮食不肯与众背，丛林信其诚，民人化其教，得法而为一方领袖者，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213543_comment'></div>搥拂之下，尝二千指，龙象杂遝，方进而未艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213543_comment'></div>其激扬大事，游泳语言，备存三录，曰《报慈》，曰《雁峰》、《游台》，盛行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213543_comment'></div>宣和三年冬谢事，复庵梁山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213543_comment'></div>越明年腊月，示疾蝉蜕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213543_comment'></div>呜呼，若人已矣，予窃为桑门惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213543_comment'></div>参学禀淳，一日泣诉于予，以予知其师之深者，欲干其状而求铭，故为书云耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213543_comment'></div>长沙孙承之谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1213543_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1122&endYear=1122')">1122年12月</a>　除夕，福州僧季休捧其所抄写《僧宝传》来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月1日</a>　正月元日，在明白庵为季休上人题《僧宝传》作品：《题休上人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213320' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213320' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213320?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题休上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（宣和五年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213320")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213320_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213320'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213320'>泰山之鸟，巢于木末；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213320_comment'></div>九渊之鱼，托于沙罅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213320_comment'></div>呜呼，鱼鸟之微，亦知附托于高深，安有毁发学道之徒，而自弃于浅陋乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213320_comment'></div>季休，福唐人也，而得业于湘上之南台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213320_comment'></div>其师太公与予为兄弟行，其熏烝见闻，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213320_comment'></div>初，太遭横逆，坐圜扉中百许日，他法属皆畏詶酢之，而休服勤不敢失礼，逮其释，余劝度之，宣和四年正月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213320_comment'></div>既受具陪众，遂写此传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213320_comment'></div>除夕捧以来，予佳其能自脱浅陋而趋高深，为题其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213320_comment'></div>明年元日也，明白庵题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213320_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　作律诗一首示觉慈，时觉慈二十三岁。作品：《元正一日示阿慈》<span "poem_title_521286")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521286'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521286'>季真少俨三十岁，俨入新年五十三。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521286'>疑我满怀揣佛法，解腰抖擞破裙衫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521286'>大瞻终老同香火，小朗平生共石岩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521286'>深炷垆香待清旦，偶闻残雪落高杉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521286'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　时湘山雪晴，为觉慈坐字序。作品：《易季真字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213421' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213421' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213421?labeling=true' target='_blank'>易季真字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213421")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213421_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213421'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213421'>季真少俨三十岁，俨入新年五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213421_comment'></div>疑我满怀揣佛法，解腰抖擞破裙衫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213421_comment'></div>大赡终老同香火，小朗平生共石岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213421_comment'></div>深炷垆香待清旦，偶闻残雪落高杉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213421_comment'></div>宣和五年，问觉慈几何年齿，对曰二十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213421_comment'></div>时湘山雪晴五更清，可掬而啜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213421_comment'></div>觉慈本字敬修，取以慈修身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213421_comment'></div>吾以谓慈皆不若真，因易为季真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213421_comment'></div>老俨书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213421_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月6日</a>　正月六日，南安岩主自严禅师忌日，作偈。作品：《南安岩主定光生辰五首》（其五）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南安岩主定光生辰五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年1月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522030")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522030'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522030'>不涉春缘正月六，衲僧拾得聚头看。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522030'>大家宜著音容想，一笑风吹牙齿寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522030'>欲问死生口门窄，更分僧俗眼皮宽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522030'>湘山雪尽千岩晓，赠以之中墨未乾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522030'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月8日</a>　正月八日，曾孝序生辰，缮写《僧宝传》以献，且为之序。作品：《僧宝传序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>僧宝传序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年1月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213259")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213259'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213259'>曹溪之道，至南岳石头、江西马祖，而分为两宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213259_comment'></div>云门、曹洞、法眼，皆宗于石头；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213259_comment'></div>临济、沩仰，皆宗于马祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213259_comment'></div>天下丛林，号为五家宗派。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213259_comment'></div>嘉祐中，达观昙颖禅师尝为五家传略，其世系入道之缘，临终明验之效，但载其机缘语句而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213259_comment'></div>夫听言之道以事观，既载其语言，则当兼记其行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213259_comment'></div>因博采别传遗编，参以耆年宿衲之论增补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213259_comment'></div>又自嘉祐至政和之初，云门、临济两宗之裔卓然冠映诸方者，特为之传，依仿史传，各为赞辞，统八十有一人，分为三十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213259_comment'></div>书成于湘西之南台，宣和五年正月八日，伏遇判府安抚大学降贵令辰缮写呈献，仰祝台算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213259_comment'></div>许旌阳白日仙去，天诏书曰：「赦汝不事先祖之罪，佳汝施药咒水之功」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213259_comment'></div>夫施药咒水，期于活人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213259_comment'></div>活人而能致飞仙，况寿考乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213259_comment'></div>余观安抚大学，其牧民临政皆得佛法之至要，和而为生，威而为杀，生杀皆以活人为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213259_comment'></div>尝生浏阳囚徒十有二人于死中，佛法之见于和者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213259_comment'></div>戮一贺文而亿万生齿安堵，佛法之见于威者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213259_comment'></div>其妙用活人之功，较之旌阳，殆相万矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213259_comment'></div>惟其得法之渊源，实出于圆照本禅师而不可诬也，故余特以禅书为献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213259_comment'></div>伏冀燕閒之暇，少赐披览，岂胜幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213259_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月</a>　上浣日，临川志端上人袖《僧宝传》来，为题其后。作品：《题端上人僧宝传》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题端上人僧宝传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213318")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213318'>临川志端上人，宣和四年夏于长沙之谷山，谷山有众，而领袖者鲁暗，不通晓世事，丛林以是凋落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213318_comment'></div>端律身益敬，日诵经行道，暇则写《僧宝传》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213318_comment'></div>同学劝经行他山，要与之俱，端辞以山水未暇观，正以白业未办为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213318_comment'></div>同学怒，弃去，端怡然勿恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213318_comment'></div>明年正月上浣日，端袖此书来求题其后，予告之曰：「一精想中，十法界种子皆具，随其所熏发而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213318_comment'></div>譬之田有稻种，藉时雨以芽孽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213318_comment'></div>十法界者，六凡四圣谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213318_comment'></div>今端屏绝诸缘，日唯录佛祖之语，味佛祖之意，则亦熏发佛乘之种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213318_comment'></div>与夫游谈无根，疲精神于庄、孟，为陈言腐说以欺无知者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213318_comment'></div>然能穷究其所自，使所言所履如传八十一人者，则可谓出家知恩者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213318_comment'></div>予视端精紧板而声圆，若可语此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213318_comment'></div>聊及之，端其勉之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月15日</a>　十五日上元夜，病起，呼觉慈为录《法华经•安乐行品》合论。作品：《上元夜病起欲写法华安乐行品无力呼阿慈为录作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上元夜病起欲写法华安乐行品无力呼阿慈为录作此</a><span id='poem_sentence_4_521287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年1月</a>　上元后，在南台寺候侯延庆不至，作诗寄之。作品：《上元后候季长不至作此寄之》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年2月1日</a>　二月初一，湘西雪尽，送客松下，周廷秀出示与张廓然酬唱诗，为跋其后。作品：《跋周廷秀酬唱诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213411' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213411")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213411'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213411_comment'></div>但是时湘西雪尽，众峰苍然，我与廷秀皆是画图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213411_comment'></div>廷秀袖出与张公詶唱之词，读之，便觉与众峰争秀，岂其愧从聚落中来，故以此句弹压清境耳。</div><div target='_blank'>季长尽室来长沙留一月乃还邵阳作是诗送之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520670")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520670_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520670'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520670'>邵阳归去知几里，万顷斜阳渡湘水。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520670'>一叶扁舟共看山，伯鸾德耀俱风味。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520670'>山中信宿不忍去，班草松间呼不起。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520670'>波心月出卧不知，但爱松风吹醉耳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520670'>朝来拾得浩荡春，雪英红雨纷桃李。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520670'>大钟横撞山答响，遥知有寺藏层翠。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520670'>想见道人出迎客，犀颅戢戢三千指。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520670'>王事得从方外乐，佳处迟留固其理。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520670'>何当更和宿山诗，要看云泉生逸气。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520670'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520670_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年3月4日</a>　三月四日，于南台寺释《法华经合论》毕，抚今追昔，作《寂音自序》，追绎达摩四种行，作《无求行》、《随缘行》、《报冤行》、《称法行》四偈。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四，四行见此文。）</span><div id='poem_1213538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寂音自序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年3月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213538")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213538'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213538'>寂音自叙：本江西筠州新昌喻氏之子，年十四，父母并月而殁，乃依三峰靘禅师为童子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213538_comment'></div>十九，试经于东京天王寺，得度，冒惠洪名，依宣秘大师深公，讲《成唯识论》，有声讲肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213538_comment'></div>服勤四年，辞之南归，依真净禅师于庐山归宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213538_comment'></div>及真净迁洪州石门，又随以至，前后七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213538_comment'></div>年二十九，乃游东吴，明年游衡岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213538_comment'></div>又三年而真净终于庵，自湘中归拜塔，将终藏于黄龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213538_comment'></div>而显谟朱彦世英请住临川北禅二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213538_comment'></div>退而游金陵，久之，运使学士吴幵正重请住清凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213538_comment'></div>入寺，为狂僧诬，以为伪度牒，且旁连前狂僧法和等议讪事，入制狱一年，坐冒惠洪名，著缝掖入京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213538_comment'></div>大丞相张商英特奏再得度，节使郭天信奏师名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213538_comment'></div>坐交张、郭厚善，以政和元年十月二十六日配海外，以二年二月二十五日到琼州，五月七日到崖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213538_comment'></div>三年五月二十五日蒙恩释放，十一月十七日北渡海，以明年四月到筠，馆于荷塘寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213538_comment'></div>十月，又證狱并门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213538_comment'></div>五年夏，于新昌之度门，往来九峰、洞山者四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213538_comment'></div>将自西安入湘上，依法眷以老，馆云岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213538_comment'></div>又为狂道士诬，以为张怀素党人，官吏皆知其误认张丞相为怀素，然事须根治，坐南昌狱百馀日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213538_comment'></div>会两赦得释，遂归湘上南台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213538_comment'></div>以宣和四年夏释此论，明年三月四日毕，停笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213538_comment'></div>坐念涉世多艰，百念灰冷，时年五十三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213538_comment'></div>追绎达摩四种行，作四偈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213538_comment'></div>《无求行》曰：「形恃美好，今已毁坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213538_comment'></div>置之世路，自觉塞碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213538_comment'></div>始缘饥寒，致万憎爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213538_comment'></div>欲坏身衰，入此三昧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213538_comment'></div>《随缘行》曰：「此生梦幻，缘业所转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213538_comment'></div>随其所遭，敢择贵贱？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213538_comment'></div>眠食既足，馀复何羡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213538_comment'></div>缘尽则行，无可顾恋」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213538_comment'></div>《报冤行》曰：「僧婴王难，情观可丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213538_comment'></div>夙业纯熟，所以甘受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213538_comment'></div>受尽还无，何丑之有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213538_comment'></div>转重还轻，佛恩弥厚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213538_comment'></div>《称法行》曰：「本无贪瞋，我持戒忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213538_comment'></div>食不过中，手不操楯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213538_comment'></div>风必顿息，而浪渐尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213538_comment'></div>离微细念，方名见性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213538_comment'></div>既说是偈，并载于此，时省观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213538_comment'></div>呜呼，孙思邈著《大风恶疾论》曰：「《神仙传》有数十人皆因恶疾而得仙道，何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213538_comment'></div>割弃尘累，怀颍阳之风，所以因祸而取福也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213538_comment'></div>寂音之祸，奇祸也，因祸以得尽窥佛祖之意，不能文以达意，以寿后世，则思邈之论可信也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1213538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　陈思忠、王庭圭来访，留数日，次韵唱酬，诗盈巨轴。作品：《次韵思忠奉议民赡知丞唱酬佳句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵思忠奉议民瞻知丞唱酬佳句</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520715")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520715'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520715'>两诗清于玉堂卧，气如汉军争袒左。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520715'>高轩想见连璧来，辗我门前碧苔破。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520715'>文章自然真吐凤，句拙见之那敢和。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520715'>高材要当万钱食，小邑折腰坐饥饿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520715'>仲弓曾为太邱令，义方亦作吉阳佐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520715'>丈夫功名未入手，行乐莫嫌诗酒涴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520715_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520715'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_520715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　有僧从事文字禅，作诗勉之，不以知闻之讥为意。作品：《僧从事文字禅三首》（其一）<span id='poem_sentence_0_521720'>中郎书异为忠孝，右辖诗清付水云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521720'>林下一灯长到晓，此生真复是知闻。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521722?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　南岳道会禅师往镇江焦山省枯木法成禅师，过南台寺，夜语及梦蝶居士蔡子因，作诗怀其人。作品：《南岳会禅师往京口省枯木老禅过余湘上夜语及前诗三绝要谒梦蝶老居士不觉有怀其人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521919?labeling=true' id='poem_content_521919'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521919'>若逢梦蝶庵中老，为道归期压旧年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521919'>肯施独龙冈畔地，大胜小岭买山钱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521919'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521919_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　作诗饯别道会禅师。作品：《会禅师胡庐而笑曰独无语以饯我乎因赋此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年3月17日</a>　十七日，为黄龙慧南忌日作偈，用宣和三年、四年韵。作品：《老黄龙生辰三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>老黄龙生辰三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年3月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522033")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522033'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522033'>同登九仞到崔嵬，困极那辞共堕摧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522033'>待汝狐疑犹豫处，当机佛手等闲开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522033'>昔年成物心空切，今日临风首重回。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522033'>满院新晴春已老，落花飞絮点池台<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522033'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522033'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_522033_0'>⑴ 德洪自住南台，每岁必作一偈，致不忘法乳之意。今用宣和三年、四年韵，时五十三矣。重惟法道凌夷，今人寒心，而障缘深重，气力绵弱，不能支持。当有法中龙象，乘愿力而来者副此志焉，是所愿望。法孙德洪题。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_522033_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年3月23日</a>　二十三日，东明了心禅师饷新面、白蜜，作诗二首。作品：《三月二十三日心禅饷余新面白蜜作二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三月二十三日心禅饷余新面白蜜作二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年3月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521761")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521761'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521761'>三月东庄新麦熟，碾迟罗细玉尘香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521761'>要看十字开笼饼，寄与庵头老俨尝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521761'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_520673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520673'>传呼部曲江路赊，迎门颠倒披袈裟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520673'>仙风照人虔敬加，秀如春露湿兰芽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520673'>和如东风吹奇葩，马蹄归路冲飞花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213607_comment'></div>作重兴之意不浅，缘改创之功未完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213607_comment'></div>欲鸳瓦之一新，拟蜂房之尽撒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213607_comment'></div>非栋梁无以资乎大壮，非丹雘无以丽乎重明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213607_comment'></div>则臣僚祝颂之诚，叶众庶归投之地。<div class='inline'
