ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1124&endYear=1124')">1124年</a>　为净因禅师题所蓄《文字禅》作品：《题佛鉴所蓄文字禅》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题佛鉴蓄文字禅</a><span class='authorDate'>（1124年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213323")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213323'>余幼孤，知读书为乐，而不得其要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213323_comment'></div>落笔尝如人掣其肘，又如瘖者之欲语，而意窒舌大，而浓笑者数数然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213323_comment'></div>年十六七，从洞山云庵学出世法，忽自信而不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213323_comment'></div>诵生书七千，下笔千言，跬步可待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213323_comment'></div>呜呼，学道之益人，未论其死生之际，益其文字语言如此，益可自信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213323_comment'></div>今三十八年矣，而见云庵平时亲爱之人佛鉴大师净因于湘中，颓然相向，俱老矣，而故意特未老，又出余少时诗句读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213323_comment'></div>想见山林之旧游处，诵白公诗曰：「手把杨枝临水坐，闲思往事似前身」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213323_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1124&endYear=1124')">1124年</a>　元勋除开封府判官，将行，作诗送之。作品：《送不伐赴天府仪曹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_520722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520722'>岂止风物繁，山水亦清富。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521325'>想见京尘遮便面，应思携手此中行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521325_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521325'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521325_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　侯延庆出示权生所画岳麓雪晴图，作诗。作品：《季长出权生所画岳麓雪晴图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>季长出权生所画岳麓雪晴图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520669")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520669'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520669'>湘西今日云生早，岳麓雪晴看愈好。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520669'>朱栏青琐寄木杪，下临绝壑青松道。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520669'>知谁沙步泊渔舟，舟中应容寂音老。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520669'>爱山谁复如君者，一幅湘西和我画。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520669'>分身亦欲看京华，要使痴儿惊羽化。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520669'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_520669_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　侯延庆出示韩驹诗，次其韵。作品：《季长出示子苍诗次其韵盖子苍见衡岳图而作也》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>季长出示子苍诗次其韵盖子苍见衡岳图而作也</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520667")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520667'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520667'>晓烟幻出千万峰，个中我曾如懒融。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520667'>天公亦妒饱清境，戏推堕我尘网中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520667'>人生万□<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>无不有，道士宁知为老枫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520667'>去年雪夜宿绝顶，笑声响落千岩风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520667'>今年千岩在掌握，烟雨又复分西东。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520667'>磨钱作镜照千里，必也高人非画工。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520667'>季长胸中自丘壑，吐辞便觉春无功。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520667'>韩侯玩世难共语，精神满腹仍疏通。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520667'>酒阑耳热眩红碧，醉语撼子崔嵬胸。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520667'>遥知堕帻笑不答，但见玉颊回涡红。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520667'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520667_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_520667'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_520667_0'>⑴ 钞补作事，武林本作变</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520667_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　延庆将赴京师，作诗送之。作品：《送季长之上都》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520671' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520671?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送季长之上都</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520671")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520671_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520671'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520671'>十年不踏黄尘路，老尽归心馀一缕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520671'>因同夜语想京华，归心百尺游丝举。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520671'>前年别我楚山边，解鞍班草弄云泉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520671'>今年送公古城北，花发水流闻杜鹃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520671'>眉间秀色照春晚，青云故人纷满眼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520671'>门前车马气如云，知谁倒屣迎王粲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520671'>行看腕脱供十吏，玉堂风景非人世。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520671'>万乘扣扉宫月斜，梦惊呼烛度窗纱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520671_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520671'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_520671_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　在长沙，周子伟约见过，已而饮于城东，但以诗来次韵，作诗答之。作品：《子伟约见过已而饮于城东但以诗来次韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520668' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520668' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520668?labeling=true' target='_blank'>子伟约见过已而饮于城东但以诗来次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520668")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520668_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520668'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520668'>一杯愁倡低眉峰，不平万事都消融。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520668'>嗟余分身处处有，遥知到子谈笑中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520668'>平生踪迹亦可笑，以丑见传如瘿枫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520668'>而公才大置闲地，正坐道骨合仙风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520668'>颇闻少年类豪侠，臂鹰走马王城东。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520668'>尔来闭门看脩竹，藉甚但传诗句工。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520668'>懒于能琴嵇叔夜，痴于恋酒王无功。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520668'>明朝此乐堕渺莽，路隔关河魂梦通。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520668'>付子后堂以清夜，料理丝竹围酥胸。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520668'>曲音少误即回顾，笑看杯面微波红。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520668'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_520668_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年3月3日</a>　三月三日，记长沙岳麓寺前涧阴之上隋朝感应佛舍利塔，示住持僧法光与安化马章。作品：《隋朝感应佛舍利塔记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213430' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213430' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213430?labeling=true' target='_blank'>隋朝感应佛舍利塔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213430")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213430_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213430'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213430'>唐僧史曰：同州大兴寺者，般若尼寺故基也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213430_comment'></div>隋文帝以魏大统七年六月癸丑生于寺中，赤光照室，紫气满庭，如幻出楼阁，而其色赭人之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213430_comment'></div>妳母觉时炎热，以扇扇之，慄然暴寒，几绝不能啼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213430_comment'></div>有尼自外至，谓太祖曰：「儿乃那罗延也，盖天佛所祐，不可令处秽杂间，当为养之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213430_comment'></div>于是太祖以儿委之，不敢名问，而辟馆以延尼，通门往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213430_comment'></div>一日皇妣阚尼在不，就抱持之，忽化为龙，鳞角已具，惊仆于地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213430_comment'></div>尼归见之，怒曰：「乃敢妄触吾儿，致晚得天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213430_comment'></div>文帝七岁，尼告之曰：「像教堙灭，一切鬼神皆西，儿当父母天下，而教法赖儿而兴之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213430_comment'></div>年十三，乃令还家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213430_comment'></div>四十馀年，足不越阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213430_comment'></div>周既废，教尼隐皇家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213430_comment'></div>文帝践祚，教果重兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213430_comment'></div>尼名智仙，神异不可测，河东蒲坂刘氏女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213430_comment'></div>七岁出家，其师一旦失之，意必堕井，俄见坐殿楯瓦上，世号神尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213430_comment'></div>尝以舍利一掬授文帝曰：「以此福苍生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213430_comment'></div>仁寿二年，出以示僧昙迁，置掌而观，数数有盈缩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213430_comment'></div>迁曰：「吾闻法身过于数量，非智所及，此未可量」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213430_comment'></div>乃分而为五十三分，诏于五十三州名山福地以建塔，塔下图神尼之象，有铭，其略曰：「维年月日，菩萨戒佛弟子大隋皇帝坚，敬白十方三世一切三宝弟子，蒙三宝福祐，为苍生君父，思与民庶共建菩提，分布舍利，诸州供养，欲使普修善业，同登妙果者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213430_comment'></div>特请两京名僧，将命奉安之日，皆有祥瑞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213430_comment'></div>长沙岳麓寺之前，涧阴之上石浮图，其一数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213430_comment'></div>山中僧道安尝为余曰：「隋朝舍利塔事极奇伟，而五季烽火之馀，铭碣焚毁，道俗游观，无所质问」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213430_comment'></div>余曰：「岂直此而已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213430_comment'></div>晋建兴二年，长沙县之西一里二十步，有千叶青莲华两本生于陆地，掘之丈馀，莲之根茎自瓦棺而出，发棺而视，但纸衣拴索，而莲实生头颅齿颊间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213430_comment'></div>有铭棺上曰：『僧不知名氏，唯诵《妙法莲华经》已数万部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213430_comment'></div>既化，遗言以纸为衣，瓦棺葬于此郡』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213430_comment'></div>以其事闻朝廷，有旨建寺其上，号莲华，今长沙驿即寺故基也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213430_comment'></div>西城之谯门与湘江之潭，皆以莲华名之者以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213430_comment'></div>然邦人无有知者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213430_comment'></div>安请余并书以示道俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213430_comment'></div>宣和七年二月，住山道人法光与安化马章彦达登涧阴，问建塔之因，光乃以余文示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213430_comment'></div>彦达踊跃，愿施钱刻石山中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213430_comment'></div>上巳日除馑，某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1213430_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　代法光作沩山茶榜。作品：《岳麓为沩山茶榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213593' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213593?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岳麓为沩山茶榜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213593")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213593'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213593'>全提祖令，则无法无亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213593_comment'></div>略在世礼，则有恩有义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213593_comment'></div>故證真必依于俗谛，如解空弗离于色尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213593_comment'></div>故造雨花，显叙法乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213593_comment'></div>自裂衣冠以参道，剃除须发而为僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213593_comment'></div>其长养成就之私，乃提撕藻饰之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213593_comment'></div>至于曲折，皆出爱忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213593_comment'></div>俯顾其微，敢称传法之嗣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213593_comment'></div>仰惟至鉴，又贞亲教之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213593_comment'></div>伏惟堂头大和尚，道契天衣，法传智海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213593_comment'></div>廓沙界之量，故能山收海藏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213593_comment'></div>示医王之心，亦畜牛溲马渤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213593_comment'></div>蝇附骥而气吞千里，铃系鸢而声登九霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213593_comment'></div>是之固然，人则幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213593_comment'></div>躬至针水之地，特陈蘋藻之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213593_comment'></div>蝼蚁微诚，知慈严之易感；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213593_comment'></div>丛林苛礼，愧恩大以难酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213593_comment'></div>重烦四海之胜流，共庆一时之佳集。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213593_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　作诗题岳麓深固轩。作品：《题岳麓深固轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_520776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题岳麓深固轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520776")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520776'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520776'>湘西峰顶寺，楼阁藏烟翠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520776'>危台占峰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>颠，小轩寄幽致。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520776'>游人常不到，石壁照溪邃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520776'>于世复何求，此生眠食耳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520776'>翛然亦何有，蒲团空曲几。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520776'>凭高俯城郭，车马环磨蚁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520776'>城郭望诸峰，时见孤云起。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520776'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_520776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_520776'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_520776_0'>⑴ 原作家，据武林本改</div></div></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521337?labeling=true' class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522211?labeling=true' "poem_title_522211")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522211'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522211'>风度凝远，和气如春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522211'>绿发授道，精敏绝伦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522211'>名冠缙绅，挺然忠义。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522211'>知国知兵，如唐陆贽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522211'>顷者天府，奉使江南。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522211'>昼锦之荣，父老聚观。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522211'>顿节西州，盗发江浙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522211'>提师百万，荡其窟穴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522211'>凯旋而还，口不言功。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522211'>但欲使民，生于死中。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522211'>重临南楚，化行郡邑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_522211'>如春在花，不见痕迹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_522211'>恢躁坦夷，易亲难忘。<div id='poem_sentence_12_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_522211'>视其胸次，山包海藏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_522211'>宜宿玉堂，宜在黄阁。<div id='poem_sentence_14_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_522211'>跬步可待，昂霄耸壑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_522211'>长沙之民，自怀其私。<div id='poem_sentence_16_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_522211'>龛此画像，饮食必祠。<div id='poem_sentence_17_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_522211'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_522211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522211'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522211_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　为韩廉使画像作赞。作品：《韩廉使奉御赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩廉使奉御赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522204")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522204'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522204'>幅巾椹衣，杳然深靖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522204'>坐藓石床，横玉麈柄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522204'>松声度曲，笑作风听。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522204'>是故有琴，弦索不整。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522204'>人徒见其神和气平，颓然委顺。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522204'>至于垂绅正笏，守法奉命。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522204'>则活人之色严毅劲正，特不受富贵所吞，而有山林之韵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522204'>究其心胸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_522204", 522204, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>山包海容</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522204'>表里不隔，八窗玲珑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522204'>盖游戏人间之出世，扶持洞上之宗风者也。</div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　与王宏道舍人游，作诗次韵兰堂、熏堂。作品：《次韵王舍人兰堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span>《次韵熏堂》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213227'>水苍茫而春暗，村窈窕而烟暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213227_comment'></div>忽微霰之溅衣，惊一枝之当路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213227_comment'></div>蒂团红膏之蜡，色染蔷薇之露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213227_comment'></div>柔风飘其徐来，暗香灭而复著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213227_comment'></div>待黄昏之雪消，看东南之月吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213227_comment'></div>何婵娟之殷勤，献清妍之风度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213227_comment'></div>方其开也，如华清之出浴，矫风神其转顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213227_comment'></div>盖天质之自然，宜铅华之不御也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213227_comment'></div>及其落也，如朝阳之奏曲，学回雪而起舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213227_comment'></div>乃仙风之体自轻，非臭夷之药能举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213227_comment'></div>怪老禅之游戏，幻此华于缣素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213227_comment'></div>疑分身之藏年，每开卷而奇遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213227_comment'></div>如行孤山之下，如入辋川之坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213227_comment'></div>念透尘之种性，含无语之情绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213227_comment'></div>岂君王宠我太甚，致我不得仙去者耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1213227_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　为王宏道容膝轩题诗。作品：《题王路分容膝轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520679' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_520679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520679'>精神画牒开，怒威亦和气。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520679'>譬如横海鳣，蛣屈见脊尾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520548'>道人相逢吴楚间，闻说绝与睿郎好。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' target='_blank'>菖蒲斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213440")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213440'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213440'>东坡居士性喜推挽后进之士，知名当时，多公赏识者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213440_comment'></div>然以今多士，犹未足以饱其欲，而雌黄遂及草之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213440_comment'></div>以胡麻、杞菊之贤于其类，援笔而赋之，则名声亦能光显于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213440_comment'></div>暮年又以菖蒲之才为迈秀，居以铜盆，培以怪石，挹寒泉而灌之，根须连络于璀璨之间，其色苍然可玩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213440_comment'></div>天下以公之所玩，从而玩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213440_comment'></div>柯山道人如公行云山中，所至不蓄长物，独于菖蒲而友之，至以名其斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213440_comment'></div>江南洪觉范见而叹曰：「菖蒲为物，无异味可嗜嚼，而君友之无厌，非能知东坡所乐之真，则尚乌能谈此情味乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213440_comment'></div>支遁蓄骅骝以寄逸想，慧理呼白猿以发高韵，而后世多其风鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213440_comment'></div>君之所寓，其清修绝俗之致，岂减遁、理哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213440_comment'></div>为之记以示知君者，庶亦知余言之非誇也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213440_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>宿石霜，与客夜语，为嘉与僧如照作字序。作品：《妙宗字序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213423?labeling=true' target='_blank'>妙宗字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213423")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213423_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213423'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213423'>顷游钟山定林，读王文公壁间所书《信心铭》，作横风斜云势，知为宗门之光，叹爱久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213423_comment'></div>山中故老谓余言：文公绝嗜此文，与衲子语必诵之，曰：「『归根得旨，随照失宗』，诸法要妙，八言足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213423_comment'></div>有而弗知则失宗，知而弗信其迷旨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213423_comment'></div>余偶客石霜，与客夜语及之，余曰：「文公闻弦赏音，妙合雅曲如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213423_comment'></div>乃知法以不生故一如，以虚明故自照，唯以自照故如如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213423_comment'></div>知白矣，如珠之光，还自照珠，非妙心宗，不能尔也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213423_comment'></div>坐有嘉禾上人忻然笑曰：「如照我名也，而适舍其义，岂偶然也哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213423_comment'></div>余曰：「尝有字乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213423_comment'></div>曰：「未也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213423_comment'></div>「请妙宗字其名」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213423_comment'></div>妙宗佳妙年，东吴丛林号饱参者，一杖翛然，如无心云，殊可人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213423_comment'></div>录其序以遗之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213423_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>石霜见东吴诚上人。作品：《石霜见东吴诚上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_520549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石霜见东吴诚上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520549")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520549'>我寻流水行，忽入霜华谷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520549'>山阴见幽人，目<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作身）</span>带湖山绿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520549'>语温如春风，韵秀自拔俗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520549'>暗惊枯木堂，栖此一枝玉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520549'>遥知夜窗深，雪响乱脩竹。<div 芜湖

萧山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='432c1c0ec18b4cb9b0819e2cb8dc2f85_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("432c1c0ec18b4cb9b0819e2cb8dc2f85");'><span id='432c1c0ec18b4cb9b0819e2cb8dc2f85_link' id='poem_520588' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520588' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520588?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圭粹中与超然游旧超然数言其俊雅除夕见于西兴喜而赠之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", id='poem_sentence_1_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520588'>道人西蜀来，风度又高妙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520588'>坐令岑寂中，绝尘追騕袅。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520588'>君看显与讷，出蜀亦同调。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520588'>竟如众星月，声光泼云峤。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520588'>子亦当加鞭，岁月一过鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520588'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520588_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　过嘉兴，僧彦由以诗见赠，次其韵。作品：《次韵彦由见赠》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520593' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520593?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵彦由见赠</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520593")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520593'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520593'>华亭富文物，最后机与云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520593'>妙年翰墨场，唾手立奇勋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520593'>万物鼻一垩，驰扫数挥斤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520593'>道人出尘者，一见过所闻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520593'>置之缁衣林，玉石宛自分。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520593'>能将霅溪昼，解追青龙氲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520593'>超然劲高节，冰雪看此君。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520593'>故应知见熟，玉骨久受熏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520593'>天眼视浮俗，争奈空煎焚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520593'>我寻住山侣，识子吴江濆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520593'>人生各有适，未易分黠嚚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520593'>风物亦自私，草木俱忻忻。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520593'>何当断岸坞，赓歌苍石垠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520593'>我诗无杰句，愧子才逸群。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520593'>此篇颇尚有，句意雅而文。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520593'>把玩值清月，林影白纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520593'>高怀亦自放，岂以我辈云。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520593'>君看功名事，真如过耳蚊。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520593'>行将挂社籍，莲沼开奇芬。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_520593'>劳君读此诗，正如莸与薰。<div id='poem_sentence_19_520593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520593'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_520593_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
扬州（江都）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='50c619e7d83e4d26bc8023c06d8bb110_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("50c619e7d83e4d26bc8023c06d8bb110");'><span id='50c619e7d83e4d26bc8023c06d8bb110_link' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521356")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521356_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521356'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521356'>五马东来数月间，十州人物帖然安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521356'>池边芳草新吟罢，楼外遥山昼卧看。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521356'>铃阁蜡烟秋色晚，谯门铜漏夜声寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521356'>虽然自是云林客，犹把风流作话端。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521356'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521356_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>得阎孝忠所寄诗二首，次其韵。作品：《次韵见寄二首》<span id='poem_sentence_1_520504'>久已仰高谊，窃伏淮海滨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520504'>夫子真自重，不减南国珍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520504'>笑谈带富贵，翰墨生精神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520504'>安知磁石针，妙处无陈新。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520504'>便觉海棠雨，圆吭争滑唇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520504'>游丝登百尺，飞絮沾泥尘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520504'>要当为设榻，敷以白氎巾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520504'>看君把麈尾，抑气思旧申。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520504'>凉肝藉苦语，激烈敢不遵。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520504'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_520504_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520505?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_520505'>平生迈往气，酝造次公狂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520505'>才高簿书缚，貌和无叹伤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520505'>君看此风味，自是万夫望。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520505'>利害方焚如，唾笑皆清凉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520505'>颍皋旧庐在，顷稻连亩桑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520505'>时以笏拄颊，阻隔如涧冈。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520505'>人生行乐耳，万事付一觞。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520505'>淮南谪天厨，大言忘巽床。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520505'>吾侪本疏拙，阅世忘否臧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520505'>愿言置此喙，无咎持括囊。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520505'>桂贤供火浴，龟虚得刳肠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520505'>一蓑烟雨蜗两角，我耕南亩君开荒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520505'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_520505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与至乾禅师别于扬州。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>宗上人将归庐山，别于扬州。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
修水（分宁）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b8f390d0f2494f1e8db7eb465bdb60c8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b8f390d0f2494f1e8db7eb465bdb60c8");'><span id='b8f390d0f2494f1e8db7eb465bdb60c8_link' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520535'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520535'>仲夏林木深，古寺雨初足。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520535'>殿阁风瓯鸣，閒庭草空绿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520535'>小轩试凭几，解箨爱新竹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520535'>道人有佳处，面数良以熟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520535'>翛然亦无营，来往相追逐。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520652'>掉头掣肘去，不顾西兴浪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520652'>登舟翻然行，万众皆目断。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520652'>平生勇于道，气韵真迈往。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520652'>安肯逐儿辈，低首投世网。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520652'>但恐吕望之，追法薛廷望。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520652'>茶盐以加之，趁出白云嶂。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520652'>要看呵佛祖，瘦拳捉藜杖。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520652'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_520652_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='58bee1453ee24162b968a0296d794c1d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("58bee1453ee24162b968a0296d794c1d");'><span id='58bee1453ee24162b968a0296d794c1d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>，34岁</div><div id='58bee1453ee24162b968a0296d794c1d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至分宁龙安，闻黄庭坚留衡阳作诗写字，因作《西江月》词寄之，庭坚次韵和答。（大厦吞风吐月）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《全宋文》页七一二。）</span><div id='poem_218225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_218225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/218225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西江月<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_218225")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_218225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_218225'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_218225'>大厦吞风吐月，小舟坐水眠空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_218225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_218225'>雾窗春晓翠如葱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_218225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_218225'>睡起云涛正涌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_218225_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_218225'>往事回头笑处，此生弹指声中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_218225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_218225'>玉笺佳句敏惊鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_218225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_218225'>闻道衡阳价重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_218225_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>明鉴禅师自荆南张商英处归虔州慈云寺，取道分宁，拜从悦禅师塔，与龙安慧照禅师经行于乳峰之下，赠其二诗，并作序送之。作品：《送鉴老归慈云序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。二诗本集失收，然可于此序中见全文。）</span><div id='poem_1213252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送鉴老归慈云寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213252")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213252_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213252'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213252'>龙安禅师之门有高弟，其惊群之辩，掣电之机，如古风穴三圣之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213252_comment'></div>元祐之初，开法于西安，嫚骂佛祖，贬剥诸方，闻其风望崖而退者，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213252_comment'></div>而登其门者，皆一时之奇秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213252_comment'></div>永安常龙、安照、慈云鉴，又角而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213252_comment'></div>无尽居士张公，尝问道于师，自称得法上首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213252_comment'></div>公以文章功业为时名臣，天下想其风采，而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213252_comment'></div>是二三友者，独与之周旋忘形，何脱略势位，岂弟法乳之深耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213252_comment'></div>崇宁二年冬，公罢政府，还荆南，照老迎于夏口，载与之俱，至鄂渚而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213252_comment'></div>江山清华，足以供谈笑，而赓酬妙语，多法喜之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213252_comment'></div>余时游湘中，闻之作诗与照老曰：「无尽、龙安两勍敌，大梅、庞老是同参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213252_comment'></div>近闻赤壁同登赏，想见清风助笑谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213252_comment'></div>已作泛舟游夏口，又成横锡过江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213252_comment'></div>归来万壑松风在，依旧闲云没草庵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213252_comment'></div>又闻鉴老去慈云，从公于传庆，清游胜赏，厌饫其平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213252_comment'></div>士大夫闻之，高其为人，曰：「鉴公此邦之福田，其可终听其去也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213252_comment'></div>遣使自江陵迎还，以慰邦人之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213252_comment'></div>遂取道西安，拜塔于山，与照老经行于乳峰之下，而余适在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213252_comment'></div>山谷闻鸟声歌呼，林泉津津，有喜色，而鉴老亦恋恋累日不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213252_comment'></div>余叹曰：「悦公虽不幸短世，门弟子何其多贤也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213252_comment'></div>方无尽居士国论，其门可炙手也，独淡若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213252_comment'></div>及闻其归山林，则千里与相从之，又皆造，不忘其师，背道好利者肯如是乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213252_comment'></div>作两诗送之曰：「故人罢相归田野，相见遥知一粲然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213252_comment'></div>陌上青山尝识面，归来白塔扫颓塼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213252_comment'></div>勤劳世外功名事，领略僧中富贵缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213252_comment'></div>又作慈云倾法雨，斩新精彩照人天」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213252_comment'></div>其次曰：「悦老解为荼毒鼓，平生得妙不施功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213252_comment'></div>欲令闻者偷心死，自是群生两耳聋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213252_comment'></div>兄弟赫然追父迹，丛林籍尔说家风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213252_comment'></div>相逢一笑投针地，俱是当年百衲翁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213252_comment'></div>此诗又叙所以南归之意，而告之曰：「禅师天骨开张，丰颜美茂，奇韵逸发，谈笑如雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213252_comment'></div>虎穴中自不生彪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213252_comment'></div>然方今之世，正宗甚危，邪法甚炽，至诚恻怛，无使龙安法道下堕于地，禅师其勉尔」！</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1213252_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在龙安无事可做，学坐睡法，题自诗与隆上人。作品：《题自诗与隆上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题自诗与隆上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213329")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213329'>余少狂，为绮美不忘情之语，年大来辄自鄙笑，因不复作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213329_comment'></div>自长沙来归，舍龙安山中，无可作做，学坐睡法，饱饭靠椅，口角流涎，自喜以谓得其妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213329_comment'></div>旁舍有道人隆公，雅好予昔所病者，时时过予，终日而未尝倦，问予昔所作尚能寻绎乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213329_comment'></div>予引纸为录此数篇以遗之，而戏之曰：「昔达观禅师居京师，士大夫相从者，皆以能诗答话多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213329_comment'></div>观笑曰：『解答诸方话，能言五字诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213329_comment'></div>二般俱好艺，只是见钱迟』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213329_comment'></div>隆公曰：「果尔，吾不复耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213329_comment'></div>坐客皆笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213329_comment'></div>隆字默翁，湘中清胜者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>初夏，作十首诗寄分宁县令李公彦。作品：《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其四）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其五）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其六）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其七）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其八）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其九）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span>《白日有闲吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首》（其十）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_520866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白日有閒吏青原无惰民为韵奉寄李成德十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520866'>李侯端自重，不肯下南璧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520866'>君看英特气，自可凌太白。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520866'>小邑试牛刀，乃有政和色。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_520866_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520867?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520867'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520867'>举笔濡大千，挥斤隘八极。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520867'>置之卧病轩，翻身触破壁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520867'>起来一调笑，庭树挂斜日。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520867'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_520867_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520868?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520868'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520868'>地生金色光，女作师子吼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520868'>此轩初不然，风日穿窗牖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520868'>莫作两头看，空花竟何有。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520868'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_520868_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520869?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520869'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520869'>客来清对榻，客去闭深关。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520869'>聊为文字饮，酬唱相往还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520869'>朝来公事少，白日吏长閒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520869'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_520869_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520870?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520870'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520870'>少年韵如春，才可供十吏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520870'>故人半青云，隐几肘门寐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520870'>行看登玉堂，清坐追陆贽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/520871?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520871'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520871'>朅来民讼少，槐影覆閒庭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520871'>看山久成癖，诗眼耐空青。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520871_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520872?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520872'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520872'>花光浮县郭，麦浪涨郊原。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520872'>吏散僧投谒，诗成月上轩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520872'>何妨横麈尾，相对两忘言。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520872'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_520872_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520873' class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520873'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520873'>密室调弦索，晴轩较画图。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520873'>捡书凭锦瑟，背句遣奚奴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520873'>一欢同煮茗，此兴不能无。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_520874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520874'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520874'>深原晓犁耕，隔溪夜舂簸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520874'>竹间伊余行，童稚供日课。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520874_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520875?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520875'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520875'>单衣试嫩寒，花下爱清晨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520875_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520875'>不恨簿书恶，何妨閒岸巾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520875_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520875'>定应悬睿想，忧乐自同民。<div href='/Writing/521971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>摩陀歌赠乾上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521971")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_521971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521971'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521971'>处处三门向南开，青山绿水自围裹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521971'>钟鱼鸣时摊钵盂，精粗随分吃些个。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521971'>一生受用只如此，何用忙忙脚踏火。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521971'>口闲莫说事，留取吞饭颗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521971'>眼明穿得针，要自时补破。<div id='poem_sentence_4_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_521971'>粥后眠一觉，不著溲涨亦不起。<div id='poem_sentence_5_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_521971'>斋后行数步，不是肚膨也打过。<div id='poem_sentence_6_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_521971'>我不求世人，世人不求我。<div id='poem_sentence_7_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_521971'>时时牵衣领，臃肿包头涡。<div id='poem_sentence_8_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_521971'>一味怯风吹耳朵，世上许多人。<div id='poem_sentence_9_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_521971'>蘖蘖犹如蚁旋磨，团团并头争什么。<div id='poem_sentence_10_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_521971'>一筹输与摩陀板头盘脚坐，人言南岳好。<div id='poem_sentence_11_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_521971'>奇峰七十朵，庐山更是好。<div id='poem_sentence_12_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_521971'>瀑布垂天云，净色不受涴。<div id='poem_sentence_13_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_521971'>殿阁参差如画出，万人围绕看登坐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_521971'>汝若学道便成佛，汝若不学地狱祸。<div id='poem_sentence_15_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_521971'>眼看鼻孔也寻常，六月日头甚热火。<div id='poem_sentence_16_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_521971'>一筹输与摩陀看屋卧，唤渠挽不来，送渠推不可。<div id='poem_sentence_17_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_521971'>摩陀摩陀，无如之何。<div id='poem_sentence_18_521971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_521971'>问著不答，好哑大哥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_521971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>夏，张商英在峡州宜都县，招住天宁寺，上书退谢，并作六颂以辞之。作品：《上张无尽居士退崇宁书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其四）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其五）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《无尽居士以峡州天宁寺见邀作此辞免六首》（其六）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_1213229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213229?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上张无尽居士退崇宁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213229")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213229'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213229'>某启：诵相公佳句，愿见二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213229_comment'></div>每念威德崇重，辩才无碍，未易酬对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213229_comment'></div>顾省钝根无异，能解非所堪任，以是久不敢行诣耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213229_comment'></div>不谓比来照禅师书中，过辱绪言见及，如佩黄金良药之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213229_comment'></div>阁下昔与云庵、兜率神交道契，为内外护，虽当时从游之人如某者，亦蒙记录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213229_comment'></div>爱人而及屋乌，谓徒虚语，今始信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213229_comment'></div>又蒙辱以崇宁见召，尚未识门屏，而据授以师位，衲子惊怪，莫不改观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213229_comment'></div>实以鄙陋，恐临事失职，有累阁下知言耳，故不敢辄受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213229_comment'></div>谨课成拙颂六首，缮写呈上，聊供阁下千里法喜之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213229_comment'></div>干冒钧重，不胜愧悚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1213229_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521593' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_2_521593'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521593_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521594' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_521594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521594'>舌本雷槌烹佛祖，笔端和气活生民。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521594'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521594_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_521597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521597'>回看坐睡横眠处，折脚铛儿解笑人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521598'>小犊鼻头无觅处，听渠露地且闲眠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。此文所作时间当在至峡州善溪天宁寺后，姑从周书系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1213230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213230?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答张天觉退传庆书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213230")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213230'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213230'>某启：某青山白云之人，其踪迹不愿上王公贵人之齿牙，纵浪大化，饱饭足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213230_comment'></div>不虞阁下过顾，千里惠书，以崇宁见要，挽至人天之上，使授佛之职，责以重振西祖已坠之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213230_comment'></div>其以阁下所责甚重，某之材力甚薄，不敢辄冒宠命，作偈辞免，意阁下必怜其诚，从其所欲，弃置之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213230_comment'></div>而礼意益勤，三返其使，欲一相见而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213230_comment'></div>某翻然改曰：无尽居士道大德博，名声遍华夏，独立四顾，为我家门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213230_comment'></div>又先云庵之执，今区区于一愚比丘，其可终不往也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213230_comment'></div>故间关而来，阁下一见，过有称赏，尝谓天下之英物，圣宋之异人，拨置形骸，倾泻意气，奇章。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213230_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c44f247bccdd45baac0218dd52b02d1e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c44f247bccdd45baac0218dd52b02d1e");'><span id='c44f247bccdd45baac0218dd52b02d1e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1105')">1104-1105年</a>，34-35岁</div><div id='c44f247bccdd45baac0218dd52b02d1e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　秋，重返龙安，李清臣、李先臣过龙安山，出示群公诗，依张商英诗次韵。作品：《清臣先臣过余于龙安山出群公诗为示依天觉韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清臣先臣过余于龙安山出群公诗为示依天觉韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520653")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520653'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520653'>随轩文字海，异宝罗周遭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520653'>忽见张公诗，雪浪翻惊涛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520653_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋李成德宫词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213413")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213413_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213413'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213413'>唐人工诗者多喜为宫词，「天阶夜月凉于水，卧看牵牛织女星」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213413_comment'></div>「玉容不及寒鸦色，犹带朝阳日影来」，世称绝唱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213413_comment'></div>以予观之，此特记恩遇疏绝之意于凝远不言之中，非能摸写太平，藻节万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213413_comment'></div>读成德所作一百篇，知前人之未工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213413_comment'></div>其收拾道山绛阙之春色，刻画玉楼金屋之情状，使海山濒海之人读之，如近至尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213413_comment'></div>非其才当世，何以治此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213413_comment'></div>上元日题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213413_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年4月</a>　四月，至分宁黄龙山，代灵源惟清作祭黄龙慧南谥号文。作品：《祭老黄龙谥号文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213570' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213570' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213570?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭老黄龙谥号文<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213570")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213570_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213570'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213570'>崇宁四年四月某日，住山某敢昭告于南禅师之塔：窃闻巢、由穑者，夷、齐饿夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213570_comment'></div>初若无求于一时，终必有称于百世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213570_comment'></div>观其措虑深远，盖亦维持化风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213570_comment'></div>故知德泽之在民，是乃声名之不舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213570_comment'></div>又况荷担大法，提携四生者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213570_comment'></div>恭惟禅师家于此山，名落天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213570_comment'></div>起临济于将仆，传少室于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213570_comment'></div>厥集大成，有光先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213570_comment'></div>乃者明天子沛流殊恩，大昭懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213570_comment'></div>特旌普觉之号，用励后学之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213570_comment'></div>仰惟觉灵，祇此荣福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213570_comment'></div>呜呼，春葩华于万物，而不自以为功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213570_comment'></div>日昭明于四方，而不知以为德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213570_comment'></div>凡所以歌咏和气，褒赞高明者，皆天下之至情，然则禅师于此，岂曰不然耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1213570_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　读黄庭坚寄惟清诗，次其韵。作品：《次韵鲁直寄灵源三首》（其一）<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　读黄大临、黄庭坚唱和《青玉案》词，次韵和之。（绿槐烟柳长亭路）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《全宋词》页七一二。）</span><div id='poem_218228' class='_poem'><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213422'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213422'>草木之英，楩楠兰蕙也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213422_comment'></div>鳞羽之英，凤鸟麒麟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213422_comment'></div>然则人类亦有英乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213422_comment'></div>公卿士大夫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213422_comment'></div>而僧之英则异是，以心空为登第，以果位为阶品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213422_comment'></div>颓然无求者，出世间之相也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213422_comment'></div>横肩勃窣者，大福田衣也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213422_comment'></div>弥天之俱载，□永之孤步，世莫能贵贱，盖所谓颖然而出者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213422_comment'></div>五羊僧名惠英，年二十馀，能折节读书，工作诗，而未有字，余以颖孺字之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213422_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521419'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521419'>千峰夕阳外，空翠摇烟霏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521419'>终古无求处，相看一笑归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521419'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521419_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>闻陈瓘南归至衡阳，复作诗寄之。作品：《莹中南归至衡阳作六首寄之》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《莹中南归至衡阳作六首寄之》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《莹中南归至衡阳作六首寄之》（其三）<span id='poem_sentence_2_521647'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521647_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521648' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521648' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_521648_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521648'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521648'>醉里南游亦偶然，归来客舍梦初圆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521648'>袖中沧海烦倾出，要看毫端浪拍天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521649_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521649'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521649'>喧热婆罗大火聚，无厌足王刀锯场。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521649'>闻道饱参俱透过，来寻初友见清凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521649_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521649'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521649_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_521650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521650'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521650'>争道头陀再应缘，那知南亩不陈鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521650'>君看提起超情句，马得幡竿尾指天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521650_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521651_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521651'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521651'>礼拜起来无伎俩，拈花笑里有精神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521651'>何如眼倦抛书睡，一枕雷霆撼四邻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521651'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521651_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521652' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521652' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
