id='poem_title_521652_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521652'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521652'>笑看痴蝇遭唾涴，绝怜香象截流过。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521652'>归来儿女团圞坐，嬴得心如古井波。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521652'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521652_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为黄龙山翊道人作《痴庵铭》作品：《痴庵铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213485' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213485' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213485?labeling=true' target='_blank'>痴庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213485")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213485_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213485'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213485'>众生以贪、瞋、痴为三毒，三毒之过，能致生死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213485_comment'></div>诸佛以戒、定、慧、方便观照，而用治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213485_comment'></div>余至龙山，翊道人引余坐于明窗净室之间，曰：「此吾痴庵也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213485_comment'></div>翊颀然秀发，论议精到，余不见其痴之相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213485_comment'></div>山云朝升，璧月夜挂，翛然无营，余不见其痴之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213485_comment'></div>禅者方以精严黠慧，自矜机辩，逸群胜物，其肯甘为痴哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213485_comment'></div>顾虎头之痴于画，王述之痴于不言，率为世传，是好名之痴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213485_comment'></div>上人泯泯与众卧起，不知人间是非荣辱，贵贱功利，如三世诸佛之白牯，可谓之痴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213485_comment'></div>虽以自志，然余以谓其未能绝对，余为之铭，又可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213485_comment'></div>上人之痴，不事于名，则余之铭，于义未失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213485_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1213485'>导师黠慧，出三界痴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213485_comment'></div>于无痴中，致众生疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213485_comment'></div>未若翊禅，淡然无为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213485_comment'></div>以痴为庵，聊以戏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213485_comment'></div>亦有痴侣，论痴要诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213485_comment'></div>若见大智，红垆片雪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1213485_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>游黄龙山断际院，为小僧作潜庵赞。作品：《游黄龙山断际院潜庵常居之有小僧乞赞戏书其上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游龙山断际院潜庵常居之有小僧乞赞戏书其上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522166")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522166'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522166'>赵州只有一个齿，潜庵一个恐不趐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522166'>虽然下下都咬著，咸酸自分盐醋味。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522166'>龙兴古寺曾闭门，断际云孙第十世。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522166'>劝人莫信马大师，一口吸尽西江水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522166'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522166'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522166_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与惟清别，作诗。作品：《别灵源禅师》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_521053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别灵源禅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521053")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521053'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521053'>平生风骨秀琳琅，水镜胸怀未易量。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521053'>声利光中忙趣少，烟霞影里淡心长。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521053'>云泉隐德无情动，猿鸟侵身不乱行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521053'>他日定归当卜筑，青藜紫蕨壮诗肠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521053'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521053_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e7ff162858bc43ad8342fca41c44ec6c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e7ff162858bc43ad8342fca41c44ec6c");'><span id='e7ff162858bc43ad8342fca41c44ec6c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>，48岁</div><div id='e7ff162858bc43ad8342fca41c44ec6c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年2月6日</a>　二月初六日，至黄龙谒昭默禅师灵源惟清塔，作祭文。作品：《祭昭默禅师文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭昭默禅师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年2月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213551")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213551_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213551'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213551'>政和八年二月初六日，甘露灭致以香羞之奠，祭于佛寿灵源真归无生之塔：宝觉以拳，授法宗纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213551_comment'></div>区别背触，天非苍苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213551_comment'></div>如履虎阱，非愚则狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213551_comment'></div>公少奇逸，发硎剑铓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213551_comment'></div>横机试之，切玉无伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213551_comment'></div>体露情尽，凡圣两忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213551_comment'></div>沩仰机辩，如珠走盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213551_comment'></div>父喜自匿，暴子所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213551_comment'></div>追还此风，名闻诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213551_comment'></div>临济法道，始于南昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213551_comment'></div>大于汝颍，盛于衡湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213551_comment'></div>黄龙三关，建无胜幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213551_comment'></div>奕世护持，不离觉场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213551_comment'></div>天魔愁怖，走仆且僵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213551_comment'></div>剪拂流辈，高师门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213551_comment'></div>庸有匪人，卖公自扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213551_comment'></div>骐驎种性，自异犬羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213551_comment'></div>狠触怒疾，夫岂知量？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213551_comment'></div>俨临清泉，精严激昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213551_comment'></div>如万星月，如百谷王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213551_comment'></div>高明广大，洞彻汪洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213551_comment'></div>成就法器，坚翅飞翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213551_comment'></div>下视毒龙，命将灭丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213551_comment'></div>划海为两，抟而取将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213551_comment'></div>老则移疾，古寺闲房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213551_comment'></div>听万象说，以默自藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213551_comment'></div>猿鸟厌见，天下想望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213551_comment'></div>我初见公，骏气腾骧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213551_comment'></div>溟涬弟之，但加敬庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213551_comment'></div>人以谤掩，公慰愈光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213551_comment'></div>置麝溺器，更增其香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213551_comment'></div>取而有之，簏于药囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213551_comment'></div>坐交时埋，瓮于南荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213551_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1213551'>落苦李，人弃路旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213551_comment'></div>公犯世忌，愈益称赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213551_comment'></div>万人浮议，冰消其汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213551_comment'></div>既幸生还，陆沉故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213551_comment'></div>岂不愿见，恃公康强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213551_comment'></div>计至失声，事出仓皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213551_comment'></div>中流欲济，俄丧楫航。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213551_comment'></div>夜泪殷枕，起喟失床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213551_comment'></div>我忧禅学，终背教纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213551_comment'></div>造论导之，排斥否臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213551_comment'></div>公闻乃曰，彼自无疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213551_comment'></div>以书教诫，欹倾数行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213551_comment'></div>至言吐凤，自然文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213551_comment'></div>马鸣龙胜，论著精详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213551_comment'></div>文字于道，疑不相妨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213551_comment'></div>索珠层渊，采玉崇冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213551_comment'></div>人各有志，咸酸异尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213551_comment'></div>但馀此意，拜未敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213551_comment'></div>嗟吁惜哉，巍巍堂堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213551_comment'></div>遂成千古，丛林荒凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213551_comment'></div>然观斗柄，阴晴晦彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213551_comment'></div>示有出没，夫岂真亡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1213551_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年2月6日</a>　二月初六日，至黄龙谒昭默禅师灵源惟清塔，作诗祭之。作品：《谒灵源塔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒灵源塔</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年2月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521184")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521184'>高帆驾浪过南溟，那料归来扫此亭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521184'>桃李成阴春老大，溪山好在鬓凋零。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521184'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_521184", 521184, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>瓦灯</span>已照宫商石，卵塔分藏服匿瓶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521184'>春雪尚能知客意，荡除毛孔瘴烟腥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年2月8日</a>　拜塔后留一日，为惟清弟子证公作《无证庵记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无證庵记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年2月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213439")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213439'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213439'>余顷得罪谪海外，馆于开元之上方俨师院，日与弥勒同龛，颓然听造化琢削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213439_comment'></div>有道人械类丛林，款余甚勤，曰：「吾泉南分化至此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213439_comment'></div>与语，翛然令人忘百事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213439_comment'></div>逃空虚者闻足音而喜，矧置身蛮夷，论效鴂舌，衣缠花贝，心绪怵然，非复中华气味，而见道人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213439_comment'></div>相从盖百许日，问出世法，余曰：「有亚圣大人出世南州，临济十世之孙号灵源大士者，今为法檀度，譬清凉月，下瞩热恼，天下名缁奇衲，龙蟠凤逸而趋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213439_comment'></div>子可跨海北去，无后时矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213439_comment'></div>道人愕曰：「敢不承教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213439_comment'></div>翼日翻然而去，余盖莫敢必其所往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213439_comment'></div>后三年，余蒙恩北归，馆于石门精舍，有力持书，视其款识，乃吾證公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213439_comment'></div>发缄疾读，则知其不鄙弃余言，见灵源于龙山两白矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213439_comment'></div>呜呼，子可谓真有志于道者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213439_comment'></div>又三年，灵源弃学子，分化他方，余拜塔而至，于是见證颀然人群中，攀翻追绎海南之人烟树石，纷然落吾目中，为留一昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213439_comment'></div>曰：「吾措庵自藏，子当为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213439_comment'></div>问庵所在，證笑曰：「以太虚为顶，以大地为基，以万象为床榻，以天魔外道为侍者，举足下足，皆是妙圆密海」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213439_comment'></div>余心知其戏，曰：「子岂所谓随身丛林者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213439_comment'></div>问其名，曰无證，曰：「圆觉谓一切众生皆證圆觉，学者以为至矣，余笑以为诬之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213439_comment'></div>本无数量不落识情，奈何谓之證乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213439_comment'></div>谓之證，譬如加首于首，名为染污，吾又强区分别之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213439_comment'></div>无證盖就学所知言耳，若亲见灵源于宝觉背触之拳，则当以身为舌，为说之尚无，證之足云乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213439_comment'></div>余曰：「有是哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213439_comment'></div>因序其语为之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1213439_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='13e72ca3b43d46a5962fba4a48f3a830_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("13e72ca3b43d46a5962fba4a48f3a830");'><span id='13e72ca3b43d46a5962fba4a48f3a830_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1118&endYear=1118')">1118年</a>，48岁</div><div id='13e72ca3b43d46a5962fba4a48f3a830' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>欲自分宁入湖南，依希祖以终老，遂馆分宁云岩寺，时韩驹宰分宁，宗杲亦从之游。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>韩驹问及预知人生将终之术，答其疑，并作六偈。作品：《与韩子苍六首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《与韩子苍六首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《与韩子苍六首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《与韩子苍六首》（其四）<span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与韩子苍六首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span "poem_title_521681")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521681'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521681'>虽赴来机少异之，箭锋相直出思惟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521681'>讷庵言下瞠双目，孔子原来是仲尼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521681'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521681_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521682' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521682' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521682?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521682_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521682'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521682'>从来未悟不曾迷，一见庵僧更不疑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521682'>脱体现前无亸避，鼻头向下少人知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521682'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521682_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521683' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521683' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521683?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521683_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521683'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521683'>盘珠走处无留影，百计推寻摸意根。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521683'>酬汝欲心颠倒见，哆啝元不是无言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521683'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521683_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521684' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521684?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521684'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521684'>但识纲宗无实法，为君拈却眼中尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521684'>鸳鸯绣出从教看，莫把金针度与人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521684'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521684_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521685?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521685'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521685'>收得讷庵末后句，罗敷种性觉风流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521685'>海坛马子似驴大，失晓山童不裹头。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521685'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521685_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521686?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521686'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521686'>百年应尽便应尽，坐脱立亡誇小儿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521686'>酪出乳中无别法，死时何苦欲先知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521686'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在云岩寺，众寺僧持纸求诗，斯须立就，韩驹劝其少加思。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>代韩驹作请如山禅师住云岩疏。作品：《请山老住云岩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请山老住云岩疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213577")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213577'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213577'>敷演佛乘，资延睿算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213577_comment'></div>佥求达识，成就胜缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213577_comment'></div>振列圣已坠之纲宗，行初祖不传之正令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213577_comment'></div>真非掩伪，旁徇道俗之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213577_comment'></div>公则生明，特用丛林之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213577_comment'></div>伏惟某人随机说法，籍教悟宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213577_comment'></div>名为东林横枝，其实泐潭正脉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213577_comment'></div>少时横行海上，老来古寺城隈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213577_comment'></div>惟以薪而续床，分栽田而博饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213577_comment'></div>然唯云岩胜刹，实曰江国上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213577_comment'></div>宗旨之渊源，缁衲之都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213577_comment'></div>凤山归去，瓶盂是处为家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213577_comment'></div>猊座重登，竿木逢场作戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213577_comment'></div>请提雅曲，大众欣闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213577_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1213577_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为如山作请药石榜疏。作品：《请药石榜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1213578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请药石榜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213578")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213578'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213578'>耆年日已凋丧，丛林今遂寂寥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213578_comment'></div>王官玉石俱焚，学者泾渭不辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213578_comment'></div>谓之受道，其实走名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213578_comment'></div>赖老成之典刑，为后昆之轨范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213578_comment'></div>恭以新命某人，滴水滴冻，知果知因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213578_comment'></div>唯显晦水到渠成，使魔外风行草偃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213578_comment'></div>一段胜事，千目同观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213578_comment'></div>龙蜃沙头，最初解开布袋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213578_comment'></div>凤凰山下，末后把定牢关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213578_comment'></div>道不虚行，法固如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213578_comment'></div>特致溪蘋之具，以表山门之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213578_comment'></div>欣然肯来，岂胜幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213578_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>宗杲为作《觉范顶相赞》，与韩驹击节称赏。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>以所作《百禅师传》初稿示宗杲，或谓宗杲读后为剔出十九人而焚之。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>于云岩讷室观苏轼、黄庭坚帖，跋其后。作品：《东坡山谷帖二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span>《东坡山谷帖二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋东坡山谷帖<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213350")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213350'>东坡、山谷之名，非雷非霆，而天下震惊者，以忠义之效，与天地相始终耳，初不止于翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213350_comment'></div>王羲之、颜平原皆直道立朝，刚而有礼，故笔迹至今天下宝之者，此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213350_comment'></div>予于云岩讷室观此帖，皆其海上穷困时自适之语，然高标远韵，凌秋光，磨月色，令人手玩，一饭不置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213350_comment'></div>若讷当藏之名山，以增云林之佳气。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213350_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1213351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213351?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1118年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213351'>前代尊宿火浴，无烧香偈子，山谷独能偈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213351_comment'></div>初见罗汉南公化作偈，其略曰：「黑蚁旋磨千里错，巴蛇吞象三年觉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213351_comment'></div>天下衲子，听莹十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213351_comment'></div>晦堂曰：「鲁直作此有据乎，亦意造尔」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213351_comment'></div>山谷曰：「吾聊为丛林戏耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213351_comment'></div>晦堂大笑曰：「岂可以般若为戏论乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213351_comment'></div>山谷始悔前所学未登本色垆鞴，乃卜居于庵之旁，方知晦堂真不请之友耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213351_comment'></div>今读此书，乃是未见晦堂时语也，不然，安有吹剑语乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1213351_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>观长老元悟藏黄庭坚书寒山诗，跋其后。作品：《又诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋在云岩寺，有诗题筠轩。作品：《题云岩筠轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521280?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_521280'>雨叶风枝小径通，拂砧清坐有谁同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521280'>粉衣香滑秋丛瘦，泉佩丁东夜壑空。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213306'>昭默孝友于昆弟，而以谦自牧，不如是，法道何由兴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213306_comment'></div>予观其赠洞和禅师法句曰：「志有常守，诚无外求」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213306_comment'></div>及疑其语，瞻其风度，此老为作实录耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213306_comment'></div>未见洞和，令人莫测其为人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213306_comment'></div>及见之，坐使人意消也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213306_comment'></div>韩子苍曰：「真本色住山人」。<div class='inline' gray;'>▪</span>为草堂善清禅师作赞。作品：《黄龙草堂清禅师赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_522173'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522173'>黄觉晚子，死心季弟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522173'>住黄龙山，为十二世。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522173'>青春无背面，空花有根蒂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522173'>欲识晦堂背触拳，寒到黄河冻连底。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_522173_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>黄龙雅上座出示死心悟新禅师舍利，为作赞。作品：《死心禅师舍利赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><br /></div>

id='poem_sentence_1_521141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521141'>经游况是闲心远，富览谁能与物齐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521141_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='34bd1354e4c54d11bffea68aeb3bbd17_label'><a href='javascript: gray;'>▪</span>代湘阴县令彭景醇为邓沿作先志碑记。作品：《先志碑记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先志碑记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213456")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213456'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213456'>政和元年，余为湘阴令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213456_comment'></div>湘阴濒楚水，临洞庭，连樯万艘，天水相接，尽献南楚之形胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213456_comment'></div>爱其风俗之纯美，民讼之稀少，士君子博学而知要，笃实而有文，穷不忘道，富则守礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213456_comment'></div>邑之南郭邓氏之富，至纨裤僮奴，谷量牛马，然奉身甚约，礼士甚恭，邑人皆化其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213456_comment'></div>其子沿循道，议论有英气，直谅而勇于为义，缙绅高其才，今为承直郎，余游相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213456_comment'></div>自余之宦湘阴馀十年，无日不思缚屋湘尾，分湖山之胜，从父老之游，且将老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213456_comment'></div>宣和四年夏，循道以书抵余曰：「天降罪罚，不自殒灭，上延先考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213456_comment'></div>启手足时则有遗训：『吾承祖宗馀庆，坐享温燠，族大口众，贫富错居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213456_comment'></div>欲赡给其贫者，未遇皇暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213456_comment'></div>汝其承吾之志』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213456_comment'></div>言卒而弃诸孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213456_comment'></div>呜呼，沿尚忍言之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213456_comment'></div>已于今年元日，与族人为约券，月给谷一斛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213456_comment'></div>男议婚钱十千，再婚减其半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213456_comment'></div>女议嫁者钱三十千，再嫁则减其半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213456_comment'></div>备丧者钱十千，及葬更给其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213456_comment'></div>岁月弗穷，而存殁弗常，不敢负标以计数，限斛以为额，庶其利流百世而不弊，子其为我书之，将刻石以昭示子孙，使无忘先训，且欲族人想见先考馀风遗烈也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213456_comment'></div>昔范文正公念族人游宦未归，多厄于饥寒，则建义庄于姑苏，以给其伏腊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213456_comment'></div>舒王请输己俸，买田蒋山饭僧，为王氏之亡者修营冥福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213456_comment'></div>文公赡其生，舒王福其死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213456_comment'></div>循道独立券约，恩及存殁，此其东南贤士大夫多称，其可以无书乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213456_comment'></div>系之以词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1213456'>汉祚中兴天所佑，笃生奇臣扫秽垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213456_comment'></div>杖策军门谒刘秀，功业千年粲星斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213456_comment'></div>邓侯受材极奇茂，毛骨似之岂其后？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213456_comment'></div>清明在躬气浑厚，慈祥照人资孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213456_comment'></div>邑人依之扶老幼，楩楠参天覆清昼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213456_comment'></div>毫末养之至成就，百未一施舟壑走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213456_comment'></div>疑侯功名在怀袖，取之易然行探手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213456_comment'></div>湖山万顷连户牖，料理风烟课榆柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213456_comment'></div>琴书娱客付杯酒，走人之急古或有，分财赡族今则否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213456_comment'></div>此风移之遍宇宙，天子无为千万寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213456_comment'></div>念尔族人拜稽首，恩无贵贱适所受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213456_comment'></div>符之弗忘帝汝祐，不然鬼亦扼汝脰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213456_comment'></div>西山磬石清欲透，刻此铭诗传不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1213456_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>同湘阴诸老为邓沿分财赡族之事赋诗。作品：《邓循道分财赡族湘阴诸老赋诗同作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_520779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520779?labeling=true' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520779'>卜式与弟赀，如塞无底窦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520779'>其爱止弟耳，亲旧竟何有。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520779'>二疏得赐金，尽以散亲旧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520779'>邓侯功名姿，颖脱盖天授。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520779'>纷纷窭人子，悬鹑露两肘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520779'>安知寒微中，不复生奇秀。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520779'>阴功虽无形，报应捷于口。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520779'>此风起颓俗，能使薄者厚。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520779'>作诗附家传，想见为拊手。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521375'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521375'>苦冰洁檗是行藏，一节无求老更刚。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年4月12日</a>　四月十二日，馆湘阴之兴化寺，卜居于此，时徐质夫自土山来，一昔夜语，作诗纪其事。作品：《宣和五年四月十二日余馆湘阴之兴化徐质夫自土山来一昔夜语甚倾倒且曰前尝梦见东坡今复见子何清事相联耶吾所居有亭名闲美尝有白燕巢梁间屡见鹤翔于层霄嘱予为诗纪其事质夫大梁人质而有文佳公子也》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213373?labeling=true' "poem_title_1213373")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213373'>云庵住庐山时，山谷过焉，相与游鸾溪，坐大石上，擘窠留题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213373_comment'></div>其法喜之游如黄檗裴公，乃作此赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213373_comment'></div>后二十馀年，得于衡阳毛氏之家，持以还长沙开法长老，觉慈实其的孙，时年二十三岁，即以付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213373_comment'></div>临济正脉，使流通不断，乃无所愧，此赞其敬之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213373_comment'></div>宣和五年中秋前一日题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1213373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　奭禅师将赴东林之请，代为作谢曾孝序启。作品：《代东林谢知府启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213237?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代东林谢知府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1123年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213237")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213237'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213237'>右某启：准使符授前件职事，已祗受者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213237_comment'></div>窃以冠世名山，道德所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213237_comment'></div>出尘净社，缁白同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213237_comment'></div>近偶厄于妄庸，坐几见其倾覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213237_comment'></div>宜得神颖，以整颓纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213237_comment'></div>上以副王臣外护之勤，下以副丛林中兴之渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213237_comment'></div>如某者涖众犹晚，涉道未深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213237_comment'></div>五逢楚国之秋，三涉湘山之刹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213237_comment'></div>特以宗风之盛，误为学者所推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213237_comment'></div>偶预总提，良出徼倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213237_comment'></div>恭惟某官斯民先觉，当世伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213237_comment'></div>世殿侯藩，名独简于睿想；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213237_comment'></div>入联清禁，道每格于君心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213237_comment'></div>期必代于天工，盖久从于人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213237_comment'></div>某已次治境，行瞻履商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213237_comment'></div>获闻謦咳之馀，倍切叙崇之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213237_comment'></div>谨具启陈谢，伏惟台慈照察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1213237_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1123&endYear=1123')">1123年</a>　中秋后，作诗送奭禅师往东林。作品：《送海印奭老住东林》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1124&endYear=1124')">1124年</a>　许叔温有和作，复和答之。作品：《复和答之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_520676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复和答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1124年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520676")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520676_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520676'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520676'>君不见功名欲致砚磨铁，桑公人间驹汗血。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520676'>五季干戈争夺中，低摧几不保臣节。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520676'>又不见相如赋工合骚雅，九重偶有赏音者。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520676'>及见但为上林令，断国反在淄川下。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520676'>长笑两事俱外物，自怜不是封侯骨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520676'>独爱华亭百袖师，小艇横蓑一竿竹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520676'>久住湘江谙水脉，揭蓬惯看湘西月。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520676'>闻道公眠画戟丛，相寻长恨城闉隔。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520676'>去年卜居城北地，客心每有悲笳碎。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520676'>惭愧诗筒走老兵，病眼那容见新制。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520676'>老来情绪那忍说，夙瘴乘之觉疲薾。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520676'>年来更欲学睦州，古寺闭门工织屦。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1124&endYear=1124')">1124年12月</a>　岁穷僧众，米竭，与侍者智观自兴化寺往湘阴彭景醇处乞米，宿湘阴村野，逢大学，作诗寄彭景醇。作品：《宿湘阴村野大雪寄湖山居士》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_title_520721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和元府判游山句</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520721")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520721'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520721'>举手弄云泉，溅衣作跳波。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520721'>侧耳闻遗音，仰看幽鸟过。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520721'>两公作妙语，清绝类阴何。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520721'>气爽如南山，晴岚掩峨峨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520721'>意快如落瀑，万仞崩银河。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520721'>秀如华林风，嫣然散微和。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520721'>而余独朴拙，欲登选佛科。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520721'>十年类马驹，镜谓砖可磨。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520721'>枫瘤或见取，此事古亦多。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520721'>噪吻成绮语，宁恤犯尸罗。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年7月5日</a>　七月五日，王宏道生辰，作诗贺之。作品：《王舍人路分生辰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王舍人路分生辰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1125年7月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520885")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_520885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520885'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520885'>贵出贤王裔，宗连母后因。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520885'>秋容漱毛骨，春色照簪绅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520885'>博古知无敌，穷经亦绝伦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520885'>后宵通七夕，今日是生辰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520885'>佳气凌湘浦，非烟压楚闉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520885'>绿醽浮白蚁，绮席绕花轮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520885'>寿缀诸天献，词容野客陈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520885'>不凋蟾窟桂，难老海山春。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520885'>已作瞻双阙，行看据要津。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520885'>功名先入手，图画在麒麟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520885'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1125&endYear=1125')">1125年</a>　为王宏道作赞。作品：《王宏道舍人赞》<span id='poem_sentence_3_522202'>方其少壮，则酒阑说剑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522202_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522202'>横槊赋诗，名动塞垒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522202_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522202'>及其倦也，则浮沅湘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522202_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中秋夕以月色静中见泉声幽处闻为韵分韵得见字</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_520778'>夜清成水宿，月出波滟滟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520778'>那知是中秋，老眼欲凄眩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520778'>此生天地间，飘泊如蓬转。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
奉新

<div class='label1' id='930e7e68d52f4b068fad59719cd47f76_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("930e7e68d52f4b068fad59719cd47f76");'><span id='930e7e68d52f4b068fad59719cd47f76_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　春，至洪州奉新县百丈山中，瞻怀海禅师遗像，作赞。作品：《百丈大智禅师真赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>百丈大智禅师真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522127")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522127_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522127'>马祖大寂禅师已化，塔于海昏之石门。师庐其旁既久，衲子相寻日增。于是厌山之浅，乃沿冯水而上，至车轮峰之下，与希运惟政火种刀耕而食，遂成法席。余崇宁四年春至山中，获瞻遗像。虽冰枯雪老，若不胜衣，而神气峻迈，如未度世。谨拜手稽首为之赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522127'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522127'>以实问答，空可青黄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522127'>以意求道，神落阴阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522127'>阴阳不测，脱略阴界。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522127'>青黄摸画，果因不昧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522127'>我有大机，佛无密语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522127'>如师子王，露地方踞。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522127'>称性文字，随分丛林。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522127'>如以妙指，发和雅音。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522127'>同世之波，寿九十二。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522127'>护持心宗，谥曰大智。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521577_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　作《临济四喝偈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《智证传》）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　元肃禅师之法嗣惟古禅师住百丈，大殿之下地荒未治，有荣州僧圆道人出山化供，作序送之。作品：《送圆上人序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213251' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213251' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213251?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送圆上人序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213251'>百丈为天下福地，禅宗振于兹，岁月之久，寺废为荒丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213251_comment'></div>大长老肃公来，中兴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213251_comment'></div>其子古公又能兴其家，昔之败瓦朽楹，今丹碧层出，钟鱼轰轰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213251_comment'></div>衲子自远而造，晨香夕灯，如安养土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213251_comment'></div>能回心植福于兹，以其殊胜之报，将如谷之答呼声也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213251_comment'></div>惜乎，大殿之下，地荒未治，有荣州圆道人，慨然欲阶之，使登殿者入离尘三昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213251_comment'></div>得佛土净登之者且尔，况施帛为之者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213251_comment'></div>圆公既出山，余挽衣告之曰：「一切殊胜，皆心所成，当勇猛勿惰，必有喜施之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213251_comment'></div>今虽檀林吹叶，会看明月满轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213251_comment'></div>一人闻之发心，三道便从天降」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213251_comment'></div>圆笑之曰：「有是哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213251_comment'></div>因书以为送。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1213251_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　秋九月三十日，黄庭坚卒于宜州，闻其讣，作诗悼之。作品：《悼山谷五首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一四。）</span>《悼山谷五首》（其二）<span -----title
宜黄
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e1539ed3dd2f47eaa09f8969e6eb9224_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e1539ed3dd2f47eaa09f8969e6eb9224");'><span id='e1539ed3dd2f47eaa09f8969e6eb9224_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1107&endYear=1107')">1107年</a>，37岁</div><div id='e1539ed3dd2f47eaa09f8969e6eb9224' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>暮春，至抚州宜黄县，与法太同游石巩。作品：《同希先游石巩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521317' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521317' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521317?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同希先游石巩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521317")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521317_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521317'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521317'>良辰美景古难并，且趁身闲稻雨晴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521317_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521317'>鸟语猿歌留我在，水声山色益人清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521317_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521317'>得幽诗句聊题壁，遇好峰峦即住程。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521317_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521317'>回首十年尘事里，与君今日梦魂惊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521317_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521317'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521317_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; -----title
邵阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='acb2df1350584d118c052bd9a2ae5608_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("acb2df1350584d118c052bd9a2ae5608");'><span id='acb2df1350584d118c052bd9a2ae5608_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年</a>，41岁</div><div id='acb2df1350584d118c052bd9a2ae5608' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年12月19日</a>　出开封府狱，友人胡强仲相随三千余里，十二月十九日至湖南邵阳方别，为作序。作品：《邵阳别胡强仲序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213243' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213243' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213243?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邵阳别胡强仲序</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213243")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213243'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213243'>「多言乃致祸，器满苦不密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213243_comment'></div>人有两三心，安能合为一？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213243_comment'></div>河坏蚁孔端，山隤有鼋穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213243_comment'></div>生存多所虑，长寝万事毕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213243_comment'></div>此孔北海临终时诗也，而其意乃若自悔，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213243_comment'></div>「教汝为恶邪，则恶不可为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213243_comment'></div>教汝为善耶，则我平生未尝为恶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213243_comment'></div>此范滂临刑语其子之辞也，而其意乃若自疑，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213243_comment'></div>徐有功方视事，吏泣白曰：「有诏，公当弃市」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213243_comment'></div>有功置笔安步而去，曰：「岂我独死，而诸人长不死乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213243_comment'></div>三坐大辟当死，不忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213243_comment'></div>三赦之，不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213243_comment'></div>其明见自性，不悔不疑，而卒以荣名终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213243_comment'></div>吾闻成就世出世间法，特一切能舍耳，有功其亦知此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213243_comment'></div>余学出世间法者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213243_comment'></div>辞亲出家，则知舍爱，游方学道，则能舍法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213243_comment'></div>临生死祸福之际，则当舍情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213243_comment'></div>顷因乞食，来游人间，与王公大人游，意适忘返，坐不遵佛语，得罪至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213243_comment'></div>重赖天子圣慈，不忍置之死，篆面鞭背，投之海南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213243_comment'></div>平生亲旧之在京师者，皆唾闻讳见，云散鸟惊，独吾友强仲姁妪守护，如事其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213243_comment'></div>自出开封狱，冒犯风雪，茧足相随三千馀里，而至邵阳，犹不忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213243_comment'></div>呜呼，臂三折而知医，阅人多而晓相，事更疑危而识交态，有交如子，何必多为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213243_comment'></div>然强仲每见余蓬头垢污，在束缚中，饮食谈笑如平日，言涕俱出曰：「子殆不知世间有耻辱忧患乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213243_comment'></div>抑真石肝铁肠也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213243_comment'></div>余笑曰：「死可避乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213243_comment'></div>心外无法，以南北论中外，则谓之失宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213243_comment'></div>以僧俗议优劣，则谓之迷旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213243_comment'></div>失宗迷旨，前圣所呵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213243_comment'></div>吾方以法界海慧照了诸相，犹如虚空大千沙界，特空华耳，何暇置朱崖于胸次哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213243_comment'></div>强仲高义密行，追配古人，宜若知此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213243_comment'></div>子持此语，为我谢乡里故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213243_comment'></div>此去死生一决，死不失为谷泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213243_comment'></div>脱或无恙，尚不失为车中王尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213243_comment'></div>他日绿锦江头相见，追惟今日，则尚可轩渠一笑也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213243_comment'></div>政和元年十二月十九日，海南逐客某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1213243_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1111&endYear=1111')">1111年12月</a>　又为胡强仲作诗三首，以示达观。作品：《至邵州示胡强仲三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《至邵州示胡强仲三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span>《至邵州示胡强仲三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_521732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>至邵州示胡强仲三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_521732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521732'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521732'>平生厌饫水云间，老境优游剩得閒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521732'>远谪瘴乡君勿叹，天教更看海南山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521732'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521732_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_521733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521733?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1111年12月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521733'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521733'>情缘不断自消灭，浮念欲生无起因。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521733'>多谢鍊磨金出矿，敢辞枷锁梦中身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521733_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_521734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521734'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521734'>卢能岭上容君看，弥勒楼前借汝观。<div -----title
琼山

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　张子修怜之，使就郡城东北隅之双井养病，并为构庵，名曰思远，其地苏轼曾游，有洞酌亭、疏快堂、俱清轩。<br /><a href="javascript: class='authorDate'>（1112年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522074'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522074'>沙弥嗜乳，作乳中虫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522074'>三篾高道，一钵孤风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522074'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_522074_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　李仲元将渡海北归，作序送之，托其至京师天宁寺见净因，录此序以寄希祖。作品：《送李仲元寄超然序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213245' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213245' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213245?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李仲元寄超然序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1112年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213245")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213245_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213245'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213245'>余至海南，留琼山，太守张公怜之，使就双井养病，在郡城之东北隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213245_comment'></div>东坡北渡，尝游爱泉，相去咫尺而异味，为名其亭曰烱酌，且赋诗而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213245_comment'></div>其旁有堂，名曰疏快，渠渠高深，吞风吐月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213245_comment'></div>堂之后有轩，名曰俱清，倚栏东望，山海之胜，一览而尽得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213245_comment'></div>太守又构庵于后，其名至远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213245_comment'></div>余既居之，乞橄榄于旁舍，判荔树于沙岸，作诗，其略曰：「整蓝乞橄榄，断树判荔枝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213245_comment'></div>日作东坡羹，有佳客至，馔山谷豆腐以饷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213245_comment'></div>崇宁寺有经可借，郡有书万卷，太守使监中之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213245_comment'></div>余时乞食于市，作息之馀，发《首楞严》之义以为书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213245_comment'></div>他日以寄吾弟祖超然，使知余虽困穷于万里，不能忘道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213245_comment'></div>仲元将渡海，不欲更作书，如到京为我一至天宁，见因觉，先为余录之以寄超然，且发万里一笑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1213245_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1112&endYear=1112')">1112年</a>　配管军中，须发滋生，自号甘露灭，作诗纪之。作品：《初过海自号甘露灭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_3_522038'>曲高唱独知音少，鲸浪粘天地脉通。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522038_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522038'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_520638'>事有世共见，而意复难知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520638'>杀父子受封，殆非人所为。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520638'>孟津观兵者，非天尚谁欺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520638'>孔子盖周人，而为殷宗枝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520638'>欲辨则不敢，亟口称夷齐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520638'>使彼果圣乎，古今无异词。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520638'>惜不经柳子，为一剖<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作掊）</span>击之。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520638'>知谁千载下，击节读吾诗。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520639'>饱霜阔叶菘，近水繁花荠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520639'>都卢深注汤，米烂菜自美。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520639'>诫勿加酸咸，云恐坏至味。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520639'>分尝果超绝，玉糁那可比。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521927'>此生身世两茫茫，醉里因君到故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521927'>沧海何曾断地脉，白袍从此破天荒。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年8月23日</a>　八月二十三日作诗贺蔡元中生辰。作品：《八月二十三日蔡元中生辰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。此条具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_521369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八月二十三日蔡元中生辰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1113年8月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521369")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521369'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521369'>才过中秋今几日，夜来海月上三更。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521369'>梦魂传得天书至，窗户俱明厩马惊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521369'>骨相终当为国器，儿声初已识人英。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521369'>明年庆节山中友，金屋怜君夜直清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521369'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年10月16日</a>　十月十六日，真净克文忌日，作偈祭之。作品：《云庵生辰十一首》（其六）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。此条具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_522039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云庵生辰十一首<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：后有政和二年琼南时作。）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1113年10月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522039")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522039'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522039'>不落思惟离圣凡，令君觌露见云庵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522039_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522039'>平生不许当头道，今日重闻称性谈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522039_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522039'>老鉴三机酬跛偃，洞山一半肯云岩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522039_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522039'>我无奇特报恩德，九死归从瘴海南。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522039_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522039'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_522039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年11月19日</a>　十一月十九日自琼州澄迈北渡海，将登船，作诗。作品：《渡海》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_520933' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520933' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520933?labeling=true' target='_blank'>渡海</a><span class='authorDate'>（1113年11月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520933")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_520933_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520933'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520933'>万里来偿债，三年堕瘴乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520933'>逃禅解羊负，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_520933", 520933, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>破律</span>醉槟榔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520933'>瘦尽声音在，病残须鬓荒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520933'>馀生实天幸，今日上归艎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520933'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520933_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
雷州（海康）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fab403cc688f402a8fb3946494d7cfb7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fab403cc688f402a8fb3946494d7cfb7");'><span id='fab403cc688f402a8fb3946494d7cfb7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年</a>，43岁</div><div id='fab403cc688f402a8fb3946494d7cfb7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年</a>　过雷州天宁寺，与戒禅师夜话，问及秦观字画，戒禅师出其维摩诘画像赞为示。<br /></div>

-----title
衡阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='619f776c132d4a9ba15d61690d6ca41e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("619f776c132d4a9ba15d61690d6ca41e");'><span id='619f776c132d4a9ba15d61690d6ca41e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='619f776c132d4a9ba15d61690d6ca41e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，过衡阳，道权禅师出示陈瓘诗，为跋其后。作品：《跋莹中诗卷》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋莹中诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213382")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213382'>了翁佯狂垢污，不择香臭，而至山水间，便能赋山矾墨梅，乃尔暴清绝耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213382_comment'></div>予政和春过衡阳，道权出以相示，如见抵掌谈笑时。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1213382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为衡阳毛庠之子在庭作《季子梦训》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_1213470' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213470' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213470?labeling=true' target='_blank'>季子梦训</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213470")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213470_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213470'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213470'>湘山逸人毛文仲，盖东坡苏公江湖游旧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213470_comment'></div>公殁馀十年，而文仲之子学成，更其名曰在庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213470_comment'></div>已而梦公授以字曰季子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213470_comment'></div>季子喜，忘寝饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213470_comment'></div>客疑以问余，余曰：「孔子梦周公，因慕周公，晚而叹曰：『吾衰也久矣，吾不复梦见周公』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213470_comment'></div>则平日所常梦也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213470_comment'></div>季子慕公而梦见之，固其所也，又何疑焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213470_comment'></div>然孔子削迹伐树，不以为衰，而以不梦周公为衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213470_comment'></div>季子僮依纨裤，谷量牛马，不以为悦，而以梦东坡为悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213470_comment'></div>夫圣贤之受材，相远如天渊，而其好善之同，弗间毫发也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213470_comment'></div>客曰：「以季子字在庭，谓何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213470_comment'></div>余曰：「世莫知其说，余独知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213470_comment'></div>公于西汉，尤爱贾生、苏子卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213470_comment'></div>非直爱其文，如盎盎之春，藻饰万物，与其屹若砥柱，荡磨惊涛也，爱其知为臣之大体而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213470_comment'></div>生为怀王傅，王堕马死，生哭泣至死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213470_comment'></div>宁独不知哭泣不能生王于死中耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213470_comment'></div>其心以谓职傅，而王终非其道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213470_comment'></div>子卿使虏，不肯辱命，虽餐毡寝煴，牧羊海上，起止仗汉节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213470_comment'></div>李陵讽使降，则请效死于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213470_comment'></div>子卿宁独恶其生耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213470_comment'></div>其心以谓职称奉使，敢爱死哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213470_comment'></div>东坡意若曰：「至士立朝之节，而远有不同，然其学同出于吴季子，而不可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213470_comment'></div>季子挂剑徐公之墓，不以死生背其心，则稽之操履，何尝以用舍背其心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213470_comment'></div>今死向千载，其蹇蹇凛凛之姿，未尝不在汉庭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213470_comment'></div>公以季子字之，如《易》之垂象，意于不言之中，使学者自求之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213470_comment'></div>客噫嘻曰：「使东坡复生，不能自解免矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213470_comment'></div>遂去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1213470_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>毛庠有庭名思古，在庭求为作记。作品：《思古堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。此条具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1213445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思古堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213445")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213445'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213445'>东坡先生曰：「孔子、孟轲道同而其言未必同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213445_comment'></div>何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213445_comment'></div>以其言性知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213445_comment'></div>孔子曰：『成之者性』，『继之者善』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213445_comment'></div>盖善者，性之效尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213445_comment'></div>而孟轲曰：『人之性善』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213445_comment'></div>孔子之言譬则如珠走盘，孟轲之言譬则如珠著毡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213445_comment'></div>夫珠非有二者，走盘则影迹不留，故子贡曰：『夫子之言性与天道，不可得而闻』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213445_comment'></div>性既有言矣，乃曰不闻，是其可以影迹求哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213445_comment'></div>著毡则观者庸讵知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213445_comment'></div>不疑簟缛亦可以留珠乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213445_comment'></div>故荀卿又言人之性恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213445_comment'></div>自善恶之论兴，盖有不胜其言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213445_comment'></div>圣贤相去百年，而其言相远如天渊，况不翅百年，而守众人之言为知道，非愚则狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213445_comment'></div>颜渊、韩愈，异世而同出孔门，然其识有深浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213445_comment'></div>何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213445_comment'></div>亦以其言知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213445_comment'></div>渊饮水曲肱，在陋巷，不改其乐，此亚圣全德懿行也，而愈谓哲人之细事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213445_comment'></div>愈且未知颜渊，能知孔子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213445_comment'></div>《易》曰：『君子多识前言往行，以大蓄其德』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213445_comment'></div>然言行之精，以韩、孟之识，有不能尽窥，学者其可不思乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213445_comment'></div>吾尝诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213445_comment'></div>三衢毛庠文仲，少有英气，深于学问而善功名，富于翰墨而饱筹策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213445_comment'></div>以破赵会食为迂，伏轼下齐为椎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213445_comment'></div>所与游，皆天下第一等流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213445_comment'></div>遭时外平，疆埸久空，无所施其材，蹇寓一官，不甘忧患折困，袖手来归，圃于衡岳之下，寝处晴岚夕霏，按行春花秋月，弄琴阅书，以娱宾客，枵然与世相忘，而名其堂曰思古，与东坡之论相表里，如维摩自藏于不言之中，以发文殊之义，缙绅高之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213445_comment'></div>文仲殁，其子在庭季子以书抵余曰：「惟子可以知先人为堂之意，强为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213445_comment'></div>故余独载东坡之论，以著文仲之高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213445_comment'></div>然晋刘寔作《崇让论》曰：「世议士名德，不迨前人，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213445_comment'></div>时非乏贤士，不崇让耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213445_comment'></div>然则士必生而能贤，不由稽古之力，为循墙巽床之伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213445_comment'></div>是学使寔不死，登此堂，将逃羞无地，尚何论哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213445_comment'></div>季子年二十馀，种性工文，听其论古今，赡博绝伦，真能世其家者也，故乐为书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1213445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为毛在庭作赞。作品：《毛季子赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毛季子赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522205")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_522205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522205'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522205'>季子逸群，矫难控御。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522205'>迹寄黄尘，名在紫府。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522205'>观此风鉴，无以为喻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522205'>但见其清却梅林之风，秀等兰丛之露。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522205'>妙文章之吐凤，视功名其破釜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522205'>我欲醉袖之旁，更画凌波之女。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522205'>使其他日归道山，渡弱水，而骖风驭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_522205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522205'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522205_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为毛在庭所图毛女作赞。作品：《毛女赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_522195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毛女赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522195")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522195_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_522195'>毛女者，秦始皇宫嫔也。二世时，逃入华山，遂得道。季子图之书室，请余为之赞。赞曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_522195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522195'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522195'>不嗅梨花，而撚紫芝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522195'>不穿云袖，而披槲衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522195'>何以风神，洞如冰雪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522195'>使人见之，眼寒心折。<div id='poem_sentence_3_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522195'>如麝有香，以缶覆焉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522195'>透尘透风，种性则然。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522195'>又如烟雨，过孤山宅。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522195'>于荒寒中，微见春色。<div id='poem_sentence_7_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_522195'>图之壁间，是真过秦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_522195'>季子好德，白发日新。<div id='poem_sentence_9_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_522195'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_522195_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_522195'><span class='label'>按：</span>《石门文字禅》卷一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_522195_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>于毛在庭处得黄庭坚所作《云庵赞》<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为毛在庭所蓄南安岩主自严禅师像作赞。作品：《毛氏所蓄岩主赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_522140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522140?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_522140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522140'>白帽蒙首，须髯绕颊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_522140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_522140'>诗乃办两，出于咄嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_522140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_522140'>以境惟心，往复无间。<div id='poem_sentence_6_522140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_522140'>是故死时，亦生之旦。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520627'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520627'>念昔谪海南，路尘吹瘴风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520627'>髯胡岂有罪，乃肯与我同。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520627'>邵阳雨中别，涕泪落无从。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520627'>今日复何日，岳寺闻楼钟。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520627'>聚观迎万指，登睫排千峰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520627'>黄泉天复见，白骨肉已重。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520627'>髯虽未对面，音问已喜通。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520627'>夫子佐岣嵝，有道如葛洪。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520627'>笔力扛九鼎，奇语出遽匆。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520627'>长篇春争丽，送我归新丰。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520627'>山林当付我，君事侯与公。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520627_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1119&endYear=1119')">1119年</a>　观仲仁所藏曾布诗帖，跋其后。作品：《跋高台仁禅师所蓄子宣诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二七。）</span><div id='poem_1213388' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213388_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213388'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213388'>历公以功业著，诗律传者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213388_comment'></div>自废放山林间，与衲子游，其语便尔清熟，此柳子厚所谓诗人以穷乃工，殆非虚语。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1213388_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213355")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div
