ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　春二月，闻仲仁禅师讣，与方广从誉禅师赴衡州华光山，作文祭之。作品：《祭妙高仁禅师文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭妙高仁禅师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213552")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213552'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213552'>孤凤两雏，名著诸方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213552_comment'></div>我初识誉，未识华光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213552_comment'></div>政和甲午，还自南荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213552_comment'></div>夜宿衡岳，草屋路旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213552_comment'></div>仆奴传呼，妙高大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213552_comment'></div>连璧而来，惊喜失床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213552_comment'></div>高谊照人，笑语抵掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213552_comment'></div>潇湘平远，烟雨孤芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213552_comment'></div>举以赠我，不秘箧箱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213552_comment'></div>追绎陈迹，云更几霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213552_comment'></div>去年中秋，宿师云房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213552_comment'></div>为留十日，夜语琅琅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213552_comment'></div>曰我出吴，游淮涉湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213552_comment'></div>今三十年，倦鸟忘翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213552_comment'></div>偶如慧晓，怀思故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213552_comment'></div>想见明越，云泉苍茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213552_comment'></div>已遣阿涌，先渡钱塘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213552_comment'></div>不见半年，岭谷想望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213552_comment'></div>计至惊定，泪落沾裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213552_comment'></div>思归之念，夫岂其祥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213552_comment'></div>呜呼师乎，忠义激昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213552_comment'></div>高风逸韵，仁肝义肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213552_comment'></div>缙绅相志，远公支郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213552_comment'></div>此生逆旅，已熟黄粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213552_comment'></div>梦中吴楚，宁能取将？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213552_comment'></div>唯方广誉，躬至影堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213552_comment'></div>如我致辞，而炷此香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213552_comment'></div>清净法身，败橐脓囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213552_comment'></div>光透毛孔，不可掩藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213552_comment'></div>昔日非在，今未尝忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213552_comment'></div>如水中乳，莫逃鹅王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213552_comment'></div>则我与誉，何用叹伤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213552_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1213552_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

崇仁

id='poem_sentence_0_520817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520817'>面馀菜色短气中，经营有钱易升斗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520817'>抱孙买锄今岁丰，黄云𥝧稏村村同。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520817'>东林鼓声是谁致，聪明慈惠陇西公。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520817'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520817_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520818?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520818'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520818'>吏奸今古同一律，迩来间见复层出。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520818'>一邑雀息行镜中，公则生明无别术。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520818'>放衙下帘调索弦，来禽青李浴清泉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520818'>吾侪呈押日课办，亦作岸巾相对眠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520818'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520818_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520819?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520819'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520819'>我年<span class='inlineComment2'>（二字疑有误）</span>政如牧民术，败群者去羊蕃息。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520819'>向来盗窃如有盟，飞蹑垣墙度窗隙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520819'>下车夜户民不闭，终夕四邻无犬吠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520819'>一欢醉倒不须归，以塼支头路傍睡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520819'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520819_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_520820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520820?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520820'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520820'>争歌来为民父母，百里民心始安堵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520820'>外台选才第荐之，何必知贤夺而去。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520820'>当持马足卧车辙，报汝百年终有别。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520820'>蹄涔不著横海鲸，簿书那容万人杰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520820'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_520820_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　至崇仁，为知县彭以功作赦后祭神文。作品：《崇仁知县赦后祭神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1213644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213644?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崇仁知县赦后祭神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213644")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213644'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213644'>唯三代之训，夏至日恭祭地祇，斯古先哲王之懿德，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213644_comment'></div>而历世堙没不嗣，今天子力举而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213644_comment'></div>致礼既毕，奇祥荐兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213644_comment'></div>欢声和气，充塞天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213644_comment'></div>犹以名山大川，庙貌所在，有功血食于民者，未克躬至，则以守令使告行吏，其敢不肃虔哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213644_comment'></div>谨用某日特具牲酹，以奠于祠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213644_comment'></div>神之听之，祇此荣福。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1213644_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　为崇仁县丞仇彦和作《连瑞图序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_1213465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>连瑞图序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213465")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213465_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213465'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213465'>崇仁为抚属邑，山川清华，民俗茂美，然封连南康、庐陵，熏烝之习，珥笔之风，或波及之，以故讼繁，号称剧邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213465_comment'></div>自昔及今，政有能声者，才可倒指而数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213465_comment'></div>比岁仍饥，令佐非正官，苟简岁月，以气相胜而去者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213465_comment'></div>今年春，奉议彭公思禹、通佐仇公彦和，联翩下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213465_comment'></div>思禹风力敏强，凿奸铲猾，拨烦摧剧，吏民惊缩以为神，号霹雳手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213465_comment'></div>而彦和又能详明练达，照了罅隙，以裨赞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213465_comment'></div>卯衙退，砌无人迹，木阴覆庭终日，而囹圄殆可罗雀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213465_comment'></div>于是令丞抵掌清语，而罢卒以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213465_comment'></div>春夏之交，雨连旬，早稻登场，已而又雨无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213465_comment'></div>民歌于阡陌之间，所至相和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213465_comment'></div>六月癸亥，有千叶白莲，双葩并干，生于县之西池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213465_comment'></div>乙丑，有芝三茎，紫颖黄英，生于丞署之后堂，邦人聚观不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213465_comment'></div>呜呼，天下之令佐，其才贤，使民畏服，敏妙励精者，所至尚多有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213465_comment'></div>至兴居一室，淡然无为，而使百里之内，风雨时若，禾黍丰登，奇祥发现于花木如斯邑者寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213465_comment'></div>使吏民畏服者人也，而奇祥于花木者天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213465_comment'></div>《传》曰：「人无所不至，惟天不容伪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213465_comment'></div>盖理有固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213465_comment'></div>余闻精诚之至，各以类感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213465_comment'></div>贰师将军拔剑刺崖而飞泉涌，忠之至也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213465_comment'></div>李善自乳其主人之子而乳湩，义之至也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213465_comment'></div>古初护柩，以身捍火而火灭，孝之至也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213465_comment'></div>蔡顺之母龁指以呼顺而顺至，慈之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213465_comment'></div>夫忠义孝慈之应，如形附影，如声赴响，则两公推诚以莅民，勤政以报国，而嘉瑞并见者，和之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213465_comment'></div>今同治一邑，气和且尔，则异日坐断国论，以康济斯民，宜如何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213465_comment'></div>邦人图二物以誇四方，称颂令丞之贤，故余乐为之序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1213465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　为崇仁县丞仇彦和瑞应堂赋诗。作品：《仇彦和佐邑崇仁有白莲双葩并干芝草丛生于县斋之旁作堂名瑞应且求诗敬为赋之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_520498' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520498' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520498?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仇彦和佐邑崇仁有白莲双葩并干芝草丛生于县斋之旁作堂名曰瑞应且求诗敬为赋之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520498")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520498_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520498'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520498'>宰肉社树阴，岂无天下志。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520498'>用材朴楔间，已有经纶意。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520498'>欲观临大事，必自小者耳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520498'>彭侯伟杰姿，要是千乘器。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520498'>小邑试牛刀，不满一笑喟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520498'>仇亦何所为，睡足时隐几。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520498'>原多深夜耕，门有昼眠吏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520498'>三年爱等母，百里平如水。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520498'>政化不自知，草木发奇瑞。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520498'>论人或多舛，唯天不容伪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520498'>耿泉岂知忠，元乳岂知义。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520498'>应之捷影响，物有固然理。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520498'>此堂湿青红，宾从时毕至。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520498'>应为文字饮，砚席生佳气。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520498'>□□□□□，□□□□□。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520498'>□□□□□，□□华裾翠。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520498'>吏民起献觞，愿酬太平醉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520498'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_520498_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　三伏中，与彭以功闲游小寺，啜茶闻棋，作诗。作品：《崇仁县与思禹闲游小寺啜茶闻棋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崇仁县与思禹闲游小寺啜茶闻棋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521153")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521153'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521153'>平生阅世等虚舟，临汝重来又少留。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521153'>携弟来<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作共）</span>逃三伏暑，入门拾<span class='inlineComment2'>（钞补作先）</span>得一轩秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521153'>隔墙昼永闻棋响，阴屋凉生见树幽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521153'>又值能诗王主簿，饭馀春露啜深瓯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521153'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521153_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年8月1日</a>　八月初一，设斋开经酬所愿，作酬经愿文。作品：《酬经愿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二八。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1213635' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213635' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213635?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬经愿疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年8月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213635")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213635_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213635'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213635'>近缘脱身海岛，犯难来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213635_comment'></div>所经历州县仅三十城，出入瘴乡馀四千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213635_comment'></div>无秋毫之恐，有太山之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213635_comment'></div>皆神之休，成己之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213635_comment'></div>唯所许愿，敢昧初心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213635_comment'></div>已延佛僧，预开经法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213635_comment'></div>以八月之朔，对三宝之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213635_comment'></div>叙事之因，设斋以忏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213635_comment'></div>恭惟十身满觉，万德贞慈，俯赐哀怜，为之作證。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213635_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
汝南（汝阳）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　北上，行蔡州道中，作诗。作品：《蔡州道中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_521163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蔡州道中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521163")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521163'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521163'>北来行尽关山道，梁宋郊墟眼力微。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521163_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521163'>饮食甘酸杂淮甸，语音<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_521163", 521163, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>清软</span>近京畿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521163_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521163'>黄尘又向九天去，槁项新从万里归。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521163_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521163'>投老不堪行役苦，手遮西日想岩扉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521163_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521163'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521163_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='24f2462af25f4a04b7fe891fb8e951a3_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='24f2462af25f4a04b7fe891fb8e951a3' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，南还，过蔡州，谒颜真卿祠堂，作诗纪之。作品：《谒蔡州颜鲁公祠堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520447' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520447' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_520447'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520447'>开元天宝政多暇，孽臣奸骄浊清化。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520447'>尺八横吹入醉乡，国柄倒持与人把。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520447'>渔阳番将易汉官，在廷之臣无谏者。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520447'>吴绫蜀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>锦光照眼，更觉霓裳韵和雅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520447'>叛书夜到华清宫，狩吕<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作相臣）</span>骨惊天子讶。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520447'>二十四城陷同日，长嗟乃尔忠臣寡。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520447'>闹传平原城壁坚，穴鼻可以牿牛马。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520447'>譬如滟滪屹中流，江势远来波倒射。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520447'>吾知守职事主耳，行藏初不较用舍。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520447'>公时风姿入睿想，贯日精诚震天下。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520447'>我行上蔡黄犬门，惊风急雪吹平野。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520447'>娇鸦暮集村不嚣，古祠窈窕连桑柘。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520447'>圣朝亦旌异代忠，轩然眉须入图画。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520447'>和如戏泚卢杞题，俨若梦令希烈怕。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520447'>至今握拳透爪地，想见怒词犹慢骂。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520447'>声光自与日月争，事之成败其天也。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520447'>此诗我欲扫东壁，入<span class='inlineComment2'>（武林本作大）</span>字端宜擘窠写。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520447_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520447'>便觉云收六合阴，春随喜色生晴野。<div id='poem_note_520447'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_520447_0'>⑴ 三字原缺，据《宋诗钞》补</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_520447_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>谒蔡州李愬祠，作诗题其画像。作品：《题李愬画像》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_218222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_218222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/218222?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题李愬画像</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_218222'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_218222'>淮阴北面师广武，其气岂止吞项羽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_218222'>公方沈鸷诸将底，又笑元济无头颅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_218222'>雪中行师等儿戏，夜取蔡州藏袖里。<div id='poem_sentence_4_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_218222'>远人信宿犹未知，大类西平击朱泚。<div id='poem_sentence_5_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_218222'>锦袍玉带仍父风，拄颐长剑大梁公。<div id='poem_sentence_6_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_218222'>君看鞬櫜见丞相，此意与天相始终。<div id='poem_sentence_7_218222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_218222'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_218222_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作李愬画像赞。作品：《唐李侍中画像赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_1213536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213536?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐李侍中画像赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213536'>余观李侍中秀骨开张，英气横逸，想见蔡州雪晚缚吴元济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213536_comment'></div>公平元济，如举捶逐鼠，无难事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213536_comment'></div>唯不杀，用李祐鞬櫜见裴度，使市不改肆如乃翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213536_comment'></div>此公之所养，真足以卓绝有唐之名将矣，呜呼贤哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1213536_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
太原（阳曲）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b36ac85b9b73414988f65e1d9c47c0a1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b36ac85b9b73414988f65e1d9c47c0a1");'><span id='b36ac85b9b73414988f65e1d9c47c0a1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='b36ac85b9b73414988f65e1d9c47c0a1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年10月</a>　十月初，证狱太原府。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='c062f89e2f1141b4a3b2cb3e398745bb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c062f89e2f1141b4a3b2cb3e398745bb");'><span id='c062f89e2f1141b4a3b2cb3e398745bb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>，44岁</div><div id='c062f89e2f1141b4a3b2cb3e398745bb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年11月23日</a>　出狱后单身寄孤馆，为人涤碗盏换取口粮，徽宗委派廉访使者监勘钊庆裕，因受牵连，十一月二十三日复收入禁，将入狱，颇忧无人供饭，以银一两、钱六百付来胜甫，求办饭，作诗。作品：《御手委廉访守贰监勘钊庆裕二十三日复收入禁将入狱忧无人供饭有银一两钱六百以付来胜甫胜甫曰此止可办半月过此如何余默计曰有官饭耳》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520606' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520606' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520606?labeling=true' target='_blank'>御手委廉访守贰监勘钊庆裕二十三日复收入禁将入狱忧无人供饭有银一两钱六百以付来胜甫胜甫曰此止可办半月过此如何余默计曰有官饭耳</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年11月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520606")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520606_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520606'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520606'>出狱未两月，单身寄孤馆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520606'>别甑容搭馏，酬以涤碗盏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520606'>那知复入狱，亲旧无半眼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520606'>但馀半月粮，何以供岁晏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520606'>摩挲没柄杓，准拟吃官饭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520606'>来生空敛眉，其室亦喟叹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520606'>丛林明白老，寰宇洪觉范。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520606'>所至神物护，尔辈见不惯。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520606'>我说此偈已，万象俱称赞。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520606'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520606_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　冬，狱中暴寒，冻损呻吟，作诗自解。作品：《狱中暴寒冻损呻吟》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_520605' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520605' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520605?labeling=true' target='_blank'>狱中暴寒冻损呻吟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520605")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520605_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520605'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520605'>由心有痴爱，痴爱乃有业。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520605'>因业疾病生，痛此百骨节。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520605'>声相成呻吟，齿颊空咬龁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520605'>侧眼看圜扉，以手枕匣褉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520605'>观此心无形，安得有业结。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520605'>业结如空华，病宁有枝叶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520605'>方作是念时，颠倒想即灭。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520605'>心造古佛样，路入法界辙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520605'>稽首甘露味，销此烦恼热。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520605'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520605_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年12月8日</a>　十二月八日，以禁中神御殿成，减天下罪囚一等，获释出狱。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
麻城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fadb34a2fa0d47f4a268f2acf3aaee40_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fadb34a2fa0d47f4a268f2acf3aaee40");'><span id='fadb34a2fa0d47f4a268f2acf3aaee40_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>，45岁</div><div id='fadb34a2fa0d47f4a268f2acf3aaee40' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过麻城，作诗赠接待僧胜上人。作品：《赠麻城接待僧胜上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠麻城接待僧胜上人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521358")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521358'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521358'>绿发凋零白业增，住庵随分有规绳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521358'>为分一邑人家饭，普供十方云水僧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521358'>扫径客来圆笑靥，开轩云破露寒层。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521358'>君看击桶金牛手，坐续山头柏子灯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521358'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>道经麻城岐亭。<br /></div>

-----title
黄冈
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='cbbd5c6ef80d4cbdb5d7b3d81b058e08_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cbbd5c6ef80d4cbdb5d7b3d81b058e08");'><span id='cbbd5c6ef80d4cbdb5d7b3d81b058e08_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年</a>　黄州逢范坦二子，作诗赠之。作品：《赠范伯履承奉二子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520460?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠范伯履承奉二子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1115年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520460")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520460'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520460'>大范风月湖，小范烟雨柳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520460'>清明与秀彻，风度随付受。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520460'>醉阑看落笔，已觉风助肘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520460'>声名定追寻，公卿在怀袖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520460'>江湖方纵浪，第未一唾手。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520460'>乃公干国器，谠论在人口。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520460'>谪居长闭门，药方曾校否。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520460'>著书亦细事，用舍付杯酒。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520460'>君看雨园鸠，雨晴定呼旧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520460'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_520460_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1115&endYear=1115')">1115年2月19日</a>　二月十九日，为惠臻禅师作《华严同缘序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二三。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1213256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华严同缘序</a><span class='authorDate'>（政和五年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213256")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213256'>余闻一切众生识种，皆具十法界性，谓佛、菩萨、缘觉、声闻四圣，天、人、傍生、饿鬼、地狱、阿修罗六凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213256_comment'></div>是十种性本无性，随所熏起，任运成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213256_comment'></div>有人于此，为诸人等谈无上，道解脱，知见一切众生，皆證圆觉，则识性熏发佛种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213256_comment'></div>如是乃至为诸人等谈不义，语毁谤三宝一切障道之法，则识性熏发恶道种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213256_comment'></div>是故如来世尊每谓众曰：「善男子、善知识者，是汝等最大因缘，能令汝辈明见佛性，离苦成道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213256_comment'></div>事彼知识，不惜身命」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213256_comment'></div>又菩萨愿力，愿与众生为不请友，其所立誓，惟欲众生悟心成佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213256_comment'></div>然诸众生自弃自贱，贪恋生死，飘流诸趣，不能逢遇善知识、善友，如万顷波寻一瓦砾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213256_comment'></div>今惠臻道人欲以是毗卢藏微尘章句，不思议妙义，结万人同观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213256_comment'></div>看其设心，欲熏发一切众生佛乘之种，是其愿力，为不请友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213256_comment'></div>而我大众，同得值遇，譬如盲龟值浮木孔，当生难遭之想，起增上善心，使易成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213256_comment'></div>俟其毕，作为卵塔，书万人名，各藏于塔中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213256_comment'></div>虚空可殒，而此愿力如烁迦罗，惟愿刹刹尘尘，證明我说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213256_comment'></div>呜呼，六道以忧畏饥饿之火所逼烧，尚不闻有佛，安得闻经哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213256_comment'></div>唯人道一切成就，既已见佛，又复闻经，而不请友曲折诱导，更复惰慢，作跛驴心，是真自弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213256_comment'></div>凡我见前法界性侣，幸同进道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213256_comment'></div>惠臻道行高洁，而饱丛林，受持愿力，久矣成熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213256_comment'></div>是故今同普告大众，是日已过，命亦随减，唯加鞭此道，是真知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213256_comment'></div>政和五年二月十九日书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213256_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='addb32a748de430cb64bdf2002f138f8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("addb32a748de430cb64bdf2002f138f8");'><span id='addb32a748de430cb64bdf2002f138f8_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>，57岁</div><div id='addb32a748de430cb64bdf2002f138f8' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年10月</a>　十月，欲自襄沔还新昌洞山，道经黄州观音院，见僧祖钦，题其壁。作品：《题观音院壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213478?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题观音院壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213478")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213478'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213478'>□□祖师相授法者三世，塔庙在淮山，从之游，得道者多庵于苍岩大林之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213478_comment'></div>路由蕲春，真身存者无虑八十馀处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213478_comment'></div>黄于蕲为接壤，太平兴国初，僧昭信始见琳公于大石之间，大安、龟头相继而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213478_comment'></div>竹瓦之东石尉村有古松两株，参天合抱，邦民岁祷雨旸于其下，其应如悬响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213478_comment'></div>垂拱初，耆旧相传为观音院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213478_comment'></div>呜呼，岂非祖师之门，得道出世于兹，已尝建寺，毁坏而不可考者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213478_comment'></div>有僧祖钦投牒疏其事于郡太守待制韩公驹，欣然给据付之，使中兴其院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213478_comment'></div>钦敦厚坦夷，道俗爱之，翕然而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213478_comment'></div>余建炎元年□□过焉，到门却立，纵望云间，万峰来朝，兹地也其兴乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213478_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
新干（新淦）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fa6cdaa024e744c5a1cc2eaa9fcf759e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fa6cdaa024e744c5a1cc2eaa9fcf759e");'><span id='fa6cdaa024e744c5a1cc2eaa9fcf759e_link' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520622")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520622_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520622'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520622'>一昨海外归，尽见故山侣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520622'>夫子独未见，梦想识风度。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520622'>今日复何日，乃获抵掌语。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520622'>犹疑是梦中，惊定无所睹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520622'>忽惊锋刃攒，凛然为毛竖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520622'>可读不可识，森严开武库。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520622'>百态出俄顷，春破赖缀补。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520622'>词高殆天得，那借江山助。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520622'>人间有此客，而使衣涴土。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520622'>君看绛阙姿，矫不受控御。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520622'>大言惷上商，坐此得龃龉。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520622'>天公聊戏之，一官良蹇寓。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520622'>天风吹绿鬓，醉眼盖寰宇。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520622'>阎浮一沤耳，是身等唾雾。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520622'>功名付揶揄，富贵我剧具。<div id='poem_sentence_16_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_520622'>道山弱水上，凝睇隔烟雨。<div id='poem_sentence_17_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_520622'>夜晴觉天多，月好笑起舞。<div id='poem_sentence_18_520622_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_520622_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>访新淦何昌言，昌言出芝草三本相示，为作诗。作品：《何忠孺出芝草三本皆黄色指其小者曰昔登第时产此今重华为作此》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>何忠孺出芝草三本皆黄色指其小者曰昔登第时产此今重华为作此</a><span class='authorDate'>（1116年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521902")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_521902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521902'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521902'>家山又产灵芝瑞，天独于君著意深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521902'>层秀已成重盖兆，色黄更类笏头金。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521902'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_521902_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>何昌言又以古鼎相示，为作诗。作品：《古鼎》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div -----title
祁阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3fd98f7048e244ffbd14355dfe659385_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3fd98f7048e244ffbd14355dfe659385");'><span id='3fd98f7048e244ffbd14355dfe659385_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>，50岁</div><div id='3fd98f7048e244ffbd14355dfe659385' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　至祁阳见夏倪，代为之作宴人致语。作品：《代夏均甫宴人致语一首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_521387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代夏均甫宴人致语一首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521387")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521387'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521387'>九龄风度照峿台，宴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>寝香凝画戟开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521387'>归国已倾天下耳<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作士）</span>，驻轩宜举故人杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521387'>青天白日心常在，附骥攀鳞志未摧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521387'>累足待公成相业，更随风驭看蓬莱<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《石门文字禅》卷一三）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521387'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521387_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_521387'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_521387_0'>⑴ 原作寔，据四库本、武林本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_521387_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年9月11日</a>　九月十一日，在祁阳与夏倪登灵泉寺远游堂，为作记。作品：《远游堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_1213446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>远游堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年9月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213446")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213446'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213446'>宣和元年秋八月，朝奉郎夏公自天府谪官祁阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213446_comment'></div>明年三月至自三岘，馆于灵泉寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213446_comment'></div>寺临大江，江流湍急，断岸千尺，万峰环之，如趋如揖，如翔如集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213446_comment'></div>公构堂其西，尽收其形胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213446_comment'></div>靖深以宜茂林脩竹，虚明以隔嚣声尘氛，而名之「远游」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213446_comment'></div>重九后二日，余从公登焉，对立凝睇，晴岚夕晖，浮动乎绿疏青琐之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213446_comment'></div>促榻对语，笑响散落乎千岩万壑之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213446_comment'></div>于是隐几，枵然忘言，盖其倚功名于忧患之外，玩云川以自娱，心饱新得，百想俱灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213446_comment'></div>然知国知兵，百未一施，而沉冥小邑，如对彭泽之狄梁公，通泉之郭代公，乃名所居之堂为「远游」，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213446_comment'></div>嗟乎世之识真者寡，所从来旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213446_comment'></div>袁天纲识武后于襁褓，惊曰：「贵武氏者，此儿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213446_comment'></div>使天纲果识真，当曰亡武氏可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213446_comment'></div>贺知章果识真，当曰游仙可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213446_comment'></div>夫一尘翳目，天地四方易位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213446_comment'></div>袁、贺方眩梦幻，以其祸为贵，以游为谪，要不足怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213446_comment'></div>公今去国之远，而能酬酢风月，安乐泉石，酒后耳热，侍儿扶掖而歌，则忘其身之为逆旅，谓之谪可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213446_comment'></div>公尝首肯余论，祝余为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213446_comment'></div>公讳倪，字均甫，其先江南人，嘉祐为名臣之后，凛凛有祖风者也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1213446_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　与祁阳县令陆弁同游浯溪，读中兴碑，作诗纪之。作品：《同景庄游浯溪读中兴碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_520449' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520449' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520449?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同景庄游浯溪读中兴碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520449")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520449_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520449'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520449'>上皇御天功最盛，生民温饱卧安枕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520449'>醉凭艳姬一笑适，薄夫议之无乃甚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520449'>长安遮天胡骑尘，潼关战血深没人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520449'>哥舒臣贼不足惜，要脔国忠如脍鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520449'>苍黄去国食不暇，马嵬赐死谢天下。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520449'>反身罪己成汤心，奈何犹有讥之者。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520449'>取非其子又遽匆，灵武君臣无怍容。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520449'>何须呜咽让衮服，自控归鞍八尺龙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520449'>谁磨石壁湘江上，揩拭云烟溅惊浪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520449'>龙蛇飞动忠义词，颜元色庄俨相向。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520449'>与君来游秋满眼，閒行古寺西风晚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520449'>道人兴废了不知，但见游人来读碑。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520449'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_520449_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宁乡
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4c8532b6336a4429864b4a9bc139909d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4c8532b6336a4429864b4a9bc139909d");'><span id='4c8532b6336a4429864b4a9bc139909d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>，50岁</div><div id='4c8532b6336a4429864b4a9bc139909d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年11月</a>　十一月，至沩山，陪元轼禅师夜话，作诗。作品：《过沩山陪空印禅师夜话》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_521256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过沩山陪空印禅师夜话</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_521256")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_521256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_521256'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_521256'>浓翠湿衣三十里，渡溪知背几重云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_521256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_521256'>忽惊宝构从空堕，便觉风光与世分。<div id='poem_sentence_1_521256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_521256'>夜久天香凝错莫，庭闲花雨自缤纷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_521256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_521256'>他生曾伴安禅地，此夕楼钟复共闻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_521256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_521256'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_521256_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　应僧法义之请，为元轼作《潭州大沩山中兴记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_1213428' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213428' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213428?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州大沩山中兴记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213428")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213428_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213428'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213428'>崇宁三年十一月，大沩山密印禅寺火，一夕而烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213428_comment'></div>住持僧海评移疾，郡以子方者继焉，未几而弃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213428_comment'></div>寺规模宏大，而经营者非其人，岁移三霜，才办法堂、大殿、寝室而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213428_comment'></div>然又苟简，斋庖垣庑皆未具，上雨旁风，无所盖障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213428_comment'></div>故禅学者分处山间林下，蜂房蚁穴，百丈大雄之风，陵夷至此极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213428_comment'></div>大观三年，潭帅曾公孝蕴闻之，曰：「沩山，南国精庐之冠，非道行信于缁衲，名誉重于缙绅者，莫能振兴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213428_comment'></div>吾闻天衣怀禅师，在嘉祐、治平之间，五迁法席，皆废残荒寂处，而怀能幻出宝构，化成禅丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213428_comment'></div>今空印禅师轼公者，盖怀四世之孙，而吴江法真之嗣，方说法于庐山之下，学者归之如云，挺然有祖风烈，当能整大圆真如已坠之网」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213428_comment'></div>于是厚礼遣人致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213428_comment'></div>越明年三月，空印来自归宗，山川改观，丛席增气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213428_comment'></div>登殿拜起，周顾太息，曰：「冠世绝境，大佛应迹，而殿宇卑陋，堂室狭小，何以严像设而致吉祥，震潮音而集龙天哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213428_comment'></div>皆广其基构而增修之，使其壮丽称山雄深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213428_comment'></div>传曰：「钟声铿铿以立号，号以警众也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213428_comment'></div>寺钟不足以光焰四海，选佛来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213428_comment'></div>于是聚铜神运仓之下，穴山为炉，钟成万斤，涂以黄金，建阁馆于殿之东庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213428_comment'></div>佛菩萨之语藏于龙宫，传自五天，学者所当尽心，所以资智證之妙，而尽细微之惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213428_comment'></div>即室五千轴者，藏于殿之西庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213428_comment'></div>又明年，增广善法堂之后为雨花堂，含风而虚明，吐月而宏深，夜参既罢，缤纷满庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213428_comment'></div>自两廊之左，绕以复屋，建库院，所以总庶务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1213428_comment'></div>自祖龛之右，翼以脩廊，建堂司，所以牧清众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1213428_comment'></div>又明年，重修僧堂，广博靖深，冬温夏凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1213428_comment'></div>曰僧者天人之福田，佛祖之因地，十方如来同一道，故出离生死，旷野深山，圣道场地，皆阿罗汉所住持，世间粗人所不能见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1213428_comment'></div>既以广延其所见，则所不见者敢不敬乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1213428_comment'></div>又刻五百尊者之像，阁而供事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1213428_comment'></div>又明年，得异木于绝壑，断而为三，大合抱，长倍寻，刻净土佛菩萨之像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1213428_comment'></div>庄严妙丽，千花照映，如紫金山并高争峻，建殿于天供厨之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1213428_comment'></div>又特建阁于寝室之前，绿疏青琐，下临风雨，奉安神宗皇帝所赐御书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1213428_comment'></div>阁成，而东南倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1213428_comment'></div>师默计曰：「增万牛莫能挽，且天章宸翰之所在，山君水王之所宜谨藏而卫护之，今职弗修，是神羞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1213428_comment'></div>言卒而风雷挟屋，山岳憾动，俄而阁正，万人欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1213428_comment'></div>昔大圆禅师开法此山也，有众千人，硕大而秀出者，有若大仰寂子、香严闲禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1213428_comment'></div>建两堂为学者燕闲之私，而名其东曰香严，名其西曰大仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1213428_comment'></div>方欲广摄异根，则修净土观法不以宗门为谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1213428_comment'></div>及其成就法器，则以寂子、闲禅期学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1213428_comment'></div>盖其方便应机而设教，譬如大海，蚊䗈、阿脩罗，饮者皆得饱满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1213428_comment'></div>又明年，重修大三门，宏壮杰立，镂金镂碧，宝翰飞动于千岩万壑之上，而太师楚国公为书其额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1213428_comment'></div>却望形胜，众峰来朝，如趋如俯，如屹立，如蹈舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1213428_comment'></div>有台自献其前，以宝积灵牙舍利葬台之中，而建塔其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1213428_comment'></div>千尺九层，荡摩云烟，微风徐来，塔铃和鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1213428_comment'></div>比丘来往，旋绕作礼，望之如开牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1213428_comment'></div>疑师以三昧力抟取梵释龙天之宫，置于人间，不然，何其幻怪神异如此其多耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1213428_comment'></div>唐元和中，僧昙叙开基，则有绪言曰：「地灵甚不可葬，葬且致祸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1213428_comment'></div>今三百馀年，僧物故莫敢塔，塔于回心桥南十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1213428_comment'></div>师曰：「事无大小而断于理，从违不可苟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1213428_comment'></div>僧火化，众俱临，先圣令不可违也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1213428_comment'></div>祸福之来，以智避就之，不可从也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1213428_comment'></div>遂建普同塔于寺之西，又修大圆禅师之塔，而峙立两亭，以覆古今碑刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1213428_comment'></div>部从者以其威灵，奏赐真应禅师塔曰净惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1213428_comment'></div>圣溪庄垄亩为比邻所吞，数世且百年，莫敢谁何，师云：「此唐相国裴公施以饭十方僧者，横目何德以堪之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1213428_comment'></div>不直而归，是陷人入泥犁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1213428_comment'></div>遣掌事执券證诸官，竟还二百亩，岁度一僧，上资睿算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1213428_comment'></div>有玉泉住持僧死于龙牙山，山中之人不容其葬，弟子抱骨石涕，师哀之，使于沩山择地建冢塔，丛林义之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1213428_comment'></div>师之潜行密用之懿，时时见于与夺，然皆本于仁义，道俗化其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1213428_comment'></div>政和六年，敕补住镇军之焦山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1213428_comment'></div>师雅意不欲东，解住持事，力辞之，归庵鸾溪之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1213428_comment'></div>俄诏听还之沩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1213428_comment'></div>自其始至，中而还，八年之间，百废具兴，非乘愿力，何以臻此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1213428_comment'></div>雪窦天衣之道，至师大振，丛林归心焉，兴修盖其游戏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1213428_comment'></div>今嗣法者，自南台定昭、了山、法光而下，诜诜辈出，棋布名山，方进而未艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1213428_comment'></div>法义谓余曰：「沩山之雄夸，非空印老师莫能办之，精神非文字莫足以传，愿求文以昭后世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1213428_comment'></div>不得辞，系以辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_1213428'>有异比丘清而狂，相山趼足穷衡湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1213428_comment'></div>黄才掬溪行嗅尝，笑云水作青莲香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1213428_comment'></div>梯空杙险屡仆僵，寝宿雾露冲虎狼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1213428_comment'></div>水与石斗声舂撞，谁挽千乘行羊肠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1213428_comment'></div>霄然洞开云水乡，横峰侧岭争回翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1213428_comment'></div>咨嗟曰此古道场，山灵乃今发天藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1213428_comment'></div>泥草吟啸久彷徉，无人告语空夕阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1213428_comment'></div>翩然曳杖还江南，道经新吴山郁苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1213428_comment'></div>登山作礼僧中王，骨面气宇凌八荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1213428_comment'></div>侍其侧者矫鸾皇，祐公杰出尤堂堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1213428_comment'></div>袖中肉山倾置旁，瓶锡一笑戏取将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1213428_comment'></div>懒安寂子尤敦厖，佐于耨耕立禅房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1213428_comment'></div>九世沉溺为津梁，分灯延联世相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1213428_comment'></div>既绝复续暗而彰，轼公貌癯中方刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1213428_comment'></div>漆瞳照人俨而庄，食堂十年折绳床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1213428_comment'></div>有大长老续遗芳，派出天衣嗣吴江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1213428_comment'></div>烬馀为子整颓纲，机锋击电谁敢当？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1213428_comment'></div>宗风回顾已举扬，以印印空成文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1213428_comment'></div>凛然面目如冰霜，令人望见折慢幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1213428_comment'></div>丛林迩来顿荒凉，反袂拭面空叹伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1213428_comment'></div>而师声价重四方，力能咄嗟办宝坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1213428_comment'></div>又取佛日重洗光，芙蓉峰峻沩水长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1213428_comment'></div>功德之利建我皇，愿同山呼寿无疆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1213428_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　为元轼作《圆同庵铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圆同庵铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213480")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1213480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213480'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213480'>空印之庵，圆何所同？<div id='poem_sentence_0_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213480'>睨而视之，同太虚空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213480'>弗设户牖，无南北东。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213480'>而庵中人，来无所从。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213480'>廓然现前，以道为容。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213480'>我此法界，遇缘即宗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213480'>自受用境，出生无穷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1213480'>使令服玩，地狱天宫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1213480'>各各无碍，如空行风。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1213480'>我非文殊，齿豁头童。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1213480'>以问法来，罄折其躬。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1213480'>而师应机，如随扣钟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1213480'>聊观此老，游戏神通。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1213480'>不起于座，瞬两漆瞳。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1213480'>以大千界，置于针锋。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1213480'>以香水海，藏于睫中。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1213480'>一切人天，之与鱼龙。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1213480'>不觉不知，如盲如聋。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1213480'>万像欢呼，声摩苍穹。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1213480'>天魔外道，以手捣胸。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1213480'>欲折困之，面为发红。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1213480'>如环轮上，寻其始终。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1213480'>于是雌伏，仰此法雄。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1213480'>我虽衰退，气犹如虹。<div id='poem_sentence_23_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1213480'>未甘见删，终依禅丛。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1213480'>斯文之作，荡除执封。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1213480'>当以理胜，文则非工。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1213480'>沩山之阴，磐石可砻。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1213480'>书以刻之，昭示童蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1213480'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1213480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　为元轼作《俱清轩铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_1213500' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213500' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213500?labeling=true' target='_blank'>俱清轩铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213500")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1213500_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213500'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213500'>晓云灭尽，群山苍然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1213500'>倚杖凝睇，如开青莲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1213500'>夜籁以寂，绕除流泉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1213500'>曲肱而听，如鸣朱弦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213500'>有大禅衲，不碍见闻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1213500'>以云门印，印空成文。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1213500'>对是净境，深炷炉熏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1213500'>人牛两亡，蓑笠具存。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1213500_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1213500'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213500_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　作偈颂题沩山立雪轩。作品：《题沩山立雪轩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_522050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_522050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/522050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题沩山立雪轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_522050")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_522050_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_522050'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_522050'>沩山雪晓试凭栏，露地牛儿觅转难。<div id='poem_sentence_0_522050_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_522050'>脱体见前谁对立，一尘不受眼空寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_522050_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_522050'>日长齿颊茶甘在，客去轩窗篆缕残。<div id='poem_sentence_2_522050_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_522050'>好在少林成想像，祖师时展画图看。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　沩山外侍者求诗，为之作。作品：《大沩山外侍者求诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大沩山外侍者求诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520729")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520729'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520729'>湘南古丛林，钟梵百世传。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520729'>大圆百丈来，缚屋岩石边。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520729'>焕然成宝坊，服用如诸天。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520729'>经今成几何，已逾三百年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520729'>谁为中兴者，卓哉空印贤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520729'>大钟日夕撞，圆音答山川。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520729'>衲子自成群，昼诵而夜禅。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520729'>道人旧未识，眉目何渊然。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520729'>乞诗亦不恶，篝灯临网笺。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520729'>人生等浮云，达者无后先。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520729'>我亦一戏耳，走笔成长篇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_520729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年</a>　吴兴宗作诗送弟从元轼出家，次其韵。作品：《次韵吴兴宗送弟从沩山空印出家》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_520707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_520707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/520707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵吴兴宗送弟从沩山空印出家</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释德洪", "poem_title_520707")'>释德洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_520707_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_520707'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_520707'>身心俱出家，岂复论家世。<div id='poem_sentence_0_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_520707'>一念断攀缘，即入三摩地。<div id='poem_sentence_1_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_520707'>珍重大愿王，此法端可恃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_520707'>若能训此心，是毕丈夫事。<div id='poem_sentence_3_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_520707'>君看宏觉师，后身是昙谛。<div id='poem_sentence_4_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_520707'>傥欲贮甘露，先将洁令器。<div id='poem_sentence_5_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_520707'>自当福人天，岂止能自利。<div id='poem_sentence_6_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_520707'>譬如鸡出燖，真复生厌离。<div id='poem_sentence_7_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_520707'>空印法门杰，净慈数高弟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_520707'>初不荷吾法，亦自为□瑞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_520707'>汝能倾心事，建此平生志。<div id='poem_sentence_10_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_520707'>净中有浮念，何异目有翳。<div id='poem_sentence_11_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_520707'>内外俱一如，乃称真正士。<div id='poem_sentence_12_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_520707'>以此谈妙法，要使天华坠。<div id='poem_sentence_13_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_520707'>百里半九十，良医三折臂。<div id='poem_sentence_14_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_520707'>果解信此言，不愧甘蔗裔。<div id='poem_sentence_15_520707_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_520707'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_520707_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年12月</a>　十二月，与元轼登芙蓉峰，谒长老从公于潮音堂，同游东涧，道人师粲、法钦、文显预焉，同游者累石塔于涧曲，为作铭。作品：《石塔铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1213515' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213515' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213515?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石塔铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213515")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213515_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213515'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213515'>沩山空印禅师轼公，与余登芙蓉，谒长老从公于潮音堂，同游东涧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213515_comment'></div>道人师粲、法钦、文显预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213515_comment'></div>空印使同游者以石累塔于涧之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213515_comment'></div>从笑曰：「连日群鹊翔鸣，岂此胜缘之祥耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213515_comment'></div>空印请甘露灭某铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1213515'>万峰之颠，乃有流泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213515_comment'></div>迸两石间，雪涡回旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213515_comment'></div>崄于三峡，下临玉渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213515_comment'></div>上有危石，其大如屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213515_comment'></div>可坐百夫，藓封苍玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1213515_comment'></div>同来六僧，五七童仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1213515_comment'></div>妍鄙俱笑，响答山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1213515_comment'></div>唯大士轼，约束长幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1213515_comment'></div>叠石为塔，团团层秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1213515_comment'></div>于一食顷，谈笑而就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1213515_comment'></div>其愿伊何，天子万寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1213515_comment'></div>山禽何知，群飞和鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1213515_comment'></div>物不虚应，胜事克成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1213515_comment'></div>咨尔东阿，地祇山灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1213515_comment'></div>护持此塔，使长听经。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1213515_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年12月</a>　酌泉赋诗，夜宿芙蓉峰，作诗三首题方丈壁。作品：《宿芙蓉峰书方丈壁三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span>《宿芙蓉峰书方丈壁三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span>《宿芙蓉峰书方丈壁三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《石门文字禅》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_521906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_521906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/521906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿芙蓉峰书方丈壁三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1120&endYear=1120')">1120年12月</a>　次日，杖屦下危峰，涧行十余里，入石门已夕，及寺，已二鼓，住山宣公允常有虎来，记其事书浮泥壁。作品：《题浮泥壁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《石门文字禅》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1213475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1213475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1213475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题浮泥壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1120年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(33754, "北宋", "释惠洪", "poem_title_1213475")'>释惠洪</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1213475_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1213475'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1213475'>空印禅师以宣和二年十二月偕余谒从禅师于芙蓉峰，累石于玉渊之上以为塔，酌泉赋诗，暮夜矣，遂宿焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1213475_comment'></div>次日从公追余二人，杖屦下危峰，自关山谷中，并涧行十馀里，两山争倚天，烟霏层叠自献，部曲断续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1213475_comment'></div>行九地底，水声硔硐，如千乘车挽而起，仰望晴虚，如展匹练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1213475_comment'></div>既出谷，沃野夷旷，遂饭于木阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1213475_comment'></div>空山暴寒，雪意浓甚，跣而渡涧者十八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1213475_comment'></div>入石门已夕，山中之人炬而来迎，及寺已二鼓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1213475_comment'></div>秉烛夜话，如梦寐中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1213475_comment'></div>住山宣公云：「常有虎来，月黑踰垣而去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1213475_comment'></div>空印使余记之，遂书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1213475_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
